1b1(rgyud): rgyug skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA san+ni pa tA rad+ha ka tu
1b2(rgyud): mA hA yA na swA tra/ bad skad du/ 'phrogs pa'i
1b3(rgyud): gi gzungs zhes byang theg po chen po'i mdo// de bzhin gshegs pa
2a1(rgyud): #/ zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa chen po dbyangs can
2a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya
2a3(rgyud): ba'i gzungs 'di sbyar bar bgyis/ bdag gi rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ oM
2a4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ A bI re/ A bA re// AM bA re/ AM bA re/ pa ri kuny+dzA/ na da na da/ puska ra
2b1(rgyud): bA hA/ dza lu khA/ ma khA ya/ i li/ mi li/ ki li mi li/ kirdi pA ra mu dwe/ mu drA/ mu khe swA hA/ oM
2b2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka
2b3(rgyud): gnas pa na/ dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa
2b4(rgyud): zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab
2b5(rgyud): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/
3a1(rgyud): #bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin
3a2(rgyud): tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byang chub
3a3(rgyud): sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/ lhun po'i rtse 'dzin blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu/
3a4(rgyud): lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang po'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'od kyi/
3a5(rgyud): blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / 'jam dpa'
3a6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thub dka' gzhon nur gyur pa dang / chu lha gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dri ma med pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang
3b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad kyang bzod pa dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ chos thams
3b2(rgyud): cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la
3b3(rgyud): 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa thabs shes la mkhas pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
3b4(rgyud): bo na kun tu rgyu mkhas pa gsal ba / yid gzhungs pa rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yog lnga brgya pa gcig gi ming ni nye rgyal gcig gi ming ni pang nas skyes zhes
3b5(rgyud): bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can de gnyis phan tshun 'di ltar bdag cag las gang gis thog mar bdud rtsi thob pa nges gcig la gcig sbran to zhes dam tshig byas so//
3b6(rgyud): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/
3b7(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa te thul spyod yul du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo // mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar dge slong 'da'i spyong lam
4a1(rgyud): mdzes pa de lta bu ni bdag gis sngan chad dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ mir gyur pa gzhan su la'ang gang yang sngon ma mthong na/ bdag de'i gan du song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa khyo
4a2(rgyud): ston pa gang yin/ gang las rab tu byung gang gi chos la dga' zhes dri'o snyam nas/ de nas kun tu rgyunye rgyal/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig
4a3(rgyud): mngon du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe/
4a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang / gang las rab tu byung gang gi chos la dga'/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// shAkya'i sras po brtul zhugs dka'
4a5(rgyud): thub chen po kun gyi dam pa dbang ldan pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin cing grol la de bzhin 'gro ba 'grol mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas shes bya sang mdzad mi mnyam sdug bsngal mtsho bskams da ltar 'di na yod/
4a6(rgyud): dri ma med pa de yi skyabs sung song nga ni de yi chos la dga'// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi ston pa ji skad smra/ ji skad ston/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis sbas pa de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa legs par
4a7(rgyud): rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed chur ldan 'byung dang / las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs
4b1(rgyud): gang na s+t+rai dang na dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa thar pa'i mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// de nas kun tu t+tA nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos/
4b2(rgyud): nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la nyon mongs pa med pa skyes te/ des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang ba 'di skad ces smras so//
4b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis ni shin tu rnyeng dka' thob gter bdud rtsi'i chos bshad pa/ 'di ni rtag tu skye ba'i 'ba' chu skams par bden par khong du chud// de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste/
4b4(rgyud): lam 'di dam pa shes rab chos rnams sgom pa mi mnyam byed pa yin de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa/
4b5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka
4b6(rgyud): gnas pa na 'di lta ste/ ral pa can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dung thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rgyal gyis smras pa/ bdag gis thogs po'i mchog dang slob ma'i 'tsho
4b7(rgyud): la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu chu'i rgyal/ tshe dang ldan pa na thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te slar song nas/ kun
5a1(rgyud): tu d+hu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ba dang / kun tu chu bar nas skyes kyis/ kun tu rgyun rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas kun tu hUM ba rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so//
5a2(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni dngas bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dka/ pags pa'i mdog na kun tu dkar ba las na tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed do// nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
5a3(rgyud): pa de de bzhin te/ kho bos bdud rtsi rnyed kyis tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang kho bos ci rnyed pa khyod la bshad do// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan las langs
5a4(rgyud): nasabla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so// gang gis srid gsum rgya ma
5a5(rgyud): myur rgal zhing / phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba// mya ngan med zhi lam de shod cig dang // yang 'byung med pa'i lam du 'jug par bya// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar/
5a6(rgyud): 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyur ldan 'byung dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa/
5a7(rgyud): thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// bang nas skyes kyis spras pa/ sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma med bzhi pa'i chos gnyon mongs lta ngan nyes pa thams cad zhi byed mi shes/
5b1(rgyud): gcod pa dang / 'di ni 'dus byas gsog gsob de phyir stong pa slubar thub pas gsungs// de thos ni bdag 'gyur dri ma med pa'i tshig de thos te gsungs// nyergyal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten las dang /
5b2(rgyud): nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyar ldan 'brang dang // las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de yang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs// gang na skye dang na dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa// thar pa mchog de smra ba'i/
5b3(rgyud): khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs// de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis de nyid du chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cig dri ma dang bral la/ nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par sbyangs te/ des rgyun du zhugs
5b4(rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 'di skad ces smras so// yang dag spyod pa 'di ni chu bo sgrol ba zhi ba mgyogs pa gzings// ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum po zhi byed 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro// 'di ni yongs su
5b5(rgyud): shes na nyon mongs phung po 'joms shing bdud 'dul 'gyur// thar pa 'di ni dgra dang 'thab mo bsal cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems// pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
5b6(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da ltag la bzhugs/ nye rgyal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na dge
5b7(rgyud): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes thos na/ bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngam/ pang nas skyes kyis smras pa/
6a1(rgyud): / tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin te bdag bdag gi 'khor la bltas la rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas skad
6a2(rgyud): cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ bdud sdig can gyis yul ang g+ha ma g+ha d+ha na mkhas shing snyan pa dang / brjod pa dang / grags par ldan pa/ skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes g.yog dang bcas te
6a3(rgyud): dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'dod do zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge slong go'u ta ma'i slob mar gyur na/ bdag gis bdud kyi yul stongs par byed kyis
6a4(rgyud): bdag der song ste skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu byung ba las bzlog la/ sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du gzhug go snyam ste/ de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam la bdud sdig can myur du bdag gi khang pa
6a5(rgyud): nas mi snang bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bsgyur nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na lam kar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos
6a6(rgyud): sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste/ khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges pa bgam par bya ba'i phyir// smras pa de dag thams cad don yod ma yin 'di la rgyu yang med// dge dang mi dge'i las
6a7(rgyud): de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la yod// myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod rtsed mo byos// skye rga na 'chi med cing sdug bsngal med de 'jig rten pha rol med// bsod nams
6b1(rgyud): bsod nams ma yin las bskyed 'bras med rgyu dang byed pa med/ rnyed phyir 'dir ni shAkya'i bu yis spras kyis dad pa ma 'gro zhig/ de nas nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/
6b2(rgyud): kye ma bdud sdig can bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba las bzlog pa'i phyir 'ongs so snyam nas/ de nas nye rgyal rgyad kyis phyogs te 'dug nas/ rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// zam ze'i khye
6b3(rgyud): khyed nyon cig 'khor ba'i skyon// dran par gyis la 'jig rten rga ba yis// gzir cing 'chi bdag gis ni rab bskor ba// de gnyis spang phyir rab byung legs par zung // de nas pang nas skyes kyis
6b4(rgyud): bdud la slar smras pa/ mkhas pa'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gsum mthar 'byin mchog chos rnams kun shes kyis// rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros 'di las skyong nus su yang med// srid
6b5(rgyud): pa rab zhi bya phyir bdag cag brtan pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bad// seng ge'i gzugs can wa yi chog gis nged kyi blo gros ma sgyur cig/ bden pa mthong ba'i lha gang dag nam mkhas la 'dug pa de dag
6b6(rgyud): gis / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad
6b7(rgyud): las khyad par 'phags pa'i lam yin te/ lam 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o// lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa'o// 'di lta ste/ rab tu
7a1(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo// de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug
7a2(rgyud): bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang // pang nas skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so// zam
7a3(rgyud): ze'i khye'u dag nged ni rga ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa las rab tu 'byung bar yang dang par chas kyi khyed kyis shes par gyis shig/ khyed rnams las gang bcom/
7a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni 'di nas phyir log cig/ de nas bram zer khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis cung zad shes pa de kun
7a5(rgyud): kyang khyed kyi mthun khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na/ khyed gang las rab tu byung ba de las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal
7a6(rgyud): dang / bang nas smyos g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par 'dud sdig can gyis rig nas/ ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i gan du 'gro mo nus par bya ba'i phyir
7a7(rgyud): rgyal po'i lab kyi grong khyer chen po'i byo logs su g.yang sa chen po babs su dpag chang btu ba zhig sprul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du
7b1(rgyud): mdzad deg ci nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis g.yang sa chen po de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do// yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du chen po brtan pa/ sra ba//
7b2(rgyud): rnyil ba sul med pa gcig tu stug por gyur pa mkhregs pa 'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa zhig mngon par sprul te/ seng ge khro zhing gdug la gtum pa sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul
7b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid drang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri nga'ang ma mthong / seng ge'ang ma mthong / seng ge'i skad kyang mthos te ka lam drang por bcom ldan 'das gal ba
7b4(rgyud): der logs su song ngo // bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor mang po brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
7b5(rgyud): slong dag khyed skyes bu dam pa tshogs kyi gtso bo g.yog gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa
7b6(rgyud): 'di gnyis g.yog dang bcas te nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas/ gcig ni nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gcig ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong zhig gis
7b7(rgyud): de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// skyes bu mkhas pa g.yog ldan 'di gnyis ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan shes rab 'jig med par/ mi mchog phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te// bdag gis de gnyis bsti stang
8a1(rgyud): bskyed nas bsu// de nas dge slong de stan las langs nas/ dge slong mang po khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsu nas bsnyen bkun
8a2(rgyud): byas so// de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
8a3(rgyud): 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol/ bdag cag bcom
8a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyi ming ci/ nye rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bdag ni bram ze nya rgyal gyi bu lags te/ nye rgyal zhes
8a5(rgyud): bgyi/ bdag gi ma'i ming shA ri'i ka ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni shA ri'i bu zhes btags so// bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so// pang nas skyes kyis gsol
8a6(rgyud): pabadag gi pa'i ming ni ko'u di n+ya zhes bgyi/ bdag gi ma'i ming ni mo'u 'gal zhes bgyi ste/ bdag de las skyes pas na/ de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes btags so// bdag rab tu 'byung
8a7(rgyud): bar yang pha mas gnang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga'i thad du g.yog dang bcas te/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nyid kyis de gnyis rab
8b1(rgyud): tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par/ bdud sdig can dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs
8b2(rgyud): su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// gang dag bstan bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol song // de kun pa yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pang / goT ta ma slob sa
8b3(rgyud): 'khor bcas ngal deng myur skyabs tshol cig/ mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam 'di khyod la bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror 'dren cing sdug
8b4(rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed// nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa// 'chal pa 'dzes pa med cing mu cor smra ba wa skad du yang ci zhig zer/ khyod ni bcom zin bdud kyis nga la da ya
8b5(rgyud): 'dir ni gnod gang byed mi nus// de nas bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas/ tshangs pa'i cha byang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so// khyod
8b6(rgyud): kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs srid pa'i myu gu rab tu bsal// de yi slan chad thub pa ci slad sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro// gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod gyur skye bo gang
8b7(rgyud): na'ang ma mchis te// 'dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur mi 'da'// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dul gang 'khod sems can mtshungs med
9a1(rgyud): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// ngas mthong de dag nga yis snying rjes thar par bya ba yin// 'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na// de nas mya ngan 'da' yis blo
9a2(rgyud): gros ngan pa g.yos ci bskul// de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te// de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ mya ngan gyi khang
9a3(rgyud): par zhugs nas 'dug pa dang de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun phan tshun 'di skad du/ ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug pa su'ang
9a4(rgyud): mi shes so zhes 'dri'o// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang /
9a5(rgyud): lhab lhub kyi bdag cag rgyan dang / rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i sil snyan byas te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis glu len gar byed cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil
9a6(rgyud): snyan dag byas nas/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / bdud sdig can nges lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas bos so// sgra ma byed smra ma byed ces de skad ces smras
9a7(rgyud): pa dang / yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do// yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yabs te bos so// lha'i bu mo de dag
9b1(rgyud): gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang / gar dang / sil snyan lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang / yang de bzhin du 'dud sdig can de lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed snga ma byed ce/
9b2(rgyud): zer ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod de/ de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs spyan klog ces bya bas/ bdud sdig can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btung nas 'di skad
9b3(rgyud): ces smras so// gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir shi 'phos ltas shig gzigs sam ci// 'on tam ci zhig de 'gro ba shugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam// 'on te 'di na khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis
9b4(rgyud): lags sam// ci yi slad du khyod ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad// 'dud kyis smras pa/ nga la dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul ba// sa steng shAkya'i bu po'i sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo/
9b5(rgyud): ni ci nas gal te brlag par ma gyur na// de yis nga yi 'dod khams 'di ni stongs par byed// lha'i bu mos smras pa/ gtso bo srid gsum bcings sred rgya mtsho mtha' rings la// zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs
9b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa su zhig mchis// bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang // de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis// bdud kyis spras pa/ sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon
9b7(rgyud): lam snying rje'i zhags pa can// stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te// 'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang 'thun gyur nas// srid pa ma lus bzlog pa nye bar bstan pa byed
10a1(rgyud): sa/ smra shAH sa
10a2(rgyud): bdag/ mas kyi nang dag pa nams nyan rdzongs rnams na gnas/ rdzu 'phrul dngan sams dang shing rje'i thigs dang ldan pa y-i das rgyal ba nang rgyas gnyis thub pas
10a3(rgyud): rab dul chos can 'jig rten gsum kun chog bzhin du 'artul// des ni nga mi 'dod khams 'di dag stongs par byed par 'gyur// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis 'drad zhig can las// bcom ldan
10a4(rgyud): 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang bral ba'i klog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
10a5(rgyud): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i sil snyan dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang / rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
10a6(rgyud): / logs su gtor ba dang / lha'i me tog dang sil snyan nas/ rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal du bab par gyur to// bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas
10a7(rgyud): pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes par gyur to// gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu bab ces/
10b1(rgyud): na kyang da sa / ldan 'das la gas/ du nga/ da 'angs da
10b2(rgyud): ma thos pa'i me tog gi char chen po rab tubab lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu ci lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin tu//
10b3(rgyud): bdud sdig can gyi g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis bdud kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char chen po nas/ rgyan gyi bar gyi char pab bo// de dag ring po mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs
10b4(rgyud): te/ nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo// de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag so so nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas/
10b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ de dga' ba dang rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems mi brjid pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi
10b6(rgyud): khang pa de rigs phrag pa gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces
10b7(rgyud): gsol to// sreng cu ma lus sems pa 'gro ba'i mig gcig pa// mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas na// khyod kyis lha dang mor bcas pa yi 'gro ba krol// thub pa bdags//
11a1(rgyud): ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/ lha dang mis mchod don dam gsung ba bcom ldan 'das// bdag cag 'thun par bud med spad pa nyid spangs nas/ blo mchog khyod/
11a2(rgyud): kyi 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni// mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung nyan to// bdag med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das// byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med
11a3(rgyud): nor gsung sgron// mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la// da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag stan las langs te mgrin
11a4(rgyud): gcig tu// bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po mi g.yo ba'i// dpal rnyed ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la sdang bar sems// dregs pas gos nas skye ba
11a5(rgyud): la sogs sdug bsngal gyis// lus kun gtses te mi bzang gnas su nye bar song // de ltar khro ba spangs te rgyal la dad par gyis// 'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs pa'i 'dam las thar pa'i bdag
11a6(rgyud): no nyid kyis 'gro ba srin gying ngo bo macan// zugs rje can gyi sbubs su 'dong gis myur du ba zung // de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug ma'i yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di/
11a7(rgyud): 'dra'i brdung rtsi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la// gang gamig so lnga na tsan 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas 'azangs par mthong bar byas te/ 'di nas bzlog la 'bram nus par byab snyam pas
11b1(rgyud): badrung nges de dag bcing ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de nas g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag brdun
11b2(rgyud): sdig can gyi drung nas dong ba dang / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas te/ ci nas bdag
11b3(rgyud): cag gi g.yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad 'khrul nas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam mkha' 'di dag thams cad du rnam par
11b4(rgyud): 'thor rlung dang / rlung nag po chen pos kun khyab par bya'o snyam na'ang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed mi nus so// thun skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yong bskyod/
11b5(rgyud): mnus na mang du lA ci smos/ de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te/ yid mi bde zhing yid la gcags nas dra zhing skang chen pos rang gi bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor la bos te/ 'dzud
11b6(rgyud): nas thams cad zlas gang bar byas so// sdug pa'i zla dang tshogs kyi'i khor rnams curang shog cig/ nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul spobs las nyams// shAn+ya'-i rnga 'di sgra ldan gsonam
11b7(rgyud): ngag 'jam la/ khong na rang bzhin du gasdong 'dra bar 'dir skyes so// nga nas spa des bdud kyi g.yog mo dang / bdud kyi bu mo do dag thams cad dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas
12a1(rgyud): bde dag thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas/ bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba nges
12a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// ci slad thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes// sreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas khyod ma 'phos// 'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma mchis na//
12a3(rgyud): khyod ni rmongs par gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgongs// bdud kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i bu pho dmangs phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngam// ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra med/
12a4(rgyud): spras// stobs cig ldan pa g.yon can de yis thams cad rnam pa du mar bslus// bdag cag pu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa yi me yis bsregs// 'jig rten 'dzin skyes bu gtsom
12a5(rgyud): dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags pa// mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dngags mang po byed brtson 'thun par myur bar yang // chos kyi kyo ba btang gis drangs te shAkya'i bu 'dzi'i skabs der song // lus mdzes
12a6(rgyud): gson car blo thos ldan 'ding mi dgrar ni rab tu gnang // rab tu sdug pa'i g.yog mo de dag snying rje me pas dpor te/ nga lang bang btsugs nas ni ring dge sbyong de yi skyabs su dang /
12a7(rgyud): ngas cag zung brnamis thongs can 'ang dang thal bar mabyas ma/ nami dang rgyasas sring pa gsum pa dag ma su spangs par byed/ denas bdud kyi bu chogs kyi'i tsho dang cas pa dag pa sa
12b1(rgyud): kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar gyi'o// bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang stobs kyi yul gyi ma thu dang / rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad bstun te/ shAkya'i bu 'digal te bal bar
12b2(rgyud): nus pa ldan ni legs/ de ltar ma nus na ni nga'i skabs su mchi'o// yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba/ sngar shAkya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su
12b3(rgyud): meng pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na/ nga g.yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos/ bdud sdig can gyis sbas pa/ bzhin bzang dag deng la/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di dag
12b4(rgyud): gsod nus na slar shog cig/ ci ste ma nus na yang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrungs kyis slar shog cig/ bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bcu gnyis po de dag de nas 'phags te/ de nas steng du dpag tshad
12b5(rgyud): brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bkang nas/ de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po bstan te/ gang gling bzhi pa'i nam mkha' thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung nag po chen po dang
12b6(rgyud): skar mangs bkang nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab la'ang las gis brdabs te/ gling bzhi pa thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas nas/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin to// de dug gis klu dang /
12b7(rgyud): thuchen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dag gis sa chen po khrag dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ ra'i rgyal po rab kyang g.yos par rig/ mtshe dang / mchichin po ring
13a1(rgyud): 'bab chu dang / chu zan dang / 'bab rgya chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do// bdud kyi 'khor de dag ni ri
13a2(rgyud): rab kyi zo ma la 'khod nas/ dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char mngon par sprul te/ nam mkha' las kun tu 'bebs so// ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / rdo ba dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / ste'u
13a3(rgyud): kha ma dang / lcags mda' dang / spu gri dang / spu gri lta bu dang / dgra sta dang / ste'u so dang / kha rang rong can dang / kha shin tu rang rong can sra ba/ drag pa/ rtsub pa/ rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te kun
13a4(rgyud): tu phab bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gang rdo dang mtshon cha de dag thams cad lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang
13a5(rgyud): ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ yul a~M g+ha me g+ha d+ha ra skar mda' ltung ba ni spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs
13a6(rgyud): de dag ni rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / phyir/
13a7(rgyud): mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar byin gyis
13b1(rgyud): brlabs so// rdul dang / mun nag dang / rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o// gling bzhi pa 'di na rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / sa dang / brag dang / ri tsi yong pa
13b2(rgyud): de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor ltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du smras dbang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re
13b3(rgyud): las kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha dang / klu dang / gnod
13b4(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang /
13b5(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
13b6(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa sa dang nam mkha' la 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so// sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i
13b7(rgyud): skyes gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni dran pa rnyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa dran nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
14a1(rgyud): byas te/ ngan song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skyes so// bdud kyi sde de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/
14a2(rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas byin pa dang / bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
14a3(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang ga ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra// grags pa 'jig rten gas
14a4(rgyud): na lam me ba// mgon po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi// rab tu lam stor rnam par mig zums la/ khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma'i nyi ma 'dra// gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig/ ded dpon
14a5(rgyud): khyod la skyabs su rab tu mchi// shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor pa'i mdzod// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs// thugs rje'i bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung // don kun
14a6(rgyud): grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi// 'khor ba dgon pa las kyang khyod thar mdzad// tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston// byams la gnas shis mchog go cho ga mkhyen// thugs rje'i gnas pa'i/
14a7(rgyud): skyabs su rab tu mchi// sgyu ma smig cu chu zla 'dra ba yis// srid pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags// mi shes nang sel 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon// sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi//
14b1(rgyud): chu bzhi dbus bam par gyur pa khyod/ nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab stsol ba// yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po// zugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchong ngo // tho mchog khyod
14b2(rgyud): bdag cag bzod par gsol/ khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod pasams pa// mgon po dpa' bos nongs pa 'azod par gsol// khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso// bdag cag bdud kyi
14b3(rgyud): phyogs rnams rab spangs te/ byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer// bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi// ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin
14b4(rgyud): spyod par// bdag cag rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston// gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dang // ldan na byang chub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor ba// phyogs
14b5(rgyud): kun tu yang de dag gdugs gyur te// dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni// rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang // 'dud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor/
14b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang / me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi
14b7(rgyud): bye ma las 'das pa'i matog gi gdugs kun tu 'jug par gyur te/ me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshal gnas pa thams cad kyi
15a1(rgyud): dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug go// 'dud kyi bu mo de dag dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang so so nas
15a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang 'chang ba 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te lham/
15a3(rgyud): mi lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
15a4(rgyud): kyang kha dog mtshungs/ rtags mtshungs pa/ gzugs 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng ge'i khri tha dad cing / 'khor tha dad la sangs
15a5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni ma thos so// bdud kyi 'khor de dag
15a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/ mchog tu dga' ba dang mos pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan
15a7(rgyud): sngar 'khod ngo // de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyir log nas/ bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud sdig can la rgya cher bzlas /
15b1(rgyud): dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhig ma nus nA/ gsad par lta ci smos/ de'i steng du nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'tsho/
15b2(rgyud): ngo/ de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te/ des 'di skad ces smras so// shAkya'i bu 'di ji srid brlag par ma byas pa// de srid
15b3(rgyud): bar du nga yi dpal song slang mi 'ong // shAkya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring bsad snyam ste// bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog cing me smra 'dug/ de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi
15b4(rgyud): khang pa na 'dug go/ 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las bdud spa bkong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu pho tshogs
15b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'di lta bu'i theg pa dang / ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / snying rje dang
15b6(rgyud): thabs dang spobs pa 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams dang ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na/ skyes bu gang zag sdig
15b7(rgyud): pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi mchi zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag chos
16a1(rgyud): bzhi dang ldan na/ 'di la skyes bu gang zag la la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs/
16a2(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhin bzang dag 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin cing / chos gang yang mi 'dzin// mi gtong khas mi len/ mi gnas/
16a3(rgyud): nye bar me len/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi gtong mi 'dzin khas mi len/ nye bar me len/ mi gnas/
16a4(rgyud): mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du spyod pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de sems can du sgru ba ma
16a5(rgyud): yin pa srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gso bar smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/ sems can gyi khams la yid kyis mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o//
16a6(rgyud): bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag gzhan/
16a7(rgyud): yang rigs kyi bu de khams gsum dang / dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung
16b1(rgyud): ba dang / gnas dang / skye ba thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa'i gnas kyi/
16b2(rgyud): lus thams cad la rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba ste/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzang dag chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po
16b3(rgyud): med pa yin te/ sgra med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ yi ge med pa/ smon pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ chags pa med pa dmigs pa med pa/ bstan du
16b4(rgyud): med pa/ dben pabadag med pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ skad cig pa/ nye bar zhi ba/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ ga nas med pa/ yul med pa/ dbang po med pa/
16b5(rgyud): phyogs med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ bsam du med pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ ser sna med pa/ spros pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ cha shas med pa ci'ang med pa//
16b6(rgyud): byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rten med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ so sor snang ba med pa/ skad cig pa ma yin pa'i bar du'o// bzhin bzang dag
16b7(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid pas dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi rtog
17a1(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// bzhin bzang dag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing //
17a2(rgyud): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bzhin bzang dag gang la la yul thams cad la chags pa'i lus kyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas
17a3(rgyud): la rnam par spyod pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na/ de gnyis la chags pa yin te/ de gnyis la chags pa'i yid kyi brnag pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu
17a4(rgyud): bar byed do// de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mtshan nyid du rnam par spyod pas gnas pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa de ni gnyis te/ thams
17a5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slu ba'o// spyod pa'i gnas dang / 'bras bu la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// skye ba dang / srid pa dang / len pa dang / sems can gyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis
17a6(rgyud): so// bshang ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / gdams pa dang / tshig gi lam dang / sgra dang skad kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// rtag pa dang chad pa la rnam par lta ba'i shes pa/
17a7(rgyud): dang shes bya'i gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes
17b1(rgyud): kyi gnas la rtog pa 'dzin gnyis so// gang pha rol dang / tshu rol dang / rtog pa dang / sel ba la gnas shing rtog pa 'ang ni gnyis so// 'dzin babang dag sdes bugang blag su stsal ba/
17b2(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba de dus gsum du ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog par rnam par dpyod pa la gnas shing kun tu rtog ste mchog tu
17b3(rgyud): 'dzin na/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'di ni gnyis so// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig me 'dod pa la sa'i ngos la nyug pa dang / skom 'dod pa la me dang / zas 'do
17b4(rgyud): ba la rdo dang / me tog 'dod pa la gos dang / spos 'dod pa la mi ro bam pa dang / gos 'dod pa la dur khrod dang / byug pa 'dod pa la nam mkha' la nyug pa de bzhin du/ bzhin bzang
17b5(rgyud): dag gang spyod pa'i gnas la chags shing rnam par spyod pa'i lus gnyis kyi gnas kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol na/ de'i 'bad pa 'bras bu med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems/
17b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de 'di skad ces gsol to//
17b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang brjod du ma mchis pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gang brjod du med par shes pa de nyid mngon par rdzogs
18a1(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya'o// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'i
18a2(rgyud): rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ gal te mchis shes bgyi na ni rtag par 'gyur/ ci ste ma mchis shes bgyi na ni chad par 'gyur ro// dbu ma'i lam ni dmigs
18a3(rgyud): su ma mchis te/ de ni mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang lags so// gang ma chags// mi skye/ mi 'gog/ tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis dab ma mchis/ snang ba ma mchis
18a4(rgyud): bde la 'tshal ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' klog gi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la'ang 'gro ba'ang ma mchis/ 'ong ba'ang ma mchis pade//
18a5(rgyud): bu shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang na thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis
18a6(rgyud): pajim med kyang ba mams/ bangon par gas pa 'dus mchis/ mngon kyi 'ang sa chis/ 'das mchis/ rang sa pa 'angs mchis/ dus gas ma yang ma mchis
18a7(rgyud): na pa gsum sangam mchis dzin lam dang nyam pa'i rlom sams kyang mchis pa 'dzin mdzin par 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dang 'a gzungs kyikyi thob kyis gsos
18b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang khams gsum yang ma mchis/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang ma mchis/ rig pa gsum yang ma mchis/ theg pa gsum yang ma man+tis/ phung po dang /
18b2(rgyud): dang skye mched la rtog pa'ang ma mchis/ rnam par rtog pa'ang ma mchis/ zi ba'ang mya mchis/ 'phel ba'ang ma mchis la/ mnyam par yang mi 'gyid pa 'di ni mngon par
18b3(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje blo gros kyis gsol pa// gang so so'i skye bo'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i chos dang / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos
18b4(rgyud): dang nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ mnyam par mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'
18b5(rgyud): sra ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ gang bden pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la rnam par dpyod cing mngon par mi zhen pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag
18b6(rgyud): narin po ches gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshan nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par
18b7(rgyud): gyi ba'i slad du mi rtogs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsol pa/ gang khams gsum la rnam par dpyod cing
19a1(rgyud): sems nyid sems la 'jug par bgyid de/ sems gnyis ka la sems kyis rnam par dpyad nas mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//
19a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal gyis gsol pa/ gang chos thams cad la mi chags// rjes su mi chags/ btang snyoms su mi bgyid/ khong khro bar mi bgyid/ 'dod
19a3(rgyud): par mi bgyidami smod/ mi 'dzin/ mi gtong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i snying pos gsol pa/ gang bsod nams dang sdig pa la mi
19a4(rgyud): chags shing / zab mo la bzod pa'i tshul la 'jug pas/ ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/
19a5(rgyud): gang chos thams cad chu zla dang mtshungs rab tu 'tshal cing / chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid sogs pa dang 'dre bar yang mi mthong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems
19a6(rgyud): dang nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ gang gi sems dang sems las byung ba la mun bya dang / sdang ba dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ab+h+ri
19a7(rgyud): thams cad mi 'byung ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ gang gnas pa la gnas pa na/ khams gsum pa la gnas pa'i
19b1(rgyud): rlangs pa la mi dmigs/ mnyam par mi bgying ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgya ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa/ gang 'khor gsum yongs su
19b2(rgyud): dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu goms par bgyid cing mi chags mi skyo ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
19b3(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la mi chags mi skyo zhing chos zab mo'i tshul yang rab tu 'tshal te/ gang rab tu 'tshal ba'ang mi len/ mi 'dor/ sdud par mi bgyid/ bral bar
19b4(rgyud): mi bgyid cing chos gang la'ang sogs pa 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'phel ba'ang mi skyed la/ dngos po dag la rnam par mi rtog pas/ kun
19b5(rgyud): nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/ tshul gcig pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems
19b6(rgyud): dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul 'di ltar zab mo stong pa nyid skem pa'i tshul 'di gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par/
19b7(rgyud): 'chang can/ kun na sbyor ba dang rab tu byor bcir dgos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lta ba mi zad pa dang thal zhing yang dag pa'i lta bar blo 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / gam med pa dang / drang
20a1(rgyud): bor sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral zhing tha ma la ri mo bya bar sgo 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / bka' blo bde bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / yang dag
20a2(rgyud): pa'i 'tsho bar spro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang bral bar spro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sems can thams cad la khro ba dang snying rje bar sgo 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / dza
20a3(rgyud): pa gsum du sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / mi slu ba dge ba'i chos su sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / rnam par ma zhi bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / dam pa'i chos srung bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /
20a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / sems nyam chung ba stobs la rab tu 'god par
20a5(rgyud): sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skyabs mi 'jigs par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams nan tan la gzud par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / bzod pa dang
20a6(rgyud): nges par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / 'dzin pa thams cad la chags pa'i mtshan nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang / rdul dang mun pa'i phung po thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa
20a7(rgyud): dang / sngo ba'i 'anas bu rnam par smin pa thams cad spong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa 'di dag ni rigs kyi tha thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba nyi shu ste/ yi ge dang / skad dang /
20b1(rgyud): sra dang / spa ba dang / brjod pa'i tsheg rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba'o// gzhan su sogs can gyi tshig gi /
20b2(rgyud): bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / bsod nams thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /
20b3(rgyud): len pa dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang / gnas dang / rgyu dang / las dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug
20b4(rgyud): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad shes nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba khong du chud par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal
20b5(rgyud): de de bzhin te/ nam chos zab mo'i tshul 'di rtogs pa de'i tshe/ chos gang ston pa dang / gang la ston pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gang dag gis ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa'i chos
20b6(rgyud): de gang yang mi mthong ste/ gang rab tu spong ba dang / gang sgom pa dang / gang kun shes par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i tshul gyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug ste/ des thams
20b7(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu tshul gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob
21a1(rgyud): pa de khyod kyis legs par smras so// de ci'i phyir zhem/ thams cad la chags pa med pa'i dngos po yin pas chos thams cad ni sgo btags pa med pa dang /
21a2(rgyud): skyes pa dang mi 'jig pa'i mtha' can dang / ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang / nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' can dang
21a3(rgyud): chos thams cad ni brjod med pa'i mtha' can dang / sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu yin pa dang / chos thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can dang / dus gsum dang / khams gsum dang /
21a4(rgyud): phung po thams cad ni ci'ang med pa'i mtha' can dang / 'du byed gsum ni stong pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang / chos kyi phung po dang / rnam par smin pa'i phung po dang / sogs pa dang / bri ba'i phung/
21a5(rgyud): po ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can du yongs su brjod do// stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / brjod du med pa'i don dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa/
21a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug go// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud/
21a7(rgyud): kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ lus rag pa spangs nas yid kyi lus rnyed do// gzhan yang nyi khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang ma
21b1(rgyud): dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po maskye/
21b2(rgyud): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyi khri bo de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor/ rangab tu gnyir nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// rdzo
21b3(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di ltar mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'i dbang gis/ sems can rnams bsod nams thams cad sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la mi bgyid pa la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
21b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir sngon byung ba 'di gsungs so// rigs kyi bu sngon
21b5(rgyud): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po dpag tu med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du snang ba 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo
21b6(rgyud): drug khri brgyang stong thung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong ni spos snang dpal zhes bya ba rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i
21b7(rgyud): lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gyur pa na/ 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i chos ston to//
22a1(rgyud): yang de'i tshe gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong btsun mo'i
22a2(rgyud): 'khor dang g.yog dang / dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
22a3(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cing sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor te/ bcom ldan
22a4(rgyud): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis/ mngon par rab
22a5(rgyud): bstod nyes pa mang sel ba/ nor bdun gyis ni 'gro la phan mdzad pa// gang gi blo gros zhi ba dang ldan par gsungs// 'gro ba'i mun sel zhi ba'i sgron ma mdzad// shi 'phon 'chi skye ba mya ngan
22a6(rgyud): 'joms// 'gro ba ngan 'gro lam las rab bzlog pa// gang gis bdud kyi lam las thar par gsungs// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i
22a7(rgyud): gdong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhib pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sems
22b1(rgyud): can thams cad la snying rjeb dang / ma lta bur sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang / chos thams cad la srog med pa dang / gsob med pa dang / gang dag
22b2(rgyud): med pa dang / tha dad du dbyer med cing yongs su rtog pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhib pa yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang chos
22b3(rgyud): gsum dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhabs pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin no// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la mi khro zhing klan ka mi
22b4(rgyud): tshel ba yin/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyin gnas su 'du shes pa yin/ chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu yongs su rtog ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs
22b5(rgyud): shing bcos su med pa/ tha dad pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes po/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gag pa ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
22b6(rgyud): pa'o// rgyal po chen po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa bdud kyi zhags pas mi zin cing bdud kyi lam las thar pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po At+pa la'i gdong gi btsun
22b7(rgyud): mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'angar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
23a1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// mi mnyam yon tan 'dzin par rab ring med
23a2(rgyud): mdzad pa ji ltar bud med las ni ngan song spangs pa yin// skyes pa 'dir 'gyur 'chi 'pho sel ba bka' stsol cig/ rab mchog phan pa mdzad pa rab tu yid kyang thul// dam pa'i 'gros bzhud
23a3(rgyud): bder gshegs rab zhi dga' mdzad pa// bcom ldan ji lta bur na bud med skyes par 'gyur// 'dul mchog gzhan la phan mdzad myur du bshad par gsol// bdag gi blo gros thibs po 'dir ni bsal du
23a4(rgyud): gsol// 'jig rten dag na mi mnyam mnyam pa dge sbyong mchog/ rab grags yon tan mang po dran dang 'dul ba 'dzin// ci nas de nyid du ni skyes par bdag 'gyur bar// rab rib mi mnga' bde 'gro bani//
23a5(rgyud): med lam myur gsungs// rigs kyi bu de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// che zhe rnam
23a6(rgyud): grangs gang gis bud med dag bud med kyi dngos po myur du brjes te/ sngon 'phangs pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i
23a7(rgyud): bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par bud med du skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do// men de la rnam grangs gang gis bud med myur du skyes par 'gyur zhing / sngon 'phangs pa'i
23b1(rgyud): bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs gang zhe na/ rme ne de la rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzu 'phrul chen mo// phan yon chen mo/ mthu chen mo 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi dngos
23b2(rgyud): po thams cad zad par byed cing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gnas ngan len gyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa ma lus par zad par byed do// rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med rnam/
23b3(rgyud): kyi bud med kyi dngos po ma lus par 'gyur te/ bud med kyi dbang po mi snang zhing skyes pa'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur/ skyes pa gzugs bzang po yan lag thams cad tshang par 'gyur/ drang zhing zhing pa la mkhas
23b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan zhing legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang / dgra thams cad thul bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'di dang tshe rabs phyi
23b5(rgyud): ma la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos
23b6(rgyud): spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag ma gtogs par/ de dag gi bud med kyi dngos po'i lhag ma lus pa de nyid la yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi
23b7(rgyud): gnas ngan len gyi rnam par smin pa tshe gzhan la bud med kyi dngos po grub par byed pa'i sa bon sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i sa bon gyi rgyu 'thun pa ri rab tsam yang ma
24a1(rgyud): lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i/
24a2(rgyud): rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bshad pa'i byin gyis brlabs so// gcig
24a3(rgyud): la gcig rjes su dgyes so// mngon par bstod do// bsngags so// rab tu bsngags so// da ltar phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sems can rnams kyis nyes par byas pa'i las yongs su
24a5(rgyud): zad par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad de// rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad do// gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs
24a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing so sor 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang / sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad par bya/
24a7(rgyud): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di 'chad par 'gyur te/ rab tu bsngags pa'i bar du mdzad par 'gyur ro// da ltar rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di
24b1(rgyud): 'chad de/ phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po me tog gi gzungs 'dir chad pa rnams la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo // bsngags so// rab tu bsngags so// men/
24b2(rgyud): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba skye bo'i nas na mthu dang dbang thob pa gang la las rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang na / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dpa
24b3(rgyud): bskur ba de'i snyan pa dang / sgra dang / tshogs su bcad pa phyogs bcur rgya cher grags par 'gyur te/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi bar du sgra dang snyan pa chen pos gang bar 'gyur ro//
24b4(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de
24b5(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas so// de'i yul thams cad du 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ga dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
24b6(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i nyes pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang / seng ge dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / spyang ki ma
24b7(rgyud): tshungs thams cad kyang gnor par mi 'gyur/ dug dang / 'dang / chab dang / zlum meng pa dang / ri ming pa dang / nub pa'i drug bsngal ba gan mi bad par 'gyur ba'i nyas pamam thas
25a1(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog thams cad kyang rab tu skyes shing rnam par 'phel te/ snum pa dang
25a2(rgyud): ro zhim par 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba g.yul du nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs nas/ rgyal
25a3(rgyud): ngo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nges pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thub par 'gyur ro// de ste rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsgyur ba g.yul du zhugs pa gnyis ka rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i
25a4(rgyud): glegs ba ma rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs na/ de gnyis gcig la gcig dpa' zhing 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon mang po grong
25a5(rgyud): nga ma grong khyer ram/ grong rdal la lar mi 'am/ rkang bzhi pa dag na 'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'am/ gnod pa zhig byung na/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs bam
25a6(rgyud): mchod pa'i yo byad rgya cher sbyar te bzhag la/ shin tu khrus byas shing lus rab tu byugs te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas tshangs par spyad de/ seng ge'i khri me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor ba/
25a7(rgyud): dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba la 'dug pa der rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di'i glegs pa ma bklags na/ der nad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi/
25b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// der 'jigs shing spu zing zhis byed pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la bu 'dod pa des khrus byes te gos gsar pa bgos la tshangs par spyad/
25b2(rgyud): de me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pas glegs bam de la mchod la/ bdag nyid kyang stan me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor ba/ dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa ro bro ba sna tshogs
25b3(rgyud): kyis bskor ba la 'dug nas/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di bklags na des bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
25b4(rgyud): phyir/ rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de nyid de'i bud meng du gyur pa'i tha ma yin no// che zhe rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gang la la'i rna lam du
25b5(rgyud): glagrags na tha na ri dag sa dang bya'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
25b6(rgyud): 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong sa la reg par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par
25b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu dag gi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi
26a1(rgyud): dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams shin tu skrag pa skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi
26a2(rgyud): mjed 'di thams cad kyang snang bas rgya cher khyab par gyur te/ lag mthil lta bur mnyam par 'dug cing / de'i tshe na ri dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang / khor yug dang /
26a3(rgyud): khor yug chen po'ang mi snang bar gyur to// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin de dag kyang sa g.yos pa dang snang ba des skrag pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus phyogs
26a4(rgyud): bzhir bltas pa dang / de dag thams cad kyis mnga' rgyang gang tsam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs
26a5(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa de la lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos
26a6(rgyud): snang dpal gyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong sa la reg pa na'ang 'di bzhin du de'i tshes g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe'i de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par
26a7(rgyud): 'dug/ de bzhin du snang ba dang sa g.yo bas skrag pa skyes te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad phyogs bzhir lta zhing mnga' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni spos snang /
26b1(rgyud): dpal de mthong nas thal mo sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal nges rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM 'di lta ste dza lo ke dza lo ka/
26b2(rgyud): mu ke/ dza li/ dza la/ dzo la ni/ dza la pra de/ dzahi li/ bar pra ru Sha lak+ShaH/ sam+ba ruH/ a ma me/ a ma mi/ wa ma me/ wa ma ma?/ a ha me/ a hame/ dzaHme/
26b3(rgyud): dza he ma Sha/ wa ram/ wa ra me/ bab d+hA/ bab d+he/ ga d+he/ thig d+hA/ bany+dzad+he/ ba ra tarban+na/ dz+wal me la/ za ra la/ a la dza Na li/ dzA na le/ dzanA m+ba She/ ba ha ra bahar/
26b4(rgyud): sid+d+ha prap+te/ dan+ti lA/ dan+ti lA/ sUr+ya bi ha ga katsan+d+ra bi ha ga/ tsak+Shu ra dz+yo ti sha bi ha ga/ tsA bak+Sha ya/ s+t+ri tA su ra bi ha ga/ dza kha ga dza kha ga/ su ra kha ga/ bi ha ma/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i
26b5(rgyud): la)a mri la/ a mr-i Sha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i khA/ oM mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i kha/ a mr-i la/ bya bats+tshed karma/ dun du ne/ ut+pA bya wa ts+tshed d+hA na kri ta/ a nuSh+ma pA dA/ kha ga nan+da//
26b6(rgyud): ang+ku le bang+gu lebi wa ku le/ ku la ha/ in+d+ra ba ri bI ba ha/ bya bats+tshe da/ ga ra b+ha/ ba pra ti/ ba pra ti/ a mo ha/ daR+sha ne/ pa ri kIr+ha b+hUSh+Ta/ kha sa ma kr-i ta dz+yo ti/ kha gardza hi/ dza ha
26b7(rgyud): dz+yo tiM/ niSh+kad+hI ra sa/ b+hi ra sa/ b+hI ra sa/ b+hI ra dze/ mA tri grA ma/ b+hA ba kri ga/ mahAkri ba/ he li/ hi hi le/ A u na pra te/ sa ma yi med/ da ma dA na/ d+h+ya na/ a pa rA rbaM She ga pa la
27a1(rgyud): kuN+Da la khe tsani bar+Na/ in+d+ra b+hA ba karma la ya pra dur b+hA ba/ pu ru la tAM/ mas mas ma sa ma sa/ bi d+hi dz+nyA ta thA ga ta sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rin po
27a2(rgyud): tog gi gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang sa chen po g.yos so// bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te/ de pho mtshan skyes so//
27a3(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dag gi bu mo grangs
27a4(rgyud): med dpag tu med pa rnams kyang rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur to// pho mtshan skyes nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/
27a5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ thams cad kyang ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang nas/ bud med de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs/
27a6(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing skad chen por 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngo mtshar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
27a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po gang gis bdag cag da ltar bud med kyi dngos po mi gda' bar gyur cing / rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i skyes bu'i dngos por gyur pa'i sngon byung ba 'di rgya cher bshad/
27b1(rgyud): du gsol/ de lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang / cho 'phrul dang / skyob pas bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'di lha dang
27b2(rgyud): mi dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams dbang du 'gyur bar bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngon byung ba 'di bshad pa ni/ bzhin bzang dag gang gi tshe de bzhin
27b3(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i thad nas rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas pas/ rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos te/ thos ma thag/
27b4(rgyud): tu btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes dang bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mo mtshan mi snang bar gyur te/ pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas/ mi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/
27b5(rgyud): rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po skyes te/ bud med de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i
27b6(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang ngo // gang gi tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa phor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong des bu thu bo gling bzhi
27b7(rgyud): la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang sgyur bas dbang sgyur te/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang / skyes bu chen po lha mdzes dang bcas/ lha mdzes kyang skyes bu chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong
28a1(rgyud): dang bcas gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri nyis stong dang bcas te khyim nas byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de'i thang du s+tha dang kha spu bregs gagos/
28a2(rgyud): ngur smrig bgos te/ yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kha ton la dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson par gyur to// de nas de na srog chags//
28a3(rgyud): bye ba mang po 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rab tu byung snyam nas/ de dag phan tshun 'di skad smra'o// dge sbyong 'di ni bdud kyi las la brtson pa ste/ g.yon can sgyu ma
28a4(rgyud): bdud kyi las dang ldan pas chos 'di ston cing / la la ni pho mtshan med par byas la la ni mo mtshan med par byas/ la la ni skra dang kha spu bregs/ la la ni gos tshon can bsko na/ la la ni gos
28a5(rgyud): dkar po bskon/ la la ni lhar skye bar chos ston/ la la ni mir skye bar/ la la ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar/ la la ni yi dgas su skye bar/ la la ni sems can dmyal bar skye b.ral la ni/
28a6(rgyud): shi 'pho dang skye ba med par bya bar chos ston te/ bdud kyi las kyi lam la brtson zhing bud med bsgyur ba'i sgyu dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong 'od zhi spos snang dpal de dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu sgru ba
28a7(rgyud): yin gyis bdag cag 'di nas dong ste de'i gzugs dang rtags 'dzin pa'ang mi mthong ba dang / de'i tshig kyang cung zad kyang mi thos par 'dong ngo // de nas de nyid na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba
28b1(rgyud): zhig yod pa des tshig 'di skad ces sbas so// kho bo'i rlung ma dang / g.yog mo dang / bu mo gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / dge sbyong ma rungs pa 'dis mo mtshan med par byas te/ skyes pa'i/
28b2(rgyud): dbang por sprul nas/ thams cad kyi mgo bregs te/ gos tshon can bskon nas/ kho bo gcig pu mya ngan gyis non te/ tha na bdag cag thams cad 'dus la gang du dge sbyong ma rungs pa/ dge sbyong
28b3(rgyud): sgyu ma bdud kyi zhags pa la brtson pa 'di'i sgra dang skad kyang mi thos na/ mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i ri khrod nyam nga bar 'dong gis/ tshur shog ces byas pa dang / de dag thams cad dga'
28b4(rgyud): ste de bzhin no zhes zer ro// de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul dang the tsom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po lhan cig tu de nas dong ste/ yul mtha' 'khob ri khrod nyam nga bar
28b5(rgyud): drang srong gi cha byad kyis spyad pa spyod cing / sems can de dag la 'di skad ces chos ston to// 'khor ba las thar pa'ang med/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi
28b6(rgyud): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang med na/ der chad par smra ba'i dge sbyong bdud kyi las la brtson pa zhig byung gis gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang / gang dag gus par smra ba dang /
28b7(rgyud): gang dag de'i chos nyan pa de dag sems g.yengs pa yin/ de dag mgo bregs// khyim nas byung / gos tshon can bskon/ dur khrod du spyad pa spyod du bcug/ slong mo pa'i spyod pa la
29a1(rgyud): bya/ btsud zan za gcig par byed/ lta ba mi bzad pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu yid 'byung bar byed/ dben par gnas pa la dang gus med par gnas khang du bcug/
29a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dga' ba glu gar dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhu ba dang / 'khrig pa'i chos dang / chang dang / ra ro bar 'gyur ba'i btung ba spangs shing smra ba
29a3(rgyud): nyung byed/ de lta bur dge sbyong gi gzungs kyis chad par smra ba bdud kyi las la brtson pa de sems can rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa zhig byung ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i byed pa ni sngon ma thos ma mthong
29a4(rgyud): ba yin pa kho bos rtog so// zhes de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du bcug go// de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gis
29a5(rgyud): thos pa/ gshed kyi ri khrod na kha cig bdag nyid kyang lam ngan par zhugs shing gzhan yang lta ba mi bzad pa 'dzin du bcug ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mi snyan pa sgrog go zhes thos nas
29a6(rgyud): 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis sems can 'di dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las yongs su thar par ma byas shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la ma bkod na/ bdag dge sbyong du gyur pa don med do//
29a7(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ldongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten du bdag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ ji ltar rab tu nyam thag par gyur pa/
29b1(rgyud): bdud bzhi'i zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams yongs su 'grol bar nus snyam ste/ de nas dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong brtul ba che zhing brtan pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas//
29b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la zhus te/ srog chags brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas/ mtha' 'khob kyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ri dang / ri brag
29b3(rgyud): nyam nga ba'i gnas de dang de dag na spyad pa spyod cing / de dang de dag tu sems can de dag la ci nas sems can de dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la btsud nas tha
29b4(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/ gzhan la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la smon la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la/ la la ni 'bras bu la bkod/ la la ni rab tu phyung
29b5(rgyud): la la ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la/ la la ni za gcig pa la/ la la ni skya bas gsum du 'gro ba la bkod pa de lta bur chos ston to// bud med dag ni rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di ba shad de/
29b6(rgyud): bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur nas skyes pa la bkod ngo // srog chags mang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la the tsom du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las
29b7(rgyud): bzlog ste/ nyes pa 'chags su bcug nas bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub la bkod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de nyid la phul nas rab tu phyung ngo // shor ba gzhon
30a1(rgyud): nu'i tshul ni ma gtogs te/ des 'di ltar ut+pa la'i gdong 'di'i bdag gi 'khor rnams bslus te khrid kyis/ bdag gis kyang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
30a2(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud byas te/ 'di ltar mngal na 'dug pa tshun chad 'di la rnam par gtse'o// de nas phyis btsas nas kyang gzhon nu rtsed mo byed pa dang /
30a3(rgyud): bzo'i las kyi mtha' dang / klog cing 'dug pa dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du skrag par bya'o//
30a4(rgyud): bgegs bya'o// byang chub thob nas kyang bstan pa gzhig par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas dge sbyong chen po ut+pa la'i gdong gis/ shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul gyis smon lam de ltar brtul te/
30a5(rgyud): btab pa la mthu chen po dang 'bad pa drug pos dad par byas te/ sdig pa'i lta ba'i thibs po de las bzlog nas nyes pa 'chags su bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems/
30a6(rgyud): skyed du bcug go// de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul rab tu dul zhing dad pa skyes nas/ 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod gang gi tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
30a7(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe byang chub thob nas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol zhes smon lam btab bo// bzhin bzang dag/
30b1(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang rim gro rnam pa du ma byab nas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang
30b2(rgyud): bcas te mngon par byung nas rab tu byung zhing / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste theg pa gsum la bkod/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni
30b3(rgyud): 'bras bu la bkod/ bud med bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang med pa ni skyes pa thob par byas pa'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyed the tsom mam
30b4(rgyud): yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur
30b5(rgyud): tengs de lta bu'i skyes bu'i mthu byas so// bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya ba gang gis dge sbyong thob par gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyed the tsom mam/
30b6(rgyud): yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes zhes bya bar
