30b7(rgyud): gyur to// bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na the tsom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba mang po dang bcas/ sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa'i bar du zer ba shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du
31a1(rgyud): khyed the tsom mam/ yid gnyis sam/ som nyi za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes
31a2(rgyud): bya bar gyur te/ gang de'i tshe ngas de'i 'khor rab tu phyung bas de'i phyir nga la sems rab tu khros pa bskyed nas/ phyis smon lam btab ste/ khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
31a3(rgyud): par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig ces byas so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong zhi spos
31a4(rgyud): snang dpal de la ma dad cing ma bsdams pa'i tshig smras te/ sdig pa'i lta bar song ba bzung nas/ ngas khyed sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las kun thar bar byas te rab tu phyung bar/ de tshun chad khyed kyis sangs/
31a5(rgyud): rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de dag la mchod pa dang rim gro byas/ de dag las chos mnyan te/ smon lam btab nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad do// khyed lus dang / ngag dang / yid/
31a6(rgyud): kyis nyes par spyad pa'i las des sngon bskal pa du mar ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong ngo // las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis da ltar bdud sdig can gyi gnas su skyes so// rin po che tog gi gzungs sngon
31a7(rgyud): byung ba'i le'u 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa na/ bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i dngos por gyur te/ mi skye ba'i chos la
31b1(rgyud): bzod pa thob bo// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
31b2(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ nyan thos
31b3(rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha dang mi'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni// bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po rnyed do// 'dus
31b4(rgyud): pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ sngon byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa
31b5(rgyud): de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rgya cher snang bas khyab par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yod pa de dag na 'dod pa'i dbang
31b6(rgyud): phyag bdud bye ba phrag brgya gang dag bdud byed pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dogs pa skyes te/ snang ba chen po 'di gang nas byung zhes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la lta zhing bdud
31b7(rgyud): sdig can zhes bya ba gang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa de bdag cag pas stobs che zhing dbang che la mthu chen po 'di de'i mthu 'am snyam nas/ de nas bdud de dag gis bltas na/
32a1(rgyud): bdud sdig can de mya ngan gyi khang pan 'dug cing yid rab tu mi dga' ba de mthong ngo // de nas bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag
32a2(rgyud): ga la ba dang / bdud sdig can gyi khang pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// kye 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ci'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
32a3(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/ khyod mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug/ de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis/ bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag la rgyas par smras pa/ kye grogs po dag shes
32a4(rgyud): par gyis shigashAkya'i rigs las shin tu g.yo dang sgyur ldan pa'i dge sbyong zhig 'dir skyes te/ de skyes ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas/
32a5(rgyud): rab tu ga yos par byas/ 'khrug par byas te sngangs par byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa 'di na mkhas pa gang su tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod
32a6(rgyud): sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po nas/ gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
32a7(rgyud): bar du mkhas pa su'ang rung / de nas thams cad de la mchod pa'i phyir dong ngo // lo drug gi bar du gcig bre gnyis su med par 'dug ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs pas kho bos kyang
32b1(rgyud): rang gi stobs kun bstan par 'dod na/ sde dang g.yog bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang / de'i drung du dong ste kun tu bskor nas bdud kyi stobs dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /
32b2(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa thams cad bstan kyang de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang sngangs shing 'jig par bya ma nus na/ stan de las bskyod pa lta ci smos bgegs gzhan bya bar ga
32b3(rgyud): la nus te/ mdangs su ma des de lta bu'i sgyu shin tu bstan cing sa g.yo bar byas pas/ kho bo sde dang bcas te pham nas shing bcad pa bzhin du sa'i steng du lhung ngo // de der 'dug
32b4(rgyud): ste de 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs nas/ 'di ltar bdud kyi yul thams cad zil gyis mnan te rigs pa bsgrubs nas sta na de las langs te/ sems can rnams la
32b5(rgyud): rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyu mas 'dun par byas te/ de dag gi sems dang / 'gro ba drug tu skye ba/
32b6(rgyud): dang / 'gro ba'ang kho bos ma shes so// gang dag de la skyabs su dong ba de dag gi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam yang spangs pa dang 'khrug par kho bos byed mi nus na/ de las smra ba 'am bskyod/
32b7(rgyud): papar lta ga la nus/ deng kho bo'i g.yog mo lnga brgya dang bunyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong go'u ta ma mdangs de la skyabs su dong nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir ngo'i mdun na
33a1(rgyud): 'khod do// kho bos de dag dang dpral ma nus so// de'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ dbang phyug dang ldan pa khyed kho bo'i grogs gyis shig
33a2(rgyud): shAkya'i bu mdangs de srog dang bral lo// de la sems can gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhig par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo sgyu can nag po'i phyogs pham par
33a3(rgyud): byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la de phyin chang bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de nas bdud me 'od ces bya bas 'dzem bu'i gling 'di gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
33a4(rgyud): shing chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang / de nas bdud me 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong / sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa thos so// thos nas de spu zing zhes byed cing sngangs par
33a5(rgyud): gyur te/ de nas nges bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// ma lus zhing na 'di ni gzugs bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes pas ring nas gnas gtsang ste/ nyon mongs rnam grol
33a6(rgyud): lam ldan yun ring lon/ srid pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las thar// khyod kyang mi rigs khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro/ gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum na skyabs// 'di la zhe sdang cung zad sus
33a7(rgyud): bskyed pa/ de ni rmongs shing bde ba nyams par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas// bdud sdig can la'adi skad ces smras so// de ni 'phrul chen bsod nams rab
33b1(rgyud): kyi mtshan// mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu thar/ sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa// bdud brgya kun gyis gtse bar bya mi nus/ sdig can gyis smras pa/ nga yi skye bo dag la dbang
33b2(rgyud): byas te// khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro// de yis ring por mi thogs yul stongs byed// yu bu cag kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba nges 'di skad ces
33b3(rgyud): smras so// khyod ni rab tu 'byor par 'gyur ba'i tshe// de nas khyod kyis rang gyi dpa' ba bstan// de na rab tu dpung nyams re chang na// de ring ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen la sngo/ bdud ral gri zla ba zhes
33b4(rgyud): bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// de ni su la'ang yid kyis khro ba med// mi gnas de ni bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang // khams gsum ngag las thar cing 'gro bar rgyu// de la gzhan gyis gsang bar
33b5(rgyud): mi nus so// sdig can gyis smras pa/ 'dod khams 'di na sems can gang 'khod pa// 'dod la chags shing nga rgyal dregs pas myos// de dag gang phyir rtag 'brang phyag brnyan te// de dag
33b6(rgyud): tshogs pas ci phyir de mi sod// de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar// dngos po kun shes sred pa rnam par btu la// srid par ma
33b7(rgyud): chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur// sdig can gyis smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na de yang yod// bza' btung zhim po sman dang gos bsnyen cing / tshor ba
34a1(rgyud): gsum yang de yi sems la yod// ci'i phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus// bdud srong spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ni/
34a2(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul ni ci yod pa// don grub 'phrul la cha shas mi reg na// de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ ngas ni de la zan bcad byas// de la rdo ba dag kyang
34a3(rgyud): 'phangs// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod// bdud shes mig ces bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyis gang tshe de la bgegs byas te/
34a4(rgyud): de ni khros pas cung zad 'tshig pa 'am// khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam// de las khyod kyi tshig ngan mngon thos sam// sdig can gyis smras pa// de ni so sor brtags pas rtag tu/
34a5(rgyud): bzod // 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral// de ni sems can kun la byams sems ldan// 'dre bar spyod de rtag go// bdud thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad
34a6(rgyud): ces smras so// kun sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa// de la bdag cag nan tan bgegs bya mod// des ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs// de la ji ltar brlag
34a7(rgyud): par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis spras pa/ stobs thob khyed cag nga yi grogs yin te/ khyed rnams bag yod byos la de re chos// thams cad phyogs su ri yi 'phreng ba dang // sa 'di ma lus
34b1(rgyud): byin gyis chur brlab bo// mkha' las mi bzang stug pa'i brag char dang // lcags kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab/ lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mnga' bo che// de lus phye mar badrag cing
34b2(rgyud): dbab par bya// kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang / mdung thung rul gri tho ba rnams phab la// 'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gis// shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya// de bzhin
34b3(rgyud): du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so// de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin 'dong bar bgyi'o// rang rang
34b4(rgyud): gi gnas nas go bgos la// sde dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dong ngo // bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan par ni bya na// dge sbyong go'u ta ma de rtsal
34b5(rgyud): ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te// khyed rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud bya ba rang gi gnas su dong nas/ go bgos te bdud bye ba re re zhing yang g.yog stong stong ya lad
34b6(rgyud): rnam pa mang po gyon pa/ lag cha sna tshogs pa/ go rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dang chas te/ de'i nub mo 'das nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyin te/ yul aM b+h+ra maM g+ha d+ha'i drang thad kyi nam mkha'
34b7(rgyud): la 'khod nas/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang /
35a1(rgyud): sha za dang / grul bum gang dag bcom ldan 'das la sems ma dad cing gus par bya bar yid la byed pa med par 'gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems/
35a2(rgyud): ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das dkrongs su bcug nas/ de dag kyang lag cha dang / go cha sna tshogs chas te de nyid na 'khod do// bdud sdig can
35a3(rgyud): ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi
35a4(rgyud): pha rol tu son pa/ g.yog lnga brgya yod pa/ gangs kyi ri'i ngos la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so// go'u ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog/ mkhas
35a5(rgyud): shing mngon par shes pa dag la gnas/ aM b+h+ra maM g+ha d+ha nu de 'dug de ring ni// rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod// brtan por sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis/
35a6(rgyud): de dang khyod du lhan cig smra bar byos// der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang // gdon mi za ba rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te// de/
35a7(rgyud): nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba/ ngas deng mi mtshungs blo bsam ci 'dra ba las khyed nyon cig/ bdud yul bdud kyi dregs chen 'joms
35b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyu de mi ston pa'i// rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra// de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la bu la ma byams bzhin// de yi slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar snga dro ni// grong khyer/
35b2(rgyud): ngag tu g.yeng ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na// de dag glu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzung // de thos shAkya'i khyu mchog ci nas yid spro meng bar bya// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ glang chen rnga mo
35b3(rgyud): seng ge ma he stag gtum sgra drag dbyar dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong de'i phyi rol myur sprul te// bdag cag lag cha mtshon thogs gdug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum des mthong na// bslad cing mi dran
35b4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul sor te de nas tha dang phyogs su 'gro// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ lam srang ba ni mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong mangs 'khod// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mda' chen mda' zhags bla dgas ral gri
35b5(rgyud): thigs// nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra drag sprin las lce yang 'bebs// de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du ma rungs 'gyur// 'dud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang /
35b6(rgyud): rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
35b7(rgyud): nas/ bdud kyi sgra'ang mi 'byin/ phyogs bzhin me dang ri'ang med/ sprin nag po'ang med/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang byin gyis klu gang yang tha na char thigs pa/
36a1(rgyud): gcig tsam yang mi 'bebs so// yang de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod
36a2(rgyud): snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon
36a3(rgyud): nu shin tu ngar la bab pa byad bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i cha byad 'dra ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing shin tu rgyug ste/ de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas/ srang du rgyug
36a4(rgyud): cing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ grogs po dag khyod kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon
36a5(rgyud): cig/ bdud gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyis gcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// skye mched dag gis shin tu chog
36a6(rgyud): mched dag gis bdag cag bslus// skye mched dag ni gsod pa ste// skye mched dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // phung po byas pas shin tu chog/ phung po byas pas bdag cag bslus//
36a7(rgyud): phung po byas pas gsod pa ste// phung po byas pas ngas mthar dbyung // 'di lta ste/ ba ha ra/ b+ha ra bA ha/ mi r-i tsI ba ha sa t+ya ba ha/ A ma ba ha swahA/ gnas brtan
36b1(rgyud): shA ri'i bu chug cing glu dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid
36b2(rgyud): rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// mgon po bdag cag de cing bzod par gsol/ 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog khyod de// phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshad/
36b3(rgyud): bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis// srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos
36b4(rgyud): mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas mo'u 'gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang
36b5(rgyud): nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas/ glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// khams nyid dag gis shin tu chog/ khams nyid dag gis bdag cag bslus// khams
36b6(rgyud): nyid dag ni gsod pa ste/ khams nyid dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ tshor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// tshor ba dag ni gsod pa ste// chog ba dag gis
36b7(rgyud): mthar dbyung ngo // sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/ sems pa dag gis bdag cag bslus// sems pa dag ni gsod pa ste// sems pa dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'du shes byas/
37a1(rgyud): pas shin tu mchog/ 'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus// 'du shes byas pas gsod pa ste// 'du shes byas pas mthar dbyung ngo // 'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/
37a2(rgyud): 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag gis gsod pa ste/ 'khor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'di lta ste/ a ma ba a ma ba/ A ra dza/ ra na dza ha shaM s+ya thA/ shaM s+ya
37a3(rgyud): thA/ ga ga na ba swA hA/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis chen po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyi tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas 'dud gzhon nu lnga
37a4(rgyud): bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phrul ldan sbas pa 'phags la ma thub dbang sras// 'khor ba'i nye sa la mnyam lha chos kyi sgron// sdig spangs
37a5(rgyud): bdag cag ri mo gus pa skyes// sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun deng skya bas so// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i/
37a6(rgyud): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
37a7(rgyud): por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas/ glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// reg pa byas pas shin tu chog/ reg pa byas pas
37b1(rgyud): bdag cag bslus// reg pa byas pas gsod pa ste// reg bya ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // bdag po dag gis shin tu chog/ bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus// bdag po
37b2(rgyud): dag ni gsod pa ste// bdag po dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste// 'khor ba dag
37b3(rgyud): gis mthar dbyung ngo // srid pa kun gyis shin tu chog/ srid pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus// srid pa kun ni gsod pa ste// srid pa kun ni ngas mthar dbyung // 'dod pa'i dga' bas
37b4(rgyud): shin tu chog/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas bdag cag bslus// 'dod pa'i dga' bas gsod pa ste// 'dod pa'i dga' ba ngas mthar dbyung // grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// rig zar
37b5(rgyud): n+ya drag mgyogs 'dran// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pas myos// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mkhas sna ya~M dregs pas myos/ mi mkhas dri yi dregs pas myos/
37b6(rgyud): mi mkhas ro yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas reg gi dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas
37b7(rgyud): chos kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas phung po'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas khams kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pas myos// mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos//
38a1(rgyud): mi mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'drajan// byis/
38a2(rgyud): pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas kun gyi dregs pas myos// 'di lta ste/ khan ba/ kharga ba/ kha rga ba/ mung dzI nI/ a brta/ bi brta kha brte pra mAr+ha dz+yo ti ra/
38a3(rgyud): brta swA hA/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /
38a4(rgyud): de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / tshor ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed
38a5(rgyud): pa dang / zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis legs par bstan/ mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der//
38a6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i
38a7(rgyud): khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa / byang bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i bu'i cha byad 'chang ba lnga bcu
38b1(rgyud): glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// da/
38b2(rgyud): skyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i klu zos par byas nyon cig/ de dag gis gcom bsnyungs pa dang
38b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin// 'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rdeg pa med/ sdig
38b4(rgyud): rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la ther zug med// chos kun myur du 'jigs par blo dang ldan pas shes// sdug bsngal chos gzir byams pa thams cad gar chags pa// reg kun sdug
38b5(rgyud): bsngal khur yin tshor ba dag kyang med// ji ltar dad pa byang chub la ma sgom bstan byed pa// de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du
38b6(rgyud): shes spangs pa dge/ bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med// bdud kyi g.yo dag thong la sems ni byang chub sngos//
38b7(rgyud): nam mkha' glog bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung // reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de// tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin// byis pa'i
39a1(rgyud): sde rnams bsdus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug/ phung po thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang
39a2(rgyud): bral/ byang chub la ma spyod des ni 'dres pas byang chub brnyes// rmongs byed chos 'di nyid ni chos su skyob pa sa gsungs// 'di lta ste su mun+de/ suny+dzin si li si li si li/
39a3(rgyud): a ba ha si li ta tha tA si li b+hU ta ko Ti si li swA hA/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang gsang sngags kyi tshig
39a4(rgyud): 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos
39a5(rgyud): ma thos// gti mug mi shes rmongs pas sdig las ci bgyis pa// rgyal ba'i sra sa la bdag cag mngon sum deng bshags nas// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs
39a6(rgyud): bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go//
39a7(rgyud): yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/ srangs de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ mo'u
39b1(rgyud): 'gal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ glang po ni lho phyogs su bltas te 'dugarab 'byor ni shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad
39b2(rgyud): phyed phyed tsam na 'khod do// nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na/ khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad+ma chub ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'dab ma ni bai DUR+Ya sngon po/
39b3(rgyud): za ba ni dpal gyi snying po// snying po ni mu tig/ dri ni lha'i spos pas lhag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de las snang ba byung ngo /
39b4(rgyud): snang ba nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/ srang de na pad+ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni
39b5(rgyud): pad+ma de 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga par snang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad brgya par snang 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag
39b6(rgyud): tshang phyed par snang ngo // pad+ma de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang / don dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems can gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag gis tshigs su
39b7(rgyud): bcad pa 'di dag thos so// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa// gcig pus 'dud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo//
40a1(rgyud): gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nyag gcig 'gro ba dag la pan phyir byon par the tsom med/ mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul yang rig pa chos don thar 'dod pa
40a2(rgyud): tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas brtul// 'gro ba kun la phan ngon rig mkhas dam chos gsung ba chen// thub pa smras cho ga 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa de ring gshegs//
40a3(rgyud): dus su gshegs pa ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang // tshad med chos ston rig pa lha dang mir bcas 'gro ba skyob// 'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron// dam
40a4(rgyud): papa gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'di kun ston// sdug bsngal 'phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing // 'jig rten don slad mi bsnyel blo gros mnga' bas spyad// ma rig pa yis bsgribs
40a5(rgyud): pa'i mig can dag la yang dam pa'i chos kyi mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshogs gyur gyis// don gyi dam pa gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la/
40a6(rgyud): stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa// smra ba'i seng ge ring po mi thogs 'dir gshegs so// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs na ni// dbang po drug/
40a7(rgyud): gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing // mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba// de ni chos kyi rnga chen rdung ngu yang dag gshegs// dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams
40b1(rgyud): rab 'joms pa// don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po/ pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir// drug gis bon smra ba'i seng ge 'dir gshegs so// 'dod pa na spyod/
40b2(rgyud): pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag byung ngo // khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' ba spyod// bag med sems pa sreng dang rgyags pas bsgribs// cag tu rmongs shing dga'
40b3(rgyud): ba'i skom gyis myos// bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi byed// 'dod pa mi rtag chu yi zla ba bzhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra// dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar pa//
40b4(rgyud): nams kyang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'gyur// dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam// rga dang na 'chi 'jigs pas kun zin cing / khyed cag ngan/
40b5(rgyud): song sa la rab tu zhugs// sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la// rten cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang bsrungs// 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la// bde bar gshegs
40b6(rgyud): pa'i skyabs su nye bar dang // song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon// legs bshed de ni khyed kyi don chen te// shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i chos ldan mnyam pa don chen no//
40b7(rgyud): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma'i 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo // mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med// rab tu bsgrims te/
41a1(rgyud): chos la rnam par sgoms/ ma 'khrul sems dang rnam par thar 'dod pas// zhe sdang rab tu spang ba'i blo gyis shig/ rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bsnan pa yi/
41a2(rgyud): bzod pa mchog la rnam par sgom pa gyis// des ni na dang rga las thar pa yi// shin tu rnam thar myur du thor par 'gyur// gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog sogs la chags// ther thug
41a3(rgyud): rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por blta// de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyud mi 'chad // de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu 'bab// rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing // byed med
41a4(rgyud): rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa/ de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur/ skye dang 'jig 'gro la chos 'di thams cad la/ nam mkha
41a5(rgyud): 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa// de dag 'chi med rga med na ba'ang med// ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med// gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags// lam de
41a6(rgyud): mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin// da ltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin du// bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par bcom par 'gyur// gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spangs phyir// ci yang med/
41a7(rgyud): cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa// tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do// bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur pa// chos 'di thams cad stong par
41b1(rgyud): bsgoms nas su/ smon pa spangs na bla na med pa yin/ byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur/ de lta bu'i don gyi tshig chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi /
41b2(rgyud): mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byang du/ la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byang du la la ni sred med kyi bu'i na byang
41b3(rgyud): du la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byang du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi rna byang du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byang du la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byang du
41b4(rgyud): la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byang du/ la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byang du la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa bal ba'i
41b5(rgyud): cha byad du/ la la ni nyi ma'i cha byang du la la ni zla ba'i cha byad dul la ni skar ma'i cha byad dul la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byang du/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byang dul la ni mi 'am ci'i
41b6(rgyud): cha byang du la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i cha byang du la la ni rin po'i cha byad du/ la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon
41b7(rgyud): pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad dul la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byang du la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad dul la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byad du la la ni glang po ches/
42a1(rgyud): srungs kyi bu'i cha byang du/ la la mirta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs ldan gyi cha byang du/ la la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byang du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i ma byad/
42a2(rgyud): du la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byang du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la/ phyung phrul dang
42a3(rgyud): rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba
42a4(rgyud): thogs shing 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ phyang phrul dang spud pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal
42a5(rgyud): mtshan dang / ba dan ser po dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni le brgan kha dog le brgan la/ gser gyi gos dang / phyang phrul dang / lhab lhub ste/ gdugs
42a6(rgyud): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthing kha thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu
42a7(rgyud): tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan/
42b1(rgyud): thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu mo'i 'dzin/
42b2(rgyud): gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te/ sa la chag chag 'debs so// la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par byed do// la la
42b3(rgyud): ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin no// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud
42b4(rgyud): dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs
42b5(rgyud): so/ gal la ni srang dang / khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa
42b6(rgyud): dang sgo khang dang / shing khang dang / gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe
42b7(rgyud): bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u 'am la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te/ skrag cing srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor bar 'dug go// 'og min gyi lha grang
43a1(rgyud): meng dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor yug tu 'khod do// bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas kun tu
43a2(rgyud): bltas na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag gis pad+ma de
43a3(rgyud): 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas thams cad na'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med
43a4(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing lus
43a5(rgyud): rdul te/ lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pos bos te/ bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig la nyon// nga la stobs med bdag
43a6(rgyud): yul 'dir dbang med// mthu stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de/ skye bo bstan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'jug go// lha mi dga' ba'i pad+ma 'dir byung ste/ 'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar
43a7(rgyud): dong bder gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'// yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro// 'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgyu yin te/ lha mi mang po thams cad yid
43b1(rgyud): gcig pa d+ma 'khor bar 'dug gang ni 'jigs pa'i gang byung myur du ri yi char bya ba ste cinas bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir bcug gyis de nas bdud gzhun
43b2(rgyud): zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi pan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyi chos rig na// bdag sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro 'ang gshegs/
43b3(rgyud): gzi brjid spu dang dpal gzugs mthong bas bdag cag myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rang mchog gzhan med// de nas bdud gzham rig rab tu phra zhing gdo
43b4(rgyud): mchog tu khros pas non pas// bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa// bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'ang mi shes sam
43b5(rgyud): 'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sdog/ ngo mi tsha'am 'dzem par mi bya'am// bdag cag stobs ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa// pad+ma'i drug
43b6(rgyud): dunye bar der dong ste// chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin tu dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// lus ni dring stobs dang brtson 'grus sbyor// ji tsam skad cig
43b7(rgyud): brlag par ma gyur pa// de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dod// de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig
44a1(rgyud): byed dpa'// sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog/ grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag myur du dgal zhing dang bas blta// 'jig rten
44a2(rgyud): gsum mchod srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dong // de nas nam mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kun tshogs pas/
44a3(rgyud): gus shing dga' ldan nga yi tshig nyon cig/ sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btung ngag yid 'thun spyod de/ khro spangs rab dga' thub pa'i gsungs mchog la yang dga' dang skyed// sangs/
44a4(rgyud): rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs de de ring gus par mchod// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun
44a5(rgyud): las byas te/ bdud la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha
44a6(rgyud): byang du la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byang du / la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du la la ni 'thab bral
44a7(rgyud): ba'i cha byang du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags
44b1(rgyud): skyes po'i cha byang du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byang du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byang du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad dul la ni nyi ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni zla ba'i
44b2(rgyud): cha byad du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i cha byang du/ la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i cha byang du/ la
44b3(rgyud): la ni rin po che'i ra byad du/ la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byang du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byang du/ la la
44b4(rgyud): ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byang du/ la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu chen po che'i cha byang du/ la la ni glang po ches srungs kyi bu'i cha byang du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi
44b5(rgyud): shugs can gyi cha byang du/ la la ni bud med rin po che'i ra byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/
44b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la/ phyang phrul dang rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan
44b7(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da na dmar po dang mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing / 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod
45a1(rgyud): do// la la ni dka zhing kha dog dkar la/ byang tshul dang spud pa kha dog le brtan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ser po dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs/
45a2(rgyud): shing 'khod do// la la ni le brgam kha dog le brgan la/ gser gyi gos dang / byang phrul dang / lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mthing kha thogs shing 'khod //
45a3(rgyud): la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la naM dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu tig dmar po'i chur 'bebs so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi
45a4(rgyud): kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/
45a5(rgyud): nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu'i kha dog gis/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod/
45a6(rgyud): du spos chu thogs te sa la chag chag 'debs so// la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par byed do// la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar
45a7(rgyud): byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin no// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi
45b1(rgyud): 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rin po ni rnam pa snga rnyogs thogs so// mas/
45b2(rgyud): ni srang dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo khang dang / gzhal
45b3(rgyud): med khang sna tshogs su 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang
45b4(rgyud): bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// bdag la phyin chad grogs med de/
45b5(rgyud): bdag gi dpal deng thams cad stor// bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams// brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya// bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba bcad// pad+ma bcang dang kun 'khrugs
45b6(rgyud): te/ de nas sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro// de na tha ma'i stobs yin no// bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas/ rlung lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/ srang gi pad+ma ga la
45b7(rgyud): ba der phyin nas/ pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma gcad par 'dod na de dag kyang ma mthong / pad+ma'i snying po la lag pas brdab
46a1(rgyud): bya/ par 'dod na de'ang ma dmigs te/ dper na glog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no/ 'di lta ste dper na grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad+ma de'ang snang mod kyi mi/
46a2(rgyud): dmigs so// gang gi tshe 'dud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad rab tu spangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs pa
46a3(rgyud): sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de'ang ma nus so// yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rab tu bskyod par 'dod na reg par yang ma nus te mi dmigs so//
46a4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ dper na la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing mi dmigs nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
46a5(rgyud): ci nas sems can 'dus pa rnams brtags te/ sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o snyam na/ sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par ma rung ngo // de nas
46a6(rgyud): bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te/ gdong mchi ma can phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong gi
46a7(rgyud): ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas// 'di ltar bdag ni 'dun 'dir slad bzhin skad cig myos par song / yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad//
46b1(rgyud): der skang brlag par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro// bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/ de rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so//
46b2(rgyud): bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de/ bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dir dbang du song du 'ong / dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/
46b3(rgyud): ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi phyi rol tu 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na//
46b4(rgyud): 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba 'am// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams sa 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du mgul pa bcing pa lngas bcings par bdag gis mthong bar rab tu khros shing skrag ste/
46b5(rgyud): skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro// de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur
46b6(rgyud): ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir khyod deng mya ngan yid kyis du gdong sgra cher 'bod// 'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma
46b7(rgyud): 'jigs myur du song // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba/ 'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud sdig can
47a1(rgyud): 'di snyam du bdag nyid tshig snyan pas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i skyabs su song la/ bcings pa 'di las bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du sems te/ de nas bdud sdig
47a2(rgyud): can gyis phyogs gang na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las rab tu
47a3(rgyud): thar par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub mgon myur du 'jigs chen mi bzad bcings
47a4(rgyud): pa 'di las khrol// de ring slan chad bde gshegs gtso mchog skyabs su bdag mchi ste// gti mug gis ni bdag ljongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen bgyis// mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan
47a5(rgyud): sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyis// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can tshig snyan pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ba de'i tshe na/ bdag grol ba snyam du shes so// gang gi tshe
47a6(rgyud): 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe yang mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa bdag gis shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro ma nus pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la mgon
47a7(rgyud): dang skyabs su sems bskyed nas/ yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so// lan 'dun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol ba shes te de nyid na 'dug go// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzung
47b1(rgyud): las bdud btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/ nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song /
47b2(rgyud): ba bdu gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las
47b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis gang gi tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so// skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
47b4(rgyud): za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so//
47b5(rgyud): chos kyi kha lo sgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang / rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te// nyan thos de dag la ni kyal ka deng byas pa// 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur/
47b6(rgyud): de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin bu bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can
47b7(rgyud): gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te//
48a1(rgyud): bstan pa'i cho ga srung srad du// kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste// bzhon
48a2(rgyud): dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la// skye bo mang po thams cad kyang // mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya// de nas de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan
48a3(rgyud): 'das ma gshegs shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab/
48a4(rgyud): las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mi stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i
48a5(rgyud): mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ga ngan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang /
48a6(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa dang / lta ba'i rgya mtsho dral ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus
48a7(rgyud): la gshegs pa mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs
48b1(rgyud): dang byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga la gsod par gshom yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang gnod pa mi nus so// ngas ni 'a/
48b2(rgyud): na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so// yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag/
48b3(rgyud): gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar
48b4(rgyud): byas te yongs su spyad do// de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro// ji tsam
48b5(rgyud): na gangan las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tshal srung ba'i lha mo mdzes zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol
48b6(rgyud): to// bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams// re re yang ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor zhing mchis
48b7(rgyud): zhe sdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te// khyod dkrongs slad du 'khrug pa'i sems kyis gnas// mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs// 'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par ma bzhud cig/
49a1(rgyud): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs pa de'i tshe/ gtsug lag 'ang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo thos phyag
49a2(rgyud): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig can dag ni lnga stong po// mtshon char bcas te mchis pa ni/ bsam med de dag khyod la sngo// thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig/ gang gi tshe bcom
49a3(rgyud): ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/ sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig
49a4(rgyud): rten sgron ma brlag gyur na/ kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing / chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgyal chen chos kyi ro ni nyams
49a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yon can gdug pas shin tu gtams// sa 'dir bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rung gyur pa lags// ji ltar shin tu dbyung ba'i
49a6(rgyud): mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis// khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di ni rab tu mi bzang mang po dag/ sdig pa'i chos can ral gri ste re mtshon rnom thogs shing mchis// bde bar gshegs pa
49a7(rgyud): 'jig rten srung slad bdag gi tshig gson te/ stobs bcu grub par bzhud pa de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang //
49b1(rgyud): de na shing gi lha mo 'ong 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje ba snying rje bar dra zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin/
49b2(rgyud): rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni// mgon po khams gsum 'di dag thams cad de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur// nam mkha' 'di la sprul gyis rkeng bcings rno ba'i mnga' dang mtshon thogs
49b3(rgyud): shing // khyod dkrongs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis ngan de ma gshegs// de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher ngu zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
49b4(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po// mnga' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje meng bar la/
49b5(rgyud): gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams// khyod dkrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang
49b6(rgyud): du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung ba'i lha mo ta la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher du zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas/ bcom
49b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan shul 'di seng ge rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bskor// dge sbyong rnams la brtse sdang 'dud kyi rnam mang
50a1(rgyud): gnod par bgyid// sa 'dir ston pa khyod dkrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson// sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse slad du ma gshegs shig/
50a2(rgyud): bcom ldan bdud thul khyod kyi bstan pa rnam zhig dang // sgyu ma bgyid pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas// lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams// kun 'dus mi dga' skrag/
50a3(rgyud): nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs// dam chos cher zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs 'gyur dang // nam mkha' skar ma 'ong stor nyi zla gyur mthong nas/ 'gro mchog kye ma mi bzang klad pa deng
50a4(rgyud): drag rdob// bder gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi// mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing // chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'grongs par brlag
50a5(rgyud): chos kyi chu yang bskam par 'gyur// dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du// ma rung 'gyur bar nye gnas tshe// mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang // 'di dag kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lnga/
50a6(rgyud): mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas/ gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol// smra mchog de ring brlag
50a7(rgyud): par ma bzhud cig/ bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi// 'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog/ bdag gi grong du brlag
50b1(rgyud): par dang ma bzhud// sems can thug brtse'i slad du 'dir gzhes te/ sems can skye bas gtses pas 'jigs thar mdzod// dam pa brnyes nas sgrol ba rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas
50b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs// sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs// srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig/ sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs// kye ma
50b3(rgyud): 'dod la chags shing byis pa'i sde// de rnams zhi bgyi slad du chos lam shod// skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong // de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / de nas
50b4(rgyud): sa'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig sgra gzhig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing /
50b5(rgyud): khyod kyis ni// rgya mtsho bzhi bltams pa yi khrag stsal cing // dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam// spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma snyed stsal to// sngon ni rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sras
50b6(rgyud): dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta// gnas dang go sa dang ma la cha zas skom dang // de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal// rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad// khyod kyis
50b7(rgyud): bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen// phar 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no// bya ba bka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas spyad//
51a1(rgyud): sems can du mnyon mongs thar par mdzad// gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni// lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig/ chu bo chen po las ni 'gro
51a2(rgyud): ba bsgral// 'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te// sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bskam par bya// sems can mang po grangs med grong khyer gzung // sems can de dag dgongs pa
51a3(rgyud): yongs rdzogs shing // byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu khod// 'di ni lam por sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par bzod// 'di dag sgrol cig dam
51a4(rgyud): bcas dgongs su gsol// bskal pa bye ba mang por chos ston to// mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol// 'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi chu yi khrus// mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba
51a5(rgyud): ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di na dga' ma mchis// bdag dgrol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzod// srid gsum rgya mtsho nas kyang 'gro ba sgrol// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag
51a6(rgyud): gcig/ rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshang du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag
51a7(rgyud): khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis bder gshegs sngon mthong ba// zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul
51b1(rgyud): chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na// de la 'di lta bu yi bgegs ma byung // ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus ngan la// rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te// thub dbang 'gro ba yongs/
51b2(rgyud): smin mdzad slad du// 'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing // smra ba'i seng ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du// sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po// 'di ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jigs
51b3(rgyud): par byed// sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa// de dag yul gcig 'khor lo
51b4(rgyud): bskor gyur pa// 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor// de nas ma rung bar ni gyur ta re// de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i
51b5(rgyud): slad// shin tu sems can don mdzad spyad// de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir// brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam
51b6(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong mchi ma zag cing ngo 'dzum gnag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
51b7(rgyud): 'khod nas// bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ la la ni skra 'bal/ la la ni rgyan 'akrol/ la la ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan snyol/ la la ni bdag gi lus sa la rdob/ la la
52a1(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ la la ni shin tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni lag pas zang rdung / la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so//
52a2(rgyud): bya bzhin du 'gro ldog/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'breng ba dang /
52a3(rgyud): gos dang / phyang phrul dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro// de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di
52a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten don slang 'di bas mang ba yi// bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad// zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes kyis// btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs
52a5(rgyud): bzhugs su gsol// sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung du mdzad// lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung // shin tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la//
52a6(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol// dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smon te// bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la// khyod kyis thugs rje bskyed de so sor
52a7(rgyud): rab ston la// chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag sgrol bar mdzod// 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i dbus son 'khyams gyur cing // 'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba// de dag la ni lam mchog
52b1(rgyud): so sor ston// 'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba// de ni khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad // rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring
52b2(rgyud): du bzhugs su gsol// 'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig/ de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam 'dren brgya lam ma rung gyur na ni// 'jig rten
52b3(rgyud): 'di ni ma lus spongs par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan rnamathar gsum gyi rgya// 'dir ni yo ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur// ngag lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag/ bdag
52b4(rgyud): cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste// de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung gnas 'di brlag ma gyur cig/ yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya
52b5(rgyud): stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te// de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lcags kyang // thub pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni// ma rung
52b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur// dpag tshad sum cu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas rab tu bskor// rna sbrang ral gri mtshon
52b7(rgyud): rnon rtsub pa'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde// byang chub snying por lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag 'gyur na// da ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de la ga la bgegs shig byed//
53a1(rgyud): de nas lha mo gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che// 'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde ste shin tu
53a2(rgyud): dpung che bas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa 'dir ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs// de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin tu snang med 'khyam par 'ong // de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs
53a3(rgyud): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to// blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te// dge ba bzhugs shing gtso bo
53a4(rgyud): thugs rje can// lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs// de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gtor cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan/
53a5(rgyud): gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// deng khyed ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag cig/ bdud rnams thams cad gzhon/
53a6(rgyud): bcas cig car du// tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na// nga yi lus kun la ni smos ci dgos// dong ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste// nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos
53a7(rgyud): bshad do// lam rnams stor ba la ni nga nyid kyis// dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan bya// ngas sngon bya bar dka' ba mang po byas// zas dang skom dag shin tu rgya chen byin// gnas
53b1(rgyud): dang sman yang mi nyung sbyin byin pas// nga la deng su gnod pa byed par nus// ngas ni rta dang glang chen shing rta dang // lhab lhub phyang phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang // bran po bran mo thong
53b2(rgyud): rdal yul 'khor btang // nga la su zhig gnod pa byed par nus// chung ma bu pho bu mo bran mang dang // yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal srid dang // sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas
53b3(rgyud): byin gyis// nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur// mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang // lus dang pags pa khrag dang rkang lags bcas// nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la
53b4(rgyud): btang // su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus// ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mang la// gus ldan bdag gis lag nas shin tu mchod// rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'// nga
53b5(rgyud): la su zhig rlag par byed par nus// ngas sngon shin tu bya dka' mang po rnams// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas// lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na// nga la rnam
53b6(rgyud): par 'tshe bar su zhig nus// nyon mongs ngas btul nges par nga sangs rgyas// sems can thams cad la ni byams sems ldan// khro med phrag dog tha ba nga la med// nga yi
53b7(rgyud): mdun na de ring su zhig nus// ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul// ngas ni bdud pham bye ba pham par byas// khyed kun rnam par thar pa nges par bya// grong du ci phyir mi 'gro//
54a1(rgyud): ma 'jigs shig/ sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na// sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa'
54a2(rgyud): yang / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun nas bsogs// zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya// bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya// sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun
54a3(rgyud): gnas pas// sangs rgyas dag gis dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci
54a4(rgyud): dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad
54a5(rgyud): ces smras so// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs/
54a6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par
54a7(rgyud): mdzad do// sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to// sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil lo// skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do// 'chi bdag gi nyi//
54b1(rgyud): ma bye mar brlags so// ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal to// gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad pa bsgyur to// chu bo bzhi bskams so// chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do// byang chub kyi lam/
54b2(rgyud): bstan to// bzod pa dang nges pa la btsud do// bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to// 'phags pa'i 'den pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do// ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs
54b3(rgyud): rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to// sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsung ngo // de nas lha dang mi de dag gis
54b4(rgyud): bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam
54b5(rgyud): de phyag bdar byas so// lha'i gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so// lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka/
54b6(rgyud): chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma sa kun tu g.yogs so// gang du bcom ldan
54b7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i la mo de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/ lha'i ras bcos bu dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / lag rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang /
55a1(rgyud): bya/ mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to// shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu dang zhing rnyog pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba/
55a2(rgyud): khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi
55a3(rgyud): 'phreng ba bzang zhing gser gyi bye ma dag gi char yang phab bo// dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya'i phye ma dang / a ka ru dang / rgya spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i/
55a4(rgyud): char yang rab tu phab bo// gor shi sha dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char yang lam der phab bo// lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig
55a5(rgyud): dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to// grong khyer gyi phyi rol na'ang lha dang mi rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do// grong khyer gyi nang na bdud//
55a6(rgyud): dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
55a7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam nas gshegs so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs
55b1(rgyud): kyis lam der zhugs te/ de nas sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs pa mthong ba nas/
55b2(rgyud): gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred med kyi bus 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor
55b3(rgyud): los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus
55b4(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag seng ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / gang dag lha ma yin gyis
55b5(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par
55b6(rgyud): mthong ngo // sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs//
55b7(rgyud): par mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te zham ring du 'brang zhing dong ngo // yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa'i drang srong
56a1(rgyud): / skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/ de g.yog lnga brgya dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i drung na sdod pas bcom ldan 'das
56a2(rgyud): drang srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam de nas gshegs shing / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed
56a3(rgyud): par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so// bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang mis mchod par snang ngo // 'di ni lus
56a4(rgyud): thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so// bdag cag gnyis gang rgan gang mkhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas
56a5(rgyud): 'di ltar bdag gis bsu la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas na sa
56a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// thos ldan yid 'thang brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang // ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen// khyed cag thams cad 'di
56a7(rgyud): la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor// yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po de
56b1(rgyud): bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/
56b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod su zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bram ze'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyi gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni go'u
56b3(rgyud): ma'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/ bka' sprul pa/ nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo// gsol ba/ khyod kyi spyod pa ci/ bka' stsal pa
56b4(rgyud): nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid la spyod do// gsol pa/ khyod kyis rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/ bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa/ nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid
56b5(rgyud): lon no// gsol pa/ drang srong chen po skar ma bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rigs pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du'o//
56b6(rgyud): 'di ni 'jig rten gyis shes pa ste/ de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar
56b7(rgyud): ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang nyi ma la rten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go// de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub
57a1(rgyud): de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis mchis par rig par bgyi'o// klang pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang dang mdzub bcu bzhi ste
57a2(rgyud): skar ma rnams kyi gnas so// gang de dag na 'da' ba ni rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la btsas pa de dang de na gda'a'o// de'ang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyis/ thub
57a3(rgyud): pa chen po gson cig/ smin drug la ni su btsas pa// de yi gdong gi sor bzhin// g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis// spu can gnag la mdog kyang dmar// longs spyod bdog cing grags
57a4(rgyud): dang ldan// mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te// smin drug la ni skyes pa yi// mtshan ma nyid de lags so// gang zhig la ni sor bzhin// sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de// snar ma la ni skyes
57a5(rgyud): pa ste// shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'// mkhas shing longs spyod phun sum tshogs// rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs// dgra rnams rtag par rab
57a6(rgyud): tu 'joms// mgul ba yi ni mdzub phyed na// gang la tshig pa 'dra gdo' ba// di ni mgo la skyes pa ste// dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o// mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la// g.yon la sme
57a7(rgyud): ba gang mchis pa// lag la skyes pa khro ba ste// de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog/ mtshan khung g.yon na sme nag mchis// nab so la ni skyes pa ste// nor dang 'bru yang 'byor par 'gyur// de ni
57b1(rgyud): shes pa'i rgya yang rlung // ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes// mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'// phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni// nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes// dbu sna dag ni thams
57b2(rgyud): cad kyang // gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis// sku ni chu zheng ga' ba ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis nyon mongs thul// tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis// skrag la skyes te thal mo
57b3(rgyud): sred tshul khrims 'chal cing 'grogs mi bde// de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o// 'og gam zung ngam rgyad gcig na// gang la byi sran 'dra gda' ba// mchul skyes te nor dang ldan// btsun
57b4(rgyud): zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi// lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na// gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni// de ni grel skyes pa ste// ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung // lte ba man chad sor bzhin// gang
57b5(rgyud): la rmi rab gda' ba ni// nga bo la de skyes longs spyod can// khrims ldan 'chi 'phos mtho ris mchis// me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag/ sme ba dmar po chu so gda'// rku zhing g.yo ngan sgyu
57b6(rgyud): ma ste// bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan// gang gi mtshan na sme ba ni// gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang // nag pa la ni skyes pa ste// 'dod chags rtag tu glu gar gda'// mtshan
57b7(rgyud): gyi 'og gam steng na ni// sme ba ser po rab tu gda'// sa ri la ni de skyes te// mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang // brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na// sme ba dmar po de bzhin te// sa ga
58a1(rgyud): la ste shor ba mchog/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor// mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul// rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste// ngo tsha shes shis brtan/
58a2(rgyud): dang ldan// shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub don// gang la byi sran 'dra ganga' ba// lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can// chos dang logs spyod ldan pa'o//
58a3(rgyud): gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni// sme ba gda' ba snron la skyes// mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal// dbul zhing snyis rjes ma mchis so// pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni// gang la rma chung gda'
58a4(rgyud): ba de/ sbubs la skyes te dbang thang can// myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid// chu stod la ni skyes pa dag/ sme ba pus mo'i lha nga na// sbyin pa bgyid cing chos lam 'tshal/
58a5(rgyud): 'chi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// chu smang la ni su skyes pa// dku 'do la ni sme ba mchis// de ltar ganga' ba shes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams// skye
58a6(rgyud): gnyis po gda' ba ni// gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad med sems can byams// 'chi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// sme ba nag po rje ngar la// gda' ba mon grur skyes pa ste//
58a7(rgyud): de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung // longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// rje ngar la ni mdzub don// sme ba nag po rab tu gda'// mon gre la skyes blun pa ste// de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur//
58b1(rgyud): rdzi ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na// rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stong la// blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa 'gying // de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid// gang la sme ba mdzub gang na// khrums spang la ni skyes
58b2(rgyud): paste// sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang // shes rab 'jig med snying rjer ldan// gang gi rkang pa gnyis ka la// sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni// nam gru skyes pa ma rabs te// 'dreg mkhan du yang /
58b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag par yang // sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni// rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis// tha skar la ni ngo skyes te// rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni// bra nye la ste snying
58b4(rgyud): brtse med// gsong ma gshed ma'i ngang tshul can// shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi// gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba ni// skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags// 'jig rten na ni rnam
58b5(rgyud): shes 'dis// sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pa gang la chags 'dus pa// de ni byis pa'i rmongs pa ste/
58b6(rgyud): sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas// khyi dang sbrul dang rus sbal dang // srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po// skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa// de dag bde la rten ma yin// ji ltar
58b7(rgyud): bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang // thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin// nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na// ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas// bcom ldan
59a1(rgyud): 'das la me tog gis gtor nas/ yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni// mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gdang /
59a2(rgyud): khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na// lha 'am 'on te khyod mi lags// gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni// tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'// spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni//
59a3(rgyud): sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra// thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs// 'di sngon ma mthong ma thos nas// khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra// khyod kyi gdung rus tse lags gsungs// bcom ldan/
59a4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing // mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings// de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin// pha rol phyin
59a5(rgyud): drug nga yi rus// bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan// yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing // dbang po drug ni rnam par gcig/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga yi spyod
59a6(rgyud): pa rnam thar gsum// byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa// de ni nga ni rab tu byung // mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs// mtshan ma med par rab tu bsgoms// sems can
59a7(rgyud): med cing srog med pa// bdag med stong par sngon sangs rgyas// tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum// stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms// nga yi ye shes pha rol song // nga yi tshig
59b1(rgyud): 'di mtshungs pa med// gang dag mkhas bzhin ma chags par// byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa// de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs// ye shes 'di 'dra 'thob par
59b2(rgyud): 'gyur// chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa 'dod med la// de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed// de dag byang chub rnyed mi bka'// chos rnams la ni mi
59b3(rgyud): gnas shing // pha rol tshu rol mi brten par// yang dag mtha' ni 'dir bsgoms na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med// dmigs
59b4(rgyud): pa dag ni rnam par spangs// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la// rang gi sems la the tsom
59b5(rgyud): spongs// nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su// nga 'drar sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas
59b6(rgyud): drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du bzhugs par mthong nas// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
59b7(rgyud): mngon du gyur to// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing
60a1(rgyud): gzhan la rag las pa med de ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas drang /
60a2(rgyud): srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// yon tan
