60a3(rgyud): mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa// khyod kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams
60a4(rgyud): pas mngon 'phags pa// sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal// gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur pa'i// yon tan
60a5(rgyud): dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyur// tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i
60a6(rgyud): rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to// sman pa chen pos sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa// sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/
60a7(rgyud): bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mo bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi// ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i mi yi dam pas lung bstan gsol// sdug bsngal chu bos 'das pa'i
60b1(rgyud): sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtshog
60b2(rgyud): bu dag/ de dag bdag gis dpang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi// drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun// dus gsum gyi ni
60b3(rgyud): bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun// sangs rgyas kyis ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu
60b4(rgyud): mya ngan 'da' bar shog/ sems can thams cad nang zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams par shog/ ngo bo nyid kyis ye shes dbang po snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig/ sems can
60b5(rgyud): gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams// de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar par shog/ sems can re res kyang ni yon
60b6(rgyud): tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig/ shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog/ de dag sdig pa rnams spangs lta ba mnyam pa nyid du sten gyur cig/ sems
60b7(rgyud): can thams cad skye ba dran zhing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/ sems can de kun chos grub srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig/ thams cad chos kyis pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par
61a1(rgyud): shog/ bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char yang 'bebs shing 'dug 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog/ bdag
61a2(rgyud): gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags// bdag kyang phyin chang sdig la lta ba'i las rnams
61a3(rgyud): spyod par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog/ bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng nas byang chub bsngo bar bgyi// sems can
61a4(rgyud): tshang du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzud par bgyi// bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam
61a5(rgyud): par sbyang bar bgyi// gang du byang chub reg 'gyur zhing yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/ smra ba'i seng ge nges par
61a6(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog/ 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pas lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo//
61a7(rgyud): sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na// me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig/ sa rnams
61b1(rgyud): g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang / me tog de dag/
61b2(rgyud): thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'jug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid
61b3(rgyud): bde bas tshim pa skyes par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom
61b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'o stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// sems can bye ba
61b5(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang / yid mi skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to// gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni/
61b6(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cig/ drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas
61b7(rgyud): pa dang / sa g.yos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams
62a1(rgyud): cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang //
62a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas/ zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog
62a3(rgyud): dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' phyang phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa de dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
62a4(rgyud): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyin// byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsungs// mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing // nam mkha' la yang
62a5(rgyud): me tog gdugs gcig 'jug/ khyod ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po// rkang gnyis dag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su// bsod nams mtha' yas nam mnga' tshang mnyam pa// khams gsum
62a6(rgyud): snying por 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo
62a7(rgyud): bskor bar 'gyur 'a'o sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bskal ba grangs med dpag tu meng pa na/ byang phyogs sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog
62b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu
62b2(rgyud): dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
62b3(rgyud): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i
62b4(rgyud): dpal zhes bya bar gyur te/ khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
62b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su gyur te/ khyod kyang den theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro// 'khor ji snyed lhag pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
62b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po skar mal dga' ba lung bstan pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la 'artson par gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags byed
62b7(rgyud): zab tshig rgya slong zag bu drus gnyis kyis/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung tu sems bskyeng bar gyur te/ deng ga thams cad kyis byang chu sems dang tshang 'dzin kya
63a1(rgyud): rlab kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba thob bo// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
63a2(rgyud): de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer/
63a3(rgyud): 'di'i sgo gang nas gshegs pa'i sgo de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi
63a4(rgyud): sems kyis kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas// /
63a5(rgyud): grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha'
63a6(rgyud): la gnas bzhin du/ bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa
63a7(rgyud): mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to// bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud
63b1(rgyud): kyi 'khor de dag la la ngag ni tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas/ drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung
63b2(rgyud): dang rta babs dang / ba ga ma dang / skyed shing gi nang na me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna
63b3(rgyud): tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol nas/
63b4(rgyud): bstod pa dang yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa
63b5(rgyud): mchog tu rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/ zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan
63b6(rgyud): 'das kyis sgo'i them pa de la reg ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mong la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so// gang
63b7(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang //
64a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang //
64a2(rgyud): grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/ sems can gzi
64a3(rgyud): brjid che ba gzi brjid rtse ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba nges bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing //
64a4(rgyud): me tog dang spos dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog da / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re
64a5(rgyud): re na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams su/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing
64a6(rgyud): bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // myur du sang par gyis la 'di dag
64a7(rgyud): ltos// byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spong // khyod kyis 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos// yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis/
64b1(rgyud): g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la// 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos// byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med// 'gro la phan phyir de ring /
64b2(rgyud): grong khyer gshegs// bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de// de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du skor// grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag ston pa mdzad//
64b3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas// byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston// rang byung mya ngan med pa'i grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la// de ltar mdzad pa de dag
64b4(rgyud): rab ltos te// rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos// yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang
64b5(rgyud): ngag 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems
64b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas me tog dang
64b7(rgyud): phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa sangs rgyas
65a1(rgyud): kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po
65a2(rgyud): gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed pa 'di lta bu/
65a3(rgyud): spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu/ yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dang / me tog dang phye ma'i char 'di'ang ga las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang //
65a4(rgyud): nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste/ ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu
65a5(rgyud): mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lha ba lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
65a6(rgyud): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin
65a7(rgyud): gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing / rdul bsags pa med ces bya bar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur// rtsigs pa
65b1(rgyud): meng la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du'ang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi
65b2(rgyud): grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas shin tu lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
65b3(rgyud): sgra thos pa nges bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug par mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi yul
65b4(rgyud): gyi lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
65b5(rgyud): cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la'ang blta ba dang
65b6(rgyud): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo // der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyog
65b7(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
66a1(rgyud): bya/ pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjing 'dir phyin to//
66a2(rgyud): de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/
66a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma lus par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna rlogs
66a4(rgyud): rgyu mthun pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
66a5(rgyud): la la dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so// lal dag gis ni mu tig gi char
66a6(rgyud): phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug
66a7(rgyud): dang gor shi sha dang / tsan ngan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyiral/
66b1(rgyud): la ngag gis ni lnga ba lhub dang / byang phrul dang rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos ma sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phang po// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la ngag gis
66b2(rgyud): ni rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs sgreng ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la ngag gis ni spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so// la la dag
66b3(rgyud): gis ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to// la la ngag gis ni sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol lo// la la dag gis ni glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to//
66b4(rgyud): lal dag gis ni sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo// la la dag gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ bcom ldan
66b5(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
66b6(rgyud): spyan sngar thogs so// la la ngag gis ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'phang bstod de thogs so//
66b7(rgyud): la la ngag gis ni bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byang du mngon par sprul te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'khod pa nas/ rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no//
67a1(rgyud): la la dag gis ni seng ge'i cha byang du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi
67a2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thag thogs med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen
67a3(rgyud): po la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
67a4(rgyud): ya na lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs
67a5(rgyud): nas srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so// pad+ma de drangs te g.yos
67a6(rgyud): pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri'i khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang g.yos so// bdud kyi
67a7(rgyud): gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas khang dang / lam dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud
67b1(rgyud): kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rgyu med rkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag
67b2(rgyud): cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang // bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag snyam ste/
67b3(rgyud): de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na/ 'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo//
67b4(rgyud): de nas rang gi yul na gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khod bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
67b5(rgyud): brgyan cing shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
67b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas sems can gcig kyang ngo mi shes te/ sems
67b7(rgyud): can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par mthong ngo // de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
68a1(rgyud): pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / da ltar bdag cag jo bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa gar dong ba'ang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas/
68a2(rgyud): kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud
68a3(rgyud): sdig can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu rnam par dang sems kyis// bcom ldan pa dag ni skyabs su mchi// bdag khrol
68a4(rgyud): 'di nas myur du mchi// chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang // ngas ni su yang bzlog pa med// gal te lam ni rab shes na//
68a5(rgyud): gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos// bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rang gi spyod yul gar dga' bar// gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal tshe// bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis/
68a6(rgyud): bcings par mthong ngo go'u ta ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te// grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa// ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings
68a7(rgyud): pa thar par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs/
68b1(rgyud): nas tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang // the tsom thams cad rab spongs la// skad cig ci yang ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams ni /
68b2(rgyud): cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon// dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang // byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon// 'dzin rten mgon
68b3(rgyud): po'i mngon sum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon// gang du bzod pa sten byed pa// de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'// gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi// rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba/
68b4(rgyud): stong pa nyid ni sgom pa dang // sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon// ji ltar ngas sngon spyad pa yi// byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'// de las me tog tsam mchod 'di// khyed cag rnams//
68b5(rgyud): la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa// sred pa'i bcings las rnam grol zhing // mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi// lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya// dri ma ngan pa gsum
68b6(rgyud): spongs la// ston pas gsung ba 'dir nyon cig/ chu bo rnams ni pha rol rgol// rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs// rnamathar gsum la rab gnas shing // sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnos/
68b7(rgyud): khams gsum gyi no nyon mongs gang // de dag ma lus rnam par chom// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang // chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams// sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum/
69a1(rgyud): gyi byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems// bye brag tu ni rab spongs la// khams gsum pa las grol ba yi// zhi byed
69a2(rgyud): bzod pa thob par byos// phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis// so so'i skye bo bslad pa rnams// dngos po med la rtog byed pa// de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin// mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis//
69a3(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang sems bsgribs nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams// 'khor ba shin tu rten par gyur// 'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal// bsam gtan sgom par byed pa
69a4(rgyud): rnams// de dag phyin ci log bzhi las// de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams// chu bo bzhi las thar par byed// 'chi 'pho skye bar rab shes pa// des
69a5(rgyud): pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag/ sems can srid pas bcings pa rnams// yang dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung
69a6(rgyud): po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa las grol zag pa med// yang dang yang du mi skye ste// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed// sdig pa dag ni
69a7(rgyud): myur du shogs// sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la// 'jigs pa med par pha rol song // srid par yang dang yang skyes pa// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag
69b1(rgyud): mi 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po rab spangs te// sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig/ 'atung ba'i/
69b2(rgyud): dam pa btung bar byos// stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig/ dam pa'i don la dngos po med// rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med// 'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste// byed pa po ni 'di la med//
69b3(rgyud): de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang // dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med// tshor ba drug dang sred pa drug/ reg pa drug las byung ba yin// de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong pa yin par shes
69b4(rgyud): par byos// rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par// dngos po nyid la brtag par byos// skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// 'di na rdzas kyang med pa ltos// gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste//
69b5(rgyud): dus gsum du yang dngos med par// shes pa de dag nad med de// de ni bla na med pa'i lam// rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la// sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // tshu rol pha rol rnam
69b6(rgyud): grol ba// de na bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang // mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
69b7(rgyud): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcang ba de dag gsungs pa de'i mong la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa snyigs ma lnga can gang+gA'i klung dpag tu med
70a1(rgyud): pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas// de mong la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sha sems can
70a2(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang dang rnyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ la la dag gis//
70a3(rgyud): ni ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dres pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di
70a4(rgyud): dag thos nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
70a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po sna bdun gyi themasas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul to// bcom
70a6(rgyud): ldan 'das gas pa zhugs su thal mo d+ha bas brkyang nas 'di shA ces gas to// rnams cad mkhyen pa shi kya // 'dus du byung ba'i 'jig rten thams cad pa// ra d+ha ga ga
70a7(rgyud): matso// 'jig rten dro chos kyi tham pa thogs// thal mo sbyar ba sems can rgya chen rgyag// rab tu bskams pas ning la gzigs nas su gachos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu brko bar gsol
70b1(rgyud): mthurtsa la rnam par bstan du gsol// mtshungs pa med pa bdu mngom 'jigs te/ ma gan po shes pa can gyi zabs rnams kyis spos chu'i sprin nar bar babo la gan mongs gapar 'am/
70b2(rgyud): bstan du gsol// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi dbang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis// thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par
70b3(rgyud): mdzod// chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas// sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la// tha med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol// chu bo bdi
70b4(rgyud): dbus 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// mi yi seng ges de ring bsgral du gsol// khyod kyi chos rnams shin tu thugs su chung // sring gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol// shin tu rlabs chen
70b5(rgyud): thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la// 'gro ba gzung mdzod mtshungs med chos kyang ston// 'jig rten nyes pa'i dri ma bsal du gsol// de nas bcom
70b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis jil bur sprul pa'i thamasas de las badz+ral khril mngon par 'dzegs te pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzis/
70b7(rgyud): nas bdung sngog can la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal nas ma
71a1(rgyud): pa dang / rgang shis gtso ba rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyu/ rnam par mar bar 'jug chub bani las yang dag pa rgal bar 'gyum na ba' la la gnas pa gyu/
71a2(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi/ khyod dga' bar gyis shig
71a3(rgyud): sdig cam thod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang / ngas dang bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i
71a4(rgyud): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// ci ste sdig med khyod la tha ba zhe sdang rgyags med na/ ci phyir de nga 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston// de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni// /
71a5(rgyud): thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci 'dra bdag la 'dir shod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni ma la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcu gnas pa// de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la gsang
71a6(rgyud): par rab tu sbyar// de tshe nga la kho na dang tha ba cung zad tsam yang med // nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin// nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas// nga gsang phyir
71a7(rgyud): ni rdo ba'i char ba rab tu dbab par byas// de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi mu mo myur bsams byes// khyod kyis nga la gnod pa du ma cim byas// nga ni bas ma gtam zhugs ma khyod kyis bud med thong
71b1(rgyud): rdzun pas byasmras rnas par kyang na byasas cadang byu/ nga sa cang rgyal sangasadu sa na du ma pa smra bya /
71b2(rgyud): de ma myong nga rjes thamams kyis zang d+ha kun tumasapa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nas sa rje na drag po pag/ man 'as du 'du sa nga gagis gdu rdzas
71b3(rgyud): pa'i tshe yang sma ni rangab tu byung // nga ni shin tu bka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni// 'ab chu 'gram na gnas cha khyod kyis rgyu ba rab tu btang // nga ni gsang par bya b+hi myod kyis su
71b4(rgyud): rab tu btang // de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drag po'i drug kyang btag/ nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba yi// rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags su gri mnga' char khyod kyis phag/ 'gro la
71b5(rgyud): phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na// khyod kyis ngur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bslus// de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste// nga gsang phyir ni khyod 'a/
71b6(rgyud): mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi// 'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med// ngas ni khyod btul nas ni byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob// 'on kyang ngo mtshar bor te 'dir 'ongs
71b7(rgyud): nas ni yang smra 'am// sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srungs mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te// khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang // snying rje bor te 'dir 'ongs nga la rgol zhing
72a1(rgyud): sgyu byed dam/ nga ni zan ma zos pa'i tshe yang khyod kyis su// nga gsang phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang // sa ste dang la lhas byin gyis ni rdob 'phangs/
72a2(rgyud): pa dang // kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang // phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang // me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang / kha zas
72a3(rgyud): dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi// de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin// khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su// nga gsang phyir ni mda'
72a4(rgyud): bo che dang ral gri mnga' mang thogs// 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g.yos na// ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas 'di nang dung 'dug/ ci ste bdud ni stong phrag byed rgol du
72a5(rgyud): yang btsud kyang // sems can khrag khrig dag ni 'di ru yang dag lhags nas su/ zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te// nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya/
72a6(rgyud): nga ni snying rjes gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa khyod ni shin tug tum bo nga la rtag tu bgegs byed pa thub pa'i dbang po rgya mchog 'di dag nga mi dbang yin gyis gang lngar tha ma'i dus la ngani
72a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad ba bya// rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyang nayang spang bar bye/ khrus par gyur ba'ang bzod pa yongs su gangang bar mi bya'o gang 'a phra ga batha parab tu tho ba'i nga
72b1(rgyud): med de/ khyod ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson// nga la gsol dang khyod nying zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu// mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshang bar gyu
72b2(rgyud): de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyis// 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dang bar byos/ khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod par bya ba rab sems kyang / khyod dgrol phyir
72b3(rgyud): nga snying rtag tu byams pas rab tu dang // sdig pa'i blo gros 'or la dang bcas yid la byos shig dang // ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom
72b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la khros te 'khrugs shing rngams nas ka de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang bdag gi mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang
72b5(rgyud): ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das dkrong ba'i phyir/ rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon
72b6(rgyud): rasprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi bang thams cad na ga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshal gzhes te chos kyang ston pa dag pamam cad kyang ba'i gzug ging
72b7(rgyud): zhis ldang ba shin tu med du'ang ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi gang de dpa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'a mang par dag gis yang brgyam ma
73a1(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa ka me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems
73a2(rgyud): dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
73a3(rgyud): zhi ba bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos
73a4(rgyud): ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de de ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa/
73a5(rgyud): sargyas kyi bstan pa'i chud byams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi ston pa nga du gnas par byed pa/ dge ba rtsa tha thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i 'artson 'bras kyi byin gyi rnabs kyi
73a6(rgyud): dang / nad bas kyirnal pa thams cad shin tum gtsang pa dbyung ba/ ngom san dang / ma shes pa da / rtsod pa dang / rmilam dran pa dang / sa ngan pa dang /
73a7(rgyud): tshas / thab pa dang / 'chang ba dang / nga ba dang / ma ma dang / rtsong ba dang / rnar mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par mthong grang ba dang / rlung ngo/
73b1(rgyud): cha ba dang / nad dang / sgram snyam pa 'a thams cad rang tuzhi bar byed pa/ wA dang / kladang / gnod rgyun dang / mi dang / sa ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byeng ba/ rgyal gas /
73b2(rgyud): cang 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sngon ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa lam drang por rab tu ston pa/ khyim dang / thong
73b3(rgyud): dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin par dang /
73b4(rgyud): mtshan mo dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman thams cad
73b5(rgyud): grub par byed pa/ bzo dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa thams
73b6(rgyud): tsang rab tu na byed pa/ rig pa dang / dran pa dang / tho gros dang / mas pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dadu/ stobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byung ba
73b7(rgyud): thams cad la slong ba meng pa'i sdang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen ba ston par byed pa byang chub sems dpa'
74a1(rgyud): rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po rnams dbugs 'byin pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par
74a2(rgyud): 'jug par byed pa/ mi skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa khong du chung par byed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin
74a3(rgyud): pa chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed/
74a4(rgyud): pachos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu
74a5(rgyud): thar par byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
74a6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed ngo // 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rlos
74a7(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so// byin gyis brlabs so//
74b1(rgyud): gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes so// gang dag ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
74b2(rgyud): ngag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so//
74b3(rgyud): byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
74b4(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba
74b5(rgyud): la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
74b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis/ so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i/
74b7(rgyud): chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa nas/ 'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis mi
75a1(rgyud): khyab pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyi ba nas/ zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi
75a2(rgyud): snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ phung pos lhag ma mchis
75a3(rgyud): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang lnga bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang /
75a4(rgyud): dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
75a5(rgyud): de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs
75a6(rgyud): pa der 'dong ngo // de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub
75a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
75b1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang ldan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan par spyod pa'i las las bzlog pa dang /
75b2(rgyud): bzang po spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs byag
75b3(rgyud): rgya dang / chog rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
75b4(rgyud): dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten
75b5(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo/
75b6(rgyud): rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med
75b7(rgyud): grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang / chos de'ang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
76a1(rgyud): cad dang / lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma thos ma mthong ba
76a2(rgyud): blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang / nged kyang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs//
76a3(rgyud): pa der 'dong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs
76a4(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar
76a5(rgyud): tshogs pa de dag la'ang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / chos nyan par rngo thogs pa lta na/ de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs
76a6(rgyud): cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po sa lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi
76a7(rgyud): ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na/ sangs rgyas bcom
76b1(rgyud): ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o// de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o// der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul
76b2(rgyud): bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de'ang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
76b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so na rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag
76b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas dang go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tsom ma za zhig/ de ltar nem nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
76b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni mtha' yas so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
76b6(rgyud): pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag pa gzung ste/ sems can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bsdu ba bsdus pa
76b7(rgyud): khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri ra ba tsam du gyur zin kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur
77a1(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so// sems can re re zhing yang yul gyi gnas go skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag phan tshun mig
77a2(rgyud): rgyang gis kyang mi slebs so// yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de//
77a3(rgyud): ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sla ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams
77a4(rgyud): cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de
77a5(rgyud): lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu ngag gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig
77a6(rgyud): tu chud par nus la/ skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad chud kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/
77a7(rgyud): me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chung par nus la/ me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu bcug kyang gnas
77b1(rgyud): shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des spu'i khung ngu gcig
77b2(rgyud): 'jug nus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad spu'i khung bu de gcig na gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi/
77b3(rgyud): zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par nus te/ rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang
77b4(rgyud): bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod pas kyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa'ang med la/ rdul gcig gi rtse mo de'ang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
77b5(rgyud): shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa nye bar len pa dang / smon lam dang / byin
77b6(rgyud): gyi rlabs dang / tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / gsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang
77b7(rgyud): yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas gzungs te/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi
78a1(rgyud): rdul tha rab ji snad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang cig yung tsam 'das paji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad ba dus
78a2(rgyud): gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang bde ba dang / sdug
78a3(rgyud): bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nges skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par
78a4(rgyud): 'phrul pa dang/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan phra mi rtog rnam par mo rtog cing lhun gyi grub pa dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
78a5(rgyud): de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa dag 'di lta bu dang ldan no// mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa/
78a6(rgyud): naphyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par
78a7(rgyud): gyur to// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba ma
78b1(rgyud): dbazhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cag thus ngas rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i thos ma/
78b2(rgyud): kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
78b3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
78b4(rgyud): bskyed pas pad+ma'i stan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do// de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul
78b5(rgyud): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig thang cig yul tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang chub sems
78b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
78b7(rgyud): thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to// byon nas kyang pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshen lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya babyon
79a1(rgyud): nas pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdza swa zhes bya babyon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bcum
79a2(rgyud): so// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs
79a3(rgyud): pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zed ces bya ba/ byang chub sems
79a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul snyed dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par
79a5(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de nas gshegs par chas pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
79a6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang
79a7(rgyud): rang gi bsod nams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi pad+ma'i stan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag/ sangs rgyas
79b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchong pa bya ba'i phyir la la ngag gis ni 'jam bu chu ba gser gyi char 'bam// gong du thos pa bzhin du thar te/ lal dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing malus par bar 'byungs/
79b2(rgyud): la la dag ni chos nyan pas bskor nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// la la ngag gis ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// yang de'i tshe tha 'od
79b3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras
79b4(rgyud): so// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs// sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i// dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog/
79b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas// zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste// zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so// gang na sems can smad pa yi// zhing ni skyigs ma lnga can 'dir// thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med
79b6(rgyud): par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng mi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan tshar gcad cing // nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang / spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// je yi don du kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab
79b7(rgyud): tu dang byos la// bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi// chos nyid zhi bar bton la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po spyong pa'i lam// bzod pa'i ga 'gas shes par byos// nyon mol
80a1(rgyud): thams cad zang bya'i phyir// gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos// ga na rnams la ni bzhugs nas su// srung ba 'dzi ni pa shang gsol phyir// dpyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu/ 'dren pa/
80a2(rgyud): rnams ni spyan drongs shig/ dam chos yun ring gnas bya'i phyir// sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa// chos rnams thams cad bsdus pa yis// gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sam
80a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad+ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te// deng thugs rje chen po dang
80a4(rgyud): ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgos pa/ mi mthun pa'i rgyu mthun pa bshad pa/ chos thams cad sdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/ bdud kyi las thams
80a5(rgyud): cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ the tshom thams/
80a6(rgyud): cad gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad srung ba/ bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos
80a7(rgyud): thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi brjed pa gcod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun tu ston pa/ bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang /
80b1(rgyud): gyi nubs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu ma bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa bar gyi gzu
80b2(rgyud): 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa
80b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyi ba dang / lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / dran pa'i sdong du gyur pa dang / spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
80b4(rgyud): byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'di nga 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang / yun ring du
80b5(rgyud): gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chab mi 'tshal ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid
80b6(rgyud): dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / tshul dang / pha rol dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog/
80b7(rgyud): dang / gsob dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gag pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po/
81a1(rgyud): ma mchis shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis
81a2(rgyud): pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye
81a3(rgyud): ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon du gyur cig/ sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan pa byed par gyur cig/ sems can grangs/
81a4(rgyud): med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
81a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyis kyang / chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems
81a6(rgyud): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs
81a7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang
81b1(rgyud): skya ba ngan pa dang / dargyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lgang dang / the tsom dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'i zang bkun ga'i'i nyis bdag rab shA byar shA /
81b2(rgyud): sems can mo so nas 'di snyam du bdag cag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan spyan chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi// 'di na gzhan ni sra'ang med do// bdag cag gcig bra la de bzhin gshegs
81b3(rgyud): pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhes do// 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol 'am/
81b4(rgyud): btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus
81b5(rgyud): pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad brtan te/ thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
81b6(rgyud): bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis
81b7(rgyud): bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos bkod pa las shin tu lhags pa'i spos gong du/
82a1(rgyud): mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams la mchod pa'i khyim
82a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag na rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
82a3(rgyud): ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
82a4(rgyud): khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang
82a5(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa/ lam rab tu stor ba/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib
82a6(rgyud): kyilong tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ thabs mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su
82a7(rgyud): spangs pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ snying brtse
82b1(rgyud): dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ngal ba dang / chang pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
82b2(rgyud): dang ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa shin tu spang ba mi mthun
82b3(rgyud): pa'i zas za bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du sgom pa/ rtsub pa/ reg na mi bde ba/ shan dang / shing bal dang / gso ma'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos
82b4(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// ri dang / ri'i sul dang / nags skyog po dang / grong stong pa dang / dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas/ rtswa'i mal cha dang / gsom dang / shing gi 'dab ma rtsub pa/ hri
82b5(rgyud): pos pa/ ragra na mi pade ba'i mal cha srung bar 'bya'o// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / rlung rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi go chachags nas/ sems can rnams la gta na nam
82b6(rgyud): rnatshogs gyis te/ rgyal rigs rnams lan rgyal sring dang dbang phyug gi gtam 'gyu'o// zas pa rnams pa ni rim byeng dang sa ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la na yul dang las kyi mtha
82b7(rgyud): ldan pa rnams la na khams dang / sman dang / sgrub pa'i gangam dang / chong ba rnams la ni na tshang gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams sani las kyi mtha la ma ngan par men pa ga sa
83a1(rgyud): bud med rnams la ni kha dog dang / rgyan dang / bu dang / phyug pa dang / 'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang / dge sbyong rnams la ni bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / las gsum la brtson/
83a2(rgyud): pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon sum du ma bgyis pa mngon du bgyi bar gzung ngo // mthar pa rnams thar bar 'gyi ba'i slad du/ sdug
83a3(rgyud): bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de na bdag la gshe'o// mi snyan pa zer ro// phrag dog gi
83a4(rgyud): chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so// kha gsag dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud med kyi tshig dag gis
83a5(rgyud): skur pa 'debs so// bdag la sas 'thor ro// bdag gsang ba'i phyir mtshon dang / dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / mnga' dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dgra sta
83a6(rgyud): dang rdo dang / mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so// bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / phag rgod dang / tshan po che rnams
83a7(rgyud): kyang 'gyed do// bdag gi gnas dang / gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang dri nga bas 'gengs so// bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du zhugs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa ma yin/
83b1(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du btsung ngo // thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsang pa'i phyir brtson no// bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi skyon sags/
83b2(rgyud): pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan stsol ba dang / chos kyi gru gzhig pa dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no// nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
83b3(rgyud): 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas/ dam pa'i
83b4(rgyud): chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams
83b5(rgyud): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / phas/
83b6(rgyud): kyi dmag tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char dang / rlung dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa dang / lta ba yang ba
83b7(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
84a1(rgyud): yul 'khor thams cad srung ba dang / g.yab dang / drukru nga / cang dang / tshangs kyid dang / rmil mngan pa dang sus ngan pa thams cad gsal pa dang / badra nga/
84a2(rgyud): dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la bzung /
84a3(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu skyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang / blo/
84a4(rgyud): gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro
84a5(rgyud): bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya
84a6(rgyud): ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs so// gcig la gcig dgyes pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84a7(rgyud): 'das de dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing gzhes pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyings ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzi
84b1(rgyud): srung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
84b2(rgyud): 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha
84b3(rgyud): rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing / phas kyi rgol ba
84b4(rgyud): thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / gakon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyid
84b5(rgyud): pa'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces
84b6(rgyud): gsungs so// de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la lag skyong bgyi ste/ chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams
84b7(rgyud): cad rab tu gnom pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du byin gyis brlab cing / chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes /
85a1(rgyud): ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis/ gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems/
85a2(rgyud): can thams cad nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ aM ga ra/ a ga ra/ b+haM ga ra/ pra b+haM ga ra/ b+ha ya ma hA/ mi traM b+ha se/ a khe/ a kha/ aM ba re/ do me/ do nan+te/ ke bad+d+he/ ke s+phA re/ sa ma bA ha ne/
85a3(rgyud): sa man+ta b+ha dre/ d+harme d+harme/ d+ha ma ke dza pA le/ mi tA nu ba le/ pA la b+ha dre/ ga Ne ga Na/ wa ran+te / hi li hi li/ hi li ti li te/ dzaM b+ha ba te/ Ta ka se/ Ta ka Na Te/ Ta ka ba ran+te/ ga Na ba ran+te/ hi rin+te/
85a4(rgyud): shi rin+te/ bin+du ba te/ gro ba he/ dzu re mi tra dzu re/ dz+re she/ agre/ a ba me/ sa s+ya ta thA dA na/ hu lu hi li/ tsan+ne/ sa mad+hA me/ d+ha me/ ku tsu ru/ mu tsu ru/ a tsi ta/ tsi li tsi li/ liH/
85a5(rgyud): bA ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mi tra bA ha/ ku lu ku lu / sa ra sa ra/ ku t+ya ku t+ya/ ma hA sa ra sa ra/ tu Tu tu Tu/ ma hA sa t+ya/ hri da ya/ puSh+pa she su puSh+pa she/ dum ba ri ha re/ a b+ha ye/ ru tsi/
85a6(rgyud): ni ka rek+She/ a ya mastu bi bA ha/ ti ti le/ ma ma le/ bA sha ka/ shi shi ra shi shi ra/ lo ka bi nA ya ka/ badz+re badz+ra d+ha re/ badz+re bA te/ badz+ra ma de/ badz+ra dat+te/ tsakra badz+rA ye/ tsakre tsab te/
85a7(rgyud): re d+ha re/ b+ha re b+ha re/ pu re ta re/ hu hu ra/ b+haM ga baM pa re/ shwa ra/ sha tsi li/ tsu ru/ pu re/ man+tha Ni/ man+tha Ne/ ga ga ra Ni/ mu dra Ne/ sa ra pa mo ha na/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ni/ mu khe shwa ra/
85b1(rgyud): la ya ni/ ra~M shiny+dza ni d+ha pa bi tsa/ tsan+d+ra la sa ma/ sarba sa t+ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na/ a d+haSh+Thi te sid d+han tu ma hA na ma mi ni/ pA la ra ti/ o dze gre/ bi tsi ni/ bAn ha ra/ bu bu re/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru mu/
85b2(rgyud): ruhi li hi li/ ha ra ha ra/ ka ka nA da ba ha/ hi hi tAM/ A yur ha na/ kan+ta/ dza lA ba sA ga ra dA ne/ a d+ha ha ni/ man a b+hi ro ha ni/ pA la sa t+ye/ a ro ShA ba ti/ hi la hi li/ ya thA/
85b3(rgyud): badza s+yA gra ya thA/ pa rany+tsa hri da yA ba sa t+ya/ pa ri ba re/ mArga a b+hi ro ha Ne/ a tsa la bud d+hi/ dA da pra tsa tsa pa ya/ bi d+ha hri da ya/ tsan+da tsa ra/ a tsa laM sho d+hA ni/ pra kr-i ti mA ra ge/ i li/
85b4(rgyud): i li le/ pra be sa ra pra de/ sarbat+ta ta thA tA satwA nu ga te/ a na ba ra ba te/ a la ta/ aM gu re/ sha mi ni brah+ma yo hi/ a hi ta a b+ha hi/ ni ra ba ya ba.i tsi ra mArga la na la gu sA re/
85b5(rgyud): tri rat+na baM she/ d+harma kA ya/ dz+wa la tsan+na/ sa mu dra pa ni/ ma hA b+hu ta byA ya/ sa mu dra be gA ba d+hA ra Ni mu dre Na/ mu khi mu dra/ su ra pra ti sa bi d+ha/ su mu tra a bar+ha ni saM brta ni/ sa ma mo haska ra/
85b6(rgyud): bi d+yu ta ra se na k+Shi ti mu dri to si/ ye ke tsi ta pra ti b+hi bA ha/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ kri tA/ ka ba tA/ shI la pra tri t+ya hri da ye na mu dri tI dA ra ni na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dA ni dA lA/ dan+di la/ shru kra sarba hi/
85b7(rgyud): d+ha ya/ mu dri to sa dza du dza ba ta/ dza kha ba ta/ su ma ti ba ti/ ma hAd b+hu ta mu dri ta/ ye ke tsi ta shad ta na ni shI ta buta/ i ni mi ne/ sa tsa ne/ go sha sa tsa ni/ bu dr-i tA/ tsAr+ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na bAka pa/
86a1(rgyud): bA na t+ya thA mahA pu b+h+yas puts+tsha la/ a ga ma ma hA ka ru Na ya mu dr-i ta sarba sam+b+ha ka pra ti pa ta tsau rA rA tan dz+wa la dud+harma ne tri sarbe mu ni pri Sha b+ha/ ma hA ka ru Na sa rA d+hi/ dz+nyA na lad+b+ha ba
86a2(rgyud): na me tri t+ya ga/ a b+hi bIr+ya ba le na/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti sarba b+hU to pa tsa yA ya swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces/ sangs
86a3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum smras nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so//
86a4(rgyud): kye mthub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid
86a5(rgyud): rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams
86a6(rgyud): cad kyi chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs byin gyi rlabs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/
86a7(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ chos kyi phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
86b1(rgyud): snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
86b2(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir/ da lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do//
86b3(rgyud): gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob
86b4(rgyud): par gyur to// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
86b5(rgyud): stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor// 'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'// byang chub sems dpa'
86b6(rgyud): brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pas// phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang // mchog tu rnyed par
86b7(rgyud): dka' ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni pha ma byed pa// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs// sgrib
87a1(rgyud): pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// bzod dang nges pa rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor spyod// 'din ngan
87a2(rgyud): byas zlo ga byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub la yang rab ston pa// pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed pa/
87a3(rgyud): thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed pa// gzungs ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa// byang chub las las mi g.yo ba// chos kyi
87a4(rgyud): dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i// gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas lhag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no// chos
87a5(rgyud): smra rnams ni srung ba dang // nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs// bdag gi sang yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang // sems can rnams
87a6(rgyud): kyi phan 'phel phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su ngag 'di la dad pa 'bul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
87a7(rgyud): rgod kyis mthon gcig tu 'di na ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dang pa 'phrul lo// khyen gyis brdung po// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma 'am/ dge slong mi / dam rdzom
87b1(rgyud): ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te gos gtsang ma 'gos la/ me tog sa tshogs bkras pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ ro tho rtswa rags kyis/
87b2(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba/ ras dang / rgyan dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan bsgrengs pas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge'i khri reg na
87b3(rgyud): 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na/ su'ang de'i sems 'khrug pa 'am / khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yid 'khrug par mi byed po// de'i lus la'ang
87b4(rgyud): dbugs mi gtong ngo // klang pa na bar byed mi nus so// mig na ba dang / lcen pa dang / son ba dang / rus pa na ba dang / mgul pa na ba dang / dpung pa na ba dang / rgyangan pa dang / rgyu man pa dang
87b5(rgyud): ljon pa dang / chu son pa dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na bar byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de ni gnas med do// de'i skang 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis
87b6(rgyud): khams 'khrug pa'am spang 'gag par gyur na'ang / des gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar byed par 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas 'de bar 'gyur ro// chos nyanapa
87b7(rgyud): gang ngan sabs gyu ba dag pa rang su' bams 'grug pa'am gang 'gags par byed bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag na 'azungs 'ang can pa dag kyang me ga pa'i las kyisadun yo
88a1(rgyud): na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
88a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su
88a3(rgyud): gsol/ gzungs 'di la dang pa stsal du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ shAn+te/ a sa ma ro pe/ mau tri sau ma ba te/ e hi/ na ba kuny+dza be/ na ba kuny+dza be/ mu la sho d+ha ne/ ba ha kha ba ha kha/ mA ra ba ta tha tA/
88a4(rgyud): pa rits+tshe da/ ba ha sa/ ba ha sa/ a mU la/ a tsa le/ tsa tsa le/ pra tsa lA d+hi d+hi le/ e ka na ya pa rits+tshe da tsan+ti ne/ bar se/ ba ra sa tra ne/ kha ga su ra tri ne sta ba su ra tri ne b+hU ta ko Ti pa rits+tshe da dz+wa la kha dz+wa la kha ba yeH/
88a5(rgyud): la kha na mak+Sha r+Na/ ka ka la/ \u0f7fhA ha hA/ hwa hra hu h+ya/ swaR+sha be dA nu/ pa rits+tsha da na/ a ma ma n+ya/ ma mkhye/ ma ma samra rba/ mu drA ga la/ saM sA rA ma bi rits+tshe da/ bo d+his ka te bi ma/
88a6(rgyud): mahA ma/ d+hU ta koTi/ A kA shA shas pa ri ts+tsha swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad drug togs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan rdzas
88a7(rgyud): chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mtha' lding dang / mi 'am ci nga /
88b1(rgyud): lho 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjod che ba de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'ang sang /
88b2(rgyud): dukye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba/ drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang / nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad yongs su thar
