88b3(rgyud): par byed pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes chen po bsags pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do zhes bka' stsal to// yang
88b4(rgyud): de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 'greng ba
88b5(rgyud): dang rtswa byug pa rgya chen po rnams kyis lus brgyan nas/ bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
88b6(rgyud): tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'jug go/ de nas tshangs pa rnon po phran sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom
88b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ning ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyis la/ der bdag la bgegs cung bad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjodas
89a1(rgyud): rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du/ 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sa/
89a2(rgyud): kyi tshog srung ba bshad par bgyi ste/ ci nas slad ma'i dus na bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor tam/ klu'i
89a3(rgyud): 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste/ sha za'amasha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor tam/ sha za'i
89a4(rgyud): 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i bu 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba
89a5(rgyud): zhig mchis te/ tha na chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang 'tshe 'am/ gnod par 'gying ngam/ 'jigs par bgyid dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs
89a6(rgyud): chen po gtong ngam/ tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis ltan/ bdag gis 'dud nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang / chad pas gcad pa dang / tshar gcad pa
89a7(rgyud): dang rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par bgyi/ bro 'tshal bar bgyi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar
89b1(rgyud): bgyi ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'dil su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas
89b2(rgyud): gnang bar mdzad do// de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go// de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin
89b3(rgyud): gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug cig/ che zhe 'dir bag med par ma byed cig/ bcom
89b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la ma 'tshe zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnams ni spos la dga'// de bzhin gshegs pa spos mi mnga'// de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas dag kyang ston pa mdzad/
89b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang // yi ge dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/ che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid
89b6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas/ de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/ nam mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig lta'i mtshan nyid sgrog btags pa med do// ji ltar 'du byed rnams la nam mkha'
89b7(rgyud): mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spros par mi mdzad/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ mi gnas mngon par mi zhen te/ de bzhin du srog la ma yin//
90a1(rgyud): skye ba po la ma yin/ gsob po la ma yin/ skyes bral ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la'ang spro bar mi mdzad/ mngon
90a2(rgyud): par mi zhen na/ che zhe khyod kyis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rtog ste smros shig/ khyod la des mi sdug
90a3(rgyud): pa'i 'bras bur gyur ta re/ skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// skyes bu dam pa 'di
90a4(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/ 'di la bud med ces tshig tu marjod cig/ de nas brgya byin gtsug
90a5(rgyud): pung 'dzin gyis/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs rje bar dgongs te bzod par gsol/ 'di skad ces smras pas bdag
90a6(rgyud): la 'bras bu mi sdug pa thob par ma gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltang mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu
90a7(rgyud): rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te des slar ma bshags su zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal/
90b1(rgyud): smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi
90b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te phyogs
90b3(rgyud): bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang /
90b4(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul
90b5(rgyud): 'di ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dad pa stsal du gsol/ gang slad ma'i dus
90b6(rgyud): na bdud nas/ mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar gyis de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dad pa stsal du gsol/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems
90b7(rgyud): bzlog pa dang / mna' bsgag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so// yang de'i tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgrin
91a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la ngang pa 'bul lo// bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus na gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// rab tu/
91a2(rgyud): bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang / nyan pa de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
91a3(rgyud): 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyis/ skyes bu dam pa gzungs gsu/
91a4(rgyud): shig de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams//
91a5(rgyud): dang nyan thos chen po rnams kyi bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ga Na shAn+te/ hA ra/ tsan+d+ra/ ma hA tsan+ta/ tsan+d+ra ha/ tsam ha/ sau me sA me/ a @
91a6(rgyud): bib ha/ e ga dza na tra/ kha kha/ mUl pa ri ts+tshe / yaka tsan+te/ pi shA tsa tsan+te/ a barbani/ saM brta ni/ saM kA ra Ni/ dza~M d+ha naM/ s+t+waM d+ha ni mo ha ni/ ud tsA ta ni/ ha ma hA/ ha ma he/ ma hA sa ku tsam/
91a7(rgyud): kha kha sha ba/ a ma la/ a mU la/ pa ri badz+ra/ a sA ra ba ba swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing / mang po tshogs par mi spyod na/ mig mi mthong zhing mgo yang 'gas/ yan lag
91b1(rgyud): tha dad 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ a tsa tsaH/ A byA ha/ tsatsa/ tsuHtsak+ShuHtwAtA/ btsatsa/ ma ngakra/ tsats+tsha/ tsan+da/ tsan+na/ nA ca / mU la tsAts+tsha/ tsamra lA/ tsats+tshat+ya/ ma skul //
91b2(rgyud): hamU ha mU / ba A ba A swA hA/ de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas/ sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces smras so// stobs chen po'i stobs kyi shugs
91b3(rgyud): shin tu 'joms pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'di btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs
91b4(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can/ snying rje med pa/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/ bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor
91b5(rgyud): glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs 'tshol du nye bar 'ong ba dang / btsun mo dam pa dang /
91b6(rgyud): bu dang / bu mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po dang / shor ba dang / dpung dam pa dang / 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang
91b7(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / bsam gtan dang / kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang /
92a1(rgyud): zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing / tha na sems kyis skad cig gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshe 'am/ gnod par byed dam/ 'jigs/
92a2(rgyud): par byed dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs gtong ngam/ sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/ bdud nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so//
92a3(rgyud): de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur/ snying yang bskams par 'gyur/ sha bkra can du 'gyur/ lus rul cing dri nga ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur/ de dag sags par ltung bar 'gyur/
92a4(rgyud): rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/ rdul gyis kyang de dag g.yogs nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms par 'gyur ro// gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag gis sa'i khung du 'jug
92a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par/
92a6(rgyud): ma dang par gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs nas/ zhal ta byed par brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tshe'am/ gang dag sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las
92a7(rgyud): 'da' na de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas pa nas/ de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// yang yul gang 'dud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos
92b1(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o// sdang ba'i/
92b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin nas/ sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bsdad par bgyi'o// yul de na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i
92b3(rgyud): char pa dang / rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / nang thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o// bde ba dang / 'dum pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mthun pa rnams bsgrub par
92b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang / grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bsti stang chen po nye bar bsgrub par 'gyi'o// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang
92b5(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu pa la gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkur/ brgya byin gyi nang du ni brgya byin gyis bkur ba nas/ de bzhin du
92b6(rgyud): sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de
92b7(rgyud): dngag kun gyis bkur ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa/ bud med kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs
93a1(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so//
93a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la mig mi 'dzum par bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa cir
93a3(rgyud): yang ma yin par bltas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye khyod kyi mig mi 'dzums par ci'ang ma
93a4(rgyud): yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / ci'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba chos gang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / tig mug gi nyon mong
93a5(rgyud): pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas/ 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par
93a6(rgyud): bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mchis pas na/ de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na/ srid pa'i yan lag bcu
93a7(rgyud): gnyis po de dag gang las skye bar 'gyur/ ci nam mkha' las skyes zhes bgyi na/ nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/
93b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o// ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin// rnam par rtog pa ma yin/
93b2(rgyud): par rig pa ma yin/ grub pa ma yin/ brjod pa ma yin te/ ci'ang ma yin pa/ ma shas med pa/ dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin
93b3(rgyud): nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su bcad pa'o// bri ba med pa'am gang ba med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med
93b4(rgyud): pa'o// cha shas med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o// mi g.yo zhing rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang / dngos po dang /
93b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o// tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag
93b6(rgyud): rnams skyes so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i phyir/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas 'dud sdig can gyis gsol ba/ gal
93b7(rgyud): te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs dang / pha rol gnod pas khyod ji ltar
94a1(rgyud): bdag la 'tshe/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul 'joms/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/ 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma
94a2(rgyud): la slob tu 'dzud/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyi bslab pa la slob na/ de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs
94a3(rgyud): med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / brgya byin
94a4(rgyud): dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang //
94a5(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di gang bar bgyis/ snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nang mi bzad pas btab ste/
94a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing lus kyang rul la dring bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa
94a7(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu klad pa na par gyur
94b1(rgyud): lus kyang rul cing dri nga bar gyur nas/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byos shig/
94b2(rgyud): dang nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis gsang ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgyad cu tshun chad kyi sa dang nam mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/ da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor
94b3(rgyud): dang bcas te/ nga gsad pa'i bar du bkye bas/ de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de bzhin du bdud rnams nas/ mi dang mi
94b4(rgyud): ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang / 'gro
94b5(rgyud): ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i bar du mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
94b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsogs kyi/ sdig can khyod deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
94b7(rgyud): tu sems skyed cig/ de ltar na khyod klad pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tshor ba 'di las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/
95a1(rgyud): bdud kyi yul las ches khyang du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med/
95a2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
95a3(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na/ ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul
95a4(rgyud): 'di'ang thob par 'gyur/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du klad pa na bar gyur kyang / bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chub tu sems
95a5(rgyud): mi bskyed do// de nas tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun/
95a6(rgyud): gzung bar spro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzud par bgyi ste/ da yang shAkya thub pa nyi ma nub kyi bar du bdag
95a7(rgyud): gis bstan pa 'di la chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o// yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o// gang du byung bde
95b1(rgyud): ni shin tu lhag par byung bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs
95b2(rgyud): su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi/ don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o// gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zan bris nas 'chang ba rnams
95b3(rgyud): dang gang na chos smra ba seng ge'i khri la mchis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bya'o// gsang
95b4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag 'gugs par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas par phyogs der mchis nas/ chos smra ba de dag dang nyan pa de dag bsrung ba dang sba bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/
95b5(rgyud): a ba me/ a ba me/ a ba re/ a ba re/ pa ri kuny+dza/ nA da nA / puSh+ka rA ba ha/ dza lu ka/ ma kha ya/ i li/ mi li ki li/ mi li/ kIN+Da tsur pre dre mu dra mu khe swAH/ bcom ldan
95b6(rgyud): 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/ bdag gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yongs su dag pas thos te/ der ma
95b7(rgyud): mchis na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing / bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
96a1(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la/ chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drug du spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de'i spongs pa rigs pas nye bar
96a2(rgyud): bsgrub par bgyi/ chos smra ba dang chos nyan pa de dag gi nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa dang / bya ba ngan pa dang / the tsom thams cad bsal bar 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos
96a3(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang // 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa der/ bdag 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / pa
96a4(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro rnams
96a5(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de na bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / brlang ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang / kha
96a6(rgyud): dang tsha ba dang / dri nga ba dang / reg na mi bde ba'i dug de thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// ngar tsha ba dang mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o// glang po che dang / seng ge dang / stag
96a7(rgyud): ngadang ma he dang / srung ki dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya'o// der sems can thams cad kyi long
96b1(rgyud): spyod dang kun tu spyod ba'i slang du/ nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro dang / zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / gos mal cha sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub
96b2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa
96b3(rgyud): thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa'i slad du/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag
96b4(rgyud): kyang chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa la gzud par 'gyi ste/ 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
96b5(rgyud): bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chung par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la yid bzhin du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
96b6(rgyud): pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas de'i mod la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la thugs brtse bar dgongs te
96b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dir gang gi phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / gzhan yang sangs kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i
97a1(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'gyur gyis/ nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag/
97a2(rgyud): tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub par gyur cig
97a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ tsa mur+Ne/ mur+d+ha/ pa ri ts+tshi ra/ ta mu hA/ hamU ha/ sa ra ka ba la kri/ sha mi kha/ pa ri ShA ha/ tsam+ba ra ya thAtsa/ su bi kha/ a mU la/ pa ri ts+tshing sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha te swA hA/ de bzhin gshes/
97a4(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
97a5(rgyud): yin rnams dang / gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dgug cing 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs kyis
97a6(rgyud): khyod 'dis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus par 'gyur ro// dbyangs dang ldan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bud med kyi cha byang 'di lta bus chos kyi tshul bsrung bar 'gyi'o// bud med rnam
97a7(rgyud): kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig bu 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med/
97b1(rgyud): de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// yang bud med gang 'di lta bus sems yongs su skyo bar gyur te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang zhing klog pa nas/ nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na/ nge 'dod pa la
97b2(rgyud): spyod kyang mngal du mi chags so// yang bud med gang brnyas shing spang bar gyur pa longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang bral ba des chos kyi rnam grangs de bklags na/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba
97b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slang du/ bdag gis nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas
97b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad la 'bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ srung ba dang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs
97b5(rgyud): las gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
97b6(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / skad cig gis bdud kyi
97b7(rgyud): gzugs su snang ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang /
98a1(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / yi dgas/
98a2(rgyud): dang sha za dang / grul bum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar/
98a3(rgyud): gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo // skad cig gis bya dang / shing dang / ri dang / 'bras bu dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / snam bu dang / snod dang / phyang phrul dang / rgyan dang / sman
98a4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i gzugs dang / yud tsam gyis dge slong dang dge slong ma'i gzugs dang / skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ngo // skad cig gis kha dog dang / rtags dang /
98a5(rgyud): dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir snang ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di kha dog dang /
98a6(rgyud): rtags dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di mthu rab tu
98a7(rgyud): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la gnas nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / shes rab kyi mig sdig pa med pas
98b1(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na bsam pa dang / sems ji lta bu dang / spyod pa ji lta bu dang / ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa
98b2(rgyud): dang / gang la skyabs su song ba'i sems can ci 'dra bdag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs
98b3(rgyud): dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / sems can gang dag
98b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ yo byad dang longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag gi chags pa spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / nad kyis btab nas
98b5(rgyud): sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyin gcig la gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug
98b6(rgyud): bsngal las yongs su thar par byas te/ theg pa gsum la phyir mi ldog par 'god pa'i dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin / bgrod pa ma
98b7(rgyud): yin no// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu chen po brtsams nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom
99a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang dag gi pha rol tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs
99a2(rgyud): med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed // byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par bye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams
99a3(rgyud): nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so// gang pos gsol pa/ 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
99a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgrol ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur
99a5(rgyud): te/ skyes dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
99a6(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// des lo bzhi
99a7(rgyud): khri sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po dag la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu phung po'i
99b1(rgyud): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'dis sngon sems can yongs su smin par/
99b2(rgyud): bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su chad pa med de/ des smon lam 'di skad du nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs
99b3(rgyud): re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/ bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi
99b4(rgyud): spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa
99b5(rgyud): de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag
99b6(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o// ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs
99b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / gzhan dag na'ang sems can gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang / the tsom can nas/ mi bde ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de dag nas shi 'phos
100a1(rgyud): nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byas te/ phyir mi ldog pa la so sor
100a2(rgyud): bkod nas/ de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun du bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas phyogs
100a3(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lpags pa rnams ston pa 'di lta bu dag kyang mnyes par
100a4(rgyud): bgyis/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu'ang mthong / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam
100a5(rgyud): papa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin gyis brlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di'ang chos mnyan
100a6(rgyud): pa'i slad du rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
100a7(rgyud): yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
100b1(rgyud): dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag
100b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa la 'dir lhags pa thams cad ngas spro bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
100b3(rgyud): 'dus pa 'di dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta bu ni dkon no// de bas na khyed kyis
100b4(rgyud): 'di mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di dang / chos kyi tshul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gi de
100b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed so so nas rang rang gi smon lam thob cig/ yang de'i tshe bdud dge sbyong me tog ces bya bas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna
100b6(rgyud): bdun gyi bre bo byur bur bkang ste/ bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas/ bud med kyi gos dang rgyan mchog gis brgyan te 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs
100b7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang / gang gzhan yang su dag 'dir 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis
101a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / myu gu thams cad kyis byung bur yongs su gtam zhing rgyas pa'i bre bo 'di 'bul na/
101a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi bre bo me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su
101a3(rgyud): gtams pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ 'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang / skom dang
101a4(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / me tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dag kyang yongs su smin par bgyi/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa des bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med//
101a5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad kyis mi brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyin/ bdag
101a6(rgyud): gi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems
101a7(rgyud): mngon par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so legs so// khyod kyi bre bo me tog dang 'bras bus yongs su gang ba 'di'ang bzhes
101b1(rgyud): so/ khyod kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / lo tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa dang / gang gi phyir 'dod pa rnyed par gyur cig/ khyod kyi re ba yid kyi
101b2(rgyud): brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig pa 'byor pa'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog
101b3(rgyud): gis yang gsol ba/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ 'chad dam/ tha na
101b4(rgyud): glegs bam la bris te bsti stang bgyid pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de dang de dag tu shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang 'bras
101b5(rgyud): bu nas/ 'bru dang me tog gi bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de dag thams cad na me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshim par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na tshe bas pa ma gtogs par//
101b6(rgyud): gal te de na sems can me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na/ dus gsum ru gshegs pa'i
101b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyis/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
102a1(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang sems can rnams me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshang ba de ni bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur/
102a2(rgyud): ro/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me tog dang 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / snying rje'i sems su gyur pa de ni bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha
102a3(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de ni bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
102a4(rgyud): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
102a5(rgyud): rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang ri dgas kyang chos 'tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
102a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du 'byung ba der sems can gyi 'bras dang / gro dang / nas dang / til dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u dang /
102a7(rgyud): sran dang / sran chung dang / sran ma dang / gang dag lo tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o// 'bru dang lo tog mang po de dag gis kyang mdzod dang bang ba rnams
102b1(rgyud): thams cad yongs su gtam par bgyi'o// de na sems can tha na bya dang ri dgas ngag gis kyang 'chal bar gyur na/ de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//
102b2(rgyud): der bdag gis bu ram shing dang / rgun 'brum dang / bal po'i se'u'i khu shugs shin tu mang po bsgrub par bgyi'o// der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bya sgyogs rnams
102b3(rgyud): yongs su gtam par bgyi'o// gang de na tha na bya dang ri dgas la sogs pas 'tshal na'ang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gi pha
102b4(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
102b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
102b6(rgyud): thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po
102b7(rgyud): byed nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba 'artul ba de lta bus sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis shig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de
103a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de las dbugs 'byin pa de thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang
103a2(rgyud): la la zhig na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi/ gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas te/ sa phyogs de na 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog
103a3(rgyud): gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa'i slad du/ rab tu snum bag can dang / shin tu che ba dang / shin tu mang ba dang / shin tu ro bda' ba dang / shin tu kha dog
103a4(rgyud): dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi/ sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung bas tshig par 'gyi/ sems can rnams kyi mdzod dang / bang ba dang / bum pa dang / rdza ma dang / bya sgyogs rnams shin tu
103a5(rgyud): yongs su gang bar bgyi/ tha na gang bya dang ri dgas kyis de la 'tshal kyang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
103a6(rgyud): bskal pa stong thams cad du sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'di lta bu dag gis tshim par bgyi/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa snyigs ma lnga dang
103a7(rgyud): ldan pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su bskal pa stong re re la'ang skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu bgyi zhing / de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
103b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi na/ bdag gi las yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni rang gi smon lam gyis 'gugs/
103b2(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lags so// 'di lnga ste/ tsa mkha/ tsa me kha/ pri pri ta ha ste/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ sma ra asma kan/ sarti bi pa ba sa be/ sa ra sa ren+de/ sa ra ma hen+na/ sa ra badz+ren+na/ ta ra pa ya/
103b3(rgyud): asma kan/ hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ a saM ga dza be/ ta kha ta kha ta kha/ bA yu bA he/ u pa nA ya/ san ta ra pA ya/ bi dza pA/ push+ma sha/ o sha d+hi/ d+ha na d+ha n+ye na/ tsan+na/ ak+Sha ye dza la b+ha ha ne/ !/
103b4(rgyud): ra asmA kan/ sa myaka pra ti pan na ba ya ma/ sa ta ta kA li/ ya ma me/ ma mi ma mi da dza ba ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag smin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i
103b5(rgyud): slad du/ gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad pa de dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
103b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis de la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / bdud 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
103b7(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang /
104a1(rgyud): mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes byang byin te/ sa /
104a2(rgyud): dam pa khyod bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa legs so legs so// kho bo cag gi bsod nams dang / brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang //
104a3(rgyud): pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthu de lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba can su spo/
104a4(rgyud): de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i grogs bgyi'o// skyes bu dam pa
104a5(rgyud): khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig/ bdud dge sbyong ma
104a6(rgyud): tog gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag de bzhin du gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de'ang bdag cag la phaH
104a7(rgyud): pa dang bde bar gyur cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa lags
104b1(rgyud): te/ 'di nyid du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas
104b2(rgyud): bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ bdud dge sbyong me
104b3(rgyud): tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pad+mo'i gdong longs shig/ khyod kyis de ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab// rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skye te bkres
104b4(rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/ gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ chos rnams rang bzhin dri med dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang / stong zhing mtshan ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul
104b5(rgyud): las rab grol bar/ rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring po mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i/ sangs rgyas dgra thul blo gros shin tu brtan pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga'
104b6(rgyud): zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te thal
104b7(rgyud): mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
105a1(rgyud): bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bskul pa bzang po byung nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i
105a2(rgyud): slad du smon lam btab ste/ sems can rnams kyi nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin blangs te/ rtsa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang
105a3(rgyud): du stsal to// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod du bgyi ba dang / nad rab tu zhi ba'i slad du sman bcud kyis len brgya rtsa bzhir sbyar te/ rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
105a4(rgyud): mar la sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bru mar la sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang / bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / sman nad med ces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhi nas/ ska ba'i phye ma dang / ril bu dang / sAr stsal
105a5(rgyud): ba'i bar du stong rtsa bzhi bstan to// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / nang zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba
105a6(rgyud): 'jig zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa la kun spyad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ der bdag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis/
105a7(rgyud): bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas
105b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i ba dang nabs kyathub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang / byung chub sems dpa' 'dus pa na po//
105b2(rgyud): 'byung ste/ der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
105b3(rgyud): de'i 'og tu 'od srungs kyis kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du sangs rgyas
105b4(rgyud): kyi zhing 'dir sman chen po bcud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cing / der yang bdag gis sems can kun gyi spyad pa dang nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas rtsa dang / rtsa ba
105b5(rgyud): dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lo tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'tshal nas/ sems can de dag sems dang sems
105b6(rgyud): las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par so sor rtog pa gang 'jug pa de'ang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
105b7(rgyud): ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes bu'i mthu chen po bgyid pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
106a1(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed du/ bdag gis bung med kyi gzugs kyi sprob chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa 'di lta bu dang / sems can nad pa yongs su smin par/
106a2(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// da ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas
106a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do// skal pa chen po dang ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'di'i grogs su'ang gyur cig/ bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog
106a4(rgyud): gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o// bud med rnams rab tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang //
106a5(rgyud): rgan po rnams kyi nang rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud las byin blangs pa zas dang / skom dang / kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar bgyis te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha/
106a6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
106a7(rgyud): 'das rnams kyis bdag la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du
106b1(rgyud): gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka'
106b2(rgyud): stsal to// khyod ni 'jig rten nang pa'i sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa// pad+ma ldan pa zhing gtsang ngam pa der/ rnam par snang mdzad ces byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin/
106b3(rgyud): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis smon lam btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de la'ang
106b4(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ni ri dang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste/ khyod ni re ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/ rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par ni// ye shes dbang phyug ces
106b5(rgyud): bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan
106b6(rgyud): 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyis 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab kyis// me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas/ zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du/
106b7(rgyud): ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba ston ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas sems
107a1(rgyud): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni/
107a2(rgyud): skye bo byang chub yongs su smin byas nas// skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par// me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la/
107a3(rgyud): g.yo zhing rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom
107a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te// khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing / rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don mthob pa//
107a5(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i sgron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la yongs
107a6(rgyud): su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan
107a7(rgyud): med// yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba/ sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med bzhin du// ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mcho
107b1(rgyud): su ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su smod pas sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan
107b2(rgyud): 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la ni// me tog spos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam rab tu// kun sa
107b3(rgyud): spos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa tshon sna tshogs la yongs su spyod pas
107b4(rgyud): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud nas su// dkon mchog
107b5(rgyud): gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas/ sngon por snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu// rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du sa bon dang / nags tshal dang / 'bras bu'i lha
107b6(rgyud): du ma nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bud
107b7(rgyud): med yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang / de dag tshogs su bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ po mtshan
108a1(rgyud): gyur te mo mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par sla la/ mo mtshan gyur te po mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro// de nas klu dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan
108a2(rgyud): pa thob par 'dod nas/ byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang tshogs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bye ba phrag brgyad
108a3(rgyud): cu dang / lha dang mi'i bu mo mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun bu dang / bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas/ mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang /
108a4(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
108a5(rgyud): lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa nas/ tshogs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
108a6(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi ma ci dang / ljo phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za bgrang ba las 'das pa sdom bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par gyur to// sems can
108a7(rgyud): bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob
108b1(rgyud): par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob nas/ 'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag mi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thog/
108b2(rgyud): pa las sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
108b3(rgyud): kyis 'aka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'chang bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rigs pas
108b4(rgyud): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA
108b5(rgyud): thub pas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sa rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang
108b6(rgyud): zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
108b7(rgyud): smin par bgyi ba dang / ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems bskyed ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang / gang gi slad du 'tshal ba dang / ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang / zas dang /
109a1(rgyud): skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams sprul pa 'am/ bshams pa 'byor par 'gyur ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag skyes bu chen/
109a2(rgyud): po'i mthu 'di lta bu 'gyid pa dang / sems can rnams la longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
109a3(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid la mdzad pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyi bsam pa dang /
109a4(rgyud): yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gsang sngags kyi
109a5(rgyud): tshig 'di dag sbyin no// 'di lta ste/ dz+yo ti ba ba/ d+hi ti ba ba/ mu ni ba ba/ sang t+ya ba ba/ pu N+ya a lang kA ra ba ba/ d+h+ya na ra sa ba ba/ ma hA kA ru Na ba ba/ ma hA pra ti ba ba/ a me ha ba ba ru ti ba ba
109a6(rgyud): bab/ sA li la ba hA/ kha ga ba ba/ bA yu ba la/ brtab ba/ ad+hiSh+Tha na 'a ba/ a ma bab/ a hanaM ba ba/ ta tha thA ba ba/ d+huta kau Ti ba ba/ nir bri ti ba ba / tri ku shal bab/ tri ya na ba pa/
109a7(rgyud): rma thug pab/ dra ba mo tha ba/ tri shus par/ rabyu sa te ldan bapa/ babab pa babs mdza/ a rgyas marba/ tata tha shAs d+hi/ sarba ku ga la su la a tiSh+Tha na ya sAtra/ skyes grangs 'byed kyis
109b1(rgyud): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi chog bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang / kun spyod par bya ba dang / yongs su smin/
109b2(rgyud): par bya ba dang / khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zung zhig/ yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang / dpal gyi lha mo dang / rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang / lha mos
109b3(rgyud): 'dzin la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur
109b4(rgyud): nas/ de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags
109b5(rgyud): kyi chog 'di dag gsungs pas na/ byin gyis brlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so// bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes sgrub par nus so// bdag cag gis
109b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson 'grus drag pos spro bar bgyi'o// yang sems can thams cad la snying rje
109b7(rgyud): ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o// lha 'am klu nas/ mi'i bar gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlang
110a1(rgyud): pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgying ngam/ zhig par 'gying ngam/ rnam par ma rung bar bgyid la/ bdag cag gi dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi/
110a2(rgyud): ba'i slad du/ gal te ma bzlog gam nan tan ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang
110a3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ kye grogs po dag lha nas/ mi'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngam/ dge slong ngam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
110a4(rgyud): ma la 'tshe la/ gal te bdag cag gis de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
110a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das/
110a6(rgyud): byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang / rab dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / byang dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag/
110a7(rgyud): gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / seng
110b1(rgyud): ge dang / stag dang / nang dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs/
110b2(rgyud): pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/ bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa
110b3(rgyud): rnams las yongs su thar par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
110b4(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cigs de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes
110b5(rgyud): bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so legs so// khyed kyis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ bdud sdig can la
110b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de// de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byos// sdig can khyod
110b7(rgyud): ni rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyis// thub pa la ni khyod kyis sngo zhing brnyogs par byed pa btang bar byos// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa khyod kyi tshig gis byang
111a1(rgyud): chub dri med ngang pa'i sems gcig bdag mi bskyed// thub pa ma gsungs bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis// de dag lhan cig bdag cag gi yul
111a2(rgyud): nas dpung dang bzhon par bcas par gnas par bgyi// phun sum tshogs 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang mi mchis// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las
111a3(rgyud): snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs
111a4(rgyud): so// ji ltar 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos//
111a5(rgyud): kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlabs/ bdud bye ba ni pham par mdzad/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can rnams la ni gzigs/ sdig pa'i lta ba las ni
111a6(rgyud): rab tu thar par mdzad/ shes rab kyi sgron ma ni 'bar bar mdzad/ zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i
111a7(rgyud): gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bshad/ nag po'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa
111b1(rgyud): de bzhin du/ da ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma
111b2(rgyud): lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de/ chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du ni mdzad na/ shAkya thub pa nyi ma
111b3(rgyud): khyod nub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'dra bar bgyid par 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su
111b4(rgyud): smin par bgyid par 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyid/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
111b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man nga ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams
111b6(rgyud): sam/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/
111b7(rgyud): gang su'ang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang / gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
112a1(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par mdzod cig/ de nas de bzhin
112a2(rgyud): gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
112a3(rgyud): grogs po dag gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon
112a4(rgyud): no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skad cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di'ang shin tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang / dam
112a5(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bla na med pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum
112a6(rgyud): gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas/ 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dus gsum
112a7(rgyud): du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so// chu'i khams thams cad dang / me'i khams thams cad dang / rlung gi khams thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs
112b1(rgyud): so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
112b2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / gang dag yang gzi brjid
112b3(rgyud): che ba'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yongs su
112b4(rgyud): smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te/ khyed kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyis/ ci nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos
112b5(rgyud): 'di yid la gyis shig/ 'bar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / yi ger bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang /
112b6(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rigs par khyed kyi
112b7(rgyud): lag tu gtad kyis/ chos smra ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung
113a1(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar
113a2(rgyud): gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas/ chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang / mi nub par bya ba dang / dam
113a3(rgyud): pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtang ngo //
113a4(rgyud): de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis
113a5(rgyud): 'dus te/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul 'di'ang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang
113a6(rgyud): yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nged kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang / sems can
113a7(rgyud): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang / gling bzhi pa na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
113b1(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyisaci nas myur du mi 'jig cing nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis
113b2(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid lha gyis shig/ rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/ srung bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa gang dag dang dam bcas pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag
113b3(rgyud): dge slong dang / dge slong me dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang / chos smra ba dang / chos
113b4(rgyud): nyan pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam
113b5(rgyud): grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas nas
113b6(rgyud): dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod de 'chang dam/ lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ chos kyi badrung des sa'i bcung
113b7(rgyud): dang sems can dmangs 'phel bar 'gyur te/ khyed nges mdangs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyir/ khyed kyi g.yog 'khor
114a1(rgyud): dang gzhal med khang 'phel bar 'gyur/ mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ de dag gi yul 'khor
114a2(rgyud): thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang chos kyi bcud des tshim nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin
114a3(rgyud): pa la'ang mngon par yid ches par 'gyur/ dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/ ser sna med pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems nas/ yang
114a4(rgyud): dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// so so bdag bdag gi yul la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'ang skye bo rags pas gang bar 'gyur/ shin tu lo legs par 'gyur/ shin tu nyam
114a5(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / lo ma'i sman dang / me tog gi sman dang / nor dang /
114a6(rgyud): 'bru rnams shin tu 'byor pa dang / nad med pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa skyed par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
114a7(rgyud): drug dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin bu ma rungs pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / spyang ki dang / dus ma yin pa'i
114b1(rgyud): rlung dang / char pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar ma dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zlab phyed dang / lo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sems
114b2(rgyud): can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu
114b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus
114b4(rgyud): pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te/ grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bud med kye dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma
114b5(rgyud): lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur ba 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba
114b6(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par/ gang gzhan lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//
114b7(rgyud): gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na'ang / 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang nyon
115a1(rgyud): mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad yongs su/
115a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba
115a3(rgyud): dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa dang / zhi zhing phra ba'i lam thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// yul du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der
115a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs 'di shin tu snum par 'gyur/ 'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / shinatu
115a5(rgyud): zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / ro med pa spong bar 'gyur/ me tog dang 'bras bu shin tu 'byor pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / bang ba dang
115a6(rgyud): mdzod dang / rdza phru dang / bya sgyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams shin tu 'byor par 'gyur te/ de na sems can gang
115a7(rgyud): dag zas dang skom gyis 'tshe ba de dag ni shin tu nad med pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dge
115b1(rgyud): ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis khyed kyi g.yo/
115b2(rgyud): 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyis/ chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye ba'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shig/ sems can rnams kyi chos kyi don la tshung
115b3(rgyud): cig de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man nga ra ba'i dri mos kyis
115b4(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / srung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis
115b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin gyi dbang po nas tshangs pa'i dbang po dang lto 'phye chen po'i
115b6(rgyud): dbang po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal cher gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bkas spro ba mdzad do//
115b7(rgyud): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bya ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis
116a1(rgyud): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bka sa bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/
116a2(rgyud): thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing gus pa chen pos gzung bar bgyi'o// snying rjes sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba nas/ bla na med
116a3(rgyud): pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho zang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas su rgyas
116a4(rgyud): par bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos yun du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas
116a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa nas/ lto
116a6(rgyud): 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang / gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa sems can gzi brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin//
116a7(rgyud): gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas/ rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i
116b1(rgyud): bar du bgyi'o// yang dag par bsan par bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o// chos 'tshal ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//
116b2(rgyud): gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
