116b3(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / gdug pa dang / rtsub pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / sra ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar
116b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// bde ba dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'dus par bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyi'o// chos nyan pa'i rgyal
116b5(rgyud): po de dag kyang shin tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis
116b6(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ bdag dang / gzhan dang / gnyis ka'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum
116b7(rgyud): du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bya ba dang //
117a1(rgyud): dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na/ khyed ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
117a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i dbang po nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang / gang
117a3(rgyud): ngag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas
117a4(rgyud): bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi/
117a5(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di'ang rigs pas blang bar bgyi ba nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o//
117a6(rgyud): dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag yang chos sgrub pas gnas pa'am/ chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong
117a7(rgyud): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glegs baM la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang / bsam/
117b1(rgyud): gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar 'gyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor 'gyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gos dang / gdugs dang / ba nangang/
117b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang byug pa nas/ sman dang yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis bsti stang du bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa'am/ ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid nyan pa'i slang du
117b3(rgyud): nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par shes nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis bsti sbrang du 'gyi bla mar bgyi/ ri mor
117b4(rgyud): bgyi mchod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba'i tshe/ chos kyi bcud kyis bdag
117b5(rgyud): cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan/ ye shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing / tshogs dang
117b6(rgyud): mthu thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag gis yul thams rung du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag
117b7(rgyud): tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / rtsub pa dang /
118a1(rgyud): brlang ba dang / khab dang / tsha ba dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shin tu bde ba dang /
118a2(rgyud): lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / 'dum pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams dus dus su 'byung bar bgyi'o//
118a3(rgyud): mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o// gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyang legs
118a4(rgyud): par rgyu bar bgyi'o// 'bab chu dang / chu mig dang / rdzi dang / lteng ka'ang shin tu gtam par bgyi'o// gang du sems can rnams chu'i klung gis gnod par 'gyur ba de'ang bdag cag gi sa bsal
118a5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs de dag tu'ang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang / yal ga dang / me tog dang
118a6(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang / bda' ba dang / kha dog dang / ro che zhing mang ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can rnams
118a7(rgyud): la nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang / sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang /
118b1(rgyud): dpal dang / bsod nams 'byung bas tshe ring po 'grub par bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor gang dag na sangs
118b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgyas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang dam/ za na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ngam/ mchod pa dang / bsti stang bgyid cing 'chang /
118b3(rgyud): ba de dag tu/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ de dag la gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/ phan pa
118b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bgyiltad mo dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / byed pa ngan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs ngan pa dang / smon lam ngan pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / tshul 'chos
118b5(rgyud): pa dang / kha gsag dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phrag dog dang / khro ba dang / ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam drang po dang / dad pa
118b6(rgyud): dang dul ba dang / kun sdom pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gzung bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po
118b7(rgyud): dang rtsis pa chen po dang / grong rdal dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / rigs bzhi rnams dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyang
119a1(rgyud): bsrung zhing yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba nas/ ngo ma shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i bar la gzung bar bgyi'o// tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyi//
119a2(rgyud): gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas/ glegs bam la bris te gzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na/ sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / brtul ba chen/
119a3(rgyud): pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du/ bskal pa mtha' yas par nan cher bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes
119a4(rgyud): bu dam pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi nub
119a5(rgyud): par nan tan byas na/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/
119a6(rgyud): kun tu srung ba'i lenas stsu / das com ldan 'das pa shugs pa shA sgru pas la can dang / rnangs pa dang / 'bags skyes po dang /
119a7(rgyud): mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag nga sems can la snying rje ba'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos
119b1(rgyud): kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chos/
119b2(rgyud): rkun dang / g.yon can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni pham par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgrengs/ sems can tshad med pa
119b3(rgyud): dag ni sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi char ni phab/ ngas bdud bye ba ni pham par byas so// bzhin bzang dag gang gi phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
119b4(rgyud): dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis sa'i
119b5(rgyud): bcud dang / sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang / dkon
119b6(rgyud): mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos
119b7(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis
120a1(rgyud): rlobs la srungs shig/ gang nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag pa'i srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang lung 'bogs/
120a2(rgyud): pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / dran pa dang / brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
120a3(rgyud): bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang bsam gtan dang po sgom pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa sgom pa'i bar dang / gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
120a4(rgyud): du bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs dang / gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta na byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus
120a5(rgyud): na byed par 'gyur ba nas/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad ngo do// gang de bzhin gshegs
120a6(rgyud): pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/
120a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa nas/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar
120b1(rgyud): du gang dang gang na chos smra ba shin tu khrus byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis 'dugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs bting
120b2(rgyud): ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chang ngam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te klog pa der/ gal te khyed chos mnyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung ba 'am/ chos
120b3(rgyud): nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang / gzhan dang / gnyis ka'i mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir ma dong na/ de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang / lam
120b4(rgyud): bskyed pa la rmongs pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i
120b5(rgyud): chos kyi tshul 'di rab tu nub par gyur pa na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/
120b6(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan
120b7(rgyud): yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos gsar pa 'tshal te/ me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis
121a1(rgyud): 'dugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs bting ba/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan
121a2(rgyud): dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad dam/ bris te klog pa dar chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba de bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa de dag dang / bdag dang / gzhan dang / gnyis ka'i nyon mongs
121a3(rgyud): pa'i las yongs su byang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar 'gyi ba 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug
121a4(rgyud): pa'i slad du/ bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te der ma mchis sam/ grong nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba dang / sems can de dag gi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang /
121a5(rgyud): bang ba mang po rab tu gang ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// 'di
121a6(rgyud): lta ste/ aM gu ha/ aM gu ha/ aM gu ha/ d+haM ga pu ra ha/ na yA mi kha/ kha kha kha ba kha ba/ kli na na kha bA swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung
121a7(rgyud): ba nas/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po rnam par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom
121b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so zhes bya ba
121b2(rgyud): rab tu byin no// de nas ko'u shi kas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis na/ grong ngam grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'ad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
121b3(rgyud): cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ kha ba mri kha/ a ba mr-i kha/ na la g+ha/ a mud dz+nyA/ a mU ba ha/
121b4(rgyud): a khat+ta/ a kha/ a sha kha/ dzi na pa khe swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur
121b5(rgyud): ba nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ldan dang ma mchis pa'i dus
121b6(rgyud): na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/
121b7(rgyud): u kha na ba na ba sa ba na/ sa mU drA saM bid dz+nyA ta thA ts+tsha ta/ ba ru drA Na ba ba rA dza swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas
122a1(rgyud): mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis
122a2(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ dza lo g+ha/ a tog/
122a3(rgyud): ma ma/ mo g+ha/ a ma sA rA dzA na tsa ya mu dza swA hA/ de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin to// de nas yang yul 'khor
122a4(rgyud): srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag/
122a5(rgyud): gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ bin+na dza kha/ kha ba dza ba ra mu kha/ k+Sha sA ra/ pu ka ba ha/ A mAn baT swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
122a6(rgyud): bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong //
122a7(rgyud): gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i bar gyi dam bcas pa dang 'gal
122b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ k+Shu d+he/ k+Shu k+Shu k+Shu dwe/ khak+Shu dre/ sA trik+Shu dre/ a nA ya nak+Shu d+h+we/ hri da ku d+be/ sA ga ra hr-i da k+Shu dre/ saM gu su k+Shu d+he/ d+har+m+mak+ShA ya mu dwe sA hA/ mi dang mi
122b2(rgyud): ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'o 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas po'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po stong nyis
122b3(rgyud): brgya dang / gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
122b4(rgyud): dang lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos
122b5(rgyud): kyi sgron ma'i bar du nub par gyur pa de'i tshe/ grong ngam/ grong khyer rAm/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/
122b6(rgyud): bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba
122b7(rgyud): 'amanagazhan yang dngang pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas/ gos gsar pa bgos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su ras bcos
123a1(rgyud): bu sna tshogs bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis gtam brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
123a2(rgyud): lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam la bris te klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos
123a3(rgyud): nyan pa dang / chos smra ba bsrung ba dang / rang gi 'khor bsrung ba dang / sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong ngam grong rdal nas/
123a4(rgyud): dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongs su ma bskyangs sam/ der sems can rnams kyi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod
123a5(rgyud): dang / bang ba mang po rab tu ma gtam mam/ der ma mchis sam/ der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
123a6(rgyud): dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / shin tu grang ba dang / tshwa ba rnams ma bzlog na/ bdag cag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123a7(rgyud): thams cad la bslus pa dang / 'khrus pa dang / ma mnyes par bgyis par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang / lta ba yongs su nyams pa dang / lus rul bar 'gyur ro//
123b1(rgyud): bdag cag g.yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di
123b2(rgyud): 'bar bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ yongs su smin par
123b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba de dag gi nor
123b4(rgyud): dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
123b5(rgyud): 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/ gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
123b7(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dang
124a1(rgyud): pa thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni ma yin no// bdud sdig can g.yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa mthob ste/ lad+ha
124a2(rgyud): cing yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i
124a3(rgyud): phyir brtson par byed do// de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang / g.yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya po de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchog gsum la
124a4(rgyud): dang pa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas 'di dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du/ 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la glags lta zhing
124a5(rgyud): skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa dang / mi dge ba'i grog
124a6(rgyud): pos yongs su zin pa dang / dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang / smon lam btab pa'i phyir sems mtshams mi sbyor/ dad par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/
124a7(rgyud): rab tu gtong bar mi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang / gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
124b1(rgyud): la dang pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun/
124b2(rgyud): pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par gyur na'ang de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa
124b3(rgyud): ngo mtshar to// yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/ bla na med pa
124b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las langs nas kun tu bltas
124b5(rgyud): nas thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
124b6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
124b7(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
125a1(rgyud): snyigs ma can thams cad rnam par spyod pa/ yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon
125a2(rgyud): mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/
125a3(rgyud): 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba
125a4(rgyud): dang / theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / dkon mchog gsum
125a5(rgyud): gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyis/ de la khyed kyis kyang ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di'ang rnam par mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du
125a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang / bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di
125a7(rgyud): la sems can 'ga' la'ang 'tshe ba 'am/ rnam par 'jig pa 'am/ nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang / chos la nan tan 'gyid pa dang / chos smra ba
125b1(rgyud): dang / chos 'an pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dang pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la mngon par brtson pa/ bsod//
125b2(rgyud): nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga' ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can thams
125b3(rgyud): cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur pa de dag la'ang bdud ngam/ bdud kyi bu 'am/ bdud kyi bu mo 'am/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ bdud kyi 'khor mo 'am/ bdud kyi pho nyas
125b4(rgyud): gtses pa'i bsam pas glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
125b5(rgyud): 'das thams cad la gsol lo// bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang /
125b6(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar
125b7(rgyud): mdzad cig/ gang su da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas de dag kyang sems can thams lnga phan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang bya'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par/
126a1(rgyud): bgyi ba'i slad du bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/ bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig/ bdag gis bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor de nan thur gyis tshar bcad
126a2(rgyud): pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / lus la ka nod pa dang / lus spa bkong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshang par bgyi ste/ de nas bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang /
126a3(rgyud): bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi 'khor mo dang / bdud kyi pho nyas gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam/ dge slong la 'tshe 'am/ tha na skad cig
126a4(rgyud): gcig tsam yang sems 'khrugs par bgyid pa nas/ dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar bgyi ba'i bar du nan tan bgying ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs
126a5(rgyud): dang / pho brang 'khor dang / ri brags de rnams ma rung bar bgyid par sems bskyed pa dang / gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag tu tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang
126a6(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / chu bo dang / sa g.yo ba dang / sa 'gas
126a7(rgyud): pa dang / skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro skye bar mi bgyid dam/ ma rung bar bgyid par 'tshul na bdud des de ltar
126b1(rgyud): sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud nas/ bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis tsha bar 'gyur/ lus lci ba dang / rdul ba dang / rul ba dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / las su mi rung ba dang / ldang mi
126b2(rgyud): nus par 'gyur/ bcing ba lngas bdag bcings par mthong ba nas/ de'i yan lag thams cad 'khum pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing slar brkyang mi nus pa dang / de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas/ nyi/
126b3(rgyud): ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang / de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrugs par 'gyur/ de'i dbang po drug kyang spyod yul du 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/
126b4(rgyud): mangs sa le/ mdzab pa/ adza / myur po la byalas le/ rngams yi/ 6 5/ kro saH/ ma pa'o// hrI la leg sa pas k+ke/ a sa na/ b+h+ya/
126b5(rgyud): k+Sha mU la ba ha/ kha ga swa/ kha dz+nyA swa/ ba ri brta/ mU ra/ a dz+nyA bA yu nya dz+nyA/ tsan+d+ra su d+yo dz+nyA na ba ha nya dz+nyA khur khwa nya dz+nyA / ba ba nya da nya/ b+hu ta ko Ti ta thA tA nya dz+nyA/ sarba dz+nyA b+hi/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti/
126b6(rgyud): nyadz+nyA/ pa rA kra ma tri ga Na ta k+Sha ba k+Sha ma ma/ k+Sha ma dz+nyA / k+Shi pre ta mA ra bi shA ya swA hA/ thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas
126b7(rgyud): te 'bras bu med par gyur to// gang su'ang rung gnod pa 'dod pa de dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub
127a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas de'i tshes ni g.yos/ sprin ni
127a2(rgyud): 'khrugs/ ri'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yos te/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang bcas/
127a3(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrugs so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdud ri byi 'di'i stobs ga
127a4(rgyud): las 'ongs/ mthug las 'ongs na/ gang snying rje med pa 'di'i rang gi phyogs thams cad dang / nga'i stobs kyi yul dang / pha rol gnod pa thams cad ma lus par bcom ste/ nag po'i
127a5(rgyud): rtsa lag ni pham par byas/ mi mthun par chad par smra ba dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas/ bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang / rul ba dang / las su
127a6(rgyud): mi rul bar gyur/ bdag gi phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te snang zhing mthong ba med par byas/ yongs su gdung ba chen pos bdag gdungs so// byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis
127a7(rgyud): smras pa/ sdig can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis stobs bskyed pas/ bdud ri byis 'dud kyi stobs kyi yul dang
127b1(rgyud): pha rol gnon pa 'di thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / de gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyis/ sdig can khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dang par
127b2(rgyud): gyis shig/ ci nas khyod lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems skyed cig/ bdud sdig
127b3(rgyud): can gyis smras pa/ bdag ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med pa 'di bas kyang ches sdig pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro'i/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng//
127b4(rgyud): chub tu ni bdag sems mi bskyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin
127b5(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas ni gnod sbyin 'jigs 'jigs lta'i gzugs su/ yang dag shes ni ri dgas kyi gzugs su/ shes pa'i sgron ma ni spre'u'i gzugs su/ sred spong ni ri'i gzug/
127b6(rgyud): sun rgun bcad ni glang po che'i gzugs su/ sems can chen po lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ko'u di mya 'od 'phror/
127b7(rgyud): spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gi lus thams cad las rnam par dag cing dro zhim pa'i 'od phyung ngo // de nas sems can chen po lnga po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
128a1(rgyud): nor bu rin po che chen po me'i 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thogs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis de dag gi bsam pa tshul bzhin
128a2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa la bltas te/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o snyam nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu/
128a3(rgyud): dam pa khyed kyis dbang gang mthong na khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed/ 'brog gnas kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi
128a4(rgyud): bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ngo //
128a5(rgyud): de'i tshe bdag cag spun lnga drung du gyur te/ de na bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byas/
128a6(rgyud): so// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar
128a7(rgyud): dude na'ang bdag cag sngon smon lam gyis spun drung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'dag cag gis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang po byas so// de nas yang der sems can chen
128b1(rgyud): po dge bsnyen yang dag shes bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bas der 'dri 'dra ba'i smon lam btang ste/ bdag bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por gyur la/
128b2(rgyud): na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa ma rungs pa/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa/ byad gzugs tha dad pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas/ lus srul po'i bar du de dag
128b3(rgyud): la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar dad pa thob par byas nas bslab pa 'dzin du btsud la/ zhi ba'i lam la dgod pa nas/ de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song
128b4(rgyud): ba'i ri dgas dang / spyang ki dang / dgo ba dang / phag pa la sogs pa la'ang chos bshad pa nas/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
128b5(rgyud): song ba dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i bar la chos bshad pas yongs su smin par byas nas/ theg pa gsum po dag la so sor bkod de/ de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
128b6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par shog cig ces byas so// de bzhin du gnod sbyin shes pa'i sgron ma spre'u'i gzugs kyis spre'u yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab
128b7(rgyud): bo/ sreng spong ra'i gzugs kyis mi khom pas nyam nga bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// rgyun bcad glang po che'i gzugs kyis glang po che
129a1(rgyud): bya/ yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po gling bzhi pa na gnas pa khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
129a2(rgyud): papa'i byang chub tshol zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs btab par gyur nas/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de'i spyan sngar bla na med
129a3(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing / bskal pa bzang po 'di thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo// 'di na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/
129a4(rgyud): snying rje med pa/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ yang ba spyod pa/ sdig pa 'dod pa/ snying rje dang mi ldan pa nas/ lus srul po sems can la 'tshe ba/ mdangs 'phrog pa/ sems 'khrugs par byed pa/ mi dge ba'i/
129a5(rgyud): sems su byed/ srog gcod pa nas/ log pa la gnas pa'i bar dag dang ldan pa/ rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag sems 'khrugs pa dang / yul/
129a6(rgyud): 'khor dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs 'khrugs par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed
129a7(rgyud): pa dang / dus dang / lo 'khrugs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / rab tu
129b1(rgyud): grangs dang tsha bar byed pa/ sa bon dang / sman dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / le tog ma rungs par byed pa/ sems can gyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang /
129b2(rgyud): nad med pa dang / 'dum pa dang / dge ba'i chos la mos pa dang / sa'i bcud dang / mdangs dang / don dang / chos kyi ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro nub par byed pa rnams bslab pa 'dzin du
129b3(rgyud): btsud de phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas/ gang tshun chad bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de tshun chad bdag rtag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi nang du skyes te//
129b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin sdig can nas/ lus srul po'i bar theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing de tshun chad sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma mthong yang
129b5(rgyud): brnyas par mi dran gyi/ sems can ci 'dra ba mthong ba de nyid kyi tshul gyis de dag la smras/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas/ sdig pa la bzlog/ byams pa
129b6(rgyud): dang snying rje'i sems la bzhag ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag la phyir mi ldog par so sor bkod do// bdag gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gang dang gang du phyin pa der de dag gnod
129b7(rgyud): sbyin 'brog gnas bde bar 'ongs sam zhes tshig tu 'bod do// de bas na bdag ming 'brog gnas shes bya bar gyur to// gang dag da ltar chos snying po dang bral zhing sdom pa la mi gnas te/
130a1(rgyud): gcig tu las nag po spyod pa'i mi de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du skyes te/ mi'i nang du nyung zad cig skye'o// gang dag las 'dren mar spyod cing
130a2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob pa de dag ni shi ba'i dus byas nas phal char gnod sbyin sdig can dang / gnod sbyin lus srul po'i nang du skye'o// de bas na dra ltar 'jig rten na gnod
130a3(rgyud): sbyin sdig can nas/ gnod sbyin lus srul po'i bar du shin tu phal che bar rnam par 'phel te/ de dag thams cad dkar po'i phyogs nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa sha stag go// de bas na da ltar
130a4(rgyud): shin tu dus ngan pa la bab pas bdag gis 'jam pos ni dus thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul po ma rungs pas bar dag chos dkar po la dgod par mi nus/ bdag gis/
130a5(rgyud): rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / dge sbyong dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'khrugs rnams kyang slar zhi bar bya mi
130a6(rgyud): nus/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar bya mi nus/ bdag gis 'byung po rnams kyi sems dang sems
130a7(rgyud): las byung ba'ang phyir zhing rnam par thar pa'i ro la dgod par yang mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu gnod sbyin dang lus srul po thams cad kyi snying la sbyor ba mi drang ba'i shes pa'ang bdag gis sangs/
130b1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis shes so// rigs kyi bu 'byung po rnams kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs kyi tshig drag po mi bzang ba chen po yod/
130b2(rgyud): de/ gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis btab na/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/
130b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srin po dang / sbyin mo nas/ klu dang / klu mo dang / grul bum dang / grul bum mo dang / brjed byed dang /
130b4(rgyud): brjed byed mo'i bar dang / nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgan po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul
130b5(rgyud): gyi bu 'am/ lus srul gyi bu mo 'am/ lus srul gyi 'khor pho 'am/ lus srul gyi 'khor mo'i bar dag gis phyi phyir zhing rgyal rigs dkrug pa nas/ ljongs kyi bar du dkrug par
130b6(rgyud): byed mi nus so// rigs kyi bu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po
130b7(rgyud): drag po mi bzad pa chen po rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyur pa der gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po ma rungs pa de dag gis sngon khon du bzung zhing mi dge ba'i las byed
131a1(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad btang nas/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / sems 'jam pa dang / 'byung po thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa dang / phan pa'i sems su 'gyur
131a2(rgyud): ro// yul 'khor dang / dmangs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po'i 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / char pa dang /
131a3(rgyud): dug dang / mtshon dang / byang dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / lus kyi rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad ka na dang / 'dus pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyon gnyis pa dang /
131a4(rgyud): nyin gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i rims dang / mdze dang / skem pa dang / g.yan pa dang / lud pa dang / 'brum bu dang / ljo na pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dang
131a5(rgyud): 'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed do// de na mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya la sogs pa las dkar po'i mtha' la mngon par brtson pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa/
131a6(rgyud): bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas nyin mtshan 'das par byed pa dang / dge ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / lus
131a7(rgyud): dang sems mi ngal bar byang chub kyi lam tshol ba la brtson par byed do// yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ rigs kyi bu ci ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag
131b1(rgyud): gi las kyi dngos grub 'di stsal cing byin gyis brlabs par mdzad de/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na/ bdag gis 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dad par
131b2(rgyud): bgyid pa/ mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad zlog par bgyid la/ dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces
131b3(rgyud): bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab du gsol/ 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas
131b4(rgyud): kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i yi ge dang sgras gang bar bgyid la/ de bzhin du ci nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig
131b5(rgyud): brjod pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ges tshim par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas la bos te 'di skad
131b6(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nag po'i phyogs skrag par bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod kyi rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs
131b7(rgyud): 'jug ces bya ba 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis spro bar gyis la
132a1(rgyud): 'khrugs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs/
132a2(rgyud): 'jug ces bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi chog de dag spros shig/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo
132a3(rgyud): sbyar ba btung nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// 'di lta ste/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ ni la
132a4(rgyud): ni la/ ni la ni la/ ku Ta Ne ku Ta Ne/ me hA ku Ta Ne/ ta ta ta to/ ma hA ta ta/ a ba b+ha sa/ a b+hi a b+hi/ ri Ni ri Ni Dam hA ri Ni ri Ni/ mi ri mi ri mi ri/ dA ri me/ ri shaM ma hA ri she/ shu
132a5(rgyud): lu shu lu/ ma hA shu lu/ shu lu shu lu d+ha/ ma hA shu lu shu lu/ u gu ma/ gu ma gu ma na/ ri mi ri mi/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri hi ri
132a6(rgyud): mi ni mi ni/ hi ni hi ni/ mu ni mu ni/ bud+d+ha li pra ba ra/ sr-ish+tsa lo ka tsAr+ya/ dzi ni dzo ni/ dzi na ri Sha b+he/ dzi na dzi na/ dzi na ri She b+ha sA hA/ bcom ldan 'das grong dam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam
132a7(rgyud): ljongs nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtogs 'jug ces bya ba gsang sngags kyi chog rig pa chen mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ de na gnod
132b1(rgyud): sbyin ma rungs pa nas/ lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar du gang dag sems ma dad pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su mi len pa dang / sems can de dag la/
132b2(rgyud): byams pa'i sems nye bar mi 'jog pa de dag gi don du bdag gis yang shin tu mi bzang ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad do// 'di lta ste/ ats+tsha ats+tsha/ mu ne mu ne/ ag+ni/ hU hU mu ne mu ne/
132b3(rgyud): ma hA ri Sha b+ha/ hu hu/ a grA dAn te/ a ta a ta/ a b+ha ru ta/ hi ni hi ni/ hi ni ha ni/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ tri ku ma/ gu ma gu ma/ gu ma/
132b4(rgyud): hi li hi li/ ni li ni li/ ma hA ni li/ sa mu dra me kha/ ha ta/ ha tA ha ta/ d+ha ra na mi/ kha khA ba kha khA ba kha praM thi bi ap+te dze bA yu/ A kA sha/ tha tha tha/ g+hum+b+he b+ha g+hum+b+he/ ak+ShaM gum+b+he/ dzi hA
132b5(rgyud): gum+b+he/ sar+b+ba ga g+hum+b+he/ rA dza g+ham+b+he/ sa maM ta g+hum+b+he swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spras ma thag tu de nas de'i mad la lha dang / klu dang /
132b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams cad 'khrugs te skrag nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa mtha' dag 'dar ro// de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom
132b7(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ lan gsum 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
133a1(rgyud): lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis shin tu mi bzad pa 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po gnon pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras so zhes
133a2(rgyud): brjod do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ 'brog gnas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag tha ma ca
133a3(rgyud): bzhengs pa'i brda dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda bstan to// de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / sa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i
133a4(rgyud): sems can rnams kyang rab tu 'dar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di'ang g.yos/ nam mkha' la'ang me tog gi char dang / bar snang las kyang sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung / spos dang
133a5(rgyud): bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ 'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
133a6(rgyud): tsan dan gyi dri chen po la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
133a7(rgyud): pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya chen yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / bris nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba
133b1(rgyud): ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
133b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri chen pos/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcad pa dang / 'thab pa'i rnyog pa
133b3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad
133b4(rgyud): kyis khams drug byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub
133b5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos bcus byin gyis brlabs so// bcu gang zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ lha dang / klu dang
133b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / grul bum de dag la khyed kyis sems can de dag rtag
133b7(rgyud): tu srungs shig/ gnod pa las zlog cig/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las dge ba la tshul cig/ zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang /
134a1(rgyud): nad med pa la mkhas pas bdag gi srog dang yang bsngos la/ sems can de dag gzung bar gyis shig ces rigs pas gtad nas/ de dag gi dran pa dang / blo gros
134a2(rgyud): dang / rtogs pa dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa skyon med par 'gyur ro// de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te/ de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par
134a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de dag sems sa dang mtshungs shing zab mo bzod pa dang ldan la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la'ang brtson par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems can gyi 'khor gyi lus
134a4(rgyud): las snying po blangs te/ dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin des
134a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par dpyod pa'i shes pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
134a6(rgyud): tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du 'dar ba 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston cing bzhugs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
134a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las tshig dang / don dang / yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i dga' ba/
134b1(rgyud): dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas/ las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba de dag thams cad rnam par shes pa la chos dang ldan pas mgo mnyam du 'gag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du
134b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig 'chad pa'i sangs
134b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing der sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems can nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can de dag dang mtshungs par 'grogs par
134b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ring por mi thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par phyin chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs
134b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos
134b6(rgyud): kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar byed cing / gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
134b7(rgyud): chos bcu po dag gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam
135a1(rgyud): par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig/
135a2(rgyud): rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag phyogs bcu nas 'dir byon pa de dag thams cad kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
135a3(rgyud): 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam par sbyang ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal
135a4(rgyud): mtshan bsgreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / ma rungs pa thams
135a5(rgyud): cad bzlog pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad lus bsrung ba dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang / byang chub kyi lam la gzud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs
135a6(rgyud): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba/ sngon ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab mo rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam/
135a7(rgyud): grangs 'di lta bu bshad de/ des chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzung ba dang / tshul gcig pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
135b1(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul srung ba nas/ gling bzhi srung ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa srung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang /
135b2(rgyud): ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams srung ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i bar dag srung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan
135b3(rgyud): 'das rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po re re'ang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa rnam pa bcus byin gyis brlabs so// grogs po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad
135b4(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di yongs su spyad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
135b5(rgyud): du skyes so thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa/ bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyis bkur ba/ phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
135b6(rgyud): ldan pa dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas
135b7(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ grogs po dag de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o// grogs po dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsti stang du byas te/ dam pa'i
136a1(rgyud): chos 'di gzung bar bya/ bsrung bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar/
136a2(rgyud): bya'o// de ltar na khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mtshan gyis ngo'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir yon tan dang phan yon rab tu rdzogs par
136a3(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas nI/ skyob pa mgon po dgal mchod par phul 'bas// gang dag dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin
136a4(rgyud): byed na/ 'jigs med des ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// brgya tshang pa yi gser rnams las/
136a5(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni// mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi 'thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
136a6(rgyud): me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khebs byas te// gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu yid kyis sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur/
136a7(rgyud): 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na// de yi bsod nams cad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kya
136b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa'i spyan sngar myur me'i snying po dri zhim til gyi byugs pa ri rab tsam// mar me bus pa 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa bye bar bzung babs/
136b2(rgyud): gang gzhan la la bsod nams 'dod pa sgrib pa slob par smon pa de dag gis// zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam byas de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// de nas de bzhin gshegs
136b3(rgyud): pa mi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros 'chang ba gang gis bzod pa sgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom// rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam gzhag lus kyi shes
136b4(rgyud): rab spel ba bas// zad pa'i dus ngan tshe na gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'di 'dzin pa// de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med// de nas de bzhin gshegs/
136b5(rgyud): pa ting nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang // gzhan dag 'dzin
136b6(rgyud): bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang // bdug pa me tog 'phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyis mchod// bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med
136b7(rgyud): grangs med pa de dag gis mdo'i bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la bos te 'di skad
137a1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag las kyi sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams
137a2(rgyud): kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
137a3(rgyud): dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog
137a4(rgyud): gi gzungs las/ mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs rdzogs so//
137a5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len+da bo d+hi dang / dzI na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
137a6(rgyud): phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA rI ts+yai nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bong skang du/ 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
137a7(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
137b1(rgyud): Shan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po ngag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
137b2(rgyud): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ste/ de bltar med/ gzung du med/ bcing
137b3(rgyud): du med/ dgag tu med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par byar med/ chad pas gcad du med/ mgo breg tu med/ gzhur med/ tshig par byar med/ dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro'o// dge
137b4(rgyud): slong dag gang gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can de'i ming shes pa de'ang bltar med/ gzung du med/ btsang du med/ dgag tu med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par byar med/ chad pas gcad
137b5(rgyud): du med/ mgo breg tu med/ gzhur med/ tshig par byar med/ de dgra'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can gyi ming shes kyis/ bdag kyang bltar med
137b6(rgyud): par gyur cig/ gzung du med par gyur cig/ bcing du med par gyur cig/ dgag tu med par gyur cig/ brgal du med par gyur cig/ rmongs par byar med par gyur cig/ chad par gcad du med//
137b7(rgyud): par gyur cig/ mgo breg tu med par gyur cig/ gzhur med par gyur cig/ tshig par byar med par gyur cig/ dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro bar gyur cig/ de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no//
138a1(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM pa dA kra ma si/ pa rA kra ma si/ u da ya ma si nai ra ma si/ ar+k+ka ma si/ marka ma si/ urmam si/ ba na ma si/ gul+la ma si/ tsI ba rA ma si/ ma hAts+tshi ba ra ma si/
138a2(rgyud): aM ta ra d+hA na ma si swA hA/ oM lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig/ bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig/ bdag skye bo'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las
138a3(rgyud): skyobs shig/ bdag glang po che'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ da seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs
138a4(rgyud): shig/ bdag stag gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag chu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig
138a5(rgyud): bdag dug gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad las skyobs shig/ 'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / nyams pa dang / ma nyams pa thams cad
138a6(rgyud): du'ang bdag seng ge las srungs shig/ bdag stag las srungs shig/ bdag klu las srungs shig/ bdag sbrul las srungs shig swAhA/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go
138a7(rgyud): ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ na mo rat+na traM yA ya / tad+ya thA/ oM A lo/ tA lo/ kA lo/ san+na lo/ sa ma pa mUr+d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ bdag dang sems can thams
138b1(rgyud): cad la 'tshe ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad la sa srungs shig swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo 'od zer can gyi snying po brjod par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA li/
138b2(rgyud): ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta/ pra duSh+Ta naM/ tsak+Shu ra mu khaM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ban d+ha mu khaM/ dzaM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya sA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai sA hA/ au ba rA li/ ba dA l-i/
138b3(rgyud): bat+tA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+pa pra duSh+TA nA/ tsak+Shur mu khe ba~M d+ha bi d+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams
138b4(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
138b5(rgyud): ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grag pas bsgyur ba'o//
138b6(rgyud): de nas lha mo 'od zer can 'di'i gzungs kyi rtog pa yin te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su bzung ba'o// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nam/ nyi ma'i steng du 'od zer can rnam par bsam par
138b7(rgyud): bya'o// de'i 'od zer las yongs su grub pa'i khab dang skud pa dang bcas pas gdug pa can rnams kyi mig dang kha drubs bzhin par mdun du rnam par bsam par bya'o// phyi rol mthong ba'i
139a1(rgyud): spyod yul du mtshams bcing ba byas la/ zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis ngag gi 'od zer las yongs su rdzogs bzhin pa'i lha mo 'od zer can ma mnyan yod na bzhugs te zhes bya ba nas bzung ste/
139a2(rgyud): lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba ni rgyal bas bka' stsal pa'o// de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ba'ang lha'i tshogs mang pos kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bdag kyang bltar med pa'i
139a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dang / de'ang dgu phrag gsum yin no// sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ oM pa tA krA ma si pa rA kra ma si/ ud+ha ya ma si/ u dA ma si/ ne ra ma si/ an+ta dz+nyA na ma si
139a4(rgyud): ming nyid rab tu sbyar te/ lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig/ bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig/ rgyal po dang / me dang / dgra dang / seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig/ bdag
139a5(rgyud): dus thams cad du phun sum tshogs par grub par gyis shig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM A lo/ kA lo/ tA lo/ sats+tsha lo/ sarba rmArti/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ sarba b+ha yeSh+Ta swA hA/ dkon mchog
139a6(rgyud): gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i/ oM ba rA li/ bat+tA li/ bat+tA lI/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sarba dudz+nyAn mu khaM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ dus thams cad du legs par srung bar 'gyur ro// bskul
139a7(rgyud): tshig bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi ni/ rgya mtsho gsum ni mtshon brjod pa'i/ oM dang bcas pa'i snying po dang / nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa dang / yi ge drug pa ni 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed do// snying po'i
139b1(rgyud): sngags 'di 'dzin na blo rno bar byed do// gleng gzhi dang bcas pa sngags 'di bcas pa byas na/ nor dang / 'bru dang / g.yog 'khor 'phel bar byed pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do// don de sgrib
139b2(rgyud): par 'dod pas thang ka 'am/ shing le ba la bris sku bya ba ni mya ngan med pa'i shing gi sdong po'i rtsar pad+ma la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ljang khu dang / ang ga rag sngon po dang /
139b3(rgyud): stod g.yogs sngon po dang / mgo bo na mchod rten yod pa/ gzhon nu ma g.yon pa'i phyogs su gzigs pa'i spyan can/ mya ngan med pa'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// sngon du bstan
139b4(rgyud): pa'i cho gas thang sku 'di mdun du blta zhing mchog tu sgrub pa'i snying po bzlas pa stong bya'o// oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o// mchog gi snying po 'di nges par mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//
139b5(rgyud): rims thams cad med par byed do// nad thams cad med par byed do// bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg gis kyang 'od zer can gyis nor 'phel ba skyed par byed do// zho dang ngur ba gnyis kyi sbyin
139b6(rgyud): sreg gis ni nges par nad med par byed do// sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po rnams dbang du byed do// zho dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin mo 'grub
139b7(rgyud): par byed do// tsha ba'i mar dang nim pa'i yal ga stong gi sbyin sreg gis ni rims med par byed do// rang gi khrag dang / rus pa dang / dug dang / ske tshe stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas pas dgra bo
140a1(rgyud): 'chi'o// 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhi bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas na dug 'joms par byed cing 'bad pa med par mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms so// nyi ma re re brgya rtsa
140a2(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na 'dzin blo rno bar 'gyur ro// oM ba rA li/ ba dA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA naM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mu khaM swA hA/ 'od zer can gyi snying po'o// oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
140a3(rgyud): ma 'od zer can gyi gsang ba'i snying po yi ge drug pa'o// snying po'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par byas la thal mo rnam par sbyar bar byas pa 'am kha phye ba'ang rung ste/ mtheb
140a4(rgyud): chen cung zad bkug ste gung mo gnyis phan tshun reg la zlum po'i rnam pa mtshan mar byas la/ skyil mo krung du gnas pas lte ba'i phyogs su gtugs par bya'o// phyag rgya 'di mchog gtso bo ste/
140a5(rgyud): las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya'i// tha ma dang ni 'bring la yang // mchog rnams la yang 'di bstan no// myur du 'di yis don byed cing // kun tu grub cing mchod par 'gyur// dag byed bsod
140a6(rgyud): nams chen po ste// bkra shis sdig pa nyams byed cing // bsod nams sdig pa kun zad pa// dngos grub rgyu ni phyag rgya yin// bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ma'i mtshan brgyang brjod na srung ba dang /
140a7(rgyud): skyob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ arka ma si/ marka ma si/ u ra ma ma si/ ba ra ma si/ nr-i ba ra ma si/ mahA nA~M ba ra ma si/ aM tar+d+ha na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba/
140b1(rgyud): dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA hA mu khi sar+b+ba d+han+ta pra duSh+TA n+te/ mu khaM ban d+ha ban d+hA sAhA/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod las phyung ba'i rtog pa ni 'di yin no// de nas sbyor ba gzhan ni 'di yin te/ gser/
140b2(rgyud): mdog can gyi phag pa bsgoms la/ de'i steng du 'ad zer can gos dkar po'i sham thabs can bsgom par bya'o// de'i spyi bor mchod rten dang / g.yon pa'i phyag gis mya ngan med pa'i yal ga me
140b3(rgyud): tog dang bcas pa'i phyag can no// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus su'ang bdag nyid phag pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya'o// snying khar chos gos kyi sne'u bzung ste/ lan bdun du/
140b4(rgyud): bsngags la mdud pa mdun byas na lam du rkun ma la sogs pas rloms par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mdud pa yongs su bkrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can gyi rtog/
140b5(rgyud): pa rdzogs so// // rang gi snying khar zla ba la laM rnam par bsams la/ de nyid yid kyis brjod pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de nas
140b6(rgyud): yang nam mkha'i phyogs su bsam pa ni/ bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs pad+ma'i lte bar seng ldeng gi khri la rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ gser gyi mdog can byang chub mchog
140b7(rgyud): gi phyag rgya can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang zhing zhi ba yi ge mAM nyid kyis brjod pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de nas mdun du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang
141a1(rgyud): mdzad kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i 'od zer can ma/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya bas gser gyi mdog can gyi skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'i phyag gis gdug pa can gyi kha
141a2(rgyud): dang mig yang dag par drubs pa mdun du rnam par bsam par bya'o// bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig la rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rig pa lan cig yongs su bzlas pa na/ de nas/
141a3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mA rI ts+yai ba ta ye/ hr-i da ya A bar+Na ye Sh+Ta/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ti/ ti li/ pa ta ti la~M/ pra ta ti li/ bA ra li/ ba rA ha mA khi sarba duSh+Tapra duSh+TAnA/ tsak+Shur mu kha~M/ ban d+ha
141a4(rgyud): swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di bzlas te/ na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ mA rI ts+yai de ba tA ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+tA le/ ba dA li/ ba rA l-i/ b.rA ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta
141a5(rgyud): gre thi bi d+hI ma swA hA/ zhes bya ba brjod do// de skud pa la rang nyid bsrung ba'i ched du mdud pa bdun bya'o// g.yog po'i ched du bya ste/ ming yongs su gzung ba'i sbyor bas mdud pa gcig bya'o//
141a6(rgyud): 'gro ba dang 'ong bas skud pa de rked pa la bcings te/ gleng gzhi dang bcas pa'i 'od zer can gyi rig pa bklag ste mdun du 'gro bar bya'o// de ltar byas na rang bzhin gyis srung bar 'gyur ro//
141a7(rgyud): nuchuthu mo bdun du zla ba la/ nyin mo ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du rang gi gnas su bya'o// de'i rjes su ji ltar gsungs pa'i rig pa lan bdun du brjod par bya ste/ nam sar+b+ba
141b1(rgyud): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa b+h+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM A lo/ kA lo/ tA lo/ sats+tsha lo/ sarba mud+d+hi/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba b+ha ye Shu ye swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o// tad+ya thA/
141b2(rgyud): oM mA rI ts+yai bat+tA ta li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mu khaM swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na pra duSh+Ta nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha
141b3(rgyud): mU kha~M swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i mchog nges par 'di yin no// oM mA rI ts+yai pa dA kra ma si/ pa rA kra ma si/ u dA ya ma sI/ nI ra ma saM/ arkam
141b4(rgyud): sitamarka ma si/ urma ma si/ ban+da ma si/ gul+ma ma si/ tsI ba ra ma si/ ma hA ts+tshi ba ra ma si/ aM tar+d+ha na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+ta laM/ ba dA li/ be rA li/ ba rA ha ma?/
141b5(rgyud): khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TAnAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mu khaM swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i mchog ni nges par 'di yin no// oM mA rI ts+yai pa dA kra ma si/ pA ra kra ma si//
141b6(rgyud): u da ya ma sr-i/ nai ra ma si/ arka ma sI/ marka ma si/ urma ma saM/ baM d+ha ma si/ gulpA ma si/ tsi bA rA ma si/ ma hA tsi ba rA ma si/ aM tar+d+ha na ma si/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bat+ta/
141b7(rgyud): l-i/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nA~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sAhA/ oM bat+tA la~M/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu kha~M/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta nAM/ tsak+Shu mu khi ban d+ha mi swA hA/ zhes bya'o//
142a1(rgyud): oM bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mra khi/ sar+b+ba dun+da pra dud+d+hA nAM/ ga d+ha bad+hi ma swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// rang nyid srung ba'i don du sngags 'di bya ste/ oM aHma
142a2(rgyud): sbyi swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang oM marka ma sa~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM a tar+tha nam sa~M swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM he jom si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM ud yA ma sa~M swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang /
142a3(rgyud): oM gu wa ma s+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang // oM bi na ma si swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM tsi ba ram swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM bad+hU the ma si swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM pa rA kA ma si sAr+b+ba/ zhes
142a4(rgyud): ba dang / oM urma ma si swA hA/ zhes bya'o// de nas las gzhan yin te/ mchog tu gyur pa'i sngags ni/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di'i las ni zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang /
142a5(rgyud): mngon spyod dang / dgug pa'o// bdag gi don du snying khar tri dang spel ba'i snying po oM dang spel ba byas la/ mgal ma'i 'khor lo la gnas pa lcags kyu dang zhags pas dgug par bya ba ni dpag tshad
142a6(rgyud): brgya yin du zin kyang lha rdzas kyi bud med 'gugs par byed do// de nas sbyor ba gzhan yin te/ nyi ma 'char ka'i tshe bya ste/ gzhon nu ma la sngags brgya bzlas te ba'i lcibs dkyil 'khor byas la
142a7(rgyud): gzhag par bya ste/ tsan dan dkar pos yan lag zugs la/ me tog dang legs par khrus byas shing gos dkar po bson la gu gral gyi 'dug pa sbyin te mthe long la rgya skyegs dang mar nag gis bkras
142b1(rgyud): pa la sngags brkyang brgya 'thas te dbang bskur ba bstan par bya'o// b+ha la sogs pa thams cad sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul te/ oM tsi ri tsi ri mu swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni sngags so// oM mA ga sngagaH/
142b2(rgyud): 'dis mar me la brgyad brgya mngon par bsngags nas gzhon nu ma la bstan par byas na sngon bzhin du mngon par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang thos pa ni/ oM
142b3(rgyud): ba tA li yaM muH/ sngags 'di khri tsho gcig bzlas te bstan par bya'o// yang na dgra bo rims kyis gzung bar 'dod na mi'i rus pa'i phye ma dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / chu bo'i ngogs gnyis kyis
142b4(rgyud): dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul dang bcas pa la gzugs brnyan byas te/ dug dang / me dang / ske tshe dang / nyin phyed dang / 'o ma dang ldan pa dur khrod kyi ras la sngags dang spel ba bris
142b5(rgyud): bzhin pa byas te/ oM mA rI ts+yai che ge mo rims kyis zung zhig zung zhig hUM phaT swA hA zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dgra bo'i khang par sbas na rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang
142b6(rgyud): na thod pa la sngon du bstan pa'i rdzas nyid kyis ming bris te yi ge a bzhi nang du bcug nas me'i nang du'ang maM gyis yongs su bskor la/ khros pas seng ldeng gi me la bdug par bya'o//
142b7(rgyud): steng nas skye ba bcings pa'i thod pa dgra bo'i khang par sbas na 'phral du rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang na dur khrod du bya'o// de nas dgra bo gsad par 'dod na drug dang / tshang
143a1(rgyud): ske tshe dang / khrag gis mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus thod pa la mang mngon par bris te hUM dang phaT gnyis kyi nang du bcug na gsod par 'gyur ro// sngags kyis
143a2(rgyud): yongs su bskor bar bya ste/ oM mA rI ts+yai hUM che ge mo sod cig hU~M/ zhes bya ba stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod du bris na ni zhag gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur ro//
143a3(rgyud): yang nA skrod par 'dod na/ oM mA ri ts+yai tsa la tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ shI g+h+raM ga mi ni che ge mo skrod cig hUM phaT/ sngags 'di bya rog gi ga shog pa blangs la stong phrag brgya bzla sa te/ dgra
143a4(rgyud): bo'i khyim du 'bad pas sba bar byas la/ rnga mo'i steng du zhon pa bsgom par byas na de ma thag tu skrod par byed do// yang na dbye bar 'dod na dur khyod kyi thal ba dang / chu klung gi ngogs
143a5(rgyud): gnyis kyi sa dang / rkang rjes kyi sa dang / yang dag par bstan pas so sor gzugs brnyan byas la rgyab spad de/ ma he'i sha dang rta'i mgo spus legs par bcings la/ dug dang /
143a6(rgyud): ske tshe dang / tsha ba gsum gyis lus byugs la/ de nyid dang / ma he'i sha dang / rta'i khrag dang ldan pas dur khrod kyi ras la phaT bzhi'i dbus su hUM gis spel ba'i ming bris la/ mu
143a7(rgyud): gyis yongs su bskor la de'i snying khar bcug ste sngags bzlas shing / ma he dang rta gnyis la zhon pa gnyis ka'ang 'thab bzhin rnas par bsams na dbye bar byed do// 'phrog byed dang dka' bzlog/
143b1(rgyud): mdang bcas pas dur khrod dus brkos la sra'o// oM mA rI ts+yai che ge mo dang che ge mo phye zhig hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni sngags so// de nas sbyor ba gzhan ni ma he'i rwa dang rta'i rus pa la gzugs pa na/
143b2(rgyud): byas te/ drug dang / gtum po'i sa bon dang / mdo'i sha dang / rtswa'i khrag gis snying khar ming mngon par bris la sngags brla zhing / seng ldeng gi me la gdugs na de ma thag tu 'byed par
143b3(rgyud): byed do// yang na dgra bo'i khyim du sbas na'ang 'byed par byed do// de yang dag par brjod par bya ba ni 'od zer can chen po 'byung ba'i rgyud las byung ba ni dgra'i dpung rengs par byed pa'i tshig/
143b4(rgyud): ston te/ kha cig tu rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs g.yos par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyi yul khams phung bar byed par brtson na/ gang gi tshe de la rgyal po 'ongs nas slar byed cing mchod de sngags
143b5(rgyud): pa la gsol ba 'debs na/ de'i tshe slob dpon gyis sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse bas byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin bya'o// de la 'tsheg chas dgos pa thams cad dang ldan
143b6(rgyud): zhing legs pa'i grogs pos de ched du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang skya bkram la/ tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la me tog dkar po bkram pa/ bdug spos dang / dri
143b7(rgyud): dang / 'phreng ba dang / gtor ma'ang byin la/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang ldan pas lan bdun du bsngags la dbul bar bya'o// sngags ni/ oM mA rI ts+yai anaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM mA rI
144a1(rgyud): ts+yai gan+d+ha pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai praSh+pe pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM mA rI ts+yai d+hU paM pra tI tsA swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai dA paM pra tIts+tsha sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod cing yongs su bsngo ste
144a2(rgyud): dgyes par byas la/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i gzugs su dmigs shing rang nyid nga rgyal dang ldan pas khri phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o// de'i sngon du song ba'i bsten pa yin te/ mi dge ba'i mtshan
144a3(rgyud): ma mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyis ni sbyin sreg bya ste/ sngon du bstan pa'i tsho gas las thams cad pa'i thab khung du rgya skyegs kyi shing dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / u dum wa ra'i yam shing gis me
144a4(rgyud): sbyar la/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar du bsgrags pa'i ngur ba nyag ma re re rnams stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// oM bat+tA li/ bdA li/ ba rA li/ 58
144a5(rgyud): mr-i khi sar+b+ba ri pra s+yai b+h+yaM staM b+ha ya swA hA/ 'di ni rengs par byed pa'i sngags te rengs pa'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// sngags 'dis bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg kyang bya'o// phyis ni rgyal po dang mdun na
144a6(rgyud): 'don ni gro ga 'am/ ras la gur kum mam/ gi'u wang dag gis bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags spel te mA~M gyis dkris pa'ang yi ge bzhis yongs su bskor te/ oM maM baM maM/ phyi rol tu ba'i yi ges
144a7(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo 'di bris la/ gang gi spyi gtsug gam/ mgul pa 'am/ dpung pa la btags na las thams cad nyid la srung ba byed pa yin no// g.yul ngor zhugs na mtshon
144b1(rgyud): chas lus la mi chod par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo las de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang phyis ni mchog tu gyur pa'i glang po che 'am/ mchog tu gyur pa'i shing rta la rdo rje slob dpon zhon te/ g.yun
144b2(rgyud): la mngon par phyogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku bkram la rgyal mtshan ser po btsugs te ras ser po'i sham thabs dang ser po'i thod bcings te/ 'chog chas rdo rje dril bu gzung
144b3(rgyud): zhing bsnyen pa dang bcas pas sngon bzhin phag pa'i shing rta la bsgoms la sngags brjod par bya'o// oM mA rI ts+yai bat+ta li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ ba rA ha mu khi sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ri pu s+ye staM b+ha ya hUM phaT/
144b4(rgyud): swA hA/ phag pas bskor ba'i nang du bsgom na de ma thag tu dgra'i dpung tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis bsad pa'i mi shi ba'i ro gos sam/ dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo 'di
144b5(rgyud): ba bla 'am/ yung ba'i khubs bris te chu bo'i ngogs gnyis kyi sa 'am/ ri'i rtse mo'i sa 'am/ drar khros kyi thal ba dang ldan pas dgra'i dpon gyi gzugs brnyan byas la 'khor lo de'i snying khar
144b6(rgyud): bcug la/ yang sa de dang lhan cig tu 'bras sA lu'i khu ba la yung ba'i khu ba dang ldan pas phag pa'i gzugs byas la/ de'i kha ru dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan kha thur du bstan la bcug ste/ phag
144b7(rgyud): pa de kham kyong kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug la song ste/ dgra'i dpung la sngon du kha bltas pas gzhag par bya'o// zan dang / nyadang / sha rlon pa dang ldan par gtor ma byin la sor brgyad pa'i seng
145a1(rgyud): ldeng gi phur zlas btab las banos te bzlas la/ sngags stong phrag brgyad rdo zla zla bar stobs dang ldan pas bzlas pa byas na dgra ba'i dpung rengs par 'gyur ro// de nas/
