173a6(rgyud): yig bzhi po dbye byas la// de nyid sbyor bas 'od zer can// dbang po de nyid bsgom par bya// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan gnas shing // sna tshogs gos ni 'chang ba dang // sgeg pa la sogs
173a7(rgyud): ro dang ldan// brgyad kyi phyed kyi phyag gis brgyan// g.yon na zhags pa yal bsnams// g.yas na rdo rje lcags kyu phyag/ snying khar phyag rgya sngags ldan pas// bltas na dngos grub thob/
173b1(rgyud): par byed// bskyed rim rdzogs rim sbyor ba yis// rang gi de nyid rdzogs byas la// yi gi grangs 'bum bzlas bsgom bya// de nas de nyid gsum dbye bas// stong phrag khre bo sbyin
173b2(rgyud): sreg bya// de nas cho 'phrul zla nya dus// dngos grub kun ster dkyil 'khor du// 'khrugs la rgya che'i mchod pa byas// stong phrag brgyas ni bzlas byas na// nges par dngos grub tu ni 'gyur//
173b3(rgyud): de nas de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ma'i las gzhan gyi sgrub pa yin te kham kyong gnyis la mAM yig gi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming spel bar byas la thal bas kham kyong bkang ste/ skud
173b4(rgyud): pa ser pos dkris la 'og ma'i steng nas rdo rjes mnan pa gsang bar bzhag ste/ rtsa ba'i rig pa ba dA li la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas na gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro yang 'jigs pa/
173b5(rgyud): dang skrag pa thams cad las grol bar byed do// tad+ya thA/ arka ma si/ marka ma si/ urma ma si/ ba na ma si/ u dA ya ma si/ gulpA ma si/ tsI ba ra ma si/ ma hA n+ni ba ra ma si/ aM tar+d+ha nam
173b6(rgyud): si swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM A ra li/ ha lo ka ni/ sats+tsha lo/ sar+b+ba mU rti/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ oM mA rI ts+yai/ de ba tA yai/ ba rA le/ ba dA le/ ba rA ha mu khaM
173b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta nAM/ mu khe be d+ha naM ku ru swA hA/ sngon gyi sa bon gyi nang du sgrub pa po bskur tshig dang ldan pa'i ming bris la sa bon gyi phyi rol du rig pa 'dzin pa brgyad dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang bcas pa zi
174a1(rgyud): bar bya'o// thams cad du yi ge'i mgo nang du byas te ma tra gsum gyis dkris la skyes pa la ni gro ga la gur kum gyis bris shing bud med la ni ga ro tsa na la bri bar bya'o// yang /
174a2(rgyud): na gos la bris nas rig pa 'chang bas rig pa bcangs nas 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / gzhan rnams kyis kyang gnon par mi nus so//
174a3(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa'i sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob bo// gdug pa can rnams 'ching bar 'dod na sngon du bstan pa'i sa bon gyi lte ba ra ban d+ha bi na zhes bya ba'i bskul tshig dang ldan pas bsgrub bya /
174a4(rgyud): ming mngon par bris te/ thal ba'i phye mas bkang ba'i kham kyong kha sbyor byas te dben pa'i gnas su bzhag par byas na gdug pa can rnams bcings par 'gyur ro// gsad pa la aM de nyid
174a5(rgyud): kyang bris/ dur khrod kyi ras la bI ti de de nyid du sla'o// mthong bar byed pa ni sngon du bstan pa'i sa bon gyi lte bar bdag gi de nyid sprin sngon po lta bur lta'o// 'phro zhing 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bur/
174a6(rgyud): blta ste yi ge'i grangs kyi 'bum bzlo'o// de nas bzung ste gang du'ang thogs pa med do// thams cad kyis mi shes par bya bar 'dod na sngon du bstan pa'i sa bon gyi lte bar ba tA li la sogs pa/
174a7(rgyud): sngags zis la/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang bcas pa kham kyong kha sbyor gyi nang du bzhag ste srung ba ser pos dkris la/ dbar po dang ser po 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i me tog gis mchod la dben pa'i gnas/
174b1(rgyud): su bzhag ste/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas gang 'dod pa der 'gro'ang gdug pa can thams cad rmongs nas gnas pa yin te de mi mthong ngo // sngon du bstan pa'i sa bon gyi lte bar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
174b2(rgyud): pa/ de'i dbus su ba tA li la sogs pa'i sngags rengs par gyis shig ces bya ba'i bskul tshig dang bcas pa kham kyong la sogs pa la bris te bsgrub bya ser po 'bar zhing 'khrug pa'i 'od kyis
174b3(rgyud): nam mkha' khyab par dmigs la/ dben pa'i gnas su bzhag ste me tog ser pos mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na rkun ma rnams dang / g.yul ngo'i mtshon dang / dug dang / me dang
174b4(rgyud): gzhan gyi dpung la sogs pa dgos pa ni the tshom med par rengs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma mchog tu gsang ba las thams cad yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo yin te/ sngon du
174b5(rgyud): bstan pa'i sa bon gyi lte bar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa byas te/ de la rtsibs brgyad pa go rims bzhin du arka ma si la sogs pa'i rig pa brgyad bris la/ ba rA li la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags
174b6(rgyud): bskul tshig dang bcas pa phyi rol gyi mu khyud la bri'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la rig pa'i lha mo bri'o// dbus su ni bskul tshig dang bcas pa'i ming bris te/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang /
174b7(rgyud): dbang dang / dgug pa dang / gsad pa dang / bskrad pa dang / rengs pa dang / dbye ba dang / mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las byed na mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang gis rig pa'i rgyal
175a1(rgyud): mo phyogs skyong ma chen mo 'dis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sgrub pa po rnams gang 'dod pa byed do// 'phags ma 'od zer can ma rig pa'i rgyal mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i//
175a2(rgyud): 'khor lo rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ 'od zed can gyi rtog pa mchog/ dang po gur kum gyis gro ga la bcom ldan 'das ma g.yas g.yon gnyis
175a3(rgyud): kyis rdo rje phag mo'i zhal sngon po'i zhal 'jigs pa zis la/ 'o ma'i nang du bcug la dkar pos mchod cing gos dkar po bris pa ni zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas pa la ni gi'u wang dang mar bsres pas/
175a4(rgyud): bris la kham kyong kha sbyor gyi nang du bzhag ste chu'i nang du bcug na rgyas par 'gyur ro// nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i ras la ka ra wI ra'i sbu gus gi'u wa nga la mngar gsum gyi/
175a5(rgyud): nang du bcug ste sngags bzlas pa byas na nye bar 'tshe ba chen po las thar par 'gyur ro// mngon spyod kyi las la ni drar khrod kyi ras samatshon gyis bcad pa'i ras la dug la sogs pas bris te chu ngogs/
175a6(rgyud): kyi sa dang / rgyal po'i sgo'o sa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i sa dang / glang bu'i rwa la 'byung ba'i sa dang / bsgru 'bya'i chu btang ba'i sa'o// sa lnga las bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ de'i nang du
175a7(rgyud): bcug la tsha ba'i mar gyis byugs te dur khrod du sbas la/ he ru ka g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas shing khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas
175b1(rgyud): na de ma thag tu 'chi'o// yang na seng ldeng gi phur bu sa btab la dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar byas na de ma thag tu 'chi'o// skrod pa yin na ras de nyid la bya rog gi smyu gus khyi'i 'o ma dang / du du/
175b2(rgyud): ra'i khu ba dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba dang bsres pas bri'o// 'bras kyi khu ba la gzugs brnyan byas te de'i nang du lam gyi bzhi mdor brkos te sbas la/ gshin rdzo gshed kyi sngags kyi rnal
175b3(rgyud): 'byor gyi bzlas pa dran na/ dpag tshad brgya yin yang mi gnas so// dbye ba ni gos de la 'ug pa'i sgo'i smyu gus de nyid kyi sol bas 'khor lo la sogs pa bris la chu ngogs gnyis kyi lho'i
175b4(rgyud): phyogs kyis blangs la/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la de'i nang du bcug ste/ de nas gnyis rgyab sprad la sgra'i the gu dkri bar bya'o// dur khrod du bzhag la de'i steng du lci ba'i nya la nyi la la
175b5(rgyud): dur khrod kyi shing gi mes sro zhing gdung bar byas na/ de ma thag tu 'phrog byed dang chung ma'ang 'byed par byed na/ sa gzhi'i skye 'gro'i bud med lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rengs par byed na gos
175b6(rgyud): de nyid la yung bas bris la khu ba ser po la byas pa'i rje btsun ma'i lto bar gzhug pa ni de las pa'i bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bcug ste/ me tog ser pos mchod na zhag bdun gyis dgra chen po'ang
175b7(rgyud): rengs par byed do// gzhan gyi dpung rengs par byed na de gnyis kyi gos la byi ba'i khrag gis yal ga bdun gyi sbu gus bris la/ de la phyugs kyi rwas bton pa'i sa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i
176a1(rgyud): sa dang / rgyal po'i sgo'i sa dang / chu klung gi ngogs gnyis kyi sa las tshogs bdag byas te/ de'i lto bar bcug nas lam gyi bzhi mdor brkos te sba sa la khams
176a2(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rnal 'byor gyis sngags 'di bzla bar bya'o// dgug pa ni bud med kyi thod pa la gi'u wang dang phag pa'i tshal bya mchil pa'i gshog pa'i sbu gus bris la sa la ma
176a3(rgyud): lhung ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la sgra'i tha gu ldan pas der bzhag na 'gugs par byed do// bskul tshig dang bcas pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o// ril pos 'gugs pa la ni de kho na
176a4(rgyud): bzhin du bris la/ de'i steng du seng ldeng gi me la gdung bar byas na dpag tshad brgya na gnas kyang 'gugs so// skyes pa ni de nyid kyi thod pa la sngon bzhin du bya'o// char med pa'i dus su u/
176a5(rgyud): dum pa ra'i shing leb la tsan dan dkar po la rma bya'i sgo'i sbu gus 'khor lo zis la/ 'og tu klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs grog mkhar gyi sas byas la dri zhim po'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rdzing
176a6(rgyud): bu ra ba zhag la/ ka ra wI ra dang nA ga pus pa'i mchod pa bya'o// nA ga pus pa'i phye ma dang gu gul gyi bdug spos bsregs la/ stobs po che'i rnal 'byor gyis gnas la bsgrub bya'i
176a7(rgyud): sngags kyis yi ge mu'i mtha' can du bzlas shing / shing le ba de nyid bzung zhing bcom ldan 'das ma'o ma'i mtshor gshegs mar bsams na 'phral du char 'bebs so// yang na gal te
176b1(rgyud): char mi 'bebra na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ma la blo dang ldan pas gtum po'i sa bon gyis bsnun par bya'o// rengs pa la ni kha 'og tu bltas la bzhag ste thal bas bsnun par bya'o//
176b2(rgyud): phan tshun du mthun par bya ba'i sbyor ba ni ma taM ga'i ras la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang ku sha'i khu bas 'khor lo bris la/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te skud pa dang lcags kyu bzung ba'i brda
176b3(rgyud): mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis sa la drud par bya'o// gzhan yang rig sngags gcod pa'i thun mong gi ra sa la chu shing gi lo ma'i khu bas chus khyer ba'i shing gi sbu gus 'khor lo bri sa la
176b4(rgyud): gcer bu skra grol bzhi pa'i gnas su 'khor los sgyur ba lta bu'i go 'phang gi rgyal mtshan gyi mgo la bzhugs su gsol lo// bcings pa la ni sa la sogs pa la sgrub pa byas la
176b5(rgyud): zhi ba'i gnas su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i dbus su byi la'i khrag gis 'khor lo bris la/ de'i nang du bcug ste ma mo'i khang par sba sa na phan tshun 'bye zhing mi mthun pa chen por 'gyur/
176b6(rgyud): ro// rmongs par bya ba la ni thod le kor gyis byugs pa la dug gis sbrul bris te/ sbrul mgo gsum pa g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas mdun du dgra la bsdigs pa/ zla ba
176b7(rgyud): dang nyi ma gnyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu g.yas skor du bsgom par bya'o// spel tshig dang bcas pa'i sngags bzlas te dbyug pa'i steng gi rtse mo la rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ 'og gi rtse mo
177a1(rgyud): la rdo rje rtse gcig pa byas na rkun ma la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro// dbyug pa che zhing 'jigs pa chen po la khyer zhing yi ge drug pa bzlas na
177a2(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// 'og tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor a las skyes pa der bdag nyid yib par bya'o// 'od zer can
177a3(rgyud): bdag la skyobs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa sngon du bstan pa'i sngags bzlas pa bya'o// zla ba dang nyi ma phan tshun 'od zer gnyis 'dres pa ni 'jigs pa thams cad kyi dus su'o//
177a4(rgyud): nyal ba'i dus su mal stan la 'dug ste tsa'i yi ge mngon par bris la rkang pa g.yon par bzhag ste mi bskyod pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas ni rkun mas mi tshugs te bcings nas rmongs
177a5(rgyud): nas 'dug go// yang na bcom ldan 'das ma ni las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i mdog yin te dbang la ni dmar po phyag gnyis pa gzhu dang mda' bsnams pa'i phyag nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
177a6(rgyud): gnas pa'o// zhi ba la ni dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ gcig na mchog sbyin pa/ gnyis pa na rdo rje dang / g.yon pa'i dang po na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga/ gnyis pa na mi 'jigs
177a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa'o// rgyas pa la ni phyag bzhi pa/ cung zad dkar ba/ phyag gnyis pa na dgra sta dang nags pa bsnams pa'o// bcings pa grol bar byed pa ni/
177b1(rgyud): ljang khu phyag gnyis pa/ zhags pa dang dgra sta bsnams pa'o// mngon spyod la ni nag mo phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na ral gri dang / phyag gzhan tho ba'o// g.yon natho ba'o// gzhan
177b2(rgyud): sdigs mdzub bo// skrod pa la ni du ba'i mdog can/ phyag gnyis pa/ zhags pa dang dgra sta'i phyag go// dbye ba la ni sngon mo phyag bzhi pa g.yas na ral gri dang dbyug pa/ g.yon
177b3(rgyud): thod pa dang mya ngan med do// rengs pa la mdog ser ba/ phyag drug pa/ g.yas na rdo rje dang / khab dang / mda'/ g.yon na zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / mya ngan med pa'i
177b4(rgyud): yal ga'o// gzhan gyi dpung rengs par byed pa la gzugs 'bar zhing 'khrug pa mi bzad pa phyag bcu gnyis pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag mtshan 'chang ba/ zhal drug pa zhabs
177b5(rgyud): drug pa/ dang po'i zhal dmar po/ g.yas nag po/ g.yon pa dkar po cung zhig khro ba dang bcas shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal lo// g.yon pa ser po cung zhig bzhad pa'i zhal/
177b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhal g.yon pa'o// steng du ni phag pa'i zhal lo// g.yas pa na ni mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / mnga' dang / dbyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / ral gri bsnams pa'o//
177b7(rgyud): g.yon gyi dang po na sdigs mdzub dang / mya ngan med kyi yal ga dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / thod pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / mi mgo 'chang ba'o// dgug pa la ni dkar po phyag bzhi pa
178a1(rgyud): zhal gsum pa/ g.yas na lcags kyu dang mnga'/ g.yon na zhags pa dang thod pa'o// dbu ma ni gser lta bu'i mdog/ g.yas pa ni gnag pa/ g.yon dmar ba/
178a2(rgyud): phan tshun mi mthun par byed pa'i dus su zhal gnyis ni nag po ste/ rta dang phag gi zhal lo// g.yas na ral gri dang rtse gsum rdo rje'o// g.yon pa na yi dgas dang thod pa'o// de ltar gnyis ka
178a3(rgyud): yang ste/ gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang mya ngan med kyi sdong po la brten pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya ma sa tsa~M te/ ba tA ye/ hr-id ya brta bya ba med/ tad+ya thA/
178a4(rgyud): bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ bA rA ha mu khi sar+b+ba duSh+TA nAM tsak+Shu rmu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ hriHhUM phaT swA hA/ ma'i yi ge las kha ru zlum/
178a5(rgyud): po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// sa'i yi ge las mgo bo dang rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// tsa'i yi ge snying khar bsgom par bya'o// bat+tA li ni dpung pa g.yas pa la'o// ba dA li ni g.yon pa'i/
178a6(rgyud): dpung pa la'o// ba rA li ni g.yas pa'i pus mo la'o// ba rA ha mu khi ni g.yon pa'i pus mo la'o// sar+b+ba duSh+Ta nAM tsak+Shu pU khaM be d+ha bi d+ha ni g.yas pa'i gzhogs la'o// dza b+ha ya dza b+ha ya ni rgyab
178a7(rgyud): tu'o/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya ni g.yon pa'i gzhogs la'o// mo ha ya mo ha ya ni nu ma gnyis kyi bar la'o// hrIHni yan lag thams cad la dgod do// hUM ni gsal bar byas pa la'o//
178b1(rgyud): phaT ni long bar byed pa'o// swA hA ni tshim par byed pa'o// thal mo mnyam par byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis kyi bar du bzhag pa ni yan lag gi phyag rgya ste/ 'di yis/
178b2(rgyud): yan lag thams cad la cho ga bya'o// 'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las mchog tu shin tu'ang snying por gyur pa'i 'od zer can gyi rtog pa brgya phrag bdun
178b3(rgyud): pa phyung ba rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA dza ya ba ti nA ma ma hA bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal
178b4(rgyud): mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags/
178b5(rgyud): ri la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'byung po rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas ma dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
178b6(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te/ dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang /
178b7(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma rnams gang dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de/ de dag la gnod par byed pa de'i tshe ku co'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to//
179a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi nas glog las ser ba dang
179a2(rgyud): char chen 'bab pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nus kyang rdo rje 'chang la brda mdzad do// de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te stan las langs nas shar phyogs
179a3(rgyud): su rdo rje 'bar ba sdong mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis
179a4(rgyud): brlabs 'di bya'o// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung po gtum po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ngas
179a5(rgyud): rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bya'o// taH b+hU/ gi rA ga ri badz+ra/ ha la ha la badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ han ha na badz+ra/ da had ha 'adz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ sarba ng+kutAnA
179a6(rgyud): ma b+h+ra ma yA b+h+ra mA ya/ b+ho d+ho badz+ra d+ha ra badz+re NA/ pA ta ya pA tA yA/ shrIg+h+nAn shI g+h+nA na/ ma b+hU ma thA/ pra ma tha thA ma thA/ d+hu trUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wa la ya/ nA ga b+ha ba nan ban d+ha ban d+ha/
179a7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thar/ shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje snying po 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o// su zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro// snying
179b1(rgyud): 'gas par 'gyur ro// snying 'grum par 'gyur ro// badz+rA ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+rA ya swA hA/ badz+ra b+hai ra bA ya swA hA/ a pra ti ha ta ba la par tho mo badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje khro bo stan/
179b2(rgyud): las langs te lho phyogs su rnam par bltas nas khros te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po deng nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams
179b3(rgyud): cad thal bar brlag go/ lus srul po thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o// klu thams cad kyi gnas rnams dkrug par bya'o// yang smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
179b4(rgyud): bdag gis rdo rje lha ma yin dang klu thams cad nas/ lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje
179b5(rgyud): rmongs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ lce 'bab par byed pa'i rdo rje/ mgo 'gems mar byed pa'i rdo rje/ snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// da ltar byung ba dang ma
179b6(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i dus na klu gnod par sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A bar+N+Na ya/ saM go tsa la/ hUM hUM hUM/ d+hon d+ho na d+ho na/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na
179b7(rgyud): ban d+ha ban d+ha ban d+ha/ sarba pA she na/ mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa ha sa/ san trA sa ya/ sarba duSh+TA nA na badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos/ lag na rdo rje/
180a1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid nag bdag ni
180a2(rgyud): kyang nub phyogs kyi klu thams cad nas/ lus skal po'i bar thams cad kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro// snying rnams dgum mo// tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ tra Ta tA Ta/ b+ha Ta b+ha Ta/
180a3(rgyud): s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya/ du ti da yan sho Sha ya/ gang zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'a
180a4(rgyud): bar byed do// hUM hUM d+h+waM/ badz+ra d+ha ri badz+re Ni/ b+haM dzaHdza/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra drA ti rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa stan las langs
180a5(rgyud): nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba'i bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa bdag gis kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod/
180a6(rgyud): par sems pa nas/ lus srul po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la klog par bgyid do// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog kyang ma
180a7(rgyud): rungs par bgyid pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi mi bzad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ he li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu na
180b1(rgyud): d+hunA/ ma tha ma tha/ ha na han/ da hadA ha/ pA tsa pats+ra/ nA shwA ya nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha ha/ badz+ra drA ti mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ sam+b+ha y+Ya/ sAr+b+bAn+ta bA nAM/ sarba a hi te lan/ badz+ra Ni thung
180b2(rgyud): d+ha me tri/ d+harmas t+ye na/ an+d+ra sa ta ye na/ in+d+ra ba le na/ lo ka pA la/ pra d+hU be na/ dzam+b+ha ya mi/ saMr+b+bA nA ga na swam+b+ha yAM mi/ sarba i ha te Shi NaM/ ba ru Na ba she na/ ban d+ha yA mi/ sarban+ta/
180b3(rgyud): gA na in+d+ra tsi le na/ sarba i he ha Shi Na tsha ga li ka ro mi/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ badz+ra shr-i kha le swA hA/ ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bslus te me tog bkram la/ a ka ru dang
180b4(rgyud): tsan dan gyi 'dug pas bdugs te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu las gang 'dod pa de bya'o// skud pa nag pos ni rim
180b5(rgyud): nad sel to// shing kAr bI ra'i lcug mas ni sprin bzlog go// rgyu'i nang du 'dug na ni dran par bya'o// gcan gabam khro bo'i nang na 'jug na ni gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa bor ro// lto spos na ni tshwa
180b6(rgyud): chus zhi bar byed do// so na ba la skud pas zhi bar byed do// sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya me tog re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor ro// nyi ma 'dran na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur
180b7(rgyud): ro/ Sha na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pa rA kra ma ye/ na maHsarba badz+ra ku la bid+ya/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs/
181a1(rgyud): lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
181a2(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i don dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman
181a3(rgyud): pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i badrag po
181a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya
181a5(rgyud): stong phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ ngas kyang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir bshad kyis/ khyod
181a6(rgyud): kyis zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya bA ha nI ye bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+harma a ba b+hA se ni/ bud+d+ha a d+h+r-i ga me dzA a ba b+hA se sA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
181a7(rgyud): pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa
181b1(rgyud): dang glegs ba ma la yod par gyur pa de'i lus la phyir rgol ba rnams kyis dpag tshad brgya tshun chad gnod par byar mi chud ngo // mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad kyis
181b2(rgyud): mi tshugs so// mi'i bdag po dbang po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo // yul 'khor der phyir rgol ba'i dpung gis mi chud par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu
181b3(rgyud): gang la la gzhi gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang / chu dang / dbyig dang / sbyar/
181b4(rgyud): ba las byung ba'i dug gzhan gyis kyang mi tshugs so// dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // de la rnam par 'tshe ba dang mtho 'tsham pa mi 'byung ngo // rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang chom rkun
181b5(rgyud): gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // g.yul ngor zhugs na'ang lus la mtshon gyis mi phog go// thams cad du rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo che ni rgyal ba can 'di'i
181b6(rgyud): gzi brjid dang / mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis thogs pa med cing ma snang ma smas par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza yot+ta ma/ d+harma a
181b7(rgyud): bab+hA sa ni/ bung d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi taM/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba A ba ro s+ya Ni/ dza ya ku su me/ swa re sa re ba ti/ dr-iH dr-i D+hedr-in+ta/
182a1(rgyud): dri D+ha pa sha ni det+te/ mo ha ni mo ha ni/ dza g+ha ni dzan+ta ni/ swam+b+ha ni swam+b+ha ni/ dza d+hi ni dzaHni/ mo ha ni sarba hi te Shi nan/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bud d+ha s+ya mahA kA ru Na/
182a2(rgyud): hA ri Ni sid d+hA na tu me man+ta pA da ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang
182a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / bdag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ dza mdzam
182a4(rgyud): dza ya/ paT paT paT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badz+ra Ni/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha raHra/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ tA ra ta ra/ dza ya ku su ma/ ba la 'al/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya bI Da 5/
182a5(rgyud): a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri Ni/ nI la b+ha sa ni/ badz+ra pra ha ra Ni/ badz+ra saM b+ha be/ badz+ra ki li/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud d+ha rash+mi/ ma hA pra b+ha be/ ud tsaskan d+he/
182a6(rgyud): ma hA te dzeH ti/ a le pa tsa le d+hu na d+hu na/ kaM ka kaM ka re/ ka si ni sa ma he te d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ b+h+ya g+hA te/ badz+ra mA la d+ha ri/ sa ra sa rA sa ra/ kA la ts+tshi ra Ni swA hA/ bcom ldan
182a7(rgyud): 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa lags te/ gang dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyis
182b1(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrab lags so// 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul
182b2(rgyud): bum mam/ grib gnon nam/ brjed byed dam/ gshed byed dam/ byang ngam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis 'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong du'ang gdon gzhan nam/ skem byed kyi gdon
182b3(rgyud): nam/ gshin rje'i gdon yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re badz+re/ hA na badz+ri Ni ha na badz+re Na/ khAd khAng khA da badz+re Ne/
182b4(rgyud): s+phoT s+phoT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badz+re Na/ i daM ga ha/ d+hun+d+rats+tsha/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gras/ pA ta ya pA ta ya pA ta ya/ d+ha me d+ha d+ha me/ d+ha d+hu me/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang /
182b5(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ rgyal bar mdzad ma rgyal bar mdzod cig kata ra
182b6(rgyud): ta ra ma hA ba ta ra Ne/ ku Te ku Te/ mu ku Te/ badz+re ku Te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs
182b7(rgyud): so// sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni sems can chen po lag na rdo rje
183a1(rgyud): khyod yang legs so// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag na yod pa dang / lus la yod pa dang / 'aglegs bam la yod pa dang /
183a2(rgyud): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas na
183a3(rgyud): yod pa der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang 'khor dang bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul de la srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol
183a4(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo // mi ngas mi 'ong ngo // dgra mi 'byung ngo // sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang /
183a5(rgyud): yul de la srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo // dgra mi 'byung ngo // sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'ju
183a6(rgyud): phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu zhing der srung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde
183a7(rgyud): legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spong ba dang / mtshon cha spong ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug gzhig pa dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / mtshams
183b1(rgyud): ga cad pa dang / sa bcings pa byed par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ta pa ne/ ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ d+hu ru me d+hu ru me/ ma hA d+hu ru me/ bud d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/
183b2(rgyud): mu khe mu khe su khe/ swa la pra te sa mA d+hi sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ ma na si/ phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bud d+ha ma na si ka swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang
183b3(rgyud): bskur ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen no// de bzhin pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang
183b4(rgyud): la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la yod par byas te 'chang ngam/ spos dang / 'phreng ba
183b5(rgyud): dang nga byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyis de la bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
183b6(rgyud): du ma dang lhan cig tu mi'i rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing phyi rol rgol ba thams cad las srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// mi'i bdag po dbang po de la dgra dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis
183b7(rgyud): glags mi rnyed do// yul der pha rol gyi dpung mi 'jug go// 'jug na'ang de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par 'gyur te/ bgegs sna tshogs brgya dag dang /
184a1(rgyud): 'gegs sna tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang klung du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba tsam zhes bya ba 'di
184a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du gzhag par bya'o// gang du g.yul 'gyed dam dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di
184a3(rgyud): mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de la gnod pa 'dis gnod par byed de/ de pham par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
184a4(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di su'i mgul du thogs pa de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho
184a5(rgyud): zang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gang du nad 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngam mi bzad pa chen po byung ba der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bres la/
184a6(rgyud): gtor ma'i cho ga gzhong khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/ der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na/ de nas der rgyal po chen po
184a7(rgyud): rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan tu nad 'gro ba dang mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan
184b1(rgyud): 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gong na rig sngag lnga dang ldan pa nga/ ti chem 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba lam/ mahA/
184b2(rgyud): che ba ni gang yang ma mchis te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so// yul gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs
184b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re a ti ta badz+re/ dz+wa li ta badz+re kahu ta sha ni/ b+haM dza b+ha dza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dzam+b+ha dzam+b+ha/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta mra hA NA ma?/
184b4(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sagra sa grA sa/ pa TA pa Ta paT/ ta Ta ta Ta taT/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu ra/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu ra/
184b5(rgyud): khu 'u re/ g+ho ri g+ho ri/ g+ho re/ badz+ra mA na si/ badz+ra hU ti/ pu ru phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi ta shi nan/ su ru me/ mu mu le/ badz+ra pra ti pa ti/ sarba ba le phu swAhA/ a mra
184b6(rgyud): pa la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya sam+b+ha be swA hA/ dza yota ta me swA hA/ dza yan d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya ma ni swA hA/ dza ya badz+ra ya swA hA/ a dzi ti badz+ra ya swA hA/ ma hA hu ta sha nA ya swA hA/ a
184b7(rgyud): mo g+ha badz+ra ha tA ya swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
185a1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la srung ba stsal bar bgyi ste/ yongs su bsgrub pa dang / yongs su gzung ba
185a2(rgyud): dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / dus ma
185a3(rgyud): lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / 'jigs
185a4(rgyud): pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o// mtshams gcad par bya'o// tad+ya b+hU/ dzA ye dza ya dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li mi li/ ma ni si/ dz+yA dz+yA dz+nyA/ dzU ru me/ mu ru mu r+ra
185a5(rgyud): nu tu Tu tu Tu/ mu lu lI swAhA/ mAr+g+ha ba tI d+hi d+hi me be ge/ be ge d+ha ri Ni/ te dzA ma ti/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams
185a6(rgyud): las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing byin gyis
185a7(rgyud): brlabs pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ bud te zad d+he/ bung d+he bud d+he/ bud d+hi bud d+he/ pa tI/ bud d+ha/ a baHsa ni/ d+harbab tA~M/ sa ma hate/ d+harmA d+hi gar+b+he/ bud d+ha bi ha ri/
185b1(rgyud): a ba b+hA sa ne swA hA/ gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid na/ de'i mgo sing d+ha ka bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro//
185b2(rgyud): su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / grong ngam
185b3(rgyud): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang du glegs bam gnas par bgyid na/ der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
185b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'chang de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / dgra rnams las thams cad
185b5(rgyud): du srung ba dang mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams
185b6(rgyud): cad bsal bar bgyi'o// slar ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so//
185b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / bstan pa srung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni sems can chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa khyod yang
186a1(rgyud): legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis sul bsrung ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang
186a2(rgyud): bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so// dug dang / dbyig drug dang / byad dang / gshed byed dang / rims nang nas/ gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de
186a3(rgyud): la mi tshugs so// pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin no// lag/
186a4(rgyud): na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya
186a5(rgyud): pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnod sbyin dang srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa shin tu mi bzang pa dag dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal
186a6(rgyud): po che thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam pa mi bzad pa'i sems dang ldan pa de
186a7(rgyud): ngag dang / sems can sdang ba thams cad kyi don dang / char gcod par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par
186b1(rgyud): byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye gzug khrig 'brum thag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs te blag rgyas btub pa yin no// rig grags kyi rtul mochen ron la brnyan 'a rgyu /
186b2(rgyud): cad kyis phyag byas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i badrag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri'i ming ci lags/
186b3(rgyud): 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung
186b4(rgyud): zhig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/
186b5(rgyud): nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
186b6(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
186b7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban te ye shes sdes bskur cing khrus te gtan la phang pa/
187a1(rgyud): gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ba tI nI nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
187a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu
187a3(rgyud): bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
187a4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
187a5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgon
187a6(rgyud): te rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/
187a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir nga'ang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye ba tI ye/ bud
187b1(rgyud): d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta ye/ d+har+m+ma a 'gyus ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA na a ba b+hA s+ye swAhA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi'o nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams
187b2(rgyud): te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chog 'di dag gang gis lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus la dpag tshad srong tshun chad du phyir
187b3(rgyud): rgol ba gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so// rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor
187b4(rgyud): der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du di'i
187b5(rgyud): lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / chu dang / rims dang / dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
187b6(rgyud): rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / 'thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog/ thams cad du'ang nga rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro// gnod pa
187b7(rgyud): med cing ma snang la ma sbas par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/
188a1(rgyud): dza yotata me/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bung d+ha brad d+ha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha To d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ro b+ha ni dza ya ku su me/
188a2(rgyud): sA re/ sa ba ra tri Di D+he Di D+he/ dadA dri D+ha pA sha ri ba d+he/ oM ha ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ sta ma b+ha ni/ sam b+hi ni/ sarba a ro tiSh+NI Na Na/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ bud d+ha s+ya/ ma hA ka ru Na Na/ bi ha ri Ni/ sing d+han tu man+da
188a3(rgyud): pA de swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
188a4(rgyud): kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/
188a5(rgyud): badz+ra pra ha ra pra ha ra/ pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su meb la ba la/ tsa kra tsa kra/ pI Da ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma/ a kra ma bi kra me bi kra me/
188a6(rgyud): a tsa la ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri Ni nI la ba tI/ badz+ra pra ha ri Ni/ badz+ra saM b+ha be/ badz+ra kA ya/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud d+ha raSh+mi ma ha pra b+he/ ud tsa kan d+he/ ma hA te dza ba tI/ ma tsa le ma tsa le/
188a7(rgyud): d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ka kai re / kA si na~M/ sa mA hi ti/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+ha g+hu De/ badz+ra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa ra/ ka la ka la ba ri Ni sA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags/
188b1(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188b2(rgyud): 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lnga 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ brjed byed dam/ gsod byed ngam/ byang
188b3(rgyud): dam ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong ma'i gdon nam/ skem byed dam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ dri za'i gdon de dag thams rmugs par bgyid so//
188b4(rgyud): rengs par bgyis so// tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re badz+re/ ha na badz+re Ni ha na badz+re/ khA da khA nga badz+re NI/ sA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/ s+pha Ta ya/ badz+re Na/ i daM gra ha na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa
188b5(rgyud): gra sa pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thad pa dang / rtsod pa dang
188b6(rgyud): 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig dza ya kA ri/ dza yaM ku ru/ ta ra ta ra tra ra/ ma hA ta ra Ne/ ku Te ku Te/ ku Te/ badz+ra ku Te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod
188b7(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje sems can chen po khyod sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying
189a1(rgyud): brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa'ang legs so// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste lus la btags sam/ glegs pam la zis
189a2(rgyud): sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chags na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas pa
189a3(rgyud): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul de srung bar 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo // dgra mi 'byung
189a4(rgyud): ngo / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang lhan cig der srung ngo // yongs su skyob bo// yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba dang bde legs su
189a5(rgyud): 'gyur bar byed do// chad pa sdong ngo // mtshon cha spong ngo // dug gsod do// mi mdza' ba 'gog go// mtshams gcod ngo // sa gcod do// tad+ya thA/ ta ba ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni d+hu ru me/
189a6(rgyud): chu ma drAng d+hA a d+hiSh+mi te/ muSh+pe nA khe/ su mra kha/ su mu She/ tha la bra la te/ san+na d+hi te/ sarbA d+hi gar+b+he sarbA d+hi gar+b+he ma nA si/ phu ru pra ru pu ru d+huru/ bud d+ham na si ke sAn+t+ra/ lag na
189a7(rgyud): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis
189b1(rgyud): brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgya ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos
189b2(rgyud): dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
189b3(rgyud): bu gnod sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu srung bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad
189b4(rgyud): kyis glags mi rnyed do// mthus yul der 'jug pa dang bgegs 'jug na'ang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong byed par 'gyur ro//
189b5(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o// gang du g.yul ngor 'jug
189b6(rgyud): ga ma/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag
189b7(rgyud): tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro// de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje grong ngam/
190a1(rgyud): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung na/ der rig
190a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / cho ga dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa btung ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/ rig
190a3(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklag sa na/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang
190a4(rgyud): lhan cig tu nang 'gro ba dang / mings de rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
190a5(rgyud): 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so// rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig
190a6(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA ga badz+re badz+re badz+re/ a mri ta
190a7(rgyud): badz+re na dz+wa li ta badz+re nahu ta sha nib+hany+dza b+hany+dza b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sta ma b+ha ya sarba gra hA NA na hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ pu ru mu ru/
190b1(rgyud): d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me/ khwa khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/ badz+re ma na si/ badz+ra hu ti/ hu ti ru/ pu ru pu ru/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi ti Shi Na na/ nA bu ru Ni/ mu mu le/
190b2(rgyud): badz+ra pra dA pA ni/ tsi ma le phu swA hA/ A yu pa la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya sam b+ha be swA hA/ dza yota ta me swA hA/ dzA ya ba re de swA hA/ dzA yan d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya ma na si swA hA/ dza ya badz+ra swAhA/
190b3(rgyud): a dzi ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ badz+ra hu tA sha nA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badz+ra ha ta swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de ra dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
190b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
190b5(rgyud): gzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo//
190b6(rgyud): dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o// mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA dza ye dza ye dza ye/
190b7(rgyud): ma hA dza ye/ mi li ma na si/ dz+nye dz+nye dz+nye / mu ru mu ru ka tu Tu tra Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ be ge be g+ha d+ha ri Ni/ te dza ba ti/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang
191a1(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs
191a2(rgyud): rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ bung d+he brang d+he/ prad+d+he bud+he/ bud+d+ha ba te/ bud+d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ d+harmab tI/ sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/
191a3(rgyud): bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/ prad+ha pa ri ha ri/ tarma a bad+hA sa ni swA hA/ sul la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid padi ni mgo bo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa 'dun du
191a4(rgyud): 'gas so// su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ glegs bam la bris te grong ngam/ grong khyer
191a5(rgyud): ram grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/ der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig
191a6(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad du 'brang ste bsrung bar 'gyi'o// dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// slar rgol ba dang
191a7(rgyud): dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// slar bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan/
191b1(rgyud): 'das kyisargyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so// sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / sems
191b2(rgyud): can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bde ba dang / bstan pa srung ba'i phyir zhugs pa'ang legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis gang yongs su bskyab pa dang
191b3(rgyud): yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang / rims dang / gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
191b4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig
191b5(rgyud): kun chub par gyis shig/ lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs
191b6(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen
191b7(rgyud): mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/ sems mi bzad pa de dag dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
192a1(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa byin/
192a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
192a3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de
192a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
192a5(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
192a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/
192a7(rgyud): Ar+ya a b+hi Shi l+ya ni nA mad+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
192b1(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
192b2(rgyud): sems dpa' grangs med pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka'
192b3(rgyud): srul pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / bden pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpas
192b4(rgyud): yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag sgoms shig/ ston cig/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
192b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul la mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba la/ bcom
192b6(rgyud): ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
192b7(rgyud): bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par byed pa dang / khyod
193a1(rgyud): gzungs yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa'ang legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gzungs ni chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
193a2(rgyud): ltar byung ba ma yin te/ shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'das pa zhes mi 'chang/ ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad/ da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad/ dngos por mi 'chad/ dngos po med par mi 'chang / mtshan
193a3(rgyud): ma dang mtshan ma med par mi 'chad/ chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'di gzungs
193a4(rgyud): ni 'das kyi/ rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni gzugs med pa bya'i/ lam du gyur pa/ rig pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul
193a5(rgyud): khrims/ sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
193a6(rgyud): ldan 'das gang la gnas shing gzungs de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la
193a7(rgyud): mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang / rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/
193b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byuka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig byang chub sems
193b2(rgyud): dpa' gzungs thob pa la bsti stang byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro// gang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa dang /
193b3(rgyud): gang dag mos pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'di lta ste san
193b4(rgyud): d+ha ra NI// ud+g+ha ra Ni/ san pra tiSh+Ti/ ud+d+ha ma s+yA pra tiSh+Ti tA/ bi dza ya ba lA/ sar+b+ba pra ha ra dz+nyA na ba ti/ u ta pa dA ni/ bi ni mA nI a b+hi Shi sh+tsa ni/ a b+hi b+ha ha ra/
193b5(rgyud): shu b+ha ba ti a ni shri ta/ ba hu kuM b+ha/ a bi ba tsa/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te/ 'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams
193b6(rgyud): dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang / legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems par gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chang ba de myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal pa/
193b7(rgyud): brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/ de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags mi bsrun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
194a1(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong
194a2(rgyud): chen po'i grangs med pa bcu mthar chags su gag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza' dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par bzung ba byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
194a3(rgyud): gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yum yin
194a4(rgyud): pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
194a5(rgyud): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
194a6(rgyud): dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
194a7(rgyud): par gang du/ sa rgya cher rgya ba tI na ma d+hA ra NaM/ bong zhing du/ 'phags par gyig nga ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jis
194b1(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na zlab dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par/
194b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legra/
194b3(rgyud): par gnas la bka' stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par 'dod pa nges/ 'das pa dang / ma byon
194b4(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo // ma thos so// ma myong ngo // gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba
194b5(rgyud): des gzungs thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin bdag gis bsod
194b6(rgyud): nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba byas so zhes mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin
194b7(rgyud): par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/
195a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid du mi rtog/ yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar ma yin/ 'gro ba med par ma yin/ 'chi 'phor ma yin/
195a2(rgyud): par ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stong par ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med par ma yin pa skye bar ma yin/ 'gag/
195a3(rgyud): par ma yin no// legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa
195a4(rgyud): de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/ don dang tshig 'bru'ang yongs su/
195a5(rgyud): zad par mi 'gyur ro// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no// ma brtags pa'i chos can/
195a6(rgyud): yin te/ bden pa'i chos dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so// sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o// rig pa'i cho ga/
195a7(rgyud): la zhugs pa'o// legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so// mi 'chang ngo // mi 'grol lo// legs par gnas gang gi tshe byang chub
195b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags/ mi 'chang / mi 'grol 'de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
195b2(rgyud): 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob bo// tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti ku Ti tsa la/ e lA i mi ri to// ko b+hU la/
195b3(rgyud): e re ri/ e mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no// ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
195b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
195b5(rgyud): rnams kyi yum mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b6(rgyud): chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
195b7(rgyud): grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang khong du chud par byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bston pa
196a1(rgyud): yin no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sangs
196a2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byas so// bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o//
196a3(rgyud): su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la
196a4(rgyud): dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma sha ra kar 'bra sa sA lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza' 'o// sangs rgyas kyi
196a5(rgyud): ri ga sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o// 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus/ gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi
196a6(rgyud): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ yi dgas sam/ grul bum mam/ sha za'am/
196a7(rgyud): mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro// bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub yongs su gzung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems
196b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//
196b2(rgyud): 'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/ dben par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la
196b3(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs
196b4(rgyud): pa ra gnas dang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
196b5(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
196b6(rgyud): phab pa'o// rgya bar skad du/ Ar+ya dze gu li nA ma bid+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dug sel ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags sangs rgyas dang
196b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
197a1(rgyud): dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na gangs kyi/
197a2(rgyud): ri byang ngos na/ spos dang ldan pa'i ri bo la ka ri rgyal de yi sul gnas tshe/ gzhon nu bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/ e n+ya ya yi pags gyon la// sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ gdug pa'i
197a3(rgyud): sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/ mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyun can/ dug gi me tog rnams za zhing / ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung // nga la de 'bod 'bong du 'jug/ bu khyod tshur shog nga la nyon// nga la dug
197a4(rgyud): sel zhes bya ba// dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod// dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/ nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ oM e li mi ta ka ti li mi tAM/ i li ti li mit+te/ dum+be/ dum/
197a5(rgyud): b+hA lI ye/ du se du sa la ye/ tak+She ta ka kar+Ne/ marme marme ra he/ kash+ma me/ kash+tsa ra mu ka te/ a g+ha ne/ i li/ a li ye/ a khA A le/ a ba i ye/ shwe te shwe te/ shwe te/ tun+te/ a na mu/
197a6(rgyud): rak+ta swA hA/ dge slong dag nga'i drug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o// de'i lus la dug
197a7(rgyud): gis mi tshugs so// sprul gang zhig de la 'dzin pa de'i mgo shing a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o// de ci'i
197b1(rgyud): bIr zhe na/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ i la la/ tsi la lI/ tsakrA/ bak+ko/ koH/ ko Te ti kAr rba ku ra Te ti/ soT ti/ pra r+ra ti/ maH/ moT ti/ ni r+par/ nik+Sha
197b2(rgyud): ru Te te/ mu r+ra Ta/ mu ru Te te/ ni mra r+ra Ta/ ni mu ru Te ti/ pra ru re/ pu Ta TaT hu ra/ phuT Ta da na/ ta he8/ nA ga hA re/ nA ga Ta tran/ ta ha re/ sarba ha re/ sarba taT+Tan/ Ta ra te/ Ats+tshi/
197b3(rgyud): AtsA le ga tshA le tsha la ka bi she/ shwA te/ shA ta Dab rat+na le/ mA ta laM/ ha le ha le/ ha la hA la ha la le/ i la le/ ke pa tsa le/ mi la le/ tan nI tAn nr-i/ taH taT/ sU tA sU tra/ phaT
197b4(rgyud): phaT/ ha ra bi Sha swA hA/ dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
197b5(rgyud): no// yang dag pa'o// bden pa'o// ma nor ba'o// phyin ci ma log pa'o// dug 'di mi gdug par gyur cig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song zhig/ 'dzin pa'i gan du song zhig/ me'i
197b6(rgyud): nang du song zhig gatshwa'i nang du song zhig thang la song zhig/ ka ba'i nang du song zhig rtsig pa'i nang du song zhig/ nam mkha' la song zhig/ sa'i nang du song zhig/ zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/
197b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig
198a1(rgyud): sngags rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+hi pa thi ta b+ha ga bAn Ar+ya aM gu li nA ma bid+ha rA dz+nye/ bod skad du/
198a2(rgyud): bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phag sa ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// de
198a3(rgyud): ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/ nges bdag la smras pa/ bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig/ klu'i dbang po
198a4(rgyud): rnams kyi dug med par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed/ g.yog rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul
198a5(rgyud): bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / 'phra man pha dang / 'phra men ma dang / chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bu ma ra can dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag
198a6(rgyud): shul chen po aM gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste/ sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par
198a7(rgyud): med par byed do// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya a~M gu li/ tad+ya thA/ oM kru 'am/ klu mo 'am/ sbrul lam// sbrul mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung mo 'am/
198b1(rgyud): 'tha men pa 'am/ 'phra men ma 'am/ gdug pas zin pa 'am/ gdug pas ma zin pa'ang rung ste/ pa pha pa/ ha re ha re ha re/ re dza ra/ be sha She/ nA ga re/ sarba re re/ ha ra ha ra/ mar mar//
198b2(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma Ta maT/ mai Ta ya mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ shIg+h+raM shI g+b+h+yAM/ la b+hu la g+hu/ A nA ya A na ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha ba na d+ha gur+Na
198b3(rgyud): gu d+ha Da g+hu r+Na pa ya g+hu r+Na pa yA/ dpag tshad stong brgyad cun gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig/ klu thams cad chings shig/ sod cig / thar par mdzod cig/ oM swamra
198b4(rgyud): hu lu ha la ha la/ ha la bi shaM/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa'i rgyal me aM gu lis bka' stsal ba/ ta ka ke Ta ka ke/ ta ka ke ni Ta ka ke ni/ shi ra shi ra/ tsaN+Da ke sha ro hi ni/ bgegs
198b5(rgyud): thams cad sel bar mdzad pa can/ las stong can/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa aM gu li ta thA bi ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya sid+hi rgyal bar mdzad pa/ mi'i
198b6(rgyud): mgo'i thod kyi 'phreng ba can/ hUMHklang cig zang cing yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du dug sel ba/ a su su ra de bi ta dang / ngan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/ bgegs 'joms par byed
198b7(rgyud): pa can ka lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swAhA/ sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'chi ba dang klang ba 'gas shing tshal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig
199a1(rgyud): drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do// oM ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li kA la ru pi ni/ bgegs thams cad klogacig/ pa pham pha rol
199a2(rgyud): pham par mdzod cig swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa aM gu li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ne d+hu ne/ d+ha ni d+hA ni/ saH/ tad+ya/ Ta ha si ni d+h+ya d+hu ne/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ rdo rje'i
199a3(rgyud): gzungs mang po sa bka' stsal pa/ 'jog po'i dug 'dor du 'jug la/ dza ya dza ya/ muM dza muM dza/ muM dza mu dza/ thos zhig/ glog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/ ro langs
199a4(rgyud): chen po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung / mu ya mu tsa muM tsa swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs
199a5(rgyud): so// / rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya sarba d+harma mA tri ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
199a6(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
199a7(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bral ba kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i gzungs pa nang thams cad rab tu par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs
199b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/ nga'ang ltar 'chang bzung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ a ba te/ a ba / / b+hag ma/ shrad+d+he/ thab+hA sa re/ tA ra Ne/ ug kha le mug khya le/ 5
199b2(rgyud): d+h+wad+hA/ pag pa N+ye swAt+su/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dag cag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i snying po brjod pa
199b3(rgyud): bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ats+tshe/ a na le/ e lu le/ a lu pha/ muH a nu ga te/ sarba d+harma a d+hi pa ti ya thAb+he/ d+ho s+tha ka ra/ a d+h+r-i ga ta dz+nyA ne/ bi shud+d+he ba ti sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
199b4(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// chos thams cad kyi
199b5(rgyud): yu ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsu DA ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes
199b6(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs
199b7(rgyud): cu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab par mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba
200a1(rgyud): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs/
200a2(rgyud): pa sbyin pa na 'phongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par mdzad pa/ yams kyi nang dang gnod pa thams cad 'jig par
200a3(rgyud): mdzad pa/ mi mthun pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ 'byung po dang / ro langs
200a4(rgyud): dang ga shis ngan du 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge dang / mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa
200a5(rgyud): thams cad zlog par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad
200a6(rgyud): 'dun par mdzad pa/ dug dang / 'brum phran dang / thor bu dang / gshed byed dang / byang dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
200a7(rgyud): gshed byed thams cad sel mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa// bdag gi bu dang tsha bo dag/ g.yog 'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa// phyir
200b1(rgyud): zlog pa ni brjod par bya// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe// brgya byin lha min rnams las pham// de nas rings pa khe nar ni// 'jig rten dbang gi drung song sa// de nas snying ni rab
200b2(rgyud): skrag nas// 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol to// lha min bdag pa ma 'dzag rten dbang // ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// 'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni// lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu gzigs/
200b3(rgyud): brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas// dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs// lnga yi dbang po nga la nyon// khyod la ngas ni srung ba byin// lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// 'jig rten gyi khams
200b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las/ ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir
200b5(rgyud): zlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung ngo // mkhas pa gang gis rig sngags 'di// bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa 'am// gdon tam 'on te klog na yang // de yi 'jigs pa kun med
200b6(rgyud): de// rtag tu bsrung zhing sgru ba dang // g.yul 'gyed pa ni rgyal bar byed// sdig dang rmi lam zhi ba dang // bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel// lha yi dbang po de bas na// gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur
200b7(rgyud): 'dod pas// bris te spyi bor gdags par bya// yid la rtag tu dran par gyis// g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma yin te// 'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog/ bud med rnams la bu po skyed// mangs/
201a1(rgyud): na gnas pa yongs su stong // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed// sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/ 'di ming phyir rlog byed ces bya// yan lag rnams la
201a2(rgyud): phyir 'bab byed// lha'i dbang po phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lA ma yin thams cad pham par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag
201a3(rgyud): tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung zhig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
201a4(rgyud): bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya ka ri/ yud+d+ho ta ta ra Ni bi tsi tra mu khi/ sarba maM ga
201a5(rgyud): la d+ha ra Ni/ dzau mU te sa ha swa b+hu dze/ sa ha sra ne tre/ sa ha sra shi re/ nan laM ka ra/ bi b+hu Shi te/ ma Ni kuN+Da la san nA ha san na de bi tsi tra mau/ li d+ha re/ tsan+da sUr+ya/ a ti re ke/ A ka sha ga na tsA
201a6(rgyud): maM ga la shi re dzI mo dr-i/ ba bi tra kri ta mAM ga le/ b+hu ri mi d+hi kA ra Ne/ tsu ru tsu ru/ shre ta pa ste/ mu ru mu ru/ she ta/ a ba na te/ hu ru hu ru pa bid tra mu khi/ ku ru ku ru tsan+da mu khai/
201a7(rgyud): A di t+ya ba sha brti ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ maM ga la d+ha ra Ni/ staM b+ha ni/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra mA ta/ mo ha ni/ a mo b+ha bA sha ha ste/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/ rA dzA tsi re/ ag+ni bi Sha/ u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni//
201b1(rgyud): kakho nu bAr Ni/ oM ha ra~M hi ri/ dza mA ka ri/ ba la kA ri/ d+hA na ka ri/ te dzA sa ri bId/ pra shA ma ni/ yang NanI/ bA ne/ par tsakra pra sha ma ni/ par seHbinA sha nI/ ur+Nod+ha rabI/
201b2(rgyud): prA b+hU da be la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma NI nad+ha ri/ tI lo kA A lo ka ka ri/ tI pu ra na ga ra bi d+ha na sa ni/ pa ra se n+ya bi dra ba ni/ sarbA kra t+ya karma nI sU da ni/ sarba b+ha d+hi ni ma prA sha ma ni
201b3(rgyud): oM tsi le mi le swA hA/ tsi le me le swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ tsa khi li tsa khi li swA hA/ tsan+da li mi Ti ni swA hA/ u ra d+he ke shi piM gA le piM ga la k+She d+ha mu khi swA hA ka oM ka ra kA ra
201b4(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri saM ri/ su ru su ru/ mr-iny+tsa muny+tsa/ muSh+mA/ pa ya/ pra sha ma ya/ pra sha na ya/ yung d+hod tA ra Ni phaT/ tsit+ta ni re ma la ka ri phaT/ a su ra ni rag+hA ta ni/
201b5(rgyud): paT dza ya ka ri phaT/ pri ti ka ri paT/ sa ha sa? shi re phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dza paT/ sa na sra ne tre phaT/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra d+ha ra na ma s+thi te phaT/ sarba sha tru nA sha ni phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo k+Sha Ni phaT/
201b6(rgyud): pa ra tsakra ni ba ra Ni phaT/ pa ra sai n+yA bi pra ba ni phaT/ sarba kritA/ karma sA da ni phaT/ sarba b+had+ha pra shA ma Ni phaT/ sarba grA ho ta sA da ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha man sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAn/ sa ma tA mi
