230a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gal te rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug tror gyi rgyal po chen po
230a4(rgyud): tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas te/ dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la/ yang 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na tshe lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par
230a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bye ba byas na bye ba thub bo// de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la gro ba dang / dpa' ba dang / dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/
230a6(rgyud): dpal 'dod na dpal 'bras 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'dzum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur
230a7(rgyud): ro/ 'bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro// yang na ral gri la sogs pa grub par 'dong na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa
230b1(rgyud): chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/ yang lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ral gri la bzlas pa 'dus byas te lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs
230b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de ltar rdo rje dang /
230b3(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o// de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed
230b4(rgyud): par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las 'grub par byed do// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re
230b5(rgyud): re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher gsal bar byas na/ de skyid pa 'thob cing stongs
230b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / lo brgya thub pa dang / blo rno ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang
230b7(rgyud): gi lu sa bor te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu'ang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par lta'ang ga la 'gyur/ gang dang gang /
231a1(rgyud): du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nga dgra dang /
231a2(rgyud): dang / maM dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
231a3(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta chos kyi rje dang / khams pa lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bskur cing zhus te gtan la
231a4(rgyud): phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza yA nA ma d+ha ra Ni ka lA/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
231a5(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can
231a6(rgyud): na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug chen po'i khang bzang gi tshal
231a7(rgyud): bde ba la nye bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can
231b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir cing tshe thung ba dag yod de/ de rnams kyi don du tshe ring ba nye bar bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor//
231b2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gzung bar bya// gzhan rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
231b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
231b4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/
231b5(rgyud): kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal to//
231b6(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sar+b+ba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+NA ya/ bud+d+hA ya te na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hI d+h+waMd+b+h+yAM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta bab+hA sa s+phA ra Na ga ti/ gag na swa b+hA ba
231b7(rgyud): shud+d+he/ a tri tri tsu tsu maM/ sarba thA ga tA/ su ga ta ba rab tsan mr-i tA b+hi li she mahA bu tra ma nAM dza dzi.A ha ra A par/ ma ma A yuHsan+ta ra Ni sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ ring bo d+ha ya ba~M go d+ha ya/ gag nas
232a1(rgyud): b+hA ba ngi shrad+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha swa ra sI sa tsa di te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ni/ Sha nA mi tA pa ri pU ra NI/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA te/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Tita
232a2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta rbaM da yA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Ti te/ oM nr-i dra mu dre/ ma hA mu dra badz+ra kA ya saM ha ta na pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba karma A wA ra Ni Shi shud+d+he/ me pra ti naM btA yA yuH shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA tiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Ti ta
232a3(rgyud): oM mu ni mu ni/ mahA mu ni bi mu ni/ bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma tem ma ti/ ma hA ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA su ma ti/ ta tha ta b+hU ta ko Ti pa ri shud+d+he bi s+phu
232a4(rgyud): Ta bud+d+hi shud+d+he/ o he heha dzA ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra s+pha ra/ sA ra s+pha ra/ sA Da ya s+pha ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha d+hiSh+Na nA d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re mar+tha badz+re su \u0f7f/
232a5(rgyud): badz+re gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badz+ra dzA lA gan+d+he badz+ro d+hA be/ badz+ra saM b+ha be badz+rI badz+ri Ni badz+ram+b+ha ba tu me sha rI re sarba satwa nAny+tsa/ kA ya pa ri shud+d+hir+b+ha ba tu ma sa dA/ sarba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hi sh+tsa/
232a6(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa mA shA sa yan+tu/ oM bud+d+ha bud+d+he sid+h+ya sid+d+ha bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya/
232a7(rgyud): sho d+ha ya/ sa man+ta no ya mo tsa ya sa man+ta ra sr-i pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i dza yA tiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu dre pu dre ma hA mu dre ma hA mu tra man+da pa deHswAhA/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di de bzhin ga shes
232b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'chi ba'i dbyug pa chen po 'dzin pa/ sdig pa zhi bar byed pa'i dag byed do// gang su dag tshe ring bar 'dod pas 'chang bar/
232b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i rim pas bklag par bya'o// sa phyogs yangs pa kha cig tu sa dang babyung gis nye bar byugs la/ dri bzang gi chab kyis chag chag gdab par bya'o// steng du bla zas kyis rjes shing
232b3(rgyud): 'phyang du bcug nas/ de'i dbus su rdul tshon dkar pos 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa shin tu brgyan par gda' bar bya'o// gang de'i dbus su rang bzhin gyi snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor ro// de ltar
232b4(rgyud): rim pa ji lta bar shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nam mkha' ltar 'dras pa'i bza' stong 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / sa'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / nor bu'i snying po 'byung ba'i
232b5(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / ro bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / snying po dpag med 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs 'byung ba'i
232b6(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / ser bu 'byung ba'i gtsug tor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo// de'i yang phyi rol nyid du pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa legs par bri bar bya'o// 'dab ma
232b7(rgyud): so so re rer rim pa ji lta bar thig le bcu drug las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo// nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / phyi stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i
233a1(rgyud): gtsug tor dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug
233a2(rgyud): tor dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / dor
233a3(rgyud): ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
233a4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / dngos po mang pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rang gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /
233a5(rgyud): dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas dus ji lta ba'i me tog gi rnam pa dbul bar bya'o// de'i phyed
233a6(rgyud): kyi stong du khri btsugs te chu'i snod du rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i mchod rten gzhug par bya'o// shog zhu'am lo ma la sngags kyi yi ge sgrub pa po'i ming can yang gzhug par bya'o// bum pa chus
233a7(rgyud): bkang ba'ang gzhug par bya'o// pad+ma'i phyi rol phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi'ang gzhag par bya'o// dar gyi lda ldi dang / gdugs dang / ba dan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas nas/ yang shar du
233b1(rgyud): bgegs rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / lhor 'chi ba rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug/
233b2(rgyud): tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / byang du phung po'i nad rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / mer rdo rje 'phreng ba tshe sbyin ma dang / bden bral du sgyu ma chen mo dang /
233b3(rgyud): rlung du gser 'od ma dang / dbang ldan du gsar gyi 'phreng ba can tshe sbyin ma'o// snod bzhi chu dri bzang dang bcas pas bkang ste/ me tog gi 'phreng ba 'byang du gzhug par bya'o// 'di'i
233b4(rgyud): mtha ra re kha gsum rdul tshon gyis bri bar bya'o// 'phreng ba dang po la spel sogs pa med pa'i 'jim pa rlon pa la byas pa'i sats+tsha stong phrag gcig bsgrib par bya'o// ma grub na brgya nges par
233b5(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o// phyogs bzhir bkur sti dang bsti stang chen po'i mchod pa byas nas/ tshig gzhan mi smra ba'i dam bca' 'dzin pa'i chos smra ba rnams kyis gzungs 'di bklag par bya'o/
233b6(rgyud): lan re re zhing mchod rten gyi dbur mchod cing rab tu gnas par bya'o// stong phrag gcig tu klog pas dbus kyi mchod rten gyi dbur lag pa bskyod cing mchod par bya'o// me tog dang /
233b7(rgyud): bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / lha bshos la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad stong phrag so sor mchod rten gyi 'phreng ba'i rnam par byas nas mchod par bya'o// ji srid
234a1(rgyud): yongs su ma rdzogs pa de srid du mar me'i 'phreng ba rlung gis mi nyams pa sbar bar bya'o// mnyam par gzhag cing gtsang sbral rab tu 'jug par bya'o// de ltar
234a2(rgyud): byas mnag 'dun pa'i tshe lo bdun du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// lo bdun po'i tshe ni de ltar tshe mchog 'thob cing nang las rnam par grol nas lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin
234a3(rgyud): pa'i 'chi ba'ang thams cad du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i nye bar spyod pa'i rim pa las gzhan du byas na de yis 'grub pa ma yin no// rab tu byed pa dang ngo //
234a4(rgyud): rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dmo pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba
234a5(rgyud): gnas brtan dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o// / @rgya gar skad du/
234a6(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni ka \u0f89\u0fa4sa paH/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs/
234a7(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
234b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rmo dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras
234b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba
234b3(rgyud): rnams yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa'i mtshan gyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang
234b4(rgyud): ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yun ring por gnas par sgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs
234b5(rgyud): te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsa
234b6(rgyud): pa.oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+NA ya bud+d+ha ya te na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+yAM b+h+yAM b+h+yAM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ oM sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na gaH/
234b7(rgyud): ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ oM b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ sarba ta thA gau ti su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mri ta a d+hi She ke ra/ ma hA mu dra man+da pa deHA ha re A har
235a1(rgyud): mA ma A yuHsan d+ha ra NI/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ ngi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ka ka na sa d+d+ha ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he sa ha swa ra swa ra saM tso di te/
235a2(rgyud): ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ShA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da yaM a d+hiSh+ThA naM a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mr-i nga?/ ma hA mu dre/ badz+ra kA ya saM ha tan/
235a3(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ra Na bi shud+d+he / pra ti naM brta ya ka ma ma A yu ra bi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ oM mu ni mra ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/
235a4(rgyud): ma ti ma t+taM/ mahA ma tI/ ma ma tri/ su ma ti/ ta Tha tab+hU ta ko Ti/ ba ri shud+d+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ prat+ti gud+d+he/ he he/ dza yaM dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sA ra bA ra/ swar swa ma/ s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/ saH
235a5(rgyud): bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Ti te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+he bud+d+he/ badz+re 'adz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ su badz+re/ badz+re gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badz+re dzA lA gan+d+he/ badz+ra ud b+he be/ badz+ra saM
235a6(rgyud): b+ha ba/ badz+re badz+ri Ni/ badz+ram+b+ha Sha tu/ ma ma sha rI raM sarba satwa nAny+dza ka ya pa ri shud d+hi ra b+ha ba tu/ sa dA me sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hi sh+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yaM a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba
235a7(rgyud): tA thA ga tA sh+tsa maM sa mA shA sa yan+tu/ bu d+h+ya bud+d+ha/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha / bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya / mo tsa ya mo tsa yaH bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya ka sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya
235b1(rgyud): baM go d+ha ya/ sa man+tan mo tsa ya mo ba ya/ sa man+ta ra smi pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA gtA hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThA te/ mu dwe mu tre/ mar+d+ha mu dwe ma hA ma drA man+t+ra pa deHswa thA/ gtsug tor
235b2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod pa 'di yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du bzhugs la/ zla ba nya ba'i/
235b3(rgyud): tshe khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyang brjod na tshe zad pa las tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro// ngan song las myur du thar te sgrib pa rnams dag nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// dung 'gro rnams kyis
235b4(rgyud): thos na'ang de rnams ngan seng gi tha ma yin te/ byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mthe ris rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram zer rigs sam/ tshong dpon gyi rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen
235b5(rgyud): po lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten de'i grib mas phog gam/ rdul gyis btab kyang rung ste ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
235b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rang ste mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa
235b7(rgyud): rdzogs so// // rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tAM nA ma a ba rA dzI tA pra t+yaM gi ra ma hA bid+hA rA dzI bod skad du/
236a1(rgyud): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub sa phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po nan/
236a2(rgyud): po'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
236a3(rgyud): lha'i yul sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
236a4(rgyud): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ gtsug tor la rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
236a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gtsug tor gyi gseb nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byung ngo // na mo b+ha ga ba te uSh+NI Sha ya shud d+he bi ra dze bi ma le swA hA/ bcom ldan
236a6(rgyud): 'das gtsug tor thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
236a7(rgyud): bye ba phrag bdun po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig can/
236b1(rgyud): na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
236b2(rgyud): 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub
236b3(rgyud): pa'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dmod pas phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag
236b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das legs ldan drag po dka' thub bzlog ma'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo//
236b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das legs ldan dga' byed dbang phyug nag po chen po grong khyer sum
236b6(rgyud): brtsegs 'jig par byed pa kha che'i dur khrod chen po na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung
236b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/
237a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das las kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo//
237a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'ad sa gti mug gi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
237a3(rgyud): ldan 'das chags pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal
237a4(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
237a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
237a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan
237a7(rgyud): gyi tha be n+ya ma'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
237b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga ceg/
237b2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
237b3(rgyud): rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
237b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
237b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
237b6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
237b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
238a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po tshe tog gi rgyal po la thug 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang daH/
238a2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//
238a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa dang ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
238a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o//
238a5(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'tha' mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad klog par byed pa/ pha rol gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed
238a6(rgyud): pa dus ma yin par 'chi ba las yongs su skyob pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad thar par byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon/
238a7(rgyud): thams cad rnam par chug par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi po rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rgya ga 'i shu rtsa brgyad rab tu sgrub par byeng pag 'thathams cad ldog par byed pa/
238b1(rgyud): gza' chen po brgyad rnam par rlag par byed pa/ sdang ba dang / drag po dang / rmi lam ngan pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu las skyob par byed
238b2(rgyud): pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyi bar du yongs su skyob par byed pa ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che// stobs chen gzi brjid chen
238b3(rgyud): mo ste// gtum pa chen mo dkar mo che/ gsal ba chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba chen mo 'phreng ba che// gos dkar mo ni chen mo ste// 'phags ma sgrol mkhro gnyer can// rdo rje 'phreng ba
238b4(rgyud): rnam bsgyings ma// pad+ma'i snang ba rdo rje'i mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub 'phreng ba can// rdo rje bar bsnams 'joms pa mo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa// gzugs ni dkar mo chen mo ste/
238b5(rgyud): 'bar ba dang ni gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// 'chi med rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje dang // rig sngags gser gyi
238b6(rgyud): 'phreng ba can// le brgar rtsi dang rin chen ma// rnam par snang mdzad rigs kyi'o// de bzhin gshegs rigs gtsug tor ma// rnam par bsgyings ma'i 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje gser
238b7(rgyud): 'ong lta bu'i spyan// rdo rje nos dang dkar mo dang // pad+ma'i lhan dpal sangs rgyas can// de bzhin rdo rje zla ba'i 'od// de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin ma dang // rdo rje 'phreng ba rdzu 'phrul che'i//
239a1(rgyud): lha mo dang ni gser 'od can// spyan mdzes mdang dkar mo dang // pad+ma yi ni spyan can dang // rnam dul zhi ba'i sems dang ni// zla 'od bdag gi yon tan shes// phyag/
239a2(rgyud): rgya'i tshogs de dag dang / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams can la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM ra Shi gA Na pra shAs+t+ra sarba tathAg/
239a3(rgyud): toSh+NI Sha si tA tA pa tre ts+tsha d+h+waM b+hIHk+Sho/ dzam+bA ni d+hAd+ha d+hA d+hIHSh+To/ swar+thA nir+N+Na drA d+hIHSh+To/ mo ha na kaR+Sha d+hu dz+dza hrIHSh+TI/ pa ra bidrA saM b+hak+Sha Na ka rI d+hu d+h+r-i d+hIHSh+To/ sarba duSh+Ta s+thAm+b+ha na ka rI d+hu d+hA d+hIHn+te/ sarba par/
239a4(rgyud): bid+hi ts+tshed na ka rI hUM dz+dza dz+rIM \u0f7fSh+To/ sarba duSh+TA nAM swastA na ke rI ts+tsha d+h+waM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hAr+t+ti bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM d+h+waM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ tsa tu rA shI tA~M nAM gra hA sa ha sAN+DaM bi d+hi sa na ka rI hU~M d+hI d+h+r-iSh+To/ aT+Ta
239a5(rgyud): bing+ga ta~M nA ma k+Sha trANAM pra sAd na ka rI hUM d+hU hrIHSh+T+r-i/ aSh+TA nI ma hA gra d+hAt+taM bi d+hi sa na karI d+hu hUM d+hIHdz+dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma~M sarba satwa sh+tsaH/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
239a6(rgyud): gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can rdzo u gtor gyi bzlog pa chen mo// phyag stong mnga' bo chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' 'a chen ma~M/ spyan bye ba brgya zag sdong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar
239a7(rgyud): ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje lto ba yangs pa chen mo can/ sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo// oM sa~M sir+b+ba d+hu ma mas pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twA sh+tsa sAhA/ rgyal
239b1(rgyud): po yis 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang / chu yis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mngon gyis 'jigs pa dang
239b2(rgyud): dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ge yis 'jigs pa dang / dgra bo yis 'jigs pa dang / thog gis 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin/
239b3(rgyud): par 'chi ba yis 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mnga' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gtum pos
239b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs pa dang / glog gis 'jigs pa dang / bye ma tsha mos 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod/
239b5(rgyud): pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon gyis 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon
239b6(rgyud): dang / dri za'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi'i
239b7(rgyud): gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul
240a1(rgyud): po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang /
240a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus chags ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon dang / re lde 'don pa'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar/
240a3(rgyud): byed pa'i mdon dang / kun tu 'greng bar byed pa'i gdon dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ba'i gdon dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / ka Ta~M ka rba'i tshogs can gyi gdon dang /
240a4(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / mngal za ba dang / khrag 'thung ba dang / zhag za ba dang / sha za ba dang / tshil za ba dang / rkang za ba dang / btsas pa za ba dang /

240a6(rgyud): zab dang / rnag 'thung ba dang / bshad za dang / gcin btung ba dang / mchil mtha' dang / skabs za ba dang / ngar skabs za ba dang skyugs pa za' dang /
240a7(rgyud): nom bu za ba dang / mi gtsangasas ba dang stor khrang nas 'ab pa 'thung ba dang / nor 'thob pa rang phas pa 'phrog pa rnams dang / de dag bses kyad dang / gdon pam
240b1(rgyud): cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad ral gris gcang ngo // rdo rje phur bus gang ba'o// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags ral bris gcad do// rdo rje bur bur gang 'gog mapa' 'gro/
240b2(rgyud): dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad // rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// brgya byin gyis byas pa'i
240b3(rgyud): rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// phyugs bdag chen po dang drag pos byas pa'i

240b6(rgyud): ro// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// g.yung pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// skar mnga' gdong gis byas pa'i rib sngags ral gris gcad do//
240b7(rgyud): rdo rje bur bus gang ba'o// rdo rje gzhon nu mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gril gtsang ngo // rdo rje phrar bus gdab 'o// gshin rje gshed kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do//
241a1(rgyud): rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// gshin rje'i pho nyas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdaba'o// klu ma rungs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris
241a2(rgyud): gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// me'i las kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// log 'dren gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad //

241a4(rgyud): phur bus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phrar bus gdan 'o// nam mkha' lding yang dag pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris bcad do//
241a5(rgyud): rdo rje phur bus gdaba'o// rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur/
241a6(rgyud): bus gdab bo// b+h+ring gi ri Ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / sprin drug gi bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral
241a7(rgyud): gris gcad do// rdo rje bur bus gdang 'o// dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gtsang ngo // rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags papa
241b1(rgyud): gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gtsang ngo // rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// 'dod chags dang thal bas
241b2(rgyud): byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gda' 'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// gang dang /

241b4(rgyud): sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / zan po dang / bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad //

241b7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams
242a1(rgyud): cad dang / phyir rgol ba 'am/ mi mdza' ba 'ab/ mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
242a2(rgyud): gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa me dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal zhing dkar ba rgyas pa mnga' ba khyod la phyag
242a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// oM dz+wa la dza la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ khAd khAd/ da rang ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ hUM hUM baT phaT swAhA/ sarba dudz+nyAn hUM d+h+waM/ sarba durbaM ti te b+h+yaHphaT/
242a4(rgyud): durmig 5/ sarba du rtswa ma b+h+yaH4/ sarba b+h+ya b+h+yaH/ sa sun+teb+h+ya5/ rbarbad+b+ha taHsams bad+ya tiH5/ sa taH5/ sarbas pa
242a5(rgyud): phaT/ sarba dza re b+h+yaHShaT/ sar+b+ba pa sA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo sta ra ka b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA kI nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba t+ti b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka tA bA si ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ya ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/
242a6(rgyud): sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tr-i nan+di ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bi se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yo ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a lam+ba ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi sarbo pa
242a7(rgyud): son pa pA yA sa b+h+ya maT/ sarba su Sh+Tas bya bar/ sarba pA te.e b+h+yaHpar/ sarbathA ti b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sam gra he b+h+yang paT/ sa rbati cis gyu paT/ sarba pra t+ya Ti ke h+ya ban/
242b1(rgyud): sarba pA te ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbon+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+h+wa d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu kar sing d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA tsAR+Ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+d+ha raH/
242b2(rgyud): b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sA d+ha ke b+h+yoHbi d+h+yA tsAR+Ye b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur+N+No b+ha gi ni b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra ko mA rI ye bi d+ha rA dz+nyA ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bik+Shi bi nA yak+Sha nAM nA phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ pa ra bi drA ba N+Da ka rA ya phaT/ sa/
242b3(rgyud): a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru DaM b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA nu Sh+yA ma nuSh+ya b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tsa b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+haN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shIng ga lA ya maH
242b4(rgyud): pradz+rang+gir b+h+ya phaT/ sarbo pa sarbab+h+ya5Ta/ sarba rAk+Sha sa b+h+yaHphaTe/ maHpra tu d+hi rab+h+yaH5Ta/ tsAn+da ts+tshin+da paH/ badz+ra bin+da phaT/ d+h+yar+m+ma phaH/ he ha~M phaT/ maho phaT/ a mo kA ya phaT/ a ti
242b5(rgyud): yaHphaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba Na ka ra ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaH/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+heHb+h+yaHpaH/ sarba/
242b6(rgyud): kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+hAr+N+Na b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta prA ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba s+thAn+da b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra sAM ka la ya ma d+hA pra t+yaM gi ra rA
242b7(rgyud): dza la phaT/ kA lA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya phaT/ mA tri gA NA ya (\u0f7fShiSh+Nu shrI ye phaT/ ma hA mA tri ga Na mam+mu tri ya phaT/ ma he shA rI ye phaT/ prah+ma NI ya phaH/ a s+t+rai ye phaT/
243a1(rgyud): sa r+b+ba kA li sa Ta/ kA la da d+hi m+me baT/ oMn d+hi mA phaT/ ro ng+ka ma prAT/ tsamaN+Da me badz+ra/ bAn NI ya \u0f7f/ mahAn+dan hU~M ya 2/ na thal ba T+Ta/ kA la rA tri ye phaT/
243a2(rgyud): ma da Na DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ya phaT/ mthA ka pA lI ye phaT/ ko ma rI ye baT/ ya mI ye phaT/ bA yu be phaT/ ku be rA ye phaT/ nai rit+na ye phaT/ ba rANI ya paH/ mA ru tA ya n+t+ra r+ra
243a3(rgyud): tI ye baT+Ta/ ma d+hA mA ru tI ya baT/ so tsI ye paTa.I shA nI ye phaT/ yok+ShA sI ye ShaT/ a tharba NI ye phaT/ sa nI ye phaH/ kliSh+Na sa pa rI ye phaT/ yA ma d+hu tI
243a4(rgyud): paT nis ti bA Nar b+h+yaHphaT/ tri sanA ba rag+hu 5/ d+ha rat+naM ya~M phaH/ a ti mra TI kak+ki ra ma hA shA sha nA ba snam ma/ oM ti b+h+yaHsarba b+ha sa byaHsa da93/ oMH ban+d+ha
243a5(rgyud): dur+m+man rak+Sha rak+Sha ma sarba satwA sh+tsa sAb+hA/ gang su dag bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul drag shul gyi
243a6(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mi mdza' ba mi mdza' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de
243a7(rgyud): rnams las bdaga' bar rad bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad sa bsrung ba ma 'ang drug / lo brgya 'tsha bar gyur ci// yon brgya mthong bar shog cig/ gang su gag nga /
243b1(rgyud): sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / mngal za ba rnams dang / khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zhag za ba rnams dang / sha za ba rnams dang / tshil za ba rnam/
243b2(rgyud): dang / rkang za ba rnams dang / btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / gtor ma za ba rnams dang / 'phreng ba za ba rnams dang / dri za ba rnams dang / me tog
243b3(rgyud): za ba rnams dang / 'dug pa za ba rnams dang / 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / lo tog za ba rnams dang / bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / nor 'phrog pa rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnam
243b4(rgyud): dang / rnag za ba rnams dang / bshang ba za ba rnams dang / gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / snabs za ba rnams dang / ngar snabs za ba rnams dang /
243b5(rgyud): skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / nom bu za ba rnams dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems/
243b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang /
243b7(rgyud): dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon
244a1(rgyud): rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon
244a2(rgyud): rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon
244a3(rgyud): gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu bre ba'i gdon rnams dang /
244a4(rgyud): tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / bum pa lta bu'i gdon rnams dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon rnams dang /
244a5(rgyud): lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / ka Tang ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon rnams dang / gdon thams cad bsal du gsol/ rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams
244a6(rgyud): dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / zla ba phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig pa rnams dang / nyin mo pa rnams dang / nyi ma phyed pa
244a7(rgyud): rnams dang / yud tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rim rnams dang / yi dgas kyi rims rnams dang / sha za'i rims rnams dang /
244b1(rgyud): mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur//
244b2(rgyud): pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bdag dang sems can thams cad la bsal du gsol/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi
244b3(rgyud): gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yig 'chus pa dang / mig nang dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang /
244b4(rgyud): brang na ba dang / snying na ba dang / gnang na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lton pa dang / rkang pa na ba dang / mdoms na ba dang / gzhang na ba dang / skye gnas/
244b5(rgyud): na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/
244b6(rgyud): bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / mi ga ser dang / g.ya' ba dang /
244b7(rgyud): 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / mchin nad dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / me pal/
245a1(rgyud): dang / ldog pa dang / skem pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / sdug pa dang / lud pa dang / brgyal ba dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang /
245a2(rgyud): byang dang / me dang / dmu chu dang / mings dang / 'thab mo dang / kho na dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu d+hi bug dang / trai la Ta ka dang / sdig pa dang /
245a3(rgyud): sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / gnag dang / chu srin dang / spyang ki dang / chom po dang / de dag la sogs pa srog 'phrog par byed//
245a4(rgyud): pa gzhan thams cad kyang bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi mthus dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad dam/ dpag
245a5(rgyud): tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chang ngu rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bzung bar bgyi'o// rig sngags thams cad bcing bar 'gro'o// gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad bcing bar gyis
245a6(rgyud): mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// sa bcing bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu bcing bar bgyi'o// nam mkha' bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi sde rab tu rengs par 'gyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/
245a7(rgyud): a tsa le a tsa le/ kha la me la kha ma/ bi 'ang 'i 'ang/ bI re bI raM/ be ra be ra/ som so ma/ shAn+te/ dAseM d+deH/ badz+ra d+ha ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badz+ra pA Ni phaT/ oM pU dz+dza phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra/
245b1(rgyud): pA Ni bar+d+ha ban+d+ha badz+ra pA ge na sa rba duN+Da bin+d+haShi nA ya kA na d+hu d+hU baT phaT/ d+hU d+hU bad+d+hA phaT/ rAk+Sha rak+Sha mA~M sar+b+ba sa twA sh+tsa sAhA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba/
245b2(rgyud): gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs pa byas nas
245b3(rgyud): bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya ste/ de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs so// mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis mi tshugs/ chad pas mi tshugs
245b4(rgyud): me dang chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed
245b5(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar
245b6(rgyud): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par gzhag nas de la rtag par srung ba dang /
245b7(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / sbed par byed do// rdo rje po nya mo mngag gzhug brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yongs su myong bar byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// nam dur/
246a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin nyid dang / srin po nyid dang / 'byung po nyid dang / yi dgas nyid dang / sha za nyid dang / srul po nyid dang / lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul por/
246a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
246a3(rgyud): tor nas byung bI gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa'ang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// thub
246a4(rgyud): par ma byas pa'ang thub par byas par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas byas pa can ma yin pa'ang bsnyen gnas byas pa can du 'gyur ro// gang dag
246a5(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de'ang sdig pa ma lus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'ang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa thams
246a6(rgyud): cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'di 'chang na du 'dod pa des kyang bu rnyed de/
246a7(rgyud): tshe dang / bsod nams dang / stobs kyang rab tu ldan no// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang /
246b1(rgyud): nga rgyal dang rgyags pa thams cad dang thal bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis mi ngas dang / ba lang gi nang dang / phrugs nang dang / yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'an/
246b2(rgyud): ba'i nang dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ongs pa la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas maM pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
246b3(rgyud): gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas/ grong khyer
246b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// gzhan gyis/
246b5(rgyud): mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs pa tsam gyis g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nang
246b6(rgyud): dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang /
246b7(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so// dus dus su klog 'byin to// dus dus su 'jug
247a1(rgyud): spogs so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// oM hUM Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+hu sarba dudz+nyA na rak+Sha ma ma sa b+ha ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA sh+tsa swA hA/ oM hUM Sh+To ban/
247a2(rgyud): d+ha ban d+ha/ saHduSh+Ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sA pa ri dA rA s+ya satwAsh+tsa badz+ra pA NI hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te mUr+Ne ni twe dze rA shi/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da
247a3(rgyud): ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshi na da ts+tsho na ngab+hin da b+h+r-i na da hUM hUM phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+t+waM sarba sa twash+tsA sA hAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha sa tA ta pa tre hUM phaT swA hA/ hUM hU raH/
247a4(rgyud): rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA sh+tsa hUM phaT swA hA/ tad+ye thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI re bI re/ bai ra be ra/ so ma sau ma/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Tha ta sarba/
247a5(rgyud): ta thA ga toSh+NI kha si tA ta pa tre sarba duSh+Ta tsi ta tA na hUM phaT swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
247a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom/
247a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir
247b1(rgyud): bzlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ta thA ga toSh+Tha Sha si tA ta pa twe a par dzi ta ma hA thA t+yaM gi ra ba
247b2(rgyud): ma sir d+hi nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlob pa chen mo mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i
247b3(rgyud): gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor
247b4(rgyud): rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
247b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas gtsug tor
247b6(rgyud): rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo //
247b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
248a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig/
248a2(rgyud): rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal
248a3(rgyud): lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
248a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyung /
248a5(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka' thub bzlog pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan sreg med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
248a6(rgyud): legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
248a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das nor
248b1(rgyud): bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das klu'i
248b2(rgyud): gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
248b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
248b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi zla ba
248b5(rgyud): DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
248b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
248b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
249a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal/
249a2(rgyud): lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/
249a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'di 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa
249a4(rgyud): gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad bzlog pa gsod pa dang bcings pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa
249a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa gara' chen po brgyad 'jig par
249a6(rgyud): byed pa dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ ma rungs pa dang sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa dug dang / mngon thams cad dang / me dang / chu las
249a7(rgyud): bzlog pa ngan 'gro'i jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis thub drag shul che// gtum pa chen mo stobs chen po// 'bar ba chen po gzi brjid che// dkar chen 'bar
249b1(rgyud): 'phreng gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyer can ma// rgyas pa'i rdo rje 'phreng zhes grags// pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub 'breng ba can// rdo rje'i
249b2(rgyud): mchu can rnam sgeg mo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma// zhi ba gser gyi 'phreng ba can// dkar chen 'bar ba gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lu gu chud gzhan dang //
249b3(rgyud): rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma// lag na rdo rje rig gser 'phreng // le brgyan rtsi dang rin chen ma// rnam snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags// phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams
249b4(rgyud): cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad srung du gsol/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tra hUM dzAM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ dza ma b+ha na ka rI hUM d+h+waM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ sta ma \u0f7fna ka rI hUM druM hrIHSh+T+r-i/
249b5(rgyud): mo ha na ka rI d+hu d+hA d+hIHSh+T+r-i/ saM b+hak+Sha na ka rI hUM d+h+r-i hrIHSh+Tau/ ban d+ha na ka rI hUM druM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ pa ra bi Sha b+hak+Sha Na ka rI dz+r-I hUM hrIHSh+TaM/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Te nAM s+thAm b+ha na ka r-I hU~M d+h+r-i hAMHSh+TAM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sarba h+na N+DaMH/
249b6(rgyud): d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM d+h+r-i hrIHSh+To/ sarba pa ra bid+yA ts+tshe da na ka rI hUM d+h+waM hrIHSh+To/ tsa tu rA gi tI nI gra ha sa ha srA NAM bi d+haM sa nA ka rAM hU~M dz+nyA hrIHSh+To/ aSh+mA bi sha tI nAM na k+Sha tAM NAM pra sA da na ka r-I hUM d+h+waM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ adz+dza nAM maH
249b7(rgyud): grah+ma NAM bi d+hi sa na~M ka rI hU~M d+hU hrIHSh+T+r-i/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarbas tau sh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tir nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen
250a1(rgyud): mo phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo// dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'brar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa
250a2(rgyud): gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig/ rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// rdo rje spos dang kar mo dang // pad+ma'i
250a3(rgyud): spyan dang zla 'od dang // sangs rgyas dpal dang de bzhin spyan// rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin// rig pa dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag
250a4(rgyud): dang sems can thams cad kun nas srung bar mdzad du gsol/ oM ro Shi ga na pra shAsta sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM d+h+waM/ dzam b+ha na ka rI d+h+waM d+h+waM/ stam b+ha na ka rI hUM d+h+waM ma hA bi drA saM b+hak+Sha NA kA
250a5(rgyud): rI dz+nyA dzAM pa ra bid+ha saM b+hak+Sha Na kA rI hUM d+h+waM/ sarba duSh+TA nA sta ma b+hA na ka rI hUM d+h+waM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha saM gra hU NAM bi d+hi sa na ki rI hUM d+h+waM/ tsa tu rA shaud+d+hi nAM gra hA sa ha sA NAM bi d+hi sa na ka rI r+b+hu d+h+waM/ aSh+Ta \u0f7f
250a6(rgyud): sha tI nAM nak+ShA trA NAM pra sA da na kA rI hU~M trA~M/ ar+g+ha nAM ma hA gra h+NA NAM bi d+hi sa na ka rI hUM d+h+waM rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje'i
250a7(rgyud): gtsug tor phyir bzlog ma chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen
250b1(rgyud): mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang dug gis
250b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa
250b3(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs pa dang /
250b4(rgyud): glog gis 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / gnod
250b5(rgyud): sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang /
250b6(rgyud): lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i
250b7(rgyud): gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gshin rje'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo 'ga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun tu 'phreng ba'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon
251a1(rgyud): las bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ zas su mdangs za ba dang / zas su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas/
251a2(rgyud): su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su phyis za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung
251a3(rgyud): ba dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang
251a4(rgyud): zas su ga tor ma za ba dang / zas su 'phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang
251a5(rgyud): zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba ste gdon de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// kun tu rgyas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
251a6(rgyud): pur bus gdab bo// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dbang
251a7(rgyud): phyag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcang ngo // phur bus gang ba'o// sred med kyi bras byas pa'i rog sngags gcad do// pur bus gad ba'o// nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang ldan/
251b1(rgyud): cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis byas pa'i rig
251b2(rgyud): sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas
251b3(rgyud): byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// b+h+r-i gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag
251b4(rgyud): po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rog sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i
251b5(rgyud): rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// 'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
251b6(rgyud): pubuphur bus gdab bo// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab bo// lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
251b7(rgyud): phur bus gdab bo// pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// drang srong gi tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig
252a1(rgyud): sngags gcad do// brar zas gdaba'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// zur bus gdab bo// mi 'thod pa za ba'i tshogs kyis byas par/
252a2(rgyud): rig sngags go cad do// phur bus gdab bo// bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag
252a3(rgyud): byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la spang du gsol srung du gsol/ oM a si ta a na lAta pra b+hA s+pha Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ ha na ha na dar da ra bi da ra bi dar
252a4(rgyud): ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+na/ b+hin+da b+hiH/ ban d+ha ban d+hA/ hUM hUM phaT phaT sAhA/ snying po'o// he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+hA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha tA ya phaT ba rA dA ya phaT ba ra pra dA ya baT
252a5(rgyud): oM sa ra bi d+hA ba Na karA ya phaT/ pa ra bidrA pa Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yakye b+h+yaHphaT sarba rak+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba thA te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaH
252a6(rgyud): phaT/ sarba bi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kub+d+haN+Da b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pA ta ne b+haHphaT/ sarba skan d+he b+h+yaHban+da ka sarba sun mA de b+hadz+dzapaT / sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHparba
252a7(rgyud): sarba a pa s+phA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo stA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yA ma ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tri nan+di ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kaM prA
252b1(rgyud): ki ma ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a laM ba ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka ta da ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kat+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan d+harbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sa su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka ru De b+h+yaHphaT
252b2(rgyud): sarba ma ho ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sar+b+ba dur laM gi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba draHpre k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+h+ya ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sane b+h+yaHphaTabar+tha
252b3(rgyud): shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHpaT/ sarba pA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+d+ha d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+ha ka rasid d+hi ka ra/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yaHpaT/ tsa tra ra b+h+yo b+ha ki
252b4(rgyud): ni b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra ku pA rI yai badz+ra ku lan d+ha ri b+haHphaT/ sarba pa hA pra t+ya bI ri b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shaM ka lA ya pra t+ya kor rA dzA ya phaT/ pa hA ka lA ya mA tri ga NA na ma skr-i tA ye phaT tharbA NI
252b5(rgyud): phaT/ biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ ma he shwa rI ye phaT/ ru drI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ tsa pud+d+hi ye phaT ku mA rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ in+d+ri ye phaT/ ag+na ye phaT/ yA bA/
252b6(rgyud): ye phaT/ nI ri te ye phaT/ ba ru NA ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ so mA ye phaT/ i shA nI ye phaT/ kA la dat+nI ye phaT/ kA lA rA tI ye phaT/ ya ma ra tri phaT/ ya ma daN+Di ye phaT/
252b7(rgyud): ya ma ru tri ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a ti mu ka ti s+pha shA na ba si nI ye phaT/ oM Sh+To ban d+ha ba na d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ sems can gang su dag bdag la gadrag pa dang gadrag pa'i sems dang
253a1(rgyud): ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul dang drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa dang 'khrug pa'i sems/
253a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas bdag dang sems can thams cad srung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/
253a3(rgyud): ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig/ gnod sbyin dang gdon gang su dag zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su 'phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba

253b5(rgyud): 'don pa'i gdon rnams las bdag srung bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ sbron brgya mthong bar gyur cig/ rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang
253b6(rgyud): nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang rlung
253b7(rgyud): las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ rims nang thams cad dang klad pa na ba bsal
254a1(rgyud): du gsolagazhogs byed na pa dang / yig 'chus pa dang / mig nang dang / sna nad dang kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang lkog ma'i zha gor/
