254a6(rgyud): dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / mi dran pa dang / dbyig drug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byang dang / bdud dang / 'ching ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa dang / dus ma yin par/
254a7(rgyud): 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+yaM bu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mong dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / g.yag rgod dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i
254b1(rgyud): srog chags rnams bsal du gsol/ de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags pats+tshi par bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bya'o//
254b2(rgyud): tAd+yA thA au an le a na la/ kha sa me kha sa me ga bai ra bai raso me so mIshAn+te gAn+te/ dad+he dAn+te bi ShA de biSh+Ta dwe bI ri bA r+ra / de bi badz+ra d+hA raM ban+ta ban+d+ha ni badz+ra pA Ni yA
254b3(rgyud): oM hUM dz+r-IM hrIHSh+T+r-i phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badz+ra pA sha na ma ma sarba duSh+Ta big+h+na bi nA ya kAM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// sus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor
254b4(rgyud): nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam shin shun la bris te lus sam mgul du thogs sam
254b5(rgyud): klog par byed na de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du drug gis mi tshugs/ me dang chus mi tshugs/ dbyig drug gis mi tshugs dug sbyar mas mi tshugs byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin
254b6(rgyud): par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
254b7(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang / grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyis kyang de la rtag tu mthun par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar yang
255a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs po nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi'ang rtag par phyi bzhin yongs su spong bar 'gyur/
255a2(rgyud): ro// nam du'ang yi dgas dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro// pi dbul por mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang
255a3(rgyud): kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis srung ba dang
255a4(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / sbed par mdzad cing / de dag gi thugs su byon pa dang dgyes par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po
255a5(rgyud): n+dan zhes bya ba phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa'ang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// thub par ma byas pa'ang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/
255a6(rgyud): mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur ro// smyung ba ma byas pa'ang spang ba byas par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa byung bar
255a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can phyir bzlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di
255b1(rgyud): 'chang ngam klog na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de tshe dang / bsod nams dang / skyobs kyang rab tu rnyed do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi
255b2(rgyud): nad dang phyugs nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
255b3(rgyud): nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la
255b4(rgyud): grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa chen
255b5(rgyud): mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di btsugs na/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug
255b6(rgyud): pa dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+hA/ ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na le a wa lo ki te tsUr+Na te dzorA shi
255b7(rgyud): oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ tsIn dats+tshin da/ b+hi na da b+hin da hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hUM phaT sA hA/ tad+ya thA/ au a na le a
256a1(rgyud): nA le khas me kha sa me/ byaM ra bai rA/ so me so me/ sarba bud+d+ha ya d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga ton+d+ha Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT hU~M ma ma hAM ni hU~M swA / klu'i rgyal po mtha'
256a2(rgyud): ya sa dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po rnams dus dus su char 'bebs so// dus dus su sprin bsdu ba dang / dus dus su 'brug gi sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro//
256a3(rgyud): nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas nas lan gsum bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
256a4(rgyud): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo/
256a5(rgyud): can gzhan gyis mi zab pa chen mo phyir bzlog pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta b+ha dra dang / lo tsa ba gzu dga' rdor gyis kha che'i
256a6(rgyud): bdud rtsi 'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag khang gi dpe rnying la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa'o// rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si
256a7(rgyud): tA ta pa tre a pa ra dzi ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni bod skad du 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug to ra nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thu ba ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs
256b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun/
256b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
256b3(rgyud): rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag
256b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la
256b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka' thub bzlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan sred
256b6(rgyud): med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa
256b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu'i gdung la phyag
257a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
257a2(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
257a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
257a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DU R+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
257a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
257a6(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
257a7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
257b1(rgyud): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la gsung gi tog gi rgyal po la
257b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog ma
257b3(rgyud): 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba sdang
257b4(rgyud): ba dang / rmi la mngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dka' bar byed pa gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par
257b5(rgyud): byed pa dgra thams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan
257b6(rgyud): gyis mi thub drag shul che// gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che// dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba gos dkar mo// 'phags ma
257b7(rgyud): sgrol ma khro gnyer can// rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'phreng zhes grags/ pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub 'phreng ba can// rdo rje mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo// zhi ba'i lha
258a1(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod ma// gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen po// rdo rje khragu rgyud gzhan dang // rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin pa/
258a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje rig gser 'phreng // le brgad rtsi dang rin chen ma// snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags// rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// rdo rje spros dang
258a3(rgyud): dkar mo dang // pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du ga sol/ srung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM r-i Shi ka Na pra shAs+t+ra ya/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tAta
258a4(rgyud): btwe hUM d+h+waM dzam+b+ha nA kA rI hUM d+h+waM/ stab+hA nA ka rI hU~M d+h+r-i TA ma hA bid+d+ha saM b+hakrA Na ka rI hU~M d+h+waM/ pa ra bid+d+ha saM b+hak+Sha Na ka ri hU~M d+h+waM/ sarba draSh+TA nAM sta~M b+ha na ka rI d+h+waM d+h+waM/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa grA hA N+Da bi d+hi sa naH
258a5(rgyud): rI hUM d+h+waM/ tsa tu ra shI tI nA gra ha~M sa ha srAr+g+haM bid+d+ha sa nA karI hUM d+h+waM/ aSh+Ta bAM sha tI nA nak+Sh+me dzA NAM pra sA da na kA rA d+h+waM trAM/ oMSh+TA nAM ma hA gra hI tAM bid+h+waM sa nA ka ro d+hi d+h+r-i rak+Sha rak+Sha thA/ bcom ldan 'das
258a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas blang ba'i gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog ma chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong
258a7(rgyud): mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pas kun nas bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol
258b1(rgyud): oM rgyal pos 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang / chu yis 'jigs pa dang / drag gis 'jigs pa dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang /
258b2(rgyud): pha rol gyi dpag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang
258b3(rgyud): sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chang pas 'jigs pa dang / lha yis 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs pa dang / klog gis
258b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon/
258b5(rgyud): dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang /
258b6(rgyud): sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang
258b7(rgyud): gnon po'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha zab
259a1(rgyud): dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su spyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi
259a2(rgyud): gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil mi 'thung ba dang / zas su snabs za
259a3(rgyud): ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su 'phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems
259a4(rgyud): 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zlas su sbyin sreg za ba las bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ de dag thams cad
259a5(rgyud): dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// brar bras gdub bo// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phrar bus gdab bo// phyogs bdag chen pos byas pa'i/
259a6(rgyud): rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig
259a7(rgyud): sngags gcad do// phur bus gdaba'o// nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
259b1(rgyud): phur bu sa gdab bo// rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ga cang do//
259b2(rgyud): phur bus gdab bo// b+h+r-i ki ri ti dang / dka' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus kadang ngo po// dge sbyong gcer bus
259b3(rgyud): byas pa'i rig sngags gcad // phur bras gdab bo// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bu sa gdab bo// 'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags ga ca
259b4(rgyud): do// phur bus gdab bo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bu sa gdaba'o// bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas
259b5(rgyud): byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ba dag la srung du gsol oM a si tA na lA rka pra b+ha s+phu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre ka dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da da ra dar/ bi dar/
259b6(rgyud): bid ra/ tsIn dats+tshi rang b+hi na da b+hin da hUM hUM phaT phaT/ he he phaT ho ho paT/ a mo g+haM phaT/ a pra ti ha tA phaT/ ba ra pra dA paT/ pra t+yaM kI ri ti phaT/ a swa ra bi drA ba ka/
259b7(rgyud): phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+haHpa ra/ sarba gan d+harme b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mahor
260a1(rgyud): ge b+hAHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHbaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphar/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHbaT/ sarba kr-i b+hAt+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ne
260a2(rgyud): b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pA ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan d+h+ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a na mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbats+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa skA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mo stA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur lang
260a3(rgyud): ti b+h+yaHpaT/ sarba dur+the k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-i ta karma NA ka kho ra do ki ra Na be tA Da tsits+tsha pre Sha ka du shats+tsharni ta dur b+hu ga te b+h+yaHphyaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma
260a4(rgyud): Ne b+h+yaHpaT/ sarba bid+yA d+hA re b+h+yaHpaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/ sarba ar+tha sA dA ke b+h+yo bidrA tsA re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur b+h+yo b+ha ga ni b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra kau mA rI ye bing+ga rA dzI yai b+h+yaHpaT/ ma hA prash+tsa
260a5(rgyud): gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shring kha lA ya pra traM ki ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma tri ga Na na ma skr-i tI ya b+h+yaHpaT/ biSh+Ta bI ye phaT/ brah+ma tI ye phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA la
260a6(rgyud): daN DI ye phaT/ in+d+ri ye phaT/ r-i drI ye phaT/ kau mA ro ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ tsA prad+d+hi ye phaT/ rA d+hi ye phaT/ kA la rA tI ye phaT/ ya padat+ti yai phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ a ti mu ka \u0f7f
260a7(rgyud): sma sA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su/
260b1(rgyud): mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag zab rnams dang zas su sha za ba rnams dang zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang
260b2(rgyud): zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su stor
260b3(rgyud): khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang
260b4(rgyud): zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su 'phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams
260b5(rgyud): dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang
260b6(rgyud): sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i
260b7(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dpag skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed
261a1(rgyud): kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon/
261a2(rgyud): rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang /
261a3(rgyud): rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad
261a4(rgyud): pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus/
261a5(rgyud): pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ge 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nang dang / mgul
261a6(rgyud): nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang kase na ba dang / rtsibs logs na ba dang / rgya ba na ba dang / lton
261a7(rgyud): ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brlan pa dang rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lagan ba dang // nying lag na pa gsal du gsol/ gdugs/
261b1(rgyud): dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog ma chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shra ba dang / g.yan pa dang

261b6(rgyud): hUM ban d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris
261b7(rgyud): to lus sam mgul la thogs na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du drug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ me yis mi tshugs/ chu yis mi tshugs dbyig drug gis mi tshugs drag sbyar

262a4(rgyud): ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs

265a2(rgyud): dkar mo dang // pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // phyag rgya'i tsho gas de dag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du gsol srang du gsol/ oM re ShI ka na pra shAm+b+ha ya/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NIShasi tA tA pa tre hUM trA~M/ dza maH/
265a3(rgyud): na ka ri hU~M dzA/ s+thAm b+hA ne ka rI d+h+r-i d+h+waM/ ma hA bid+d+ha sAm b+hak+Sha Na kA rI hUM d+h+waM/ pa ra bid+ha sam b+ha.At+yA kA ne dz+nyAM d+h+waM/ sarba draSh+TA naM s+thAm b+ha na ka ra hUM d+h+waM/ sarba yek+Sha rak+Shas rba prA N+DA 'di d+hi sa na ka ri hU~M dz+dza/ tsi d+ha rA shId+ha/

266b5(rgyud): ha phaT ka ba ra pra dA phaT/ ti ki ra ti phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma rung de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka na

267a1(rgyud): ra ke b+h+yaH5Ta/ sarba dur la kri tiSh+ThaH2Ta/ sarba draSh+Te shri te b+h+yaHphadz+ra/ sarba dza ra b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba thaM h+ya karba khor de b+h+yaHphaT/ kir Na be tA De b+h+yaHphaT/ tsats+tsha tha shaka
267a2(rgyud): R+Sha rdi tid+d+ha phaT/ drar b+ha ka teb+h+yaH5Ta/ sarba tIr grIk+kig+h+nAd+hAH/ sarba za pa Nib+h+yaHban+d+ha/ sarba bin+d+ha d+ha b+hU baT/ dza ya kad+ya/ bar+d+ha kAr Sh+Ta phaT/ sarba ar+tha sAt+ma kaM b+h+yo ba~Md+d+hAHraH@
267a3(rgyud): tsatur b+ha ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bid+d+ha rA dzI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA prA t+yaM ki re b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shri kha l+yA ya/ pra d+haM kIr+yA rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma trig Na nA ma s+thi tA ye phaT
267a4(rgyud): biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ brah+ma NI ye phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI yai phaT/ kA la da Na DI ye phaT/ aM na drI ye phaT/ r-i drI ye phaT/ kau mA rA ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ tsA mur+t+ti ye phaT/ rA tI ye
267a5(rgyud): phaT/ kA la rA tri ye phaT/ ya ma dar+t+ti ye phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ a ti mu ka ti sma shA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi
267a6(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams
267a7(rgyud): dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil zab rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za' rnams
267b1(rgyud): dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhags za ba rnams dang / zas sa bachil pa
267b2(rgyud): 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su skabs zab rnams dang / zas su ngang snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag zab rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su 'phreng ba zab rnams
267b3(rgyud): dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo to/ \u0f7f/
267b4(rgyud): za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang
267b5(rgyud): lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang
267b6(rgyud): mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon
267b7(rgyud): rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang
268a1(rgyud): smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / thib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang
268a2(rgyud): nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i
268a3(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang /
268a4(rgyud): rims mi bzang ba rnams dang / rims ldang drab pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams
268a5(rgyud): dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang /
268a6(rgyud): mgul nang dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lga gor na ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / son pa dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na pa dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / rgyaban pa dang / lho na pa dang / rked pa na bdang /
268a7(rgyud): chu son pa dang / brlan pa dang / rje ngaran pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na pa dang / yan lag na ba dang // nying lagan pa dag bsal dra gsol// srung dra gsol/ gdugs dkar mo can
268b1(rgyud): rdo rje gtsug tor nas byung ba phyir zlog ma chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shra ba dang / g.yang ba dang //
268b2(rgyud): 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang // skem pa dang / skrag pa dang / dbyig drag dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byang
268b3(rgyud): dang / me dang / chu dang / mings dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dras ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu d+h+ya ma bra ka dang / trai la ta dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mong dang / seng ge dang
268b4(rgyud): stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / spyang ki dang / chu srin dang / bung ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o//
268b5(rgyud): gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gdon thams cad bcing bar bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badz+ra d+ha ri/ ba na d+hA ban d+ha ni/ badz+ra pA Ni
268b6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ hUM hUM phaT/ bar d+ha phaT phaT swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis me thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di gros
268b7(rgyud): 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam mgul du btags na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs// mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig drug gis/
269a1(rgyud): mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ bud kyis mi tshugs so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / rnam/
269a2(rgyud): par log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dka' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig skyong phrag brgyang cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang ga sbed par byed de/ de rnams
269a3(rgyud): kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dgra' bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// nam du'ang gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ka yi dgas dang / sral po dang / lus srul po
269a4(rgyud): nyid du mi 'gyur ro// mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
269a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa'ang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// thub par ma byas
269a6(rgyud): pa'ang thub par byas par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur/ bsnyen gnas ma byas pa'ang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur/ sbyang ba ma byas pa'ang spyad pa byas par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byas
269a7(rgyud): pa'i sdig pa'ang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'ang ma lus pa zad par 'gyur ro// bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs
269b1(rgyud): dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang / bsod nams dang / skyobs kyang rab tu rnyed do// 'di nas shi 'phos na'ang 'jig rter gyi khams
269b2(rgyud): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nang 'gro ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi
269b3(rgyud): dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim
269b4(rgyud): gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer chen po'i sgor zhugs la grong khyer ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal la ma ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// gzhan gyis mi thub ma
269b5(rgyud): phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs ma thag tu yul khams zhi bar 'gyur ro// yams kyi nang dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'brug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams
269b6(rgyud): cang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+hA/ bdag la srungs shig spungs shig swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ oM hU~M Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+hA badz+re/ bdag la spangs shig srungs shig/
269b7(rgyud): rak+Sha rak+Sha bAM/ badz+ra pA Ni ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Shama.a pa lo ko te mur d+ha te dzi dA shi/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ der ngar bi da ra bi dar/ tsIn dats+tshinang / b+hi nang b+hin nga/
270a1(rgyud): pA d+ha/ []/ 6/ san skyes[]/ ra mas/ 6d+hAm nas /
270a2(rgyud): ti.oM sarba ta thA ga hon+d+hi Sha i hA ta pa tre hU~M phaT swAhA/ b+h+rUM ma ma hA ra~M sAt+ma/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so// sangs d+ha
270a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod/
270a4(rgyud): do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / gtsug tor lha yul/
270a5(rgyud): ma chung ba kha che'i paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta mu kha pra be sha rany+dza bi ma loSh+NI Sha pra b+ha sa sarba ta
270a6(rgyud): thA ga ta hri da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par/
270a7(rgyud): lba ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rin/
270b1(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang / zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor mang po chogs/
270b2(rgyud): pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pas 'khor los
270b3(rgyud): sbyar ba'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de ltar
270b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang lhar skyes pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
270b5(rgyud): pa dang / ji ltar lha'i gzugs 'dod pa dang / bltas pas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu
270b6(rgyud): phyin pa dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / rga shi dang / skye ba las grol ba dang / rdzus te skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i/
270b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum zag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan
271a1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang / thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes/
271a2(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan du sems shing rjes su spyad de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do// de nas lha'i 'khor
271a3(rgyud): de nyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yog lha'i zla bye ba phrag stong dang ldan pa/ lnga'i bu mo khri brgyad skyong gis bskor ba/ lha'i rnam par 'phrul
271a4(rgyud): pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa'i khang bzang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig
271a5(rgyud): yod de/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu mo mchog gi me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang lhan cig dga' ba chen po dang ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la ni chags/ rin po che sna bdun las
271a6(rgyud): byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang bzang gi nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor zhing rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis dregs te snyems shing nyal lo// de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de gnyid kyis log cing lha'i
271a7(rgyud): bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra basbyangs te nyal bar gyur to// de nas gnas mchog der lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mnga' gdong zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa
271b1(rgyud): de la bskul ba/ kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs longs/ khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya/ dga' ba la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/ lha'i longs
271b2(rgyud): spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya/ da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ lha'i longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi gnas gzhal
271b3(rgyud): med khang dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ci dgos/ khyod kyi srog ni yod med kyis// thabs ni myur du rnam soms zhes// de skad ces smras nas lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mnga' gdong mi
271b4(rgyud): snang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas brgyal te phal nas kha spu ba tu sa la lhung ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag ni sgra ni bshig/ rgyan rnams
271b5(rgyud): ni lhung / gos ni bsnyil/ kha nas khrag dang gsher ba ga ni chad nas mchu dang / dkan dang / mid pa dang / lce ni bskams la/ smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni smre ste ngu zhing cho nges 'debs la
271b6(rgyud): hud kyi hud ces 'dzer cing / lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu drang tsan dan gyi chu brang mos 'thor zhing / kha cig ni mgul nas 'ju/ kha cig ni lag pa nas 'ju/ kha cig ni de'i sgra la 'o byed
271b7(rgyud): kha cig ni rkang pa nas 'ju/ kha cig ni mgo la 'ja/ kha cig ni brgyal te 'gyel/ kha cig ni sa'i steng na chu med pa'i nya bzhin du 'gre ldog/ kha cig ni lus la mes tshig pa bzhin du che rjon
272a1(rgyud): kha cig ni smre sngags dra ma 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces zer cing ngu'o// de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba sangs te dran pa thob nas/ kha nas khrag stun
272a2(rgyud): cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyams su myong nas shugs ring du phyung ste lus 'dar zhing rlung gi shugs kyis btab pa bzhin du g.yo bar gyur la/ sgra basbyangs pa'i snying gis rings pa rings par
272a3(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la gtugs te/ rkang pa gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyab
272a4(rgyud): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid can sgrub tu gsol/ lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong gis smra ba thos nas/ badrag dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus
272a5(rgyud): bgyid de zhes mchi zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba soms shig ces mchi na/ lha'i dbang po thabs gang gis 'chi ba dag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror mchi bar
272a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur bar 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol/ lha'i dbang po ci nas kyang bdag 'chi bdag gi sgo nas thar pa'i cho gas bdag la sgrub tu gsol/ de nas lha'i dbang
272a7(rgyud): po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu ma 'jigs shig/ gang gis 'chi bdag pham par
272b1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
272b2(rgyud): mya ngan las brgal ba bla na med pa'i sman pa yod de/ de ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / rtsa lag bzang po dang / dpung gnyen dang / pha ma lta bur gyur pa yin no// de ni ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par
272b3(rgyud): mdzad pa yin gyis/ 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myur du 'dong ngo // de nas de'i tho rangs lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / lha'i bu dang /
272b4(rgyud): lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan ga la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum
272b5(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dman pa'i tshig bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
272b6(rgyud): lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mnga' gdong gis bskul to// de dgrang bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 'chi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du
272b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig gsan nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/
273a1(rgyud): 'dzum pa bstan pa des zhal nas kha dog du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer byung ba des skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'od/
273a2(rgyud): zer gyi snang ba des lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // zho 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi gnas
273a3(rgyud): rnams snang bar byas nas bskul te/ bskul nas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so// zhugs
273a4(rgyud): thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi bdag gi sgo'i 'jigs par 'gyur ba de nyon cig/
273a5(rgyud): 'di gal te 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzang ba chen po drag po'i tshor ba sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur ro// thog mar ni grong khyer chen po wA rA NA sir
273a6(rgyud): smyig ma mkhan gyi phyi sa khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha za mo phag mgo can du skye bar 'gyur te/ phyis khung de na bshang gci za'o// phyi sa khung de nyid kyi nang na srog chags bye ba brgya stong gnas te/ de dag dus
273a7(rgyud): gsum du phag mo de'i sha za zhing keng rus 'ba' zhig lus par byed do// de nas yang las kyi dbang gi dbang kun rdzogs par 'gyur te lo bdun tshang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/
273b1(rgyud): de nas dgon par rus sbal gyi skye gnas su s+ye la/ de na chu'i ming yang mi grag cing shing grib kyang med de'i tshan gyis lus gdungs shing tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya rog dag gis lus btogs nas lus
273b2(rgyud): dum bur 'gyur ro// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhig par 'gyur te/ lo lnga tshang bar de ltar 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ wA rA NA si de nyid du chu 'bab rgya chen
273b3(rgyud): po'i nya chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med par ro 'phangs nas lus chen po de la sbrul gdugs pa dang / bya rog dang / sre mo dang / khyi dang / gzig dang / dred dang / 6
273b4(rgyud): spyang la sogs pas za'o// srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang za'o// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung zhing zad par 'gyur te lo gsum de ltar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas
273b5(rgyud): nas khyim bdun du skye zhing 'dzam bu'i gling gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ mdze can gyi khyim dang / dbul po'i khyim dang / g.yung po'i khyim dang / shan pa'i khyim dang / rigs ngan gyi khyim dang / gdol
273b6(rgyud): papa'i khyim dang / dmus long gi khyim du skyes te lo drug cu'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal de dag myong nas/ de nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa
273b7(rgyud): brgyang cu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste brgyal mi'i lus thob na'ang dbul ba dang / yan lag ma tshang ba
274a1(rgyud): dang / shes rab chung ba dang / yi ge mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang thal ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis spyad pa dang / rtag tu gom pa
274a2(rgyud): dang bkres pa sems pa dang / tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
274a3(rgyud): shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid mi dga' nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag re ba ma mchis par gyur to// bdag la skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
274a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'chi bdag gi chang pa chen po'i gnyen po yod kyis/ de bas na re ba med par ma byed cig/ des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'chi
274a5(rgyud): ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyur
274a6(rgyud): ro// shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos bcom
274a7(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
274b1(rgyud): lha thams cad skyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das skye dgu'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
274b2(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa bsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgrag tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sem
274b3(rgyud): can rnams dbugs dbyung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phyog bcu kun gyi de
274b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen po gdab tu gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du
274b5(rgyud): gnyen po ston pa chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de skad ces gsol pa thugs su chud nas/ rnam pa
274b6(rgyud): kun tu rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor gyi dbus nas byung nas
274b7(rgyud): des phyogs kun tu snang bar byas te rin po che'i gdugs lta bur nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka'
275a1(rgyud): sbal to// lha'i dbang po bcu byin kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par sdang bde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang ga dam tshig la rnam par \u0f7f/
275a2(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags zung zhig/ phyag rgya 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o//
275a3(rgyud): gzungs sngags mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro dang // ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sngon/
275a4(rgyud): gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur te// dper na me yis rdza bsregs pa// rlung gis thal ba myur du deng/
275a5(rgyud): de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la// bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad sreg/ dper na char pa 'bab 'gyur te// ri la 'bab chu babs pa yis// sa yi steng gi phyag dar dang // nyal nyil thams cad 'dod
275a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// de bzhin gzungs 'di mthong ba dang // thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa 'dag/ dper na me yis gser sbyangs pa// sos bcad rung bar snyi bar 'gyur// de bzhin bzlas brjod byas
275a7(rgyud): tsam gyis// lus skyong 'gyur te the tsom med// dper na nyi ma shar gyud na// 'od zer kun tu rab tu 'byung // de bzhin su zhig gzungs 'chang ba// de yi lus kyang rnam par mdzes/ dper na
275b1(rgyud): sa pa por nya 'gre rdzog/ chu dang bral bas 'chi gror 'gro// la las slar yang rgyang bo bas// de na gnas shing yang ce'o// de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang // mi rnams tshe thog par byed// zhwag/
275b2(rgyud): dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig/ nasaH sarba twa thAg tA nA~M/ oM maH tsan+da ma rti dz+wa lan/ sdug gaN+DI rA/ a kAr+b+ha la sa kad+ha ma a san+d+han+ta rA sa swa n+ta ra/ san+d+ha ra san+ta ra/ k+Shas 6na/
275b3(rgyud): k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni k+Shu NAk+Sha Na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ha ma hA sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA b+hA ba nA/ sA ga re/ sa sho d+ha ya/ mAM sar+b+bA satwA sh+tsa/ b+ha ga ba ti sar+b+ba pA paM bi ma le/ dza ya dz+r-i ya/ dza pa lad+d+ha
275b4(rgyud): s+phu Ta s+phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ big ta a ba ra Ni/ b+ha ya ha ra Ni/ hUM hAMdz+dza/ br-i t+ya daN+Da d+ha re/ a b+ha ya pra de uSh+NI Sha bya ba lo ki ti/ sa maN+Da mu She/ sa san+ta bya ba lo ki te/ ma hA ma ye/
275b5(rgyud): mahA bA sha d+ha re/ sa soH bi ma le/ a kaR+Sha sa a kAR+Shaya/ AkAn+d+ha pa sa kan+d+ha ya/ thar b+har/ sa thar pa zlar/ oMn+d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha nI/ b+hU She Na thA dza/ ma hA mad+hA/ bi la
275b6(rgyud): dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+he sid+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha naM saM bo d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+hA ni saM sho d+hA ni/ bri sho d+hA ni bi sho d+ha ni/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ma sar+b+ba pA paM/ sarba ta/
275b7(rgyud): thAg ta kra la b+hu dze/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ pra sa raM hu ma ma pra N+ye/ bi nA shwan+d+ha pA paM sar+b+ba ki la bi Shaha ra/ ma Ni bi shrad+d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi ma la~M/ bi ka si ta pad+de/ ka ba tsi ta b+ha dze/ Sha T+TA ra mita
276a1(rgyud): pa ri bA ra Ni/ sar+b+ba tanag Sh+TI ShA bi log te swAhA/ sar+b+ba ta thAg ta prad+d+ha d+hiSh+ThA na d+hiSh+Thi ke swA hA/ sA y+Yarba te swAH/ prad+hud d+he swAhA/ pud+d+ha du lo ki tI swAhA/ prar+d+ha sa pa loka/
276a2(rgyud): te sAhA/ mr-i t+yA dat+te swA hA/ ya ma daN+De sAhA/ ya me d+hu te swA hA/ saM ha ra Ni swA hA/ saM b+ha ra Ni swAhAM/ san+d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ pra ti sa ra Ni swAhA/ oM dzo be ti swAhA/ te dzo ba ti swAhA/ dza ya ba ti swAH
276a3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta mu drA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags 'di lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su ston cig/ des ni khyod kyis lha'i bu de la yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar
276a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par zha ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi
276a5(rgyud): nang du gzhug go// mchod rten gsar pa 'am rnying pa'ang rung ste de'i nang du gzhug/ spos dang byug pa'ang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan
276a6(rgyud): gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su bltas te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro// a karu dang du ru ka'i bdug
276a7(rgyud): pas bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa la rig sngags kyi snying po 'di bris te mchod rten
276b1(rgyud): gyi nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na/ gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du
276b2(rgyud): bcug par 'gyur ro// ring 'asrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro// snying po 'dri bris la gzhug go// oM na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he dz+wA la dz+wa la/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he saM tha ra ma sa sa/
276b3(rgyud): yuHsaM sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya ma ma sar+b+ba pA paM/ sarba ta thA ta sa man+doSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shrad+d+he hUM hUM hUM hUM/ aM baM saM dzaHswA hA/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dus
276b4(rgyud): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di la gus par byas te/ mchod rten gyi las byas na tshe zad pa las slar nur te tshe ring por sbyong bar byed do// gal te shi 'phos na'ang sprul gyi
276b5(rgyud): pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad nam yang 'chi ba'i
276b6(rgyud): tshor ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad sems can dmyal ba'i
276b7(rgyud): sgra na ma du'ang grags par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das las bzung /
277a1(rgyud): nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam langs pa dang rang gnas su song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du chog go rams
277a2(rgyud): bzhin du mchod rten gyis las byas nas/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'ang byas pa dang / byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams cad
277a3(rgyud): dang bral te/ lus rnam par dag nas pags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/ skra dang mig ni mtho na mthing lta bur gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mngon du mthong / nam mkha'i
277a4(rgyud): dbyings nas de bzhin gshegs pas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung ni phyung ngo // de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lus su gyur pa mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzung ste rab tu dga'
277a5(rgyud): nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la rig sngags/ a la la chos/ 'bras bu 'phral du ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje mchog tu che ba yid bzhin gyi nor
277a6(rgyud): bu de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha'i bu de rang gnas su song nas lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs blangs te
277a7(rgyud): lhalha'i gos dang / spang pa dang / rgyan kyang blangs nas g.yog 'khor thams cad dang / lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang dga' ldan gyi gnas su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
277b1(rgyud): ga la ba der dong nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jug go// de nas rgyal po chen po
277b2(rgyud): bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes// bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
277b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sug las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mi bzad cing shin tu tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom
277b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa dag legs par dris so// de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// lag na rdo rje sngon byang ba 'das
277b5(rgyud): pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na yangs pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ byang ba// gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ gzugs bzang zhing
277b6(rgyud): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems
277b7(rgyud): shing sgo ba la mang du byed de/ sems can thams cad la phan phrar 'dod do// de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rang snang zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba/
278a1(rgyud): zhig gnas te/ khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu stegs la dad do// bram ze de ni khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po dang bcas pa spros
278a2(rgyud): kyang / khyim bdag de ni de la dang pa'i sems mi skyed par/ de 'di snyam du sems te ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum bur gtubs la nya dang rus sbal sreg pa bzhin du bor te khar ngan skyugs kyis dgang ngo
278a3(rgyud): snyam mo// de nas 'di snyam du bsam pa thag tu khyim bdag de la sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis btab bo// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi kar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste/ shi nas sems
278a4(rgyud): can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te/ der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo // de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang / phag dang / rus sbrul gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong
278a5(rgyud): ngo // de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te/ der yang bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo // de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer de nyid du dmus long gi khyim
278a6(rgyud): duduskyes te/ dmus long du gyur nas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang / gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang / de la dge slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/ des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas
278a7(rgyud): par byas te zan byin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'ang bsngags so// dbus long des gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur nas bram zede'ang dran te/ rjes su sems shing kye ma'o//
278b1(rgyud): sa sgyu nga sgyu sa smra/ sa sa na / /
278b2(rgyud): nang ma lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bsod cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na khyis bdag dpras long du gyur pa de gzhan ni shu yin snyam du myong dogs shing the tsam tha'a'am me
278b3(rgyud): gnyis sa gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/ zhwa'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis bsdam par bya'o// lakun rdo rje las nges 'bras bu rnam par drin pa
278b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo // lha'i bu 'dis byang chub kyi snying por mthar thug gi bar du las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo // lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur pa
278b5(rgyud): de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom mam yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyid do// dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrog pa'i dge slong de ni 'jam dpal gnon
278b6(rgyud): nur gyur pa 'di nyid de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' ba thob par gyur te/ ca co dang gzha'i sgra chen
278b7(rgyud): po byung nas// a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis
279a1(rgyud): song ni phyir mi ldog par zar to// lha'i tha mo bye ba 'bum phrag 'bum ni bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so// de nas/
279a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la gan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi tshig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dri ni mthu che ba phun yon che ba lags so//
279a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing / gang gis sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su grol bar mdzad pa'i cho ga
279a4(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di'i phan yon dang sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
279a5(rgyud): bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// ring bsrel gyi snying po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
279a6(rgyud): ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor bar bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// des nI kang+ka'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi/
279a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//
279b1(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyur ro// sbrul gi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor/
279b2(rgyud): nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye zhing pad+ma
279b3(rgyud): las skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lha 'dod par 'gyur ro// bsams pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su
279b4(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos gsar pa bgos te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o// snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o// mchod rten
279b5(rgyud): lnga gdab par bya'o// rig sngags 'di'ang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o// mchod rten bzhi ni grwa bzhir gzhag go// gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// shing bu btsug
279b6(rgyud): te ba dan dmar po sbyang bar bya'o// me tog gis gtor ro// bum pa gang ba lnga gzhag go// grwa bzhir pog por bzhi nas dru ru ka dang / a kA ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul gyi 'dug
279b7(rgyud): pas 'dug par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o//
280a1(rgyud): nad kyis btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang tshabs che ba dang / tshe zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / pha rol gyi dpag/
280a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis skrag pa dang / bu 'dod pa dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go// rma bya'i sgo lngas byab par bya'o// mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o// cho ga 'di lan
280a3(rgyud): cig byas na bskal par bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro// nang thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / drang
280a4(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshi marje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad lus yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
280a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig pa 'gyur
280a6(rgyud): ro// tshe zad pa'ang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs te sha zad pa'ang lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lus shin tu yongs su rdzogs par dag par
280a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bsam pa'ang yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyin chang 'chi bdag gi sgor sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus
280b1(rgyud): bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad par/
280b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 'di'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa
280b3(rgyud): dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas na 'jigs pa med pa'i lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo//
280b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur/
280b5(rgyud): ro// tshe rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs gcig tu brgyud pa/
280b6(rgyud): rnams su'ang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa de dang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir
280b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs
281a1(rgyud): sngags 'di gnyis lar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod chen la bskor ba byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bral du mchod rten las sgra
281a2(rgyud): 'byung ste legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'phral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma dang ser sna dang / phrag
281a3(rgyud): dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las
281a4(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na'ang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras na'ang bya'i tshogs
281a5(rgyud): yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// za na khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / byi la dang / sre mo dang / srog chags sna tshogs la spras na'ang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bye ma la lan Di shu rtsa gci
281a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du gtor na/ gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mtho ris su
281a7(rgyud): skyes pa de dag gi lus la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gcan gzan dang bya sna tshogs gang dag dur khrod der 'gro ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ril gtor na ri dgas
281b1(rgyud): dang bya chub de dag thams cad 'de 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod/
281b2(rgyud): byas na/ gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung ras gdung bas bsregs pa las 'phral du yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ gal te mgul nas
281b3(rgyud): thag pa gtags te khrid pa'ang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ro// de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par
281b4(rgyud): 'gyur te the tsom med do// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'ang bran bzhin du sems shing 'dug go// lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi
281b5(rgyud): khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'chi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ 'bum tshang nas mchod rten thams
281b6(rgyud): cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la gnas pa 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma
281b7(rgyud): snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng ba byas ra dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
282a1(rgyud): pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o// gang dag de la bya ba rnams byed pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par
282a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dod pa de dag
282a3(rgyud): kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// thu na grib mas pa na'ang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ bya ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni brjod par mi rus so//
282a4(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i
282a5(rgyud): bude dag dang / brgya byir la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lnga'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
282a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lAn+da gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs
282a7(rgyud): sngags mthu chen po 'di ri yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang thos par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ldan cig tshogs nas skad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na yid bzhin gyi nor bu
282b1(rgyud): rin po che 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyas par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la bsgrags par bgyi'o// 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can cher po de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing rtag tu rgyur mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /
282b2(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig
282b3(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyed la gtad do// 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tror dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
282b4(rgyud): snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI lerU bo dI dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur
282b5(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ sarba ma na an mi ti sid+d+histu pe nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes pa thams cad mthar phyin par
282b6(rgyud): grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
282b7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la/
283a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la// mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med// spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal// rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
283a2(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lnga las grub pa/ gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang / tshad
283a3(rgyud): med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang / rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyings kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na/ lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang /
283a4(rgyud): byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs/
283a5(rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor drang thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams las 'od zer kha drog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu skad cig bkye sde
283a6(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas/ mtha' yas
283a7(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang / rig pa rnams smra shes pa dang / 'theng po rnams dang / zha ba rnams 'gro zhing yan lag
283b1(rgyud): rangs pa dang / nad pa rnams nad drang bral ba dang / dmyal ba rnams tshe phri nas rim gyis sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas
283b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyis mchod rten chos kyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te/ 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs
283b3(rgyud): brnyan du gyur to// de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phen dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab dang /
283b4(rgyud): dril bu dang / dar dpyangs dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bshos dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas
283b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgron po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi mA la uSh+NI sha'i gzungs
283b6(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
283b7(rgyud): zhig gis 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngamang / bris sam/ klog gam/ ming nyan par byed na/ de mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / sdig pa'i las ni byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang
284a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bi ma la uSh+NISha'i rig pu chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o// oM d+hu drA sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wA la d+hArma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ sa~M hA
284a2(rgyud): A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga tA sa man uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rig pa
284a3(rgyud): rnon mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba dang /
284a4(rgyud): rig pa chen mo 'di lus sum mgul du thogs na/ de lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid ri brag gam/ tshal lam/ dgon pa 'am/
284a5(rgyud): sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na rI dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// oM tru d+hu sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya bar+b+ba dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+hesaM ha ra Na/ A yuH
284a6(rgyud): saM sho dA ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le shud d+he/ ma hA bi ra dze ra gaM bi ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ bi bi sa ra a a la~M swA hA/ zhes brjod nas se ga ni thams cad kyang mdzod rten
284a7(rgyud): byi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid chu 'am/ chu bo 'am/ mtsho 'am/ rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la brgal ba na'ang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur
284b1(rgyud): s+ho oM sI ya d+hA sarba twa thA ga rjid ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma hA d+ha kar+the/ sraM har NA A luHsa sho d+ha s+ya/ b+hA pa~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta bi ma la uSh+NI mi shung d+he/ ma hA bi ra dze ra ga b+hI ri sa d+d+harmAnatu/
284b2(rgyud): bi bi sa ra/ a ma ma ki swA hA/ zhes brjod na chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bta
284b3(rgyud): nA rnganam mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rjer gyi 'ang bzhin du 'gyur ro// oM s+t+rai ya d+hA sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i dra ya/ gaR+She dz+wa la d+har+m+ma d+ha tu gar+b+heHsaM ha ra NA A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga ta ga man/
284b4(rgyud): bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud d+he/ ma hA bi ra rtse ra gaM b+hI ra si d+harma d+ha tu bi bi sa ra a a e khaM ya swA hA/ zhes brjod na nam mkha'i khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gyur te/ phyag bya ba dang / bskor/
284b5(rgyud): ba bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bzlas te/ 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la'ang mchod rten btab na nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dag par
284b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sa dung / shing dang / rdo dang / 'jim pa dang / 'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur
284b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ oM rat+na tsi ti paM tse bi li sa ra swA hA/ zhes brjod nas pa'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/
285a1(rgyud): grang zhig gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang / shing dang / kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//
285a2(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyis brlab ma bzhugs pa'i phyir ro// rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te btab na/ 'byung ba chen po gang
285a3(rgyud): la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa
285a4(rgyud): chen mo 'das byin gyis brlabs te rdo dang shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de/ bcu gcig/
285a5(rgyud): kun tu 'od kyis thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te gser dang / dngul dang / bai rbaR+Ya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sA la chen/
285a6(rgyud): po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na mchod rten gcig btab na rang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo 'dis pa btag
285a7(rgyud): na bye ba btab kyang gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gong ma bzhin no// rig pa chen mo de'i sngags 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ sUk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+ma shAn+te shan+te/ ni ku le/ ya sho te dzogs rba bu
285b1(rgyud): aSh+Ta na/ a d+hiSh+Ti he/ a nu mi de swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni 'dri yin te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ro//
285b2(rgyud): brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
285b3(rgyud): kyang brjod par mi nus so// khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// 'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi
285b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so// de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chud gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni thogs mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam
285b5(rgyud): mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas der sa bdag byin gyis byurlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa
285b6(rgyud): mchod rten dang dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste/ thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/ oM badz+ra sU tra hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud
285b7(rgyud): par dmigs nas mchod rten gyis khyon ji tsam ran pa dang / 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam ran pa thig gis sa gcad/ de bzhin du sa gcad na sa gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang
286a1(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng ni mur pa sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen po'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/ oM badz+ra kI li kI li kI la ya sarba dur+N+Na hUM phaT
286a2(rgyud): ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje phur bu dmigs te dbus dang thA gzhir gdab bo// de bzhin du btab na mi dang mi ma yin pa las srung bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni
286a3(rgyud): ma gtogs so// seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar gzhag go// de nas ti lA dang yungs kar la rig pa ched mo'i sngags 'di ba
286a4(rgyud): par bya'o// oM a mr-i te ha na da na hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te sa'i phyogs su gtor bas/ sa phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//
286a5(rgyud): ltar sa ga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlabs te/ bragegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de/ spos dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pa/
286a6(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang lA ma yir la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags nas phyogs de'ang
286a7(rgyud): shin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o// oM badz+ra kha na kha na hUM pa Ta
286b1(rgyud): ces bzlas shing sa ga ni de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma
286b2(rgyud): gcig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste brdung ngo // badz+ra mud ba ra a ko Ta ya hUM
286b3(rgyud): phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na nyon mongs pa dang bag chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba ni spos chub
286b4(rgyud): la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas gtugs te/ spos chu de'i nang du'ang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas par dmigs te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
286b5(rgyud): 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/ spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ ces bya ba lan/
286b6(rgyud): bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra pra mdza
286b7(rgyud): nA laM hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun brjod de/ 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis
287a1(rgyud): brlab pa ni 'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thAsu k+She sU k+Sha
