287a2(rgyud): shAn+te/ shAn+te/ d+han+te/ dAr+Ne/ nir ku le/ ya she ya shro bA ti te dzo shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sarba 'jug pa/ a d+hiSh+Thi te tra.A na mo te tsi te swAhA zhes bdag nyid kyis rig pa chen mo 'di
287a3(rgyud): lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam pa lnga phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcur
287a4(rgyud): 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro// 'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
287a5(rgyud): sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ sa lan bdun bzlas te/
287a6(rgyud): zin gyis brlabs na/ 'bi'i bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phros shing khyab ste 'gro ba mang po'i doran byed par 'gyur ro// 'od zer
287a7(rgyud): gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'bi nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel gong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas 'bi 'bi'i nang du bi ma la
287b1(rgyud): uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa 'am/ gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shog pu 'am shing shun la sngags bris pa dang / de'i nang du rigs lnga so so'i snying po// oM tru~M tra~M hri AH
287b2(rgyud): de rnams phrugs su sbyar te mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa 'am/ yi ger bris pa 'am/ gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig
287b3(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gar+b+he swAhA/ zhes bya ba bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro// yid kyis kyang dmigs so//
287b4(rgyud): de nas tsai t+ye'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar rab/ til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o// oM A ra dze bi re dzi swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de
287b5(rgyud): nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rter 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o//
287b6(rgyud): oM badz+ra mud ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab ra dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de nas bi ma la uSh+NI she'i
287b7(rgyud): snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten 'byam klas par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten phor bu'i nang nas dbyung ba'i
288a1(rgyud): rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dri brjod la dbyung ngo // oM d+harma d+hA tu ye swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te/ mchod rten phyung na thabs dang shes
288a2(rgyud): gnyis su med pra 'brel bra las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'brum klas pa 'byung ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro//
288a3(rgyud): de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rten snod nas phyung ba las 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM pra ma Na ye swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas 'khor
288a4(rgyud): lo btsugs na rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i shar bu dang / dar gyi ldab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyan/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon/
288a5(rgyud): tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas mchod rten na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas lnga
288a6(rgyud): gsol to// oM d+harma drA tu swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he d+harma te swAhA/ zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil/
288a7(rgyud): 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong
288b1(rgyud): tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig rdo'i sngags bu brtsig pa ri sa 'am/ rdo leb bam/ shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te/ 'og gi khri'ang seng ge'i khri 'am/ rin po che'i khri'am/
288b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i khri stegs bu byas la/ de'i steng du 'gro ma yang dang spos chus chag chag btab ste/ dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun tu gur kum dang tsan dan gyi chus zlum por bskug
288b3(rgyud): la/ srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'ang mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya
288b4(rgyud): 'am stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa gcad par bya'o// mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri
288b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha stu pe swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten
288b6(rgyud): bzhag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni/ dang po dbus su dgod/ de nas shar du dgod/ de nas lhor dgod/ de nas nub tu
288b7(rgyud): dgod/ de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o// dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra pad+ma sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo rje
289a1(rgyud): dang ng+gA'i gdanas bzugs su gsol zhes byas las ga'i dang / rnam pa 'a'i khams dang / rgya mtshor 'jing thams cad mchod chen gyis gang bar med kyi gyu sa
289a2(rgyud): so// gzhan yang mchod rter re re bratab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/ mchod rten gyi
289a3(rgyud): dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni zhi ba'i dkar po// rgyas pa'i ser po dang dbang dmar po// srung ba ljang khur dmigs te na bza' yang de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so// de
289a4(rgyud): nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge raM dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste hUM raM swA hA/ zhes lan gsum
289a5(rgyud): brngas pas de nyid ye shes kyi me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur
289a6(rgyud): de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga 'am/ brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge a dkar po glanas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngas
289a7(rgyud): 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hUM phaT/ ces grangs ji tsam ran par bzlas na mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so//
289b1(rgyud): de nas mchod rjen gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang ba der bltas la/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/ snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
289b2(rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/ sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprir phung
289b3(rgyud): bzhir du mthar 'byam klas par 'phros shing / sems can gyi khams thams cang du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du yid kyis kyang
289b4(rgyud): dmigs so// de nas marjod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la
289b5(rgyud): rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi nang na rin po che'i sa
289b6(rgyud): bzhi dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de ltar du mchod den re re
289b7(rgyud): btab ste bzhag nas de la mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas ni/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / 'bras chen dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang / 'dra zhing dgod pa dang / tha re dang /
290a1(rgyud): 'phan dang / gdugs dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i rig pa chen mo 'di brjod/
290a2(rgyud): par bya'o// oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe swA hA/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrig shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bebs par 'gyur ro//
290a3(rgyud): de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po chu re res mchod cing yon du da ru chung dang / 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang gdugs bu chung yang rung ste re re dbul
290a4(rgyud): lo/ de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab lags na/ dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyi phyogs bani dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang
290a5(rgyud): rgyar dang / cha lugs dang / 'khor phun sum tshog slu pa tshul bzhin du dgongs te dmigs par bya'o// ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de'ang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing
290a6(rgyud): gsal ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs kyi snying po dang / rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re ba kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dang zhing 'tsher ba gcig tu dmigs la
290a7(rgyud): de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam klas par rigs lnga phyogs bcur 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyi nam mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug
290b1(rgyud): par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'di mdzad cing reb bskangs nas slar 'dus nas de nyid kyi dri/
290b2(rgyud): gtsug dang thugs kar phog/ 'phrin las kyis sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/ dung phor gyi nang du spos chab dang dri sna tshog
290b3(rgyud): sbyar ba'i argas gsol to// arga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung phor bzhag la/ spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud
290b4(rgyud): rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/ mchod pa dbul ba'i rig pa chen po 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a mr-i te ar+g+haM me pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du
290b5(rgyud): gdugs shing sbrengs te phul nas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro// tshig tu'ang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do// de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis
290b6(rgyud): dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste/ ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigs so// de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog cing lan ci mang du brjod
290b7(rgyud): par byas/ bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par btab par bya'o// cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi bde'ang rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi skur sbyar ba las dgongs pa ma nyams par bya ste/ mchod rten
291a1(rgyud): dang mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs te/ mchod rten btab na'ang chog rgyas par bya ba dang 'draste
291a2(rgyud): 'gal ba med do// de bzhin du ma gyur na'ang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa nyid 'di yin te/
291a3(rgyud): mchod rten de de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag dge gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'dri ma brjod na mchod rten la mchod pa phul zhing mnga'
291a4(rgyud): gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro// zhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo // rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing// dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi gsapa
291a5(rgyud): bas/ mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams// btab kyang rdzogs par yong mi 'gyur// zhes 'byung ngo // gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas/ mchod rten dang sku gzugs btab pa'i
291a6(rgyud): yon tan ni ji skad du/ mchod rten cho ga dam pa 'di// bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni// gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis// gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra// yun rings dus nas 'khor ba yi//
291a7(rgyud): mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams// ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byung // tshe ring phur sum tshogs par 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan du skyes nas kyang // rigs mchog dam par skyes pa na// longs spyod
291b1(rgyud): mchog dang rab ldan zhing // 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal por skyes// tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur// dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du// dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing // bdeg
291b2(rgyud): kyi gnod pas de mi bskyod// bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur// mthar ni mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rdzogs so// / mchod rten gcig ya ni/
291b3(rgyud): chad bye ba man chad ga ba pa'i sngags dang bsam pa'i rgyud ni kun kyang 'dra'o// de lnga mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang cho ga ni/ 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams
291b4(rgyud): cad la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// na mas+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAn/ dzi nA nAn/ ban d+he rat+na tra yan shu b+hA na/ ak+Sho b+hU a mi tA ban tsa ban de/ a daM a lo ki taM/ na mas+t+ra d+ha nu ga tA
291b5(rgyud): nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA gu tA nAn/ suk+Sh+me suk+Sh+me/ nA ka de/ shan+te/ dAn+de/ shrI ba ni rA ku la~M/ ya she ya sho ba ti/ ti dze te dzo ba ti/ sarba bud d+ha ad+hISh+Ti twe swAhA/ mu dra 'debs bya'o 'dzib 'am/
291b6(rgyud): sngags bri ba'i tshe lan bdun gdon pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bu d+hA rA na/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nAn/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags la/ oM badz+rod b+ha bA ya swA hA/
291b7(rgyud): tse ti'i por bu'i nang dang / sa tsa'i nang du phye ma btab pa'am/ snum gyis byugs pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra sa ri dze bir dze swA hA/ phyag rgya'am sngags gzhug pa'i sngags pa/ o d+ha mA hru rje /
292a1(rgyud): tse ti'i phor bur 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA/ zo ba rdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/ oM badz+ra mud ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM/ tse ti'i phor bu nas phyir/
292a2(rgyud): dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma ra te swA hA/ 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM b+h+ra ma ta na ye swA hA/ tse ti'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag pa'i sngags la/ oM su pre tiSh+Thi badz+re swA hA/ cho ga de
292a3(rgyud): lngar byas na tse ting gcig btab pas bye ba snyed btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'ji ba can gyis grar na bar bslus na/ nad mdze'i rnam
292a4(rgyud): pa bco brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rasmi bi ma la bi shud+d+he pra b+ha NA nA ma d+hA ra Ni
292a5(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
292a6(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi pho brang gi 'khor gyi khyams chen po ra dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang
292a7(rgyud): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
292b1(rgyud): dang / 'jam dpal dang / shes rab 'od dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa rnams dang / wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
292b2(rgyud): lA ma yir dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das la zhe sar byas/ ri mor byas/ bkur stir
292b3(rgyud): byas te/ yongs su bskor ba la chos stor cing bzhugs so// de'i rje ser skya'i grong khyer na gnas pa bram ze chen po ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yid mi ches shig/
292b4(rgyud): log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig gi tshe gzhan zhig gis rmi ltas su rmis te bstan pa/ bram ze chen po khyod de ste zhag bdud na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba thos nas/ bram ze de
292b5(rgyud): shin tu'ang mi dga' ste 'jigs skrag nas yid la bsams pa/ da bdag gis srog gi skyabs su la btsal bar bya/ yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no
292b6(rgyud): zhes grag na/ bdag de'i gar du song ste// de thams cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag ni 'jigs pas nyam thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs mdzad pa'i phyir chos ston gor ma chag go snyar bsams
292b7(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ba dang / rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spobs te sems
293a1(rgyud): shing 'dug pa la/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ sgrib mi mngar bras bram ze'i bsam pa mche/
293a2(rgyud): nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgongs te bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdud na 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 'gro mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye
293a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal bachen po bcu drug tu kha brgyud de skye bar 'gyur ro// de las thar nas kyang rigs ngar shan pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas
293a4(rgyud): kyang phag gi lus su skye bar 'gyur te/ rtag tu ngan sgyogs mi gtsang ba za zhing 'dam rdzab kyi nang du'ang yun ring du gnas te/ rgyun du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas gas te mi'i lus thob na'ang
293a5(rgyud): shin tu dbul ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / dri nga ba dang / mdog mi sdug cing gnag pa dang / lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang / mdze nad can du 'gyur te/ skye bo yongs la mi sdug cing rtag tu bkres pas nyam
293a6(rgyud): thag pa skye bo yongs kyis spad pa/ rtag par rdeg btsog bya zhing shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de thos nas/ bram ze de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid gdungs
293a7(rgyud): bas dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi
293b1(rgyud): dgon dang skyabs mdzad pa lags na/ bdag ni sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags te/ deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid ra bdag ngar song ngar 'gro sems cad dpyapa
293b2(rgyud): bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las skyabs mdzad par gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod song la grong khyer ser sku'i lam gyi sum
293b3(rgyud): mdon mchod cher ring bsrel cang rnying pa ral ba zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi rtse mor srog shing btsugs la/ gsang sngags yi ges bris pa de'i rang du bcug ste mchod pa byas
293b4(rgyud): ras gsang sngags lan bdun bton na khyod kyi tshe'ang phyir nur te 'phel bar 'gyur la/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas longs spyod che ba rnams su skye ste/ bskal pa
293b5(rgyud): stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod kyang phyir 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ de nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur te/ bskal
293b6(rgyud): pa brgya stong du mar bde ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang shi 'phros nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde
293b7(rgyud): ba'i longs spyod mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun tu'ang yid gzhungs shing tshe'i bar chad med pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad nas nam du'ang sems
294a1(rgyud): can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang phrad cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad do// bram ze chen po
294a2(rgyud): gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la tshe thung ba 'am/ nad mang ba zhig yod na des
294a3(rgyud): mchod rten rnying pa bcos sam/ gsar du brtsigs kyang rung ste/ gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du gzhug nas dkyil 'khor byi dor byas te mchod na/ de dag gi yon tan ni tshe zad
294a4(rgyud): pa'ang tshe slar nur zhing ring ba dang / nad kyis btab sdug bsngal ba'ang nad do cog las thar pa dang / nam du'ang ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba dang / byol srong gi skye gnas dang /
294a5(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi sgra rna lam du'ang grag par mi 'gyur na/ de dag tu skye ba lta ci smos/ de nas bram ze des de skad thos nas shin tu yi rangs te/ mchod
294a6(rgyud): zhig pa bcos par bsams nas de 'khor de nas langs te song ngo // de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba zhig stan las langs nas
294a7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di ji lta bur bgyis na yon tan dang / legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur//
294b1(rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lnga pa/ gsang sngags chen po rnams kyi rang mchog bdag nyid che ba dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'di dkyil 'kho//
294b2(rgyud): chen po'i cho ga bzhin byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di thos na mtshams med
294b3(rgyud): pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa'ang ma lus par byung bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang / brnab sems dang / phrag dog la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ tshe zad pa
294b4(rgyud): las kyang tshe ring du rung ba dang / bkra shis dang / legs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
294b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad pa dang /
294b6(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom
294b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gyi steng nas 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po byung nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par
295a1(rgyud): mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang mkhyen par mdzad nas 'od zer de dag slar 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nu bo// de nas bcom ldan/
295a2(rgyud): 'das dgyes shing bya ka la bing ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsang sngags bkar stsal pa/ nam sab+hA nan/ sa bya rbaM bud d+ha ko Ta nan/ pa ri shud d+he ma na si/ a b+h+yA rtsi ta duSh+Ti tA nAn/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/
295a3(rgyud): a mi tra a yuHs+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shud d+he/ A yur bi sho d+ha ni/ saM he ra saM ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga te bir+ya ba le na pra ti sang ha ra/ A yuHsA ra sA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/
295a4(rgyud): sa ma ya/ pro d+hi bo d+hi/ bud+d+ha bu d+hA/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma ma sarba pA si A ba ra Ni bi shud d+he mi ga ta ma lam tsha ra su bud d+ha bud d+he/ hu ru hu ru swA hA/ ka'adi ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/
295a5(rgyud): gang la la 'di'i cho ga byed par 'dod ni tshes brgyad dang / bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga rnams gang yang rung ba la mchod rten ring bsrel can la lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/ gsang sngags
295a6(rgyud): 'di lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ zhus byas la dkyil 'khor byas nas gsang sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun bris te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags 'don pa dang yi ger 'dri ba'ang zhus byas/
295a7(rgyud): la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ lus spos kyis byugs nas kha zas gtsang ma zos la/ me tog dang bdug pas mchod do// de la rin po che sna bdun yang yon du phul lam/ yang na bdag gi
295b1(rgyud): nyams kyis ci 'byor par phul yang rung ste sems mgu bar bya'o// chos btsun par bya ba'i phyir bsti stang dang ri mo cher bya'o// gsang sngags kyi yi ge la'ang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du shes bzhag
295b2(rgyud): ste mchod rten che chung ji tsam nus pa bdun cu rtsa bdun 'dab par bya zhing / de re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na/ tshe zad pa las tshe sbar rur te tshe ring bar
295b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa tshe rabs grungs med pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang nas nam du'ang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas thams cad du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
295b4(rgyud): gang du skyes pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun snyed
295b5(rgyud): la dge bo'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig nang tshabs po ches btab ste 'chi ba'i dus byed pa la thug na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la
295b6(rgyud): de'i steng du tshon sna lngas ri mor bris te/ dbus kyi char ni 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / g.yung drung ris dang / pad+mo rnams bri'o// grwa bzhir yang pad+mo re re bris te/
295b7(rgyud): de'i steng du spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re re gra bzhir gzhag go// bdug spos kyis snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs 'thul ba'ang bzhag go// kha dog sna lnga'i snod du kha zas sna tshogs dang zas
296a1(rgyud): dkar gsum dang / 'bras can du sbyar ba gzhag/ yang dri'i chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras sam 'bru'i snod bkang ba phor bu re re blugs pa dang / yang kha zas sna
296a2(rgyud): tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma spos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag go// gtor ma de dang 'bras kyi drung du nye bar tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bo'i steng du mar ma
296a3(rgyud): gzhag go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su nad pa bzhag la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bstan pa'i nang pa'i mdun du'ang mchod pa'i bshos banag ste 'bul du gzhug go// de nas sngags
296a4(rgyud): mkhan gtsang sbra cher byas te/ nad pa de la gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab ste/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na nad pa tshe zas de 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye ba zhag bdur nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul par 'gyur
296a5(rgyud): ba'ang tshe slar nur zhing tshe ring por 'gyur ro// rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis gtsang sbra cher byas te/ nyid gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid 'tshe'i/
296a6(rgyud): bar du bton nu/ de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang brede ba mi zad pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na sangasu rgyas bzhugs pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur
296a7(rgyud): shing tshe rabs rjes su dran par yang 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang sgrib pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis mi shi ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems zag pa nas
296b1(rgyud): gsang sngags lan bdud cu rtsa bdur bzlas brjod byas na/ shi ba de ngan song gi gnas su lhung na'ang de'i mod la las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mtho ris kyi lha'i gnas su skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro//
296b2(rgyud): yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags yi ger bris pa gzhan gyi ming nas smos te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug la/ nan tan du mchod pa byas na shi ba gang yin pa de ngan song gi gnas nas thar te mtho
296b3(rgyud): ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ngar song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la
296b4(rgyud): la zhig gis mchod rten de la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ mchod pa phul yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las
296b5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// tha na bya dang ri dgas la sogs te gang dag la mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang rnam
296b6(rgyud): yang dud 'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gang la lnga mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa'ang mchod rten de la reg gam de'i grib mas phog kyang
296b7(rgyud): rung ste/ de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhing zad par 'gyur ro// mchod rten de'i gnas na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za la sogs pa lus la
297a1(rgyud): 'jug cing gnod pa dang / gcan gzur khro bo dang / thog 'bab pa dang / sdig sbrul khwa gdug pa dang / sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing /
297a2(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / ser ba dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa
297a3(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na'ang mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od zer chen po byung bas/ ltas ngan pa dang bkra mi
297a4(rgyud): shishes pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan zhig bas pa ngan pas dmag dang chom rkur gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/ dgra rgol ba zhig byung na'ang gnas der mchod rten de la 'od
297a5(rgyud): zer chen po 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me lce kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang nas dpag gi dpung dang / mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan pas pha rol gyi dmag
297a6(rgyud): tshogs thams cad zhi 'ing phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// lce rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa bya ste/ phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa
297a7(rgyud): dang ra rang 'go ba dang / byug pa zhi bams cad mi 'byung ngo // gi'ab ba ci cod pa mi 'byung / chos pa yin par srid pa med par 'gyur ro// 'di la g.yang thug sa gson kyi
297b1(rgyud): gzhad pa dang mnan par mi nus te/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro// yang mchod rten de'i srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad pa/ oM swarba ta thA ga tA bi pu la yaSh+Ti/
297b2(rgyud): ma Ni ka nu rA dza ta/ bi pu shi ta yaSh+Ti d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+te bi lo ki te/ sA ra sa ra/ ma ma sarba pA paM bi shod+b+ha Ni/ saM bi d+ha Ni/ pra ba ra yaSh+Ti/ pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ta phu ru tsa ra ma la bi shud d+he hUM hUM swA hA/
297b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu ci nus kyang gsang sngags 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi ngos bzhir gzhug go/ de'i cho ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang bris te srog shing gi nang du gzhug
297b4(rgyud): cho ga de ltar byas na mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra'o// de'i gong du'ang mchod rten ring bsrel can dgu khri dgu stong ba zhengs pa dang 'dra'o// de'i yang gong du de bzhin
297b5(rgyud): gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o// yang gang la la zhig gis 'jim pa las mchod
297b6(rgyud): rten chung ngu zhig byas te/ de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o// yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di
297b7(rgyud): la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ thal mo sbyar ram/ me tog phul lam/ byug pa dang bdug spos phul lam/ dril bu dang / ba dan dang / gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na'ang
298a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal dang mthu
298a2(rgyud): stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro// thun bya dang brang pa la sogs pa mchod rten de'i grib mas phog na'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang
298a3(rgyud): drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta bu rmi lam du rmis sam/ rgyang nas mthong ngam/
298a4(rgyud): dril bu'i sgra thos sam/ mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
298a5(rgyud): kyis srung ba dang rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di ni mchod rten gyi srog shing gi
298a6(rgyud): gsang sngags zhes bya'o// yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po 'di yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ rung dru ba le prA ti swa
298a7(rgyud): skar/ ta thA ga tad+hA tu d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ san d+ha ra san d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Ti te sA hA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang la la zhig gis
298b1(rgyud): mchod rten bdag nyid kyis byas sam/ gzhan byed du bcug gam/ mchod rten rnying pa bcos legs byas kyang rung / sa 'jim pa las mchod rten chung ngu byas sam/ sro phag gam/ rdo ba las
298b2(rgyud): byas kyang rung ste/ drang por gsang sngags kyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad tshad du bzlas brjod byas te/ de'i 'og tu mchod rten sen mo gang tsam gyi sa la byas sum/ khru gang gi tshang du byas sam/
298b3(rgyud): dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na'ang rung ste/ gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / sems rtse gcig tu byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la'ang spos kyi ngad sdang ste/ tsan dan dang / ga pur dang /
298b4(rgyud): gla rtsi dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i dri bo 'am/ lha'i spros dri zhim po'i ngad sdang bar 'gyur ro// bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang
298b5(rgyud): yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na'ang tshe nur
298b6(rgyud): zhing ring bar 'gyur/ nam 'chi ba'i dus byed na'ang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgongs te/ skye gnas phyi mar
298b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par 'gyur/ der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
299a1(rgyud): lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba shes pa 'thob bo// lus las tsan dan gyi dri'i ngang
299a2(rgyud): 'byung zhing / kha nas ut+pa la'i dri bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang dri'i byug pa
299a3(rgyud): yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/ gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rten bskus na'ang de dag gi yon tan dang legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro// yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
299a4(rgyud): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang bar byas te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dag dkon pa dang rin po cher 'du shes pas bzung na/ de de bzhin gshegs
299a5(rgyud): pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/ gsang sngags rnams lnga gus pa bskyed nas yi ge bri bar bya ste/ gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi thog shing
299a6(rgyud): gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste mchod rten byas na/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsngags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang legs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
299a7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rteran gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su thugs rabs mdzad nas gsungs pa
299b1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing / thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod ras gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i byin gyi
299b2(rgyud): rlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni legs so legs so// shin tu'ang legs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de nas
299b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang / byang chub sems
299b4(rgyud): dpa'i lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra
299b5(rgyud): dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba de zos nas bdag gcag rang rang gi spyod yul la skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur te/ mthar gyis yon tan chen
299b6(rgyud): po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig pos te smras pa/ kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu 'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa'ang shin
299b7(rgyud): tu rnyed par dka'/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa thos pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes smras so//
300a1(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang cho ga yon tan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i
300a2(rgyud): rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dngas par gyur/ 'chi ba'i 'jig pa drung / sdig pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/ tshe rang phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas dga' mgu yi rang
300a3(rgyud): te yid bde ba chen po thob par gyur to// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyang sems dang zhing rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
300a4(rgyud): cad rnam par sel bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis sbas pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ chos la dga' ba'i phyir
300a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phul te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang/
300a6(rgyud): sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du
300a7(rgyud): bshad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar par mdzad pa lags na/ da 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
300b1(rgyud): thams cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal to// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ nub na pa nI nI/ sa mug saM rban+ta/
300b2(rgyud): ko Ti yu ta sha ta sa ha srA tAM/ na maHsarba tri ba ra Na bi skAm bi ni bo d+hi sa ta ya/ oM tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta A yur ba lA nI pu la ni ma le/ sarba sid+d+hi na ma mas+thi tA/
300b3(rgyud): ba ra ba ra/ sarba satwa a ba lo ki ni/ oM sarba rI bA ra Na bI ska ma bi nI/ ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'dra bdag gi gsang sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad
300b4(rgyud): pa lags te/ gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu byas te/ skad cig gcig gton na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin/
300b5(rgyud): du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ mchod rten de la la la zhig gis phyag byas sam/ tshig snyan pas stod dam/ spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / mar me 'bul
300b6(rgyud): na rigs kyi bu de de'i tshe de nyid la sdig pa thams cad byang zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams byasal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med
300b7(rgyud): pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa bus
301a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur ro// yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis chos brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga gang yang rung ba la zhus
301a2(rgyud): dang gtsang sbra byas te/ gos gtsang ma gyon la zhag gcig srung ba 'ang / yang na zas dkar gsum zos te/ mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di la bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/
301a3(rgyud): bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
301a4(rgyud): dgapar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad cing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
301a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang lnga la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad batron rA ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad bton na sgrib pa
301a6(rgyud): thams cad byung ste phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis bzhi brgya rtsa btud bto ra rgyal cher ris pa'i ri rgyal po chen po drag kyang ne bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te khrub
301a7(rgyud): ba dang skyabs byed cing / shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed ras bsod nams thams cad nye bar bsgrub bo// gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad ba'o dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa 'thor/
301b1(rgyud): bo// yang gang gis drug brgya rtsa brgyad btor na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang gang gis bdun brgya rtsa brgyad btor na legs pa'i yon tan thams
301b2(rgyud): cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad ba ton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i ring dbang 'thob ste/ sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na
301b3(rgyud): phung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du bton na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis nyis stong tshang bar bton na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//
301b4(rgyud): gang gis sum stong tshang bar bton na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis bzhi stong tshang bar bton na dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis lnga stong tshang bar bton na rang sangs rgyas
301b5(rgyud): kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis drug stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis bdur stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa
301b6(rgyud): dang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis brgya stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnon par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis dgu sbyong tshang bar bton na rig sngags dang gsang sngags rnam
301b7(rgyud): kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis khri tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gnon par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis nyi dri tshang bar ba'od/
302a1(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur te/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir
302a2(rgyud): bsod nams las bya bar 'dod nA/ mchod rten rnying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la bcos legs byas te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tsang gi bar du bskor ba
302a3(rgyud): byas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs
302a4(rgyud): so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i grogs byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi cho ga tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin no// de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba
302a5(rgyud): pa'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
302a6(rgyud): sku las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad bsal nas/ de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi
302a7(rgyud): 'askod pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de gang ces gsol pa dang / bcob ldan 'das kyis/ gas sa pa'i bdas tshol ba 'astsal pa/ gsangs pa'i dag po sasang thabs kyi chos 'dides ni ma 'ongs
302b1(rgyud): pa'i dus na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no// ngas chog ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po grub cing phar yor cher gnas par
302b2(rgyud): gyur na/ las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
302b3(rgyud): snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las tshogs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyis
302b4(rgyud): na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir legs par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// dge slong dang /
302b5(rgyud): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob par 'dod cing yon tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po cho ga sngar bstan pa
302b6(rgyud): bzhin du byas te/ dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/ grwa bzhir dri'i chu phor bu bkang ba re re bzhag
302b7(rgyud): bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba'ang bzhag nas/ snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang / dri'i chu dang / 'bras skam po rnams thugs te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang / yang til nag
303a1(rgyud): / po dang / sran ma ma kha dang / 'bras rnams bsres te bac+doMs pa'i 'bras drug kris ra zhes bya ba dang / zas dkar gsum dang / 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du thugs/
303a2(rgyud): pa dang sang shing 'og snga tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi snang du bkram sI/
303a3(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang bcug rus/ mchod rten gyi phyogs pazhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig
303a4(rgyud): pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdor par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ oM bi pu la bi pu la bi ma le pra be ra dzi na pa re sar sa ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu garje.a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ a ya Na to
303a5(rgyud): ba ni swAhA sarba dre ba na/ ba ha ya bi shud+d+ha ka d+hISh+Tha nu sa ma ye sA hA/ bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sems
303a6(rgyud): dadapa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang
303a7(rgyud): sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang rim gro byed/ srog shing brtan par byed do// de bas gong durang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i klung
303b1(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do// de ltar sems zag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na/
303b2(rgyud): yon tan de dag dang / gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi ror bu ring po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten
303b3(rgyud): byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan la la
303b4(rgyud): zhig gis mchod rjer 'dri mthong ngam/ mchod rjen de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na'ang las kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang yongs su byang nas
303b5(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o// gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa'ang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par
303b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ zan bya dang ri dag so la sogs pa sems can gong gis mthong ba de'ang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/ bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// gang
303b7(rgyud): la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ sa dang lci bas byugs la/ de'i steng du spos kyi skyang rul
304a1(rgyud): gyis byugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i sdong re re bzhag la/ sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris
304a2(rgyud): te rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang re re de'i nang du gzhug go// de bas yang gsang sngags 'di dbu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bres te/ mchod rten gyi
304a3(rgyud): 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug ste/ mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ me tog dang byugs pas mchod la/ lar bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'dri rang gdon par bya'o//
304a4(rgyud): na maHna ba nA TI nA/ ta thA ga ta gaM ga NA nAM Di bA lu kAM/ ko Ti yuk+tA sha ta sa ha srA tAM/ oM po po rI/ tsA ri Ni tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la ba ri swA hA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
304a5(rgyud): par spyad par yang ma zad de/ des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed byas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu
304a6(rgyud): rtsa dbu snyed la mchod cing snyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// de'i gong durang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/ mchod rter de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang
304a7(rgyud): dang yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
304b1(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do// yang gang lnga la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po ma nor bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod
304b2(rgyud): pa'i las byas la lus la thogs na rig pa de nyid kyis srung ba dang sgrub pa mdzad de/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang / shar gnyer ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas
304b3(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa'ang mtshams med pa lnga'i/
304b4(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa'ang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gang lnga la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra zlos sam/ grib ma sa phog gam/ lus la reg kyang rung te/ de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa
304b5(rgyud): dang sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mkhyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi
304b6(rgyud): rnyed thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa mdzad cing spyan ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do// lha thams cad dang / dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de
304b7(rgyud): la stongs grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang / sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de lta bsar rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gas
305a1(rgyud): sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ge ra bris la lam gyi bzhi mdo'am sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la/
305a2(rgyud): de'i nang du bcug na 'gro ba thams cad dang / bya dang / spang ma dang / tha na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / de la phog pa'i sa dang / rdul dang / rlung dang /
305a3(rgyud): grib mas phog na'ang byol song dang / yi dwags dang / ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing / 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho rig
305a4(rgyud): lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
305a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / tshangs
305a6(rgyud): ris kyi lha rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams lnga bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams lnga yongs su gtad kyi/ rtag
305a7(rgyud): tu rim gror bya zhing yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi rang du chug la gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/ nam du'ang rgyun ma bcad par sems can la ston cig/ mthong zhing thos par
305b1(rgyud): byas nas mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje dang /
305b2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha dang / bu dang / gdod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa tha
305b3(rgyud): cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'thun par smras te gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags
305b4(rgyud): 'di'i cho ga dang / mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bgyi/ rtag par gzungs su gzung zhing
305b5(rgyud): mi bskyud par bgyi/ yi ger bris pa dang / bklag pa dang / mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems cad gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing
305b6(rgyud): khong du chud nas ngan srong ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa dang / sdig pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis
305b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin spyi bos blang ba'i slad du gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag rim gror bgyi/ btsun par bgyi/ gus par bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes gzhag par bgyi
306a1(rgyud): rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi ste/ nam du'ang nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i srad du ran tar bgyi/
306a2(rgyud): bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag bsrung ba dang / rim gror/
306a3(rgyud): bya ba dang / yongs su gzung bar khas blangs pa ni legs so legs so// shin tu'ang legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi
306a4(rgyud): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par spyod do// 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan
306a5(rgyud): po bi d+yA ka ra sr-i ha dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar d+he dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ jo bo a ti sha dang / dge bshes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams dag par bcos so//
306a6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na a gra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag
306a7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ sems cad sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshang tshong du nub pa rnams yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir/ blo gros shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
306b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi mchog snying rje chen po'i rtse mo 'char ba/ thogs pa med pa'i don yod pa'i las kyi dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba/ sems can gyi dkyil 'khor/
306b2(rgyud): ma lus pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang ngan song gi sdug bsngal rngam pa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa phan pa ma yin pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams
306b3(rgyud): cad dang nad rnam pa du ma dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / stong chen mo rab tu 'jom par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ thog mar bcom ldan 'das
306b4(rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshogs du ma bye ba phrag 'bum gyis brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal nas brtsam par bya'o// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ be ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te samya ka saM bu d+hA ya/
306b5(rgyud): sarba a dz+nyA ra d+ha ka ra sha ma na ye tra/ tad+ya b+hU/ sa d+ha ni sad+ha ni/ sid d+hA bid d+hA re/ b+ha ga ba ti pA rA pA ra shA d+ha ba ti/ a dz+nyA nA sha mA ya/ sarba pA paM bi shud d+ha d+harme ni rA la dz+nyA na go tsa re/ a saM ga ri Ni
306b6(rgyud): pra sha ma mi mUrti su khaM pra te sarba kre sha d+ha ba ti/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ bi d+ha ma NI bi nA sha ni bi nA sha ni/ bi nA sha ya bi nA shA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti su ra sa mi la bud+d+hi/ sa ra sa ra bi sir
306b7(rgyud): bi sa ra/ su ru su ru/ sU ru sU ru/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ a dz+wa na ma ko Ti sa ha sra saM tsi tan karma A ba ra Ni k+Sha pa ya/ k+She pa bi ti bud d+hi ba sha ya
307a1(rgyud): pa sha brti ni pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa re/ bi she Sha ba tri.a she ShA li ni/ ka ru ta go tsa re/ ba ma hA dz+nyA na a bI She ka ba ti/ su bi mish+tsi ta d+harme/ he te b+ha ga ba ti
307a2(rgyud): ma hA ka ru Ne ku ru ku ru/ bi sho d+ha ya maM/ sarba saM tAMsh+tsaHma hA ka ru No ta se ke na san sir tsA ya/ sa ma ba d+hA ya/ swa ma b+he lA ya/ pra ro hA ye mre/ ma hA ka ru Na bi dza na pa ri shud d+ha ya/
307a3(rgyud): a mo g+ha me ku ru dzI bi tan rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ b+ha ga ba ti ma ma hA bo d+hi tsit+taM saM mU h+yed ma san tu shud ba ti mI kA ru Ni/ bud+d+he bo d+hi pra te/ na rA ka pre ta tir+ya g+ha ti/ na duHkhe na mU la ni/ de ba ma ruH
307a4(rgyud): ga ti saM pa ha na bi ga to pa kle she/ sarba bud+d+ha d+harmA pA ri pU ra Ni sA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas byung
307a5(rgyud): pa 'di ni gzungs grangs med pa phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa'o// sdig pa dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o// bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /
307a6(rgyud): ltas ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// tshe dang / bsod nams dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa dang / nad med/
307a7(rgyud): pa byed pa'o// 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon thams cad nges par 'joms pa'o//
307b1(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i ming bzung ba dang / thos pa dang / brjod pa tsam gyis kyang tshe rabs bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'ba' byang bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad
307b2(rgyud): bsrabs par 'gyur ro// de'i ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
307b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i dge ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro// snying rje las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang
307b4(rgyud): mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du lar bdun bdun brjod ni sdig pa thams cad las rnam par thar par 'gyur labyang chub sems dpa'i yor tan
307b5(rgyud): stong phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// nam nangs pa'i dus su skyil mo krung bcas te bde bar 'dug pa lag pa gru gsum gyi phyag rgya byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang
307b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdag nyid chen po mngon sum du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te/
307b7(rgyud): yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod ra/ de la yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ don ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro//
308a1(rgyud): tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/ bsnyen gnas drangs nas gos dkar po bgos te/ sbyin pa byas la byang chub kyi sems
308a2(rgyud): chen po blangs nas mi sdug pa med par lag pa brkyang ba des rang gi lag gis dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog kha dog sna gsum gyis mchod nas tsan dar dkar pos bdugs la/ 'jig rten gyi khams
308a3(rgyud): stong phrag mtha' yas pa dag na mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsams te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
308a4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong chen po 'bar ba 'byung ba 'di nam dga' ba chen po skyes kyi bar du brjod na/ bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung na 'dug
308a5(rgyud): pa shes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zang zing med pa'i chos kyi longs spyod chen po'i dga' ba thob par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su phyir mi ldog par skyes pa/
308a6(rgyud): yin no// tshe rabs gzhan du song na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'ang thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang
308a7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed do// mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la'ang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//
308b1(rgyud): lha thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur te/ gang
308b2(rgyud): la smras pa de de'i bya ba grub par 'gyur ro// des ci bsams pa dang byed du bcug pa rnams kyang lha la sogs pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
308b3(rgyud): sus kyang ngag mi gcog par yang 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang / gzugs dang / bsod nams dang / lang tshe dang / nad med pa dang / rgyas pa 'phel bar byed do// bgeg/
308b4(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// mdor ra de bzhin gshegs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams rang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gru chen po mthong bar 'dod pa rnams dang /
308b5(rgyud): yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa rnams dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'i gar thabs byed pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang
308b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang / rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / bar chad med par rgyud chen po'i de kho na rtogs par 'dod pa rnams dang /
308b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
309a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams kyis yang dag par bsten pa 'di thog mar bsgrim pa chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsams pa'i cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du blang bar bya/
309a2(rgyud): snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @rgya gar skang du/ kro d+ha bI dza la kA lpa gu h+ya 'du/ khrod skad du/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog/
309a3(rgyud): pa gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni// khro bo 'di ming gshin rje gshed// mtshon cha me lce 'bar bas 'khrugs// drag
309a4(rgyud): la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa// de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan// thams cad kyi ni lag cha shor// de bzhin du ri 'jig rten pa'i// lha rnams lus kyis 'dud par byed// gzhan yang thal mo gyur/
309a5(rgyud): byas te// skrag nas bstod pa mang po byed// lha rnams mang po ji snyed kun// 'jam dpal khro bo'i gzi brjid kyis// gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa// bcom ldan bdag cag sangs/
309a6(rgyud): rgyas dang // chos dang dge 'dun grubs mchis kyi// rab tu mi bzud 'jigs pa'i ma gzugs// gzi brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab pa// khams gsum 'khrugs par mdzad pa mthong /
309a7(rgyud): gang tshe lba dang lha min rnams// skrag nas skyabs su dong ba na// de tshe 'dzam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni// khro bo slar yang ni rab 'gyur// gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi// khro bo chen po zhi ba la/
309b1(rgyud): de nas skyabs su drong ba yi// lnga rnams kur gyis zhus pa ni// khyed kyi brtson 'grus mchog 'tshal bas// ji la bur na mnyes par brdzi// ji ltar yang ni dang bar 'gyur// bdag cag the tsom chen/
309b2(rgyud): po mchis// khro bos lha rnams tshig gsan nas// gshin rje gshed kyis bka' stsal pa// lha rnams thams cad khyed nyon cig/ nga ni dus gsum sngon du 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi sngon du byung //
309b3(rgyud): nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung // da ni dus gsum da ltar 'byung // nga ni lnga brgya mtha' ma'i tshe// nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// nga yi bstad pa
309b4(rgyud): 'byung bar byed// las ngan mtshams med byed pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung // zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung // gos ngan dug rdul gyon pa'i tshe// de tshe
309b5(rgyud): nga yi bstan pa 'byung // nga ni dus gsum 'byung ba'i sku// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung // ji lta bur ni zhir 'gyur yang // nga ni thams cad zhi ba'i sku//
309b6(rgyud): ji lta bur ni khros 'gyur yang // thams cad khros pa nga yi sku// gzi brjid chen po khyed rnams kun// gang tshe gsum la skyabs song ba// de tshe nga yi mi bzad pa// khro bo'i yid la gnas par gyis//
309b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum ni gnas pa dang // de yi bka' yang bskyang ba dang // sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nga yi yid ni zhi 'gyur gyis// khyed rnams skyabs su dong ba yi// byang chub sems dang ldan pa yi//
310a1(rgyud): bams cad don ni sgrub pa'i mchog yi ge 'bruni bcu bdud po// nga yi snying po yid las byung // lha rnams kun kyis gzung bar gyis/ gshin bye ga shed po bdag nyid cig
310a2(rgyud): snying po rab tu gsungs pa na// de nas sa ni g.yos par gyur// rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu 'khrugs// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang // sha za la sogs phung bar 'gyur// lha rnams kun ni phyag 'tshal
310a3(rgyud): zhing / yan lag kun nas spu langs nas// gshin rje gshed po khro bo yi// khro bo'i snying po de gzung ngo // de ras dam chos srung ba'i phyir// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// rtog pa 'di ni
310a4(rgyud): de dag la// gshin rje gshed kyis rgyas par gsungs// de nas khro bo rnam rgyal gyi// rtog pa khro bo nyid kyis gsungs// snying rje byang chub sems ldan pa'i// lha rnams kyis thos dga'
310a5(rgyud): 'gyur nas// dkon mchog gsum ni srung ba'i phyir// so so yi ni rtog pa bshad// de dag gi ni rtsa ba'i rgyud// khro bo nyid kyis rab gsungs pa// khro bo rnam rgyal zhes rtswa 'di// 'jig rten
310a6(rgyud): dang 'jig rten pas// sngon nas phyag byas khro bo yi// zhal nas ji bzhin thos nas kyang // khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// rgyud 'di byang chub sems rnams kyis// snying rjes de bzhin rgyas pa/
310a7(rgyud): dang rnam pa mang por byin gyis brlabs// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skabs te dang po'o// de nas khro
310b1(rgyud): bo rnam par brtsal// 'jam dpal khro bos bshad pa yi// brtag pa rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya// de la 'di yi dkyil 'khor ni// dngos grub thams cad spyir mdzad pa 'i//
310b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad// yi dag mang po zhes bya'o// thams cad du ni dkyil 'khor 'di// gnas ni gang du 'grub par 'gyur// sngags pas thog ma nyid du ni// de yi
310b3(rgyud): gnas ni brtag par bya// shing gcig pa 'am dur khrod dang // khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mchod rten dang ni mu gnyis dang // thibs po stong pa lam srang rnying // skyed mos
310b4(rgyud): tshalnga dang ri yi rtse// chu yi 'gram dang nags tshal dang // yang na mtsho yi 'gram dang rI// lha chen gyi na gnas kyang rung // ba lang lhas sam g.yul gyis// khyad par du ni yul gtsang bar// gang
310b5(rgyud): du yid ni dga' bar yang // der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya// de nas rig 'dzin nan tan gyis// sa ni yang dag sbyang bya ste// pa tsha med cing ma gas pa// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa la// shar dang byang ni
310b6(rgyud): mtho ba dang // kha dog snum pa lhag par bzang // ba las byung ba rnam lnga dang // ldan pa yi ni lci bas byug/ ci rigs par ri byugs nas kyang // slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas nas// smyung
310b7(rgyud): ba byas te mnyam bzhag nas// khro bo'i srung bas byin gyis brlab// yi dgas phal chen zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo zi// zar ma'i ras sapa ras bal las/ thig srung
311a1(rgyud): gsum sgril mdzes pa yid// grwa bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi par// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig btab ste// thog mar shar dang byung nas ni// lho dang nub kyi bar du'o// thig skud de ni
311a2(rgyud): phyogs mtshams nas// de nas kyang ni drung bar bya// shar dang lho yi matsums dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// thig gis rab tu cang byas te// gru bzhi par ni big gdab bo// rim pa
311a3(rgyud): pa mdzes pa la// sgo bani dag gis mdzes par bya// lho phyogs kyi ni sgro phye la// lhag ma rnams mi gcad par bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa yi// dbus su pad+mo bri bar bya// pad+mo dang ni
311a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhi sgo// the tsom med par mnyam par bya// mdzes byed sgo yi phyed du bya// 'gram pa 'dab ma'i tshad dang mnyam// nye ba yin mdzes byed kyang // mdzes byed dang ni 'dra bar bya// cho ga
311a5(rgyud): bzhin du dkyil 'khor te// kun tu thig ni btab ras kyang // phyi nas tshul bzhin rig 'dzin pas// dur khrod thal bas bri ba ni// rtag tu byang shar la sogs pa'i// grwa yi nang ni de dag tu
311a6(rgyud): mkhas pas bre con phyag rgya bri// phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dgas gnag/ gzhan yang yi dgas lnga pa ni/ pad+ma'i steng du bsam par bya// de bzhin byi sgo'i nang dag dang // phyogs rnams de dag thams
311a7(rgyud): cad du// mi ro mgo med yi dgas rnams// dur khrod thal bas dang ra te bri// de phyir yi dgas phal chen yin// khru gang la sogs rim pa nas// khru brgyad pa yi bar du ste// de las
311b1(rgyud): lhag par yong mi bri/ rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni// khru gang ba ni bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mi rgyal sgrub pa khru dor bkar// sems can kun ni bsrad ba dang // de bzhin gcig
311b2(rgyud): la khru gsum pa/ khru ba'i dbang dang dbug pa yi// las rnams kyi ni mchog tu gsungs// khru lnga rlung dang mi nang dang // dgra rnams med par brtsal ba'i mchog/ khru drug bgegs rnams thams
311b3(rgyud): cad dang // gdon rnams nges par zlog par byed// khru bdun pa ni lha yi rnams/ dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams byed// khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun// sbyin sreg mchog tu shes par bya/
311b4(rgyud): deltar ci rigs bri sa nas ni// de nas gtsang mas nye reg bya// chu yi phyir ni chu yi snod// chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya// de bzhin me tog don du yang // me tog sdug gu dri zhim dang // me tog
311b5(rgyud): 'phreng bas snod mchog gzhan// legs par dgang zhing mdzes par bya// dri yi don du bya ba ni// tsAn dAn+da dkar po dmar po blang // a ka ru dang sbyar ba yi// gu gul bdug pa de bzhin no//
311b6(rgyud): mar me mar gyi mar me dang // mkhas pas snying po 'jam pa'o// drag po yi ni las dag la// mi yi tshil gyis bya bar bshad// gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs// sbyar dug la sogs
311b7(rgyud): lhag par dbul// de ltar der ni tshogs bsags nas// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas te// byang chub sems la dmigs nas ni// ri mo yi ni las
312a1(rgyud): rnams dag/ gal te 'dri bar mi nus na// yi dgas phal chen dbus dag tu// pad+ma sngar bris gang yin pa// de yi steng du yi dgas ni// mkhas pas yid kyis bsam
312a2(rgyud): par bya// yi dgas kyi ni sngags mchog gis// bsam pa dag ni byas ras kyang // grwa yi be con bzhi po yang // sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya// gal te 'dri bar nus na ni// sngags nyid
312a3(rgyud): steng du gzhag par bya// sgo yi yi dwags bzhi po yang // gal te bri bar ma nus na// de bzhin yi dgas 'dzin sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob par gsungs pa yin// de yi nang du rang sngags
312a4(rgyud): kyis/ byin gyis rlob par bya ba'i phyir// rkang lag mgo bo dpung pa dang // de bzhin gzhan yang dpung pa dang // gzhan yang de bzhin lag pa'i 'phreng // zod pa keng rus mi lpags rlon//
312a5(rgyud): ro yi 'phreng ba bsam par bya// de yi nang du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob tu gzhug par bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin bsams nas// mjug tu khro bo gshin rje gshed// sngags brjod pas ni spyan
312a6(rgyud): drangs nas// rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol// khro ba 'khrugs pa 'jigs mdzad pa// sku ni ma lce 'bar ba 'dra// gzi brjing 'phags pa bsam pa ni// sku mdog sdang zil ba cag 'phro dra/
312a7(rgyud): zhal drug sgra yang kham par 'dug/ smin mkham pa mig kyang ser// spyan gsum mig ni zlum pa ste// phyag ni bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs// de bzhin yi dgos steng na bzhugs// zhabs
312b1(rgyud): drug gis ni mdzes par byas// tri shU la ral gri dbyug dgra sta// sbyin pa'i phyir ni phyag brkyang ba// lcags kyu yi ni mtshon cha dag/ g.yas pa'i phyag na de bzhin bsnams// de bzhin g.yon pa'i/
312b2(rgyud): drug po yang // thod pa mdung thung mda' bo che// mdzub mos bsdigs dang zhags pa bsnams// phyag na dbyug to bsam par bya// mi mgo rlon dang skam po dang / yi dgas 'phreng bas
312b3(rgyud): rnam par brgyar// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol// sku yang che la gsus khyim che// zhal gyi dbyibs ni du ma ste// sgra ni rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa 'dra// zhal gcig bzhad cing zhal gcig
312b4(rgyud): ni zhal gcig 'jigs par bgrad pa'i zhal// zhal gcig zhal ni gdang sa pa ste// ljags kyang bskyod par mdzad pa dang // zhal gcig kyang ni mche ba gtsigs// de ltar snying pos
312b5(rgyud): legs par ni// spyan drangs mchod yon dbul bar bya// de nas dri dang sbyar ba'i chus// mchod yon cho ga bzhin phul nas// yi dgas kyi ni spyi bor yang // me tog dmar po gzhag par
312b6(rgyud): bya blo chen gyis ni khro bo la// de nas tsan dan dmar po dbul// dri yi 'og tu me tog rnams// tsan dan gyi ni gtor ma dbul// me tog me tog gtor ma dbul// me tog me tog
312b7(rgyud): 'phreng ba rnams// me tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya// me tog sngags kyis rim bzhin du// me tog cho ga bzhin phul nas// rang gi snying po sngags kyis kyang // khro bo yi na spyi bo dang // khro bo gtso ba'i
313a1(rgyud): snying khar ni// snying po rnam par dgod par bya// 'tshogs mar de yi 'tshogs ma dang // de yi gtsug tu spyi gtsug gzhag/ de yi lus la cho ga dang // mtshon na'i
313a2(rgyud): tshogs la mtshon bzhag ste// 'di skad bstan pa 'di dag ni/ me tog dag gis dgod par bya// de ltar ci rig mchod nas kyang // bdug pa rang gi sngags kyis dbul// de nas mar me rab
313a3(rgyud): 'bar bu/ phyogs brgyad du yang dgod par bya// 'byung po'i gtor ma khro bo la// phul ras yi dgas phal chen gyi// phyi rol tu ni mkhas pa yis// sme gtor rnams ni sbyin par bya// khro bo btso la de
313a4(rgyud): phyogs te// de nas yang ni bdug pa dbul// de yi phyi rol chu bcas snod// me tog gis ni bkang ste gzhag/ cho gas khrus kyi bsnang ba yi// slob ma dag ni bos nas kyang // sngags kun gyis ni
313a5(rgyud): gzi bskyed la// khro bo yi ni snying po yis// lag gnyis me tog byin nas ri// gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs par bya// dkor mchog gsum ni dran byas la// slob dpon gyis ni gzhug
313a6(rgyud): par bya// rang gri snying pos me tog nyid// dkyil 'khor la ni gtor du gzhug/ de nas be con zhes pa yis// phyag rgya sngags pas de la bstan// dkon mchog gsum ni gsang ba yaM//
313a7(rgyud): dam tshig de la sbyin par bya// de nas grub par bya ba'i phyir// sngags pas chu dang me tog gis// khro bo'i gtso bo'i gsang sngags dag/ dbang skur ras ni de la sbyin// de nas khro bo snying po yi/ cho ga
313b1(rgyud): ba'in du dbang bskur nas// me tog bdug pa'i 'phreng ba yis// snying po de la sbyin par bya// khro bo yi ni snying po mchog/ nges kyang de ltar mnos nus ni// de nas tha myur phyag byas nas/ ci/
313b2(rgyud): nus sbyin pas mchod par bya// sngags pas bla ma mchod byas ras// dngos grub thob 'gyur gzhan du mir// slob ma snying po byin ras kyang // 'phreng ba tsar dngad la sogs pas// mchod nas de yi 'og tu ni/
313b3(rgyud): phyi rol tu ni sngar bzhag pa'i / dri chu la sogs bkang ba'i sngo// de thangs mchod yor phul ras ni// 'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzang ba'i// mthu rtsal drag po gshegs su gsol// bzhud nas kyang ni
313b4(rgyud): yon chudade// dkyil 'khor la yang dbul bar bya// rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi// rig sngags 'chang gis de ltar ni// mchod pa rtag tu legs par bya//
313b5(rgyud): de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las// yi dgas ngal po che'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o//
313b6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHpre ta mu khad kru swA hA/ dbus kyi yi dgas kyi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHA kro d+ha bi dzA la
313b7(rgyud): ag+nir dz+wa li ti dzi be pre te shwa ri hUM phaT/ 'di ni grA yi be cor bzhi'i sngags so// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHoM pre ta bod lak+Sha ya hUM phaT/ shar gyi sgo'i yi dgas kyi'o// oM pre ta bi mAn+ta/
314a1(rgyud): kung+ku phU/ lce k+ko'i yi dwags kyi'o// oM p+sa tA dz+wA la hUM badz+ra/ nub kyi sgo'i yi dgus so// oM k+Shi pra pre to ta kiT+TahUM / byang spro'i yi dgas s+ho/ oMn paH
314a2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+hUd+d+ha pre ta mA lo bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i tI/ ku h+ya be ts+yai kA mu khi sarbar k+Sho ba dz+rats+tshe d+h+r-i kayi dgas 'phreng ba'i'o// 'di ni yi dgas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
314a3(rgyud): sngags kyi tshogs so// de ni khro bo gshin rje gshed spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i sngags la sogs pa 'thung ngo // oM na ma bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM ge b+h+yaHkro d+ha bri ri bi ra sarba ma ye na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/
314a4(rgyud): oM AHhUM/ i di pra ta/ A sa na Na/ pre tod ga ta nA rak+Sha rak+Sha sA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed spyan drangs pa'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la dz+wA la tI bi grA ha hUM phaT/ go cha'i 'o// oM a kr-i/
314a5(rgyud): d+he kA yA man+ta ka ha nA ma thA b+hany+tsa hUM phaT/ 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po gang gi rtog pa 'di yin pa de'i sngags yi ge 'bru bcu bdun pa'o// oM A hUM/ de nyid kyi snying po'o// oM kA la hUM phaT/ 'tshogs
314a6(rgyud): ma'i 'o// oM ya man+ta ke e ka bI ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug gi'o// oM bai ba sa swa tAn ta ka hUM/ mtshon cha'i 'o// 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po ga shIr rje gshed kyi yan lag lnga pa'o// oM
314a7(rgyud): e ka bI ra ya man+ta ka bi ra ra sA hA/ mcho de yon dbul ba'i sngags so// oM b+hi mAn ta ka te dze be lin ni sA hA/ lga bshos kyi sngags so// oM bA ka tsi ta sho ni tra ra tra/ saM gan d+ha bi gra ha
314b1(rgyud): sa so/ spyo ni legs m+b+ha d+hA N+Dam+b+ha / \u0f7f drA phre 'das pa sa so/ yos ma smra//
314b2(rgyud): d+ha / sa gyi lags // maud bya rjo na ng+ge / ngas pas yang ma / su
314b3(rgyud): pre ta ma~M mi ni/ swA b+h+re Te dz+ra pr-im+b+hi shi dzirje rjen AT ne gris pa li swA hU~M/ sridags mang po'i dkyil 'thor gyi gtor ma'i sngags so// 'a ma dgas ces ba chog sbyid lo sa/
314b4(rgyud): ba rnal bltas/ yidapas bral po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi grags rim par bye ba ste gsum bya'o// de nas gzhan yang 'angam dbyung kyi// khro bor pa'abo gcig du ni/
314b5(rgyud): tshad med gzi bting bdag nyid che// de yi phyag rgya bshad par bya// thog mar dkon mchog gsum po yi// dam tshig mngon par bstan byas nas// lag pa g.yas pa chog bzhin/
314b6(rgyud): legs par rab tu 'asring bar bya// rig 'dzin dag gis rtag par ni// lag pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis// mthe bong legs par smras pa ni/ rab tu bsdams pa bzang po bcing // cho ba shes
314b7(rgyud): pa'i be con rtsa// snying po sngags sam logs shig tu// sngags pa phyag rgya sngags kyis bcings// gzhan du rapa yang mi bcing ngo // oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+he/ a sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dzI la/
315a1(rgyud): A tri dz+wa la ti dza \u0f7f/ a b+hi dzA li taShI hA/ pre ta shir hU~M phaT/ be con gyi phyag d+ha'i sngags so// phyag rgya gcig pur gyur pa 'di// khro bo'i snying po sngags 'bar byed/
