368a7(rgyud): bsdus nas bshad pa yin// bzlas pa dang ni hom dag dang // dartul zhugs dka' thub ma byas kyang // sngags kyi dngos 'di shes nas ni// mchod pa 'ba' zhig dbul bar bya// 'di la mchod pa
368b1(rgyud): bya ba nyid// khro bo'i rgyal po rtag pa ru// mnyes byas yin par gang shes pa// sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rngub tu sngags pas sems pa dang // rtag tu sngags kyi bdag nyid gyur//
368b2(rgyud): rtag tu yi la zhen pa dang // rtag tu mchod la brtson pa dang // rtag tu khro bor 'du shes pa// las rnams thams cad grub pa'i phyir// cho ga mdor brdzus 'di bshad pa'o// the bo rnam par rgyal
368b3(rgyud): ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las// gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste dang po'o// ma mai mA mi mU mu// mU mu me mA me ma ni// yi ge zung dang ya bral bye brag gis/
368b4(rgyud): thog ma tha ma zung gcig tu// 'khor lo 'di ni ci rigs par// sbyar bar bya ba 'di bshad do// sa bon zhes bya dkyil 'khor gzhag/ khro bo dag ni so so ru// dbang dang khon dang gsad pa dang /
368b5(rgyud): de bzhin bslang dang gi ba dang // yang na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir// zung dang bsnol bas myur du 'grub// khro bo zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil du bzhag ste so so ru/ zung zhig tshig gnyis tha mar gan/
368b6(rgyud): che ge mo zhig dbang du byos// mtshon cha med pa'i sa bor gzhag/ swA hA ri tshig ni bar bar gzhug/ bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas nas// de la rkang pas brdzi ba ni// sngags pas 'greng ste 'dug pa ni//
368b7(rgyud): rkang skyo ba yi bar du bya// rgyal po dbang du ma gyur pa// de yi dbang du myur du 'gyur// gcig pu de la spos nas su// myur du go rims bzhin gzhag pa'o// sa bon gnyis pa'i gnas la ni/
369a1(rgyud): #gnas nas gdong yang bsgyur nas su// zung zhig tshig gnyis mtha' mar gzhag/ che ge mo yi mdza' po de// sdang bar gyur ces mtha' mar bya// skrag par bya ba
369a2(rgyud): cung zad med// bsgrub par bya ba gnyis ka yi// gzugs ni 'jigs pa'i las byed de// gcig tu dpa' bar mnyam ldan par// gnyis ka la yang rkang pas mnan// sngags mkhan de la gnas
369a3(rgyud): pa yis// mel tshe thun na phyed tsam gyis// de nas sgrub pa 'dod pa bzhin// de gnyis phan tshun dgrar gyur pas// khro bo rim bzhin bsgoms pas ni// lan cig byas pa tsam gyis 'gyur// sa
369a4(rgyud): bon gnyis pa de las kyang // drag po rtsal gyis spos nas de// khro bo chen po mig rtsa dmar// gnas ni gsum pa la gnas te// g.yon pa'i gnon pas mnan pas ni// drag po shugs can ma
369a5(rgyud): lus mnan// kha dang brla dang rgyab kyang bsgyur// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra myur 'gyur// phyis kyang rim gyis 'di la gnas// logs shig khro bo'i 'khor lo'i bkas// rkang pa'i tsham rnga ma de bzhin
369a6(rgyud): byas/ gdong yang dal bus bsgyur nas su// dang po'i sa bon gang yin pa'i// dbang du byed la rgyas par 'gyur// de yi mtha' yang lhan cig tu// me dang 'dra ba 'bar ba ste// kun gyis las ni/
369a7(rgyud): grub 'dod na// shin tu legs par sbyar bar byed// de yi zung mas bskul ba yang // so so'am gcig tu'ang rung bar bshad// khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i mthu// brgyad pa dag las myur bar gnas/
369b1(rgyud): rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyis ni// khon pa'i sa bon dag gis bskul// sa bon zung mas bskul ba yang // brgyad pa 'byed par sgrub pa la// mdza' ba myur du bzlog pa'i phyir// cho ga bzhin du rim par sbyar
369b2(rgyud): rim pa snga ma'i tshul bzhin du myur du gsang par 'dod pa yis// khro bo yi ni 'khor lo gnas// dgug pa A bI tsA rA ya// cho ga 'di yis dgra bo dag/ myos par byas nas 'jig par 'gyur// lga
369b3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni sbas pa yang // gshed po'i drung du khrid par 'gyur// rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyis su// khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas// bcu pa dag la rim gyis gnas// drag shul can
369b4(rgyud): gyis drag tu mnan// de yi sa bon gyis kyang phye// sngon gyi sa bon rab 'bar ba// snga ma bzhin du rim gyis bzlas// sngar bshad pa yi las sgrub bo// 'khor lo rim pa bcu gcig po//
369b5(rgyud): gang yin pa ni de bzung nas// de nas zhi bar byed pa yi// sa bon de yis bskul bar bya// snga ma bzhin du bskul ba dang // snga ma'i las ni byed par 'gyur// zhi ba dag la gang gsungs pa//
369b6(rgyud): rgyas pa dag la sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo yi ni gnas kyi mchog/ bcu gnyis pa la gnas nas su// de yi se bon bskul bar byas// bdag gi mthu rtsal gnod brtags pas// sa bon zung
369b7(rgyud): ma sbyor ba yis// sa bon mthu ni 'bar ba can// 'khor lo bkod pa'i las rnams ni// sngon gsungs pa dag grub par bya// de ltar khro bo'i 'khor lo ni// cho gar bcas pa rgyas pa dag
370a1(rgyud): gsang ba bskul mar bcas pa yi// sbyor ba ma lus bshad pa yin// sa bon zung mas bskul ba krung // gnyis pa rab tu grags pa yin// de 'dir sa bon gnyi/
370a2(rgyud): pa yin// myur du grub par 'gyur bar bshad// bla ma'i sa bon thams cad la// phul ba'i tshig gnyis rtag tu sbyar// zung ma'i zung ma'i tshig 'di la// ya tha dag dang tha ma ru'o// 'khor lo
370a3(rgyud): bkod pa bstan pa 'di// ji ltar rim par shes na ni// sbyin sreg bzlas brjod ma byas kyang // khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub thob/ khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang ba ni// 'di mi shes par gang sbyor pa/
370a4(rgyud): de 'di dngos grub mi 'thob kyi// myur du spyo ba thob par 'gyur// ma me ma mI mu sU drug rnams kyis// dbang dang 'okhon dang gsang ba dang // bskrad dang zhi dang rgyas pa'i mthar// mkhas pa dag gis
370a5(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// de dag nyid la bzlog pa yis// de bzhin du ni bskul bar bya// ji skad gsungs pa 'di rnams ni// ma grub na ste gzhan du med// de la mu mu mi ma me ni// ma ni rgyas mthar de bzhin du// 'khor
370a6(rgyud): lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas rnams ni// de dang de dgra gnyis su gyur// de bzhin 'khor lo'i nang du yang // khro bo sku mchog sa bon yang // bzhag nas tshig gi mtha' mar yang // khro bo'i dril bu dkrol ba dgod/
370a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mu ran nang dag tu// zung zhig pa yi tshig gnyis brjod// ma 'os pas 'khor lo'i mig gi nang // sa bon bkon pa rnams la gnas// khro bo'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa ni// shes na ji skad bshad pa
370b1(rgyud): yi/ dngos grub rnams ni thob par 'gyur// dngos grub tshul bzhin thob 'gyur ba// de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya// thog mar phug rgya bcings nas su// sku nas su ni skur bskur te// las rnams
370b2(rgyud): tshul bzhin mthong ba yis// sbyor ba dag ni legs par bya// gdong dang kha mig rkang pa mnyam// rab tu dang zhing zhi ba'i sems// snying yang de bzhin rab tu dga'// dbang du bya ba'i sngags gsungs/
370b3(rgyud): pa/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas sgrub// rkang pa ya gcig thung ngu gzhag/ gdong dang nu mjing bcus te mnan// kha dang mig ni ya gcig 'dzums// tsham rnam gnon pa chen po byas// be
370b4(rgyud): con la ni mig gis blta// bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub la 'bad// gang dag dbye bar 'dod pa yis// de dag dbye ba brtsam par bya// rkang pa gnyis pa bteg pa yis// tsham rnam bya ba slar la
370b5(rgyud): bzhag bzhin bsnyen phyag rgya bcings nas su// khro bar lta zhing yid kyang khros// rab tu dpa' ba sran dang bcas// rtsal gyis gnon par rab tu 'dud// sngags pa sngon bzhin sngags tshul
370b6(rgyud): gnas// gang 'dod pa ni gzhom par bya// de la rkang pa ya gcig kyang // drag shul can du brkyang ste gzhag/ gzur te 'dug pa'i tshul du gnas// gdong yang yon por bsten bar bya// mdzub mo
370b7(rgyud): bsgreng ste gdengs pa dang // be con phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs// dgra dag bslad par 'dod na ni// myur du bslad par bya bar 'gyur// de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa mtho bar
371a1(rgyud): / bya/ dpar dang ldan pas g.yon pa spang // zhi bar 'dod ma zhi bar 'gyur// phyed ni dma' bar bkug ste gnas// rkang pa g.yas pas tshas rngam byed// sngags tshul
371a2(rgyud): gnas pas bsgrims na ni// rgyas par 'dod na thob par 'gyur/ slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba/ bzlog ste bya ba gzhan du med// grub pa bzhig nyid chen po yi// tsam rnga ma rim pa drug gsung
371a3(rgyud): pa drang po'i ming ni log par phyogs// de yi 'og ma rgyab kyis phyogs// de bzhin tsatsham rngam gsum pa ni// khro bo che zhes bsgrags pa yin// bzhi pa mdzub mo bsgreng ba yis// lta
371a4(rgyud): pa la ni stobs zhes bya// drug pa stobs po che zhes bya// 'di rnams tsham rngam drug tu bsgrags// tsam rnga ma dngas pa byas pa yis// dgra yi 'khor rnams g.yen spyo ba// 'khor lo'i
371a5(rgyud): mchog la goms byed pas// grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ khro bo chen pos gsungs pa yis// rab gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di dkon// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'di// de bas yang ni
371a6(rgyud): shin tu dkon// gsang ba'i rtog pa bzang po 'di// kun tu dngos grub kun sbyin par// gsang ba'i rtog pa de bas kyang / 'khor lo 'di ni shin tu dkon// ngom dang ldan pa yong mi
371a7(rgyud): dgos// sngon du bsnyen pa bya mi dgos// khro bo rgyal po'i brtul zhugs dang // dka' thub drag po'ang bu mi dgos/ bas pa tanar sbyor ba'ang bya mi dgos// gang la 'khor lo 'ba' zhig yod/
371b1(rgyud): gang gsungs pa yi ngos grub nas// de ma brag tu dngos grub bog/ de bas 'di ni gsang byas nas/ thams cad sbub pa'i sgrub pa pos// bdas gi don mchog gang 'dod pa// shin tu legs par
371b2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog pa gnyis pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ni// sna tshogs thogs med tha dad pa/ sngags
371b3(rgyud): pa 'dod na cho ga mchog/ dang por byas na dngos grub thog/ rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni// re zhig 'di yi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan dag 'drir ni bshad par bya// de yi las ni gang gsungs
371b4(rgyud): pa// gang dag phyis kyang grub 'gyur pa// dpa' bo gcig pu 'ba' zhig gis// thams cad nyid de gang gsungs pa// thams cad de ni bshad par bya'o// sngags des las rnams kun
371b5(rgyud): byas pas// rgyud la dngos grub gang gsungs pa// dpa' bo gcig pu'i mthus kyang 'grug/ oM ni de yi thog ma ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i dam tshig yin// thog ma dang ni gnyis pa yang /
371b6(rgyud): drag po'i rtseg gi phul ba'i lugs// klas pa'i 'khor gyis mnan pa'i rigs// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng bkod la// sngags rnams thams cad nas byed pa// khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/
371b7(rgyud): gsum po de nas sbyar bar bya// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ su ni de yi 'og tu bsdam// sngags pas sngags rnams kun gyi mtshan// de dag rtag tu rig par bya// thogs ma med pa'i sngags
372a1(rgyud): rnams ni// bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis// bsrung la sogs pa'i las rnams kun// go rims bshad pa bzhin du bya// thams cad bdag nyid chen po 'dis// bsrung ba/
372a2(rgyud): dag ni byas nas su// sngon gyi tshul bzhin rab dben pa// sku gzugs don mchog gzhan nas ni// cho ga ji skad sngar gsungs pa// cho ga bzhin du mchod pa bya// nyin re me tog 'phreng ba la// lan
372a3(rgyud): bdun bzlas pa rnams kyis mchod// mchod nas ka rA l+lI ra yi// me tog dmar po kha 'bus pa'i// brgya ni rtsa brgyad grangs rnams kyis// bu don la ni bog par dbul// cho ga 'di ni dus gsum
372a4(rgyud): du/ rdza ba gcig tu byas nas ni// khro bo mngon sum nye gyur nas// rmi lam du ni dngos grub rtser/ cho ga 'di ltar sngar byas na// gang 'dod pa yi dgos pa dag/ de tshe gdon mi za bar
372a5(rgyud): 'grub// de yi cho ga mchog bshad pa// de ltar zla gcig bsnyen byas na// de yi las rnams gang bya ba// de yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas// de ni legs par bshed par bya// de nas dang
372a6(rgyud): 'gro dang sbyor ba'i// dug ni rnam pa gsum dag dang // gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang // lto 'phye srin por bcas pa 'jig/ bdag gis byis pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags// sbyor ba lan
372a7(rgyud): cig bdag gis gsung // yid la bsams pa tsam gyis kyang // gzhan dag gi kyang mchod par byed// bzhi pa'i rims la sogs de yang // thos pas myur du med par byed// ma dang byis
372b1(rgyud): pa'i gdon rnams dang // thal ba'am yang na sas kyang rung // bdag nyid dag par bsams nas ri// bdag dgar phab nas dgos pa'i don// gang dang gang dag 'dod par ni// bsgoms pas de/
372b2(rgyud): dang de dag byed// yid la bsams pas de dag thar// rdol lan gsum bzlas pa yis// chu srin kum bi ra la sogs// mche ba can dag phyogs med par// chu bsal ba yi mchog tu 'byung //
372b3(rgyud): 'gro tshe yid la bzlas na ni// lam na rkun po'i 'jigs pa med// seng ge sdug dang dgra rnams dang // nad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// rgyal po'i drung du 'gro na yang // sngags kyis smyig tu/
372b4(rgyud): bcings na ni// rgyal po khros pa myur rab tu// brkyang nas thul mo sbyor bar byed// gshegs 'gyed pa dang rgyan po dang // mtshon dang me yis 'jigs pa la// yid la dran zhing bzlas byas nas// mi
372b5(rgyud): bde kun las thar par 'gyur// 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bya'i phyir// mi bde nyam thag gyur pa la// sngags 'di myur dran brjod byas nas// sprin dag mnan par bya ba dang // 'dod bzhin myur du mar
372b6(rgyud): yang bzlog/ gnam lcags ser ba 'bab pa yang // dbyug pa'i phyag rgyas zhi bar byed// phyag rgyas bcings pa de nyid kyis// yid kyis sprir rnams dbab par bya// de ltar phyag rgyas bsdigs nas ni/
372b7(rgyud): smin mtshams dag kyang bsgyur bar bya// rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni// gnam lcags ser ba gcad par bya// sbyor ba mkhas pas ci 'dod pa// char pa dag kyang gcad par bya// gos ni sngon
373a1(rgyud): po bgos na ni// khor lor lug bsrung byas nag/ med parlab par cur zhugs te/ nyin gsum legs par brdas rnas // btu byin gyis ni sprin bsdus nas/
373a2(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du char pa 'bebs// de nas sprin chen las byung ba/ char pas sa stengs khyab par 'gyur// nyin re rtag tu bzlas byas na// bdag dang dri bzhin gzhan rnams kyi/ nad
373a3(rgyud): rnams de nas med par 'gyur// rgyal po dbang du bya yang rung // yungs kar dkar po bzang po las// gzugs brnyan legs par byas nas su// de yi gzugs kyi steng 'dug la// gang
373a4(rgyud): gi ming smos nyin bdun du// bzlas brjod legs par byas na ni// de ni myur du cho ga 'dis// bran bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur// gzhag gcig smyung ba byas pa yis// dmangs rigs dag
373a5(rgyud): ni dbang du 'gyur// zhag gnyis smyung ba de bzhin du// bzlas pa rje'u rigs 'dod pa bzhin// zhag gsum byas pas rgyal rigs te// zhag bzhi dag gis bram ze dag bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin byas
373a6(rgyud): ma'adod pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur// 'bru dang phub ma thams cad las// bu dang bu mo gang yang rung // de bzhim gzugs brnyar byas na ni// dmangs rigs la ni mtshan gcig gis// rab tu rdza
373a7(rgyud): ba bya bar 'gyur// rje'u rigs la ni zhag gnyis kyis// de skad tsog pur 'dug nas ni// de bzhin mdza' dang bral bar byed// nyin zhag gsum dang bani dag gis// rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'o//
373b1(rgyud): ji ltar ji skad gsungs pa yi// las kyis bya yi gzhan gyis smin// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// dur khrod sol bas legs pa ru// snga ma bzhin du legs par bri/ de nas seng
373b2(rgyud): ldeng phur bu la// sngags kyis stong du bzlas byas nas// de yi 'og tu lus la gdab// dgra bo de yi ming smos nas// dri la khros mar byas nas su// de nas de yi snying khar 'dug/ phur bu btang
373b3(rgyud): ste bzlas bya ba// de nyid lag pas bzung nas su// dus gsum nyi ma gsum byas na// dgra bo gang du btab pa drer// gzer thabs drag pos btab nas su// 'gul mi phod par
373b4(rgyud): sa la ltung // 'gra bdun lon nus 'chi bar 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas su song nas su// laka pas be con phyag rngu bcing // lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yis// bsdigs shing nyim nub
373b5(rgyud): nas su// khros shing dgra yi ming spros bzlas// de nas dgra bo mo bdon gyis// zin nas spyod pa sna tshogs pas// 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag ni byed// de nas sgrub pos zhi ba yi// tshogs de la zhi bar bya/
373b6(rgyud): ma mo rnams kyi mdun 'dug nas// zhi ba'i cho ga mkhas pa yis// dbang po bsdams shing yid bde bas// nyin zhag gsum du bzlas byas nas// de nas de la las de yi// zhi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// nyi ma /
373b7(rgyud): la ni mngon phyogs nas// lag pas dgra bo'i mgo byug cing // dgra yi ming spos mnan nas su// nyi ma nub tu bzlas byas na// de yi klad pa na 'gyur ba/ tshabs chen shi la thug par 'gyur// de nas/
374a1(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas su// nyin par zlos shing zhi bar bya// sa stengs rkang pa gcig gis 'dug/ nyin par lag pa gyen du brkyang // ci dga' khros shing bzlas byas
374a2(rgyud): pa/ dgra yi ming smos ci 'dod par// nyi ma nub kar de nas dgra// mi dgar ba dang myos 'gyur te// gnyen dang mdza' ba rnams bor te// de nas gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro// de la 'dir ni zhi ba la/
374a3(rgyud): 'on te rgyas par bya 'dod na// gtsang sbra byas te gos dkar bgos// bde zhing brtan par ma g.yos par// mchod pa bzang po byas nas su// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas// 'o ma btung zhing
374a4(rgyud): bzlas byas pa// zhi bar 'gyur gyi bar du'o// de ltar 'di ni sna tshogs pa// sbyor bcas rgyas par bshad pa yin// rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du ni// ma gsungs pa yang legs par sgrub// khro bo rnam par
374a5(rgyud): rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bzang po 'di// he la'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni//
374a6(rgyud): de bas bzang po gzhan med pa// ji ltar rigs pa bshad par bya// dang por he zhes gang gsungs pa// bskul ba'i sa bon thams cad pa'o// de ni len dang 'dzin pa ste// las la sbyar du bskul ba'o//
374a7(rgyud): de bas thog mar bskul ba dang // don bzhin du ni bzung ba la// khro bo yi ni rgyal po yi// he la'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan// he he ha ha haM hi hi hi ha ha he he gnyis sbyar ba// khro chen tshig gi thog mar sbyar/
374b1(rgyud): zung zhig pa yi tshig gnyis pa'o// zung drug 'khor lo'i mtha' mar dgod// mu ra ma rtsibs kyi mig rnams su// sngags las 'byung ba'i re re'o// don rnams thams cad sgrub par 'gyur//
374b2(rgyud): bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags// gnas su ji ltar bkod pa dang // ji ltar spros shing gang gnas pa// so so'i las la sbyar bar bya// de nas 'di dag bkod pa de// sngags rnams pa
374b3(rgyud): tshul bzhin bshad// de'i nang mu ran gsum po dang // dbus kyi mu ran bzang por ldan// mtha' yi mu ran drug po dang // rtsibs kyi zur drug rab bzang ba// rab dben 'du 'dzi med pa'i sar/
374b4(rgyud): chog bzhin du legs bris nas// de yi gnas su sbyar ba dang // de yi go rims bzhin du sbyar// de yi tsham rngam gsal ba yi// sngags rnams 'di ni bsdu bar bya// dbus su de bzhin gshegs
374b5(rgyud): pa yi// snying po mtshan ni brjod pa'i mchog/ bzhag nas de yi gnas dag la// sngags ni grub par byed pa gzhag/ mu ran gnyis la gnas nas su// khro bo'i snying po gzhag par bya/
374b6(rgyud): de ni khro bo'i 'bas kyis mnan// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra yang bsgrags// khro bo'i zhabs kyis bcags byas pa// rtsibs rnams khro bo mthu dang ldan// dbus su snying po dag par ldan// rab tu 'drar
374b7(rgyud): ri ngas byas pa// mu ran gsum gyi bar duste// thams cad don rnams kun 'grub pa'o// he de ga ci hi hi hi ha ha she te gnyis su gyur// khro bo chen po'i tshig dbus nas// sa bon bzung ba'i
375a1(rgyud): phyi rol gzhag/ thog mar bskul ba'i tshig rnams dgod// khro bo du mas brtul bskul ba ste// thams cad kun tu don rnams kun// grub pa'i phyir ni de la gnas/
375a2(rgyud): de ltar 'khor lo byas pa yi// phyi nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag/ bskul ba'i tshig rnams bkod pa'i mtha'// khro bo gzhan rnams bkod par bya// de nas gzhan yang rim bzhin du// khro bo chen po dgod
375a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir// skul bar byed pa bcu gnyis po// 'di dag tshul bzhin bshad par bya// dang po khro bo rgyal pos gsungs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba che zhes bya// rdo rje me yis rgyal por gnag/ rab tu dga' ba'i shugs
375a4(rgyud): gzhag go/ rab tu drag shul stobs po che// rgya che khro bo lnga pa yis// drug pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba// khro bo bdun par byed pa yin// zur du khro bo brgyad po grags/
375a5(rgyud): 'phongs pa sgrol ba de bzhin dgu// rab tu 'joms pa bcu pa yin// de bzhin kI li kI li gzhag/ kI li kI li chen po dang // bcu gnyis su ni gsungs pa yin// khro bo rab tu snang byed pa/
375a6(rgyud): bcu gnyis bgrangs pa 'di dag ni// khro bo'i rgyal po sa kun tu mnan// thams cad rim pa bzhin du gsungs// 'khor lo'i phyi rol gnas pa 'khod// 'bar zhing drag po'i mthu dang ldan/
375a7(rgyud): thams cad bstan nas 'khod pa ni// khro bo chen po snang byed pa// mthu rtsal chen po stobs su ldan/ kun kyang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o// sa bor snga ma mtha' yas rnams// mug kyang drug dang
375b1(rgyud): ldan par bya// seng du klad kyi 'khor gyis mtshan// sa blon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o// dang po dkyil 'khor na gnas gcig / tshig dang bcas pa'i don kun thug/ rab tu 'bar ba'i sngags kyi mthab/
375b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can gyis bsgrags// sa bon gnyin pa gang yin pa// tshig dang bcas par de bzhin nas// rdo rje me rgyal zhes bya ba// jo bo don kun grub byed pa'o// dang po'i sa bon
375b3(rgyud): gsungs pa yang // snga ma bzhin du tshig dang bcas// rab tu shugs drag cher grags pa// khro bo'i rgyal po khro bor snang // snang byed khro bo'i rim pa las// tsheg drag de bzhin khro bo che/
375b4(rgyud): de ni stobs po che zhes gsungs// gnyis pa'i 'khor lo cho ga mtha' can// gang gsungs khro bo rgya chen ni// de ni snying por grags pa yang // mi thub gtso bo'i tshig dang bcas// de yi gsum
375b5(rgyud): po tshig bcas pa// de yang de bzhin bsgrags pa yin// 'jigs pa zhes bya rab tu che// khro 'di khro bo sdang byed pa// rgya chen gyi ni rim bzhin du// bzhi pa yongs su bsgrubs pa yin/
375b6(rgyud): tshig bcas rab tu drag po nyid// su ru khro bo de bzhin gzhag/ de yi sa bon lnga pa yin// 'bar ba'i 'phreng chen zhes bya gang // chog dang bcas pa de bzhin du// khro ba 'phongs pa
375b7(rgyud): grol zhes bya'o// lnga po rgya chen nyid yin te// chog dang bcas par bsgrags pa'o// rab tu 'joms pa zhes bsgrags pa// khro bo khro bo sdang byed pa'o// sa bon snga ma mtha' med
376a1(rgyud): las snga ma chog bcas de bzhin gzhag kI li kI li bya ba yi// dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// de bzhin de yi sa bon nyid// tsheg bcus de bzhin/
376a2(rgyud): 'dir bshad do// kI li kI li chen po de// khro bo'i khro bo snang byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni// sa bon 'di dag rnams kyis bsgrags// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyor ba yis// ra
376a3(rgyud): tu snang bar byed ces bsgrags/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i 'khor los gnas// gshin rje gshed po yin par gsungs// dang por de ni 'khor lo bstar// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // khro bo'i rgyal
376a4(rgyud): po de las gzhan// khro bo'i bdag po snang byed pa'o// de ltar khro bo gsum po de// gang dang gang du rab sbyar ba// de dang de ru sngags rnams ni// skul bar byed pas de bzhin bskul// cho ga
376a5(rgyud): shes pas nan tan du// gang dang gang 'dod bsgrub par bya// khro bo bsgom dang ldan pa yis// he la'i 'khor lo yongs bsgoms nas// dka' zhing sgrub tu rang mi rung ba// brtul zhugs hom
376a6(rgyud): dang bcas la sogs// de yis dgod pa ma byas kyang // sngags bkod shes na sgrub pa'o// he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pa// de yi bka' ba ma byas kyang // gdon mi za bar myur du 'grub/
376a7(rgyud): brtul zhugs ngom dang bsam gtan dang // ji ltar gsungs pa'i dka' thub dang // mngon par brtson zhing dad pa'i bdag lan grangs bcu gnyis gang bsnyen pa// rtog las gsungs pa'i las
376b1(rgyud): rnams byed// rab tu ya mtshan ston pa'o// de la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pas// ring por mi thogs bde ba ni// khro bor bsgom pa dang ldan zhing // he la'i 'khor lo gnas 'dug na// kham
376b2(rgyud): gsum dag kyang lan cig gis/ thogs med myur du g.yos par byed// de bas rab tu bsgrims nas su// khro bo bsgom po sems byas te// he la'i 'khor lo las 'byung sngags// sbyor ba
376b3(rgyud): dag gis goms par bya// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// rtog pa dang por gang bsgrags pa// de yi rtog pa gsang bshad pa// cho ga 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog/ khro bo 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di// cho ga de
376b4(rgyud): bas shin tu gsang // khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang bshad pa// rab tu snang byed de bas kyang // he la'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di// rab tu gsang ba'i mchog yin te// rtog pa 'di dag thams cad kyi/
376b5(rgyud): rab tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// rtog pa rab tu gsang ba ni// 'di dag rnam pa kun la yang // he la'i 'khor lo 'dra ba yi// 'khor lo ma byung phyis mi 'byung // gang zhig 'di yi don thos nas//
376b6(rgyud): khro bo'i grub pa sgom byed na// de yis 'bad pa ma byas kyang // 'jig rten na ni sbub dka' med// he la'i 'khor lo'i gnas la ni// ji ltar 'dod par gnas nas su// khro bo bsgom dang rab ldan
376b7(rgyud): pas/ khro bo'i gzugs su gnas nas su// rtse gcig tu yang tshig gi mchog/ sgrub pa mchog ni sbyin par byed// thogs pa med par 'jam dpal mthong // ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o//
377a1(rgyud): khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa sde bzhi pa'o// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// skul cig ces bya'i tshis
377a2(rgyud): gnyis gzhag/ skul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis mthar// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o// khro bo chen po 'phreng ba dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'di yi mthar// kun tu dang po g.yo ba dang /
377a3(rgyud): sngags shes tsham rngam mdzes pa yis// he la'i 'khor lo la gnas te/ dang po gnas su 'dug nas su/ be con phyag rgya lan cig bcing // de nas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pa// sngags pa 'gre
377a4(rgyud): ste 'dug pa ni// rkang pa gnyis ni bsgyur ba dang // khro bo bsgom pa 'di la ni// sems ni rab tu shes byas nas// sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa 'am// ri dag g.yo bo'i bar du'o// de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa
377a5(rgyud): yis// gnyis pa'i gnas la song nas su// khro bo chen po'i tshig mthar gnas// sgoms shig ces par dbang bskur ro// de tshig thog mar bkod nas ni// de yi mthara' mar bdud rtsi 'khyig/
377a6(rgyud): bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mthar// rdo rje me yi rgyal po'i sngags// rab tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang / tsam rngam gsal ba dag la gnas/ be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni// zo bo bsgoms pas
377a7(rgyud): sngags bzlas so// rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'di ni// mtsho dang rdzing chen krung chen rnams// zos pas myur du sems par byed// 'bab chu dag kyang gyen du 'beb// khro bo mthu chen gnon ldan pa/
377b1(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya// rtsibs rnams rim pas kun mnar pa// gnyis po de las 'phos nas su// de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug/ mthu rtsal ldan pas rim par mnan// khro bo/
377b2(rgyud): cher po'i tshig gi mthar// skrad par byos zhes tshig gnyis bskul// de ni snga ma bzhin bkod nas// de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar// rab tu drag po'i shugs gzhag go//
377b3(rgyud): rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yis// khro bo tsham rngam bsnyen par gnas// glang po myos pa'i shugs can dag/ mngon du 'ong bar gyur na yang // de ma thag tu skrag par byed// myos pa'i shugs
377b4(rgyud): kyang rab tu dor// slad du log par phan tshun du// bskor zhing mi dga' bzhin du 'gro// glang po'i rgyal po de myos shing // bde ba ma thob babs par 'gyur// sgrub pa khro bo sgom pa yi//
377b5(rgyud): ga'i tshul ni de bzhin no// he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i// bzhi pa'i gnas la 'dug nas kyang // khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// non cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul// de nas cho ga sngar
377b6(rgyud): bshad pas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa de yi mthar// khro bo chen po stobs chen gzhag/ kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa yi// tsham rngam gyis ni mi g.yor mnan//
377b7(rgyud): dpung ngam yang na glang po 'am// gru 'am yang na shing rta 'am// rta dang rnga mo lug la sogs// khro bo bsgoms pa'i tshul bzhir byas// sbyor ba de la gnas nas ni// rab tu man pa byas
378a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas he la zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo lnga pa la gnas nas// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig gnyis gzhag/ khro bo bdud rtsi
378a2(rgyud): 'khyil pa yang // mtha' yi tshig gi gnas su gzhag khro bo rgya chen zhes bya ba// rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang // rab tu 'khrug par zhes bya ba'i// tsham rngam mchog gis
378a3(rgyud): myur du ni// dgra yi dpung rnams phan tshun du/ rab tu rnam par dkrug par bya// de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi// rim pa drug la gnas nas ni// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// rmongs par
378a4(rgyud): gyur ces tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang / tshig gi tha mar kun tu gzhag/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// cho gra snga ma bzhin du bskul// rmongs par byed pa'i tsham rngam
378a5(rgyud): gyis/ cho ga bzhin du rab bskul nas// ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin// 'gro ba myur du rmongs par 'gyur// de nas he la'i 'khor lo 'di// rim bdun pa la gnas nas su// khro bo
378a6(rgyud): chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis gzhag/ khro bo 'dzin par byed pa yis// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa skul bar byed// 'jigs par gyur pa'i sgra sgrog pa// khro bani
378a7(rgyud): tsham rdzam gyur bar ni/ dus min par yang ljin gyis khebs// de nas 'dod banyin char pa 'beb// de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi// rtsibs kyi rim pa brgyad pa la// gnas nas 'dir ni rdza ma
378b1(rgyud): bzhin// khro bo cher po'i tshig gi mthar// hi his bon gnyis bzhag nas// de yi 'og tu bdud rtsi 'khyil// khro bo zur du de bzhin du// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i tha mar gzhag / khro bo tshom rngam la
378b2(rgyud): gdungs pa/ kha cog ces bya ba myur bar ni// rkang pa la gcig gdangs pa'i skabs// seng dang ser ba rdung sa mogs/ dus pam yang na dus min par// srub po khro bo 'acoms pa yis//
378b3(rgyud): khro bo'i sngags kyi tshul bzhin du// swa yi steng du 'bebs par byed// se la'i 'khor lo gnas brgyad po// sgrub pa yi ni sar bor nas// khro zho'i sa bon tshig gsal ba// dgu pa bzang po la gnas te/
378b4(rgyud): khro bo chen po tshig gi mthar// spongs shig pa yi chog gnyis bskul// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// tha mar 'phongs pa sgrol ba gzhag/ khro ba bsgoms pas mdzes pa yi// tsam rngam
378b5(rgyud): gsal ba byas nas ni// khro bo gshin rje gshed po bzlas// khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsapa// hUM zhes bya ba bzang po yis// khro bo dngos por bsgoms nas ni// shing gi rtse dang yal ga dbug/ yang
378b6(rgyud): na shing rten rtsa nas 'byin// me tog 'bras bu klog pa 'am// yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed// ljon shing chen po rnams kyang ni// ji ltar 'dod par mi g.yor 'gyur// he la zhes bya'i
378b7(rgyud): 'khor lo yi// rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas/ khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// rloms shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo chen po rab 'joms pa/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
379a1(rgyud): pa'i mthar/ snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya/ 'jigs par byed pa'i tsham rngam byed// ri chen dag gi rtse mo dang // sgo dang lcags sgrog rnams kyi ni/
379a2(rgyud): bo'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du// bsgoms ra rab mchog grub byed pa/ de la yi ni 'khor lo yi// rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// snyil cig ces pa'i tshig gis/
379a3(rgyud): bskul// khro bo kI li kI lA yang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bya ba// tshig gi bla mar gnas pa ste// cho ga bzhin du bsha pa bzhin/ kI li kI la zhes bya ba// tsam rngam mchog
379a4(rgyud): la de bzhin gnas// be con gyi ni phyag rgya cings// gshin rje gshed po bsgoms pa ni// rin chen rtsa ba brtan pa yang // rtse mo nas kyang snyil bar byed// yang na ri kar skye ba yi// brtan pa'i
379a5(rgyud): shing rnams 'gyel bar byed// de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi// bcu gnyis pa yi rtsibs la gnas// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// zhugs shig ces pa'i tshig gis bskul// bskul nas de yi tha ma
379a6(rgyud): ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya// khro chen kI li kI la yang // de yi tha mar gzhag par bya// kI li kI la chen po zhes// bya ba'i tsham rngam de bzhin bya/ be con phyag rgya bcings nas su//
379a7(rgyud): khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// yid la rab tu goms byas na/ rtsig pa shing skam rdo la sogs// babs na phyung ste nam mkhar gnas// nam mkha' la ni byung nas kyang // 'dod pa
379b1(rgyud): bzhin du ltung bar byed// 'di ni rang byung ngo mtshar la// 'di ni dus gsum sngon du byung // spyod pa gzhan yang snga ma bzhin// khro bo bsgoms pas byed par gsungs// he la'i 'dod
379b2(rgyud): lo dgod pa ni// rab tu gsang ba yin par bshad// gsang dang bcas shing sbyor bcas pa// shes na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang ri rigs par// tsham rngam bcu gnyis
379b3(rgyud): sbyor ba dag/ mdo dang rgyas pa'i tshul dag gis// da ni rab tu bshad par bya// kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin// de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad// skrag par byed pa gsum pa ste/
379b4(rgyud): bzhi pa kun tu sdom par byed// rab tu 'khrug ces bya ba lnga// rmongs par byed pa de bzhin drug/ myur ba tsam rnga ma de la gnas// kha gdangs pa ni brgyad par bshad// mdzes zhes
379b5(rgyud): byang dgu pa ste/ 'jigs par byed pa bcu pa yin// kI li kI la zhes bya dang // k+Shi li kI le chen po yi// khro bo tshom dzam bcu gnyis so// 'di dag rim bzhin bshad pa yin// thog
379b6(rgyud): mar bsdigs pa'i rim pa yin// be con phyag rgya ldan par bya// phyi nas rang gzugs ji bzhin du// sngags pa dag gis shes par bya// rang gi gzugs kyang rang gnas pa// bsdigs
379b7(rgyud): shing tsham rngab byed la sogs// skrag par byed pa'i kha ni zab// khro bo'i lta ba gdong 'gyur ba// rkang pa 'gyed par bzhag pa dag/ tsham rngam mtshan nyid bshad pa yin// rkang pa ya
380a1(rgyud): gcig myur du gzhag/ gdong dang nu mjing yon po byas// khro gnyer 'jigs pa byed par bsnyer// g.yon pa mdzub mo gcig gis bsdigs// tsham rngas
380a2(rgyud): byed cing be con gdengs// gdong dang bad+ma dang rkang pa g.yon// kun tu g.yo zhes zla ba ste// jo bo tsham rngam bsnyems dang bcas// kun tu g.yo ba'i rim gsungs la// rab tu g.yo zhes
380a3(rgyud): ba ni/ cung zad du ni dbus dman pa'o// rab tu g.yo ba brtag par bya// de bzhin dpung pa brkyang ba dang // rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs pa dang // lag gnyis drug tu rdob pa ni// de bzhin
380a4(rgyud): skrag par byed par bshad// be con la ni lta bar gtad// rkang pa g.yas pa gsal bar gyur// de ni kun tu sdom par bshad// g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs par bya// dpung pa
380a5(rgyud): gdengs pa g.yon bzhin du// mig ni mdzub mo gcig la gtad// rkang pa g.yas pa phyar ba ni// kun tu 'khrug pa zhes bya'o// rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs byas te// g.yon phyogs su
380a6(rgyud): ni phyar zhing bskor// dpung pa brkyang ba'i be con gdengs/ bsdigs pa gcig tu rmongs par byed// myur du tsham rngam zhes bya ba// de nyid dpung brngubs bsdigs pa'o// de nyid las ni
380a7(rgyud): kha gdangs pa// kha gdangs pa zhes bsgrags pa yin// sran dang bcas la bzhi ni bskor// mthu rtsal che ba'i stabs su stsol// mchu yi mtha' ma so yis mnan// lag pa byar
380b1(rgyud): te sdigs par byed/ bsnyems dang btsas shing sgra yang 'byin// 'jigs par byed pa'i skye ba spags pa'i// tsam rnga ma leg par bshad pa ni// mdzes pa'i khro bos gnon pa'o// bcan/
380b2(rgyud): thabs su ni bskor bar bya// rkang pa g.yas pa btsugs te mnan// lag pa gnyis ka dra ba rdob pa// byas nas 'jigs par bya ba ni// de bzhin bsnyems dang bcas bshad pa// tsham rngam
380b3(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po 'dri// 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ste// rtag tu khro bo sgom pa'o// rkang pa mnyam par bzhag ste 'dug/ g.yas pa cung zad mtho bar bya// dpral dang ldan pas g.yon pa spad//
380b4(rgyud): g.yon pa sor mo gcig ni bsdigs// dpung pa bteg sta be con 'phyar// rkang pa dang ni gdong bsgyur ba// rtag tu khro bo skem pa ni// kI li kI la zhes bya'o// kI li kI la chen po ni// de nyid las
380b5(rgyud): ni rgyab tu blta// khro bo mig ni ya gcig btsums// myur du mchod stabs byed pa'o// 'di ni tsham rngam sbyor ba ste// he la'i 'khor lo rtsibs rim las// mdor ni ji ltar dgod pa dag/ legs
380b6(rgyud): par bshad pa 'di yin no// he la'i 'khor lo'i mthu sngags dang // tsham rnga ma g.yas kyi mthu dga' yis// las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba// ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o// bsgrub pa de
380b7(rgyud): dag gsang rgyud dang // he la'i 'khor lo 'di shes na// khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur bas// khro bo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur// rtog pa 'di ni gsang bar bcas// gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu ba/
381a1(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las// mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las// rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di// rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba// thos nas gas/
381a2(rgyud): ba'i don bsgoms pas// lnga de thams cad yi rang nas// khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te// rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la rjes su yi rang
381a3(rgyud): ba'i le'u me nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// jo bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyung rdzogs so//
381a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra b+hair bad+mar cin ma/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
381a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// rdul ba sras dang bcas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dI mi se lA bya/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams cad bdag la 'thun par rtag tu ma
381a6(rgyud): yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig/ de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go// a ra ro/ a sa mahAs ma hA/ a nar+tha/ rna ma tra~M/ khaN+Da la NA/ ma hA bI re/ tsa lo sa ma ma/ A
381a7(rgyud): ma hA ba le/ ka Na ka Na na ma hA ba la ag gri he ka ha ha badz+ra badz+ra hA ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hU~M paN+Da la sa ma ba ra ar+tha bi tha me/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru / sarbaM thA sarba ti/ dza la dz+wa la ka a shri Na phaT
381b1(rgyud): 'a gas rdza kham pa sa da sbyi pashegs pa'i yun pa yan song sa myod bya sa snru sa gas mas pas 'ad
381b2(rgyud): byas par 'gyur ro// las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/ dam tshig gsum pa'i chog las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang
381b3(rgyud): gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no// de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/ rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni// klu dang lha srin bcas pa yi// sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa// de
381b4(rgyud): khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i// brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa// de ni srung bar byed pa'i mchog/ ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa
381b5(rgyud): med bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni// skye bo kun la grung gyur cig/ ta d+ya/ oM badz+ra ma ka ra/ badz+ra pra kar/ badz+ra dAr+dz+dza / b+ha lA bar+t+ta/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ri tsum pa k+She/ tsulu te le na mo rang trathA/
381b6(rgyud): ya na mo badz+ra bai rab s+yag ma hA ga Na pa ti s+ya/ badz+ra sha hi par shu/ pA shra/ has+t+ra ya/ badz+ra ka na ka/ badz+re DUr+tha a laM krI/ ga rI rA ya badz+ra pA Ni ra nub lA ya/ tad+ya thA/
381b7(rgyud): b+hu ru b+hu ru/ a na yA/ a na yA / mahA ga Na ba ti la b+hu la \u0f7f/ e hi e hi/ a tha ma a kra ma/ sha ri ra~M/ kri hri ta ma/ gri hI ta ma/ de ma daMSh+Tha ma thA/ ar+tha bi sha tus rnyer
382a1(rgyud): kiny+tsi rA ya si/ bi d+hu na/ ba d+ha na/ pa Ta pa Ta/ kaM pa kaM pa/ raM ga raM ga/ mo da mo da/ d+harmaHrma/ badz+ri bA badz+ri bA/ sU ra pU ra/ kur+Na gur+Na/ a bi sha a big
382a2(rgyud): shrIg+h+na shI g+h+raM/ ma hA badz+ra b+hai ra be/ ga Na pa ti rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad la rengs par bya ba dang / byad snyems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i rtsi ba la dkyil 'khor dru bzhi pa byas la
382a3(rgyud): sems khros pas mtshon la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byang snyems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun
382a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// ser ba bzlog/
382a5(rgyud): par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing / spa'ang ha cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro// chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan/
382a6(rgyud): bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro// nang zhi bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman nam tshul lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam thugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// las gang byed pa
382a7(rgyud): thams cad la'ang lam 'dun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs so// / 'apag
382b1(rgyud): pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang // rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs// bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di// kun gyis thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i/
382b2(rgyud): gzungs// rnal 'byor ci rnal 'byor chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban d+he skyo 'od 'byung ba la gnang ngo // / rgya gar skad du/
382b3(rgyud): Ar+ya ma hA da tA na ma d+hA ra Ni/ 'od skad du/ 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
382b4(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 'aldan bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dam slong gi dge bdun rjen po dang thab cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mtsho dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin rgyas
382b5(rgyud): po'i khab kyi dung khron chen po bsil ba'i gnas na/ bung shi chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go// der 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdom rnams dang /
382b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lho'i phye chen ma'i gdon rnams dang / dri ba'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / drung lha'i gdon
382b7(rgyud): rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha pa'i gdon rnams dang / rdul bus kyi gdon rnams dang / gcig rnams dang / rtsa rog rnams dang /
383a1(rgyud): 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la shim
383a2(rgyud): gtses so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
383a3(rgyud): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus te mchi ma blags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan rin khyod
383a4(rgyud): ci'i phyir nga'i mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma thog/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal
383a5(rgyud): po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na/ bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis mchis na/ der lnga'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi
383a6(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon
383a7(rgyud): rnams dang / mi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'thung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha ba'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gang rnams dang / gnyis rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / bum pa rnams dang /
383b1(rgyud): grog spur rnams dang / thig thul rnams dang / grazhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis bdag la shin tu gtses lags mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sbags/
383b2(rgyud): zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod kyis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen pa
383b3(rgyud): rnams bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring po'i don dang / phar pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba 'di zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ a gA/ baM gA/ taM thA/ ta ra~M bA/ sa rA sa rA/ ta ra bA sa/
383b4(rgyud): sadas dzaHrA/ a ka re/ a ra bI rA/ ta rA bI rA/ ta ra bI rA/ ta ra ta ra bi ra/ karka ra bI rA/ tsu ru b+hI rA/ tsu ru tsu ru bI rA/ in+da ki/ sa ra ha nas/ ha na sa ki sa ra/ mi tsi re lA ma hA mi ts+tsha
383b5(rgyud): bi hi ShI kA/ ka li tsA kA aM ge dza ye/ dza ye ki la/ e lA/ tsin+ta/ li le ti le ti le/ su mi ta/ bu su ma ti/ tsu lu nan+de/ tsu lu tsu lu nar+the/ tsu la na Ti/ ku na ti/ ha ri NI
383b6(rgyud): ki kan rI Da ki ta/ gau ri/ gaR+sha d+ha ri/ d+hA ra Ne/ d+hA ra Ne/ uSh+Ta/ pi pI li ka/ uSh+Ta/ pa pi la ke/ ka rA kar+Ni ka/ ka ke le/ tsa la nar+Ni/ ka gI ma le la mA ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/
383b7(rgyud): pA la ku le bta sa le/ un mi li/ ta ra bI re/ ta ra ta ra dzI ba~M/ ku ru bI re/ ku ru ku ru bI re/ tsu ru tsu ru tsu ru tsu ru bI re/ ma hA bI re/ i ram ti/ ba ra ma ti / rak+Sha sa ti/
384a1(rgyud): sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ram su ra s+yAd+ha ni/ a pra ti ha te/ rgyal po dbang po dang / rgyal po zla ba dang / rgyal po gshin rje dang / rgyal po rlung khA dang rdul
384a2(rgyud): po gzi can dang rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / rgyal po be con dang / rgyal po be con mo dang / rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje dang / chos kyi rgyal po
384a3(rgyud): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba bla na med pas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / bzhi pa dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang
384a4(rgyud): chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ i la mi le/ ta sa lA/ i ra ma
384a5(rgyud): tibi ra mu ti/ tsa la ma ti/ pu ru ma ti/ pu ru phu ru/ phu ru pu ru/ pa ra khu ru ru/ khu ru mra tri/ b+hu mi maN+De/ ka li ke/ tsaN+DA li/ a kr-i sa rA le/ i yA sA ga sa la ma to//
384a6(rgyud): hu le/ s+thu le/ sha le dza ya/ b+hU le/ tsa la nA Ti/ tsa nA Ti/ nA gA nAn d+ha ra Ni go ro hi ni/ go le ti he/ aN+Da re/ paSh+TaM/ ke yu ri/ ke tu ma ti/ b+hu traM ga me/ b+hu ta ba ti/ d+har+ye/
384a7(rgyud): ma hA ba le ai tsut+te/ a tsu rud+he d+haram+b+hi ra/ dza ya li kA/ dzi le go ro hi na/ tsa ra/ hu ru hu ru/ run d+hu ru mad+hu/ hu ru/ d+hu ma ti/ d+ha ran d+ha re/ \u0f7fre/ bi tsa mi ti/ nA sha ni/ ban r+tha
384b1(rgyud): macan/ thal tsan/ rarbA ne/ bi shoHne/ sa da~M Nisan b+hI ra Ni/ sats+tshadz+nyA ni/ d+hu rAmA le d+ha ras Ne/ garabang/ ba d+hA pa ti/ bai bai ri/ ge re le/ rba du
384b2(rgyud): baM ga le swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa bcu pa 'di srud pa la mdud de/ lag pa la btags sam/
384b3(rgyud): mgul du btags na/ kun nas dpag tshad bcu khor yug tu bcon rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro// de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi
384b4(rgyud): tshugs par 'gyur ro// mtshon dang / dug dang ka nang dang / rims nad dang / rims drag po dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / ro langs dang / khro gdug dang / me dang / chus 'chi ba'i
384b5(rgyud): dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sbyor ba rnams legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o// grub pa rnams kyang chud mi za bar
384b6(rgyud): byed pa'o// pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'i/ pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o// nad dang / mya ngan dang / bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o// 'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu
384b7(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa'o// gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// gdon gang gis mi gtong ba de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gebs so// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
385a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'ang rdo rje 'bar ba/ kun tu 'brar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba ka me lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tsal pa bdun du 'gems so//
385a2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang ljags kyi 'khor lo spu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo//
385a3(rgyud): sgra gcan zin rgyal po dang / mi rgod dang / me dang / chu dang / mtshon cha dang / 'brog dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang / rtswa dam du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzangs kyi rig sngags 'di
385a4(rgyud): lhan cig brjod na sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur ro// sgra gcan rin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsang gcig
385a5(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa gsung pa/ gsung bar 'gyur ba grub pa mchog tu gyur pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa lnga dang / klu dang dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/
385a6(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba se bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig nad med pa dang 'jigs pa med
385a7(rgyud): par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa be con chen po zhes
385b1(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tso ba ban rje ye shes rjes bskur cing zhus te/ gang kas bcas kyis nga
385b2(rgyud): bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// rtsa gar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na mA la nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/ bod skad du// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin
385b3(rgyud): po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
385b4(rgyud): bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang
385b5(rgyud): dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la/
385b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// klu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin rnams pa
385b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// dri za rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lto 'phye chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'am ci rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// srin po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sha za skra gyen du brdzes pa rnams la
386a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rig pa'i bdag po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba dang nyi ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gzhan gyis mi thub
386a2(rgyud): pa'i rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i snying po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ lha dang klu rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba las thams cad byed pa gtsang ba brjod par bya ste/ dag cing de ni bkra shis
386a3(rgyud): pa bsod nams byed gtsang dpal yon can// srin po 'joms pa'i lha rnams dang // sems can kun gyis mi thub pa'o// sdig pa thams cad rab 'jig pa// don kun grub pa dpal yon can/
386a4(rgyud): gdon kun rnam par 'jig byed pa// rig sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// 'di ni rtag tu rgyal byed pa// brgya byin gyis kyang mi thub 'di// dug dang gshed byed 'jig byed pa// me dgra rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /
386a5(rgyud): gshed byed gdon dang ro langs dang // rmi lam ngan dang lus srul dang // lha dang lha min dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams las// kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad// rtag tu bdag la srung bar mdzod/
386a6(rgyud): nyin gcig pa yi rims nad dang // nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum pa/ nyin bzhi pa yi rims nad dang // wang dub rims las 'di srung mdzod// dug dang dbyig dug zos pa yang // kha zas bzhin du/
386a7(rgyud): zhu bar 'gyur// gang gi mngal na mi chags dang // gang gi bu po 'chi ba yang // rin po che'i 'greng ba yis// de dag myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur// nor 'dod pa ni nor rnams thog/ dpal
386b1(rgyud): 'dod pa yang dpal thob 'gyur// 'thab cing 'gyed dang g.yul ngor yang // myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin// sems can rnams la gnod gzigs nas// 'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa// rin
386b2(rgyud): chen 'phreng / zhes bya ba yi// rig sngags 'di ni brjod par b+ha// tad+ya thA/ oM da na ka rI/ bi bu la ka ri/ dza la ka ri/ yaSh+Ta ka ri/ pri d+hi ka ri/ A yudz+nyA de/ praN+ya dA ri/ Ar+tha pra sha mra na/ d+ha raH/
386b3(rgyud): nabi brta ni/ shI ka ri/ sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra pA sha bar+t+ti ni/ me dA dza na ni/ pu tra dzA na ni/ ba ri ba rA ba bar+Na ni/ A yardA ni/ pra ti ka ri/ dzaM b+ha ni/ sti b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha sha kA ti/ kats+tsha na ma
386b4(rgyud): le/ gra ha sau/ ma ka ra Ni/ sarba kA li kA la ha bi gra ha bi bya d+ha/ pra sha ma ni/ pa rA tsakra ni ba ra Ni/ ba ra bai n+ya/ staM b+ha ni/ tsAn+da ni rA mA le/ ka ri Ni/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma ni/ sarba ka la
386b5(rgyud): biSh+Ta nA sha ni swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu ru swA hA/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ sarba de ba a nu dz+nyi te swA hA/ sarba nA ga saM rak+Shi ti swA hA/ oM ni ri ni ri phaT/ ha na ha na phaT/ da had ha phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa \u0f7f/
386b6(rgyud): gang dag bdag la sdang bar sems pa dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / byad byed pa dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad phaT phaT swA hA/
386b7(rgyud): ag+ni staM b+ha ya ma bI sha na/ sha trun u da kan/ tsau ra na/ sarba duSh+Tan/ sarba pra ba t+yar+thi ka pra t+ya ma tra na/ staM b+ha yA midzaM b+ha ya mi/ mo b+ha ya mi phaT phaT sA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ces
387a1(rgyud): bya ba/ rin chen 'phreng gis rab brgyan pa// las kun byed dang de bzhin du// rtag tu srung bar byed pa 'di// 'gro 'am yang na ci yang rung // de dag 'ga' 'khris te 'chang /
387a2(rgyud): srin po 'joms pa bsod nams mchog sdig pa'i rnyog pa 'jig par byed// g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab pa dang // kun tu rgyal bar byed pa dge/ mi gang gtsang sbra byas nas su// rig sngags 'di
387a3(rgyud): bris bcang ba dang / bklags dran shes rab car de la// 'jigs pa kun tu mi 'byung ngo // cho ga bzhin du klog 'atsang na// gsang ba po kun rtag tu srung // yongs su skyong bar byed par 'gyur// rtag
387a4(rgyud): tu rgyal bar byed pa ste// dper na rin chen 'phreng ba yis// mgo bo brgyan na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes// gang dag rig sngags 'di 'chang na// de yi gdon rnams
387a5(rgyud): rnam par 'jig/ nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// de yi 'khor ni bzang por 'gyur// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bye brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir//
387a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs thams cad kyis// rig sngags 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ lha yi rgyal po rnams dang ni/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung // de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs
387a7(rgyud): par mdzad// dge ba dang ni nor rnams 'phel/ sdig pa rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur// rmi lam ngan dang nyes byas las// grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu rni/ mu ni mu ni mi ni ma ti
387b1(rgyud): pa ti ma tI/ ma hA ma ti/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yams kyi nang dang gnod pa thams cad las bdag bde legs
387b2(rgyud): su gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i 'brang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba banaN+De
387b3(rgyud): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// oM pad+ma tsan+ta maNi dza la hUM/ snying po'o// oM ba ra da pad+me hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM ma Ni badz+ra
387b4(rgyud): Ni b+h+yAM/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// sngags snying bani 'byung smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ana? rA
387b5(rgyud): ya bi sho d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo//
387b6(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong / shing a mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang
387b7(rgyud): phyogs na/ lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i chos su gyur to// tshe'i 'du byed kyi lham lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas grag pa skyes
388a1(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas/
388a2(rgyud): nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang tshe don du gnyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag gis bdud
388a3(rgyud): thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par 'gyur ba/ bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gni 'di
388a4(rgyud): rnams nyon cig/ tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ye/ b+hA ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya pa ri sho d+ha ne/ a b+hA ye u b+ha ya nA de/ ni ru ba kISh+Ti/ a na ku le.a ku la pa ri shro d+ha ni/ a gra te/ a bi kalpe/ a kaH
388a5(rgyud): n+we.a ts+yu te/ shud b+he shu b+he/ te dze te dza ba ti/ sha ma u pa sha me ma ho pa sha me mai dri me t+yud dri ti to no/ to Sha ya ne sa tes t+ya daR+sha / i ba rud d+he kA sa hi te ha ta tesarba ana?
388a6(rgyud): sid d+he a mr-i ta pa te a bi tebadz+ra sa t+ye / a ka ya/ ak+Sha ya pra b+he / dran+ta ba re/ shud+d+he shud+ho/ za d+h+we/ a ba bA se ka ya ba b+ha sa ba ti/ u pa yo ke/ a nud+ha re / sa ma tsin+ti/
388a7(rgyud): bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na/ shi le bi sho d+ha ni/ a saM har+ye / su ni gr-i hi taM ma ra ba la naM/ ba ra dza yo dr-iSh+Ta ga tA nAn/ d+harmo la kA la.ud ga tA nan/ d+harma ni d+ha ni s+ya/ saM gra ha nan/ d+harma ko Sha s+ya/
388b1(rgyud): ko'u shi ka khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ khyod kyi rig pa gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin/
388b2(rgyud): tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dag go// 'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/ bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// don thams cad kyang 'grub par
388b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te de'i tshe 'di skang du/ jo bo lba las mgyur la// 'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du// kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyi
388b4(rgyud): grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// 'di'i mthu thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig
388b5(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig/ na mo arge tu le na tsan+d+ra ni ye swA hA/ sarba arbA sA d+ha ni swA hA/ d+harma sA d+ha ni ye swA phA/ sarba an+t+ra rA ya bi sho d+ha nA ye swA hA/ bcom ldan/
388b6(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan/
388b7(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
389a1(rgyud): dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sngas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa//
389a2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba a b+ha ya pra dA na nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub
389a3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal
389a4(rgyud): lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i zag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
389a5(rgyud): phyogs gcig na 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni rab tu gnod par bgyid pa
389a6(rgyud): stebacom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni bdag la yun ring por byer rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de las bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
389a7(rgyud): kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags don thams cad byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu
389b1(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rang bzhi pa thams cad rengs
389b2(rgyud): par byed pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lnga dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyir byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung
389b3(rgyud): po dang / ro langs dang / byA'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang /
389b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su 'phreng ba za ba dang //
389b5(rgyud): zas su spos za ba dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin
389b6(rgyud): 'thung ba/ rab tu phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul spyod pa/ rab
389b7(rgyud): tu 'jigs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / mtshang chub thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di zung zhig dang / thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags
390a1(rgyud): ba shad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a De ma r+ye pra me De/ go le bo/ le bos+ya se/ moT Te/ ban+de/ khA ran+te/ khA ra Ne / ga Ne gra Na/ ga Na bA ga Ne/ pra ti mo Ne/ kA lI pra kA
390a2(rgyud): li tsANI/ ma hA tsatra pra tri tsaN+Da/ be ge a ti be ga/ so na?/ go na/ mo hA/ pra mo dA pra mo Ta/ nA sha ni/ pra nA shA ni ke d+ha ba ni/ pra d+hA ba ni/ ba la ga ni/ pra ba la ga ni/ nr-i t+ye ni/ khra naM/
390a3(rgyud): t+ya ni/ kro d+ha ni/ pra ti kro d+ha ni/ hAn ha na/ bi gran bi ha na/ sarba duH pra duSh+TA na nA sha ya/ sarba a b+ha ya pra dwe/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang /
390a4(rgyud): nad 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad 'grub par gyur cig/ de lta ba sa na/ khi di khi di/ tsum be/ sarba sid+d+hi tsi di ra te/ na maHsarba buH
390a5(rgyud): nAn swA hA/ lha'i dbang po thams cad lnga mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'di skud pa la mdud de bcings sam/ swa lnga mdud pa bor ram/ bzlas brjod byas sam//
390a6(rgyud): yungs kar ram/ gi ru wang la lan cig bsngags te bskus sam/ go cha la bsngags na mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ rims nad kyis ma yin/ nyin gcig pas ma yin/ nyin
390a7(rgyud): gnyis pas ma yin/ nyin gsum pas ma yin/ nyin bzhi pas ma yin/ mes ma yin/ gsang sngags kyis ma yin/ ro langs kyis ma yin / dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin te/ chus
390b1(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rlig sngags dang gsang sngags sbyor ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyor ba rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed do// sbyar te grub pa rnams gzhan
390b2(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs par byed do// pha rol gyis bcings pa lngas grol bar byed do// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed do// bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byed do// gdon thams
390b3(rgyud): cad phung par byed do// gdon gang gis mi gtong na'ang / de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom
390b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs
390b5(rgyud): pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar
390b6(rgyud): bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dA bi Da bi d+ha rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags
390b7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na smyig ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams
391a1(rgyud): na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi glog thams cad bzlog pa/ so so 'brang
391a2(rgyud): pa sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga'ang da ltar 'chad kyis zung zhig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs/
391a3(rgyud): na skad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i grog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog
391a4(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad du mI 'byung bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'i dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag
391a5(rgyud): pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// 6thA/ ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi ni ni min d+ha re
391a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'di glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
391a7(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam
391b1(rgyud): grangs 'di la 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bci'o// tad+ya thA ka ha te bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra t+yar+tha ke/ pra t+ya mi tre shud+d+he/ muk+te bi ma te/ pra b+ha swa re/ aN+Da re/
391b2(rgyud): paN+Da re/ shwe te ga bar+N+Na / ra bA si ni/ ha ri ka rA di/ pi ga la ki da d+hi mu khi dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
391b3(rgyud): phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus mgrin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar/
391b4(rgyud): ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni muH/
391b5(rgyud): ri rI/ mA ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA mA ti/ hA hA hU hA/ khyod lnga sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes spras kyis/ dI Sha.AhA/ bco ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di
391b6(rgyud): su'i snying la 'dzin tam yi ger bris na/ de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o//
391b7(rgyud): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang sman pa dang
392a1(rgyud): bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos sbyin ma mangs 'di la gzungs ci gdang sngags sdi ga'i rnams brjod par bci'o// tad+ya// tsi mi lig ci swAhA/ bas+thAmA re pa re bahA/
392a2(rgyud): brah+ma gar+b+ha puSh+pa sa sA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gri srung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams
392a3(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thul mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
392a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni ba ri Ni / khan d+ha ban d+ha ka sA dan d+h+ye/ ma ti ma ti/
392a5(rgyud): ti Ta gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsa tA li/ ma taM gi ba ra la ni/ hi na mA ri NI ma la ni/ da la mad+he/ tsakra pa kra/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig
392a6(rgyud): sngags rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad la sna rnam par thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'bum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas rgyal
392a7(rgyud): po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nge
392b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi
392b2(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ha ri/ Ar+ya pra sha ste/ shi ra muk+te/ maM ga le/ stu ste/ s+thA tsi ti swAhA
392b3(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba/ dus ma
392b4(rgyud): lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od
392b5(rgyud): zer brgya pasabacom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrung ba chen po yid bzhin
392b6(rgyud): gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang bkra/
392b7(rgyud): mi shis pa 'jigs par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te de bzhes su gso/
393a1(rgyud): de ci'i slad du zherabacom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/ sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o
393a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ a ra dze/ a ma re a mr-i te kA uH ya/ pu t+ya badz+ra ba te/ sar+b+ba pA pa br-i sha ma nI ye swA hA/ Ar+ya bud+d+ha so pA kI ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'ja
393a3(rgyud): dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam mche ba'i dug
393a4(rgyud): ga ma dbyig dug gam gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
393a5(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag la legs so zhes bya//
393a6(rgyud): babyin te/ bzhin bzang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su gzung rtsa ba'i phyir 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams
393a7(rgyud): bshad pa legs so legs so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / smyos pa dang / rab tu smos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin
393b1(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spong ba de dag dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus bral/
393b2(rgyud): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+hi ye shes
393b3(rgyud): sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad gsar bcas kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ gA thA dI ya d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ tshigs
393b4(rgyud): su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang // le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin// 'dod chags dang ning
393b5(rgyud): rgyal spyod pa dang // 'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa rnams// sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste// de yi gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa// de yis bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyes pa thams cad
393b6(rgyud): rab tu spong bar 'gyur// tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra pra kA ra badz+ra tsakra/ daMSh+Ta b+ha ya na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ tsu lu ke tsu lu tsu lu sarba bud+d+ha sA hA/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
393b7(rgyud): pa'i gzungs la ni// tshig gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba// sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des// phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob par 'gyur// khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par 'gyur ba dang //
394a1(rgyud): / 'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang // thams cad du ni tse rab dran par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang drad par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin/
394a2(rgyud): de dag las ni theg mchog thos// mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang // sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du thob// tshigs su bcas pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
394a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+hA dza a gra ge yu ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang
394a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la
394a5(rgyud): bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las pham/ rab tu pham nas de rtab cing rings pa'i gzus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
394a6(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris
394a7(rgyud): las pha ma rab tu pham ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pha ma/ rab tu pham na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
394b1(rgyud): pa lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyar ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zung zhig/ ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi
394b2(rgyud): thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'di mnos so// mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do// mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa 'am
394b3(rgyud): tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa 'byung ma myong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan
394b4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya bA hi ni/ sha~M ka ri shaM ka ri/ pra dz+nye ka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ sarba sha hUM/ dza~M b+ha sa dza~M b+ha ya/
394b5(rgyud): b+ha swa staM b+ha ya/ mo ha la mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya ba hi ni/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma thA pra ma thA/ gra sa gra sa/ ha sa ha sa/ hU~M hU~M/ la dz+wa la hUM/ la bo dA ri/ rnge ne rbeH/ tsaturbak+She/ tsa tu da
394b6(rgyud): tu b+hu dze/ a si mus la/ tsakra tri shu la/ tsakrA tri shU la/ badz+ra ka ba tsa d+hA ra Ni/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ han phan/ da had haM/ pA tsa pA
394b7(rgyud): ma tha ma tha/ pra ma za pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+h+ya na/ hUM hUM/ pheT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ par s+yai n+yam bi nAn sa ya/ sarba sha trun nA sha ya/ d+h+wa dza a kra ke yu re/ triT triT tri Ta
395a1(rgyud): hrIT b+hIT/ u la kA mu khi/ u la kA d+hA rA ni/ trai lo kya ma thA ni/ bi d+han sa la ba ra sa rgyan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ tsa la tsa la
395a2(rgyud): tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ kaM pa kaM pa/ ka lu ka lA/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+tsa runy+tsa ats+tsha ha swaM/ bi d+ha na sa ya pa ra sin+dan/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ bud+d+ha
395a3(rgyud): sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ sa t+ye bA d+hi nan sa t+ye na/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye nA ma ti kra ma/ d+harma sa t+ye ma ti kra mA/ saM g+ha sa t+ya mA ti kra ma ni sa t+ye bA dI nAn/ swa t+ya ma ti kra ma ka laM bo da ri/
395a4(rgyud): khaM bo da ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kun+da kuT+Ta/ kuR+ShA pa ya kuTu pa ya ru tra ma nA ya biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya brah+ma ma nA ya trai lo kya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba de ba a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha
395a5(rgyud): s+yArAgan d+harba/ kuM b+ha tA ma ho ra ga a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ bi d+ha na swa ya pa ra sai nAn/ raM ga ri gA/ raM ga pa yA/ raM ga pa yA/ dz+wA la dzA lA/ puSh+pa mA li ni/ run d+ha run d+ha/ ri ti ri ti
395a6(rgyud): tsi ti tsi ti d+hi ti d+hi ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ta mu kha pa ra/ se na ku lo ta sA da ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ he he/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ri Ni ma ti/ dzaM b+ha d+hA dze/ sarba bud+d+ha
395a7(rgyud): a ba lo ki ti/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig/ sarba ta thA ga te/ a ba lo ki ti swA hA/ gu Na rA dza pra b+ha sot+ta me swA hA/ sUr+ya arka bi ma le sAhA/ tsan+da a ka bi ma le sA hA/
395b1(rgyud): sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra d+he/ mI ka ra Ne sAhA/ bdag 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi
395b2(rgyud): rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di sa khyod g.yul sprod pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'byed pa 'am/ gang du 'gro'ang rung ste thams cad du rgyal bar
395b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am/ mgul du btags na/ mi'i rgyal po dang skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung ba byed do// bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste/ mi 'jigs/
395b4(rgyud): pa sbyin zhing srung bar byed/ dpal skyed par byed/ kha rol gyi sde spa bkong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun tu gnas par byed do//
395b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
395b6(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// sngags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA nA
395b7(rgyud): shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
396a1(rgyud): n+ya gar skad du ka Ar+ya tsun+de de bi nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
396a2(rgyud): lo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma
396a3(rgyud): mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag rnam pa
396a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod cigra/ na maHsap+tA nAM sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ko Ti nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa la tsun+da sA hA/ brtson 'grub chen po thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs
396a5(rgyud): che ba pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro bo chen mo/ khro bo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma drag mo'i gzugs can ma/
396a6(rgyud): zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma ma pham ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma mig stong ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
396a7(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i gru can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur
396b1(rgyud): ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stang stabs can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar ston par mdzad ma sku rdo rje dang bai DUR+Ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ oM
396b2(rgyud): b+ha ga ba ti tsun+thi/ trUM d+h+waM/ kr-i kr-i/ b+h+r-i pru/ nr-i sr-i r-I r+Ya/ A be sha ya/ br-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+Na pa yaM/ ha rA ha ra/ b+hany+dza d+hany+dza tAs ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ma ra ya ma rA yA/
396b3(rgyud): pa tsa pa tsa ka da ho da ha/ gr-ih+Na grah+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang zhag gsum pa dang gzhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims
396b4(rgyud): dang yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / yi dgas dang / shu za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las
396b5(rgyud): skyes pa dang 'gro ba dang gnas pa 'di dag dang sdang ba gang bdag la 'tshe ba dang gdug pa de dag thams cad sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya man+da ya man+da ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya / tA pa ya tA
396b6(rgyud): pa ya u ta sA da ya/ u ta sA da ya/ ha n+wa ha na badz+ra Na rAs ra sa rA daN+De na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khag+ne na ka hUM hUM/ tsu tsu tsU/ d+h+r-i dzU d+h+waM/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya s+yA hA/
396b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags ma lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i
397a1(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ur+yA su mu khan nA mA d+hA ra Ni khyod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang /
397a2(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing drung na/
