397a3(rgyud): byang chub snying po'i mchod rten chen po na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la
397a4(rgyud): sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
397a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgya mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bskul pa/
397a6(rgyud): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
397a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur
397b1(rgyud): badrag phyir rgol ba dang ka dgra thams cad kyis gnod par bgyi ba bsrung ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lnga'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /
397b2(rgyud): srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / byad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / par mchi 'am/
397b3(rgyud): slar mchi 'am/ nyal lam/ gnyid kyis log gam/ smyos sam/ rab tu smos kyang rung / thams cad du'ang skyob par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gdon du de lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi
397b4(rgyud): gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ ji ltar bdag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang / rtag tu srung ba dang / yongs su sbyong ba 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don/
397b5(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las bsrung ba dang / yongs
397b6(rgyud): su bskyang ba bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab pas thug
397b7(rgyud): su chud nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod
398a1(rgyud): legs pa rab tu nyon la yid la rlung zhig dang / bsgo bzung po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// u gu mu gu ba lI ni/ ban d+ha ni ba la tsam na/
398a2(rgyud): ba hu ba hu ba hu li brta ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsungs par 'gyur ro//
398a3(rgyud): byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ badz+rI badz+rA badz+rI badz+rI d+hA ra ri/ badz+ra pA Ni/ badz+rI d+ha ni/ tsakra badz+rI/ tsakra d+hA ri/ pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/ b+hi ri/ mu ri/ tsi ri/ a hu ni/ b+ha ga d+hi b+hi ri/
398a4(rgyud): shi ri tra/ shi ri/ ru ru tse ru ru tse/ tsa rai tsA ri/ da ri tsi le/ tsu ru tsu ru / pa tA re/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dus ma yin par 'chi
398a5(rgyud): dar byed pa'i 'grog pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa tad+ya thA/ ban d+hi da / ga ga nI ni/ mur+d+ha ni/ pra mUr+d+ha ni/ na shwa ni/ prA nA shA nI/ nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa nas
398a6(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ni/ ban d+ha ni/ ban d+ha ni/ tsIn+da ni ts+tshin+da nI/ tsi re tsi rI ma he ha da ni/ ba ni ba re/ khA re be re/ bi raM br-i ri/
398a7(rgyud): bo d+hi bo d+hi su la ni/ sha ra ni ba ru ba ri ni/ bar hU~M ye/ zah+ma tsa ri Ni/ in+da ba ti d+hi d+hi rI ma Ni/ na mos he sha ra ya ni/ li shi/ b+hany+dza ni/ bA pa dza ha ni/ kA la pa ti ni
398b1(rgyud): b+hu ta ba da ni/ sa t+ya ga the so ma dA daM/ so ma pra b+he sAhA tse ring bar 'gyur ba/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra hA ni swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ i Di ta ga Da ta kha di da/ a ye na/ a ri/ b+ha dza ni
398b2(rgyud): ka kIr+t+ti ni/ pu tra dad ta nimarga a b+hi ro ha ni/ hu sa ba ti/ mu pa ba ti/ hi li hi li/ ya thA ba dzu ya/ ya thA ag+ni ya thA ba raM tsa ya thA na la/ ya thA badz+ra Na/ ya thA hr-i da ya sAhA/ lag na
398b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje nas sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
398b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlab pa dang / bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par bzhag bzhin du nga'ang 'chad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
398b5(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshar smir mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer phyung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ngo // 'od zer gyi snang ba des bskul bas rang rang gi
398b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas chas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod 'dir byon nasabacom ldan 'das shAkya thug pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sems can/
398b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa mchog tu dga' bar byed pa ga dran par byed pa/ bshad par byed pa legs so
399a1(rgyud): legs so// bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis brlab bo// legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rigs kyi bu 'am ka rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing /
399a2(rgyud): nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par
399a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / ngar song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan
399a4(rgyud): pa dang longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
399a5(rgyud): 'das thams cad dgyes shing thugs su byon par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang / snang bar
399a6(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan
399a7(rgyud): par 'gyur pa dang / lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams gsungs shing
399b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
399b2(rgyud): gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o// su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam
399b3(rgyud): grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thAshi khi shi khi shi khi shi ka/ tsaM tsi tsi tsi/ b+ha b+ha
399b4(rgyud): bAb+h+ra ru ru ru ru dzi dzaM dzaM dzi/ gra bra gra gra pri hri hri hri/ ha ha ha ha/ ma ma ma ma/ ha na hA na me sarba pra t+yar+thi kA/ da ha da ha me/ sarba sharba ba/ pA tsa pa tsa me/ sarba a hI
399b5(rgyud): te shi na swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ dngos grub dam pa'i
399b6(rgyud): gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams spras pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe myong ba'i rig
399b7(rgyud): sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi ba bshad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi la tsa li swA hA brah+ma sA re swA hA/ brah+ma swA hA
400a1(rgyud): bras+tha A ba su gar+b+he a kalpe/ pu Sha sa sta re swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la
400a2(rgyud): bsrung ba dang yongs su bsrung ba'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
400a3(rgyud): 'das bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du
400a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad par bya ba'o// tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi tsit+te/ ba ra Ni dA ma ra Na De/ dit+te dit+taM gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri sa ra ma tan+ta/ badz+ra tu la ni
400a5(rgyud): dz+wa la mA li ni/ tsakra ba ka/ sha ba re sha ba re/ sha ma re sha ma re swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
400a6(rgyud): pa dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis/ bcom ldan 'dasA ga lA ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
400a7(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe bskyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
400b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya bA puSh+pe su puSh+pe ga sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ d+hu ma ba ri ba re Ar+ya dra
400b2(rgyud): ste shAn+tha/ nir muk+te/ maM ga l+ye hi ra N+ya gar+b+he stA ra sA pa te swA hA/ de nas 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
400b3(rgyud): gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe bskyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa dang yid la bgyis pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la
400b4(rgyud): bsrung ba dang yongs su bsnyung ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ pi li lib pi li si li ma hA bi pi li/ si me li se/ gu ru \u0f7f
400b5(rgyud): gu ru gu ru/ Ne me dra gu ru Ne swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
400b6(rgyud): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing // nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
400b7(rgyud): bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ an+ye phu/ ban+de phu/ nan+d+he phuH/ ku naT+Te phu/ ma nan+de phu/ mur+b+ha ta ha ke pu/ shi pu b+haM ge phu/ maM ge phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
401a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi
401a2(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su bsgrub pa dang /
401a3(rgyud): zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang ga chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ he badz+re he dz+re hI hAbi si bi si ma hA bI si phu
401a4(rgyud): swA hAde nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam
401a5(rgyud): grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o//
401a6(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu hu lu lu/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha naM/ ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas sde dpon gzhon nus/ bcom ldan 'das gA la bra de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud dwe/
401a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang bar langs nas klog pa'i rigs
401b1(rgyud): kyi bu 'am ka rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hri li Shi/
401b2(rgyud): li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tu ru tu ru ka tu ru tu rukasarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha nAM ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas lha'i bu zla 'od kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/

401b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
401b6(rgyud): tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// dad+ya thA raha te/ bi ha te/ ni batre/ sarba pra t+ya rAk+Sha
401b7(rgyud): pra t+yaM/ mi tra/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ muk+te/ bi muk+te/ bi ma le/ nirma le pra b+ha sa re pra b+ha ka re pu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
402a1(rgyud): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe bskyong ba'i rigs sngags
402a2(rgyud): 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le dz+wa le ma hA dz+wa le ma hA dz+wa le ke dz+wa le ni u he muH/
402a3(rgyud): sha me pra sha me/ ma ha pra sha me/ sha mu sa mA d+he/ ma hA sa ma d+h+ye/ sa mA ba d+hA/ dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa la ba me phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon kha ba can gyis ka bcom ldan 'das
402a4(rgyud): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong
402a5(rgyud): ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya bA/ u duM ba re/ u duM ba re/
402a6(rgyud): duM be duM bI/ bya ba dz+re/ A na g+he/ sa mA d+he/ mAr+tha sA mA d+he kanI le nI le/ nI la kre she ke shi ni/ ku le ku le/ mA hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi/ ma no hA re/ ar+the/ ban+de/ nan+d+he
402a7(rgyud): kun+ta Ta ti/ sa ma tha/ ba ba la/ ku rtse / dAn+te/ nI la ka she/ ku le/ nI la ka she/ ku le/ nI la ka shai/ ku le/ nI la dAn+te/ dzaM ku le/ hu she/ mU she/ ba laM ku shai/ ha la ku
402b1(rgyud): pha la mu tse swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i rigs gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
402b2(rgyud): to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas kyang klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
402b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a ma le bi ma le nirma le/ maM ga le/ hi ra Sh+ya gAr+b+he sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ka ka ma g+hi ni/ yu bi ra dza/

402b5(rgyud): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin
402b6(rgyud): cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am ka rigs kyi bu mo de la 'byung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ gzungs sngags
402b7(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA 'adz+re/ badz+re Ni/ bud+d+ha badz+re/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te badz+re/ su bud+d+he/ ni bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ ba hu bud+d+he bi shiSh+Ta/ bud+d+he
403a1(rgyud): shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he kra ni shi grA ma ni/ dza ge l+ye/ a la se/ ti li me/ ti li/ ti li le/ mArge shAn+ta gA d+ha gA mi ni pu swAt+ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byung /
403a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sngas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pra bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgro bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong/
403a3(rgyud): ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA ga hi li badz+re hi hi badz+re kaya ba ki ri ki ri/ badz+ra swA hA/
403a4(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ ASh+Ta ren+da pa dzA rI/ sh+ye dra/ pAN+Da ra ba si ni/ kin+ta rA/ ku rA de/ ke yu re/ i hA bud+d+he/ tA ta bud+d+he/ b+hu dze/ bu dze/ b+hu dza ga me/ b+hu dza pA pa t+ye/ b+ha ye b+ha ya/ b+ha ya a
403a5(rgyud): gra ba te/ bi ni bi ni/ shi ri/ pa the/ shi pra pa the/ a dI t+ya pra the/ te dzete/ dza ba to/ A kA sha pa the phu swA hA/ de nas rdo rje phonya mos/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
403a6(rgyud): btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags
403a7(rgyud): 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ku Te ku Te/ ku ti ni/ ku Te kun
403b1(rgyud): re sAhA/ rI le nI lI/ nI la ke she swA hA/ pI ti prI ti/ pi ta ke shre swA hA kayo tsi ti/ lo tsit+te / lo hi ta ke she sAhA/ a ba d+hA de/ a ba d+hA da ke ne sAhA/ mAT+TiSh+NI many+dziSh+Te / mak+Shi/
403b2(rgyud): she steH/ tsakra tsakre/ badz+ra tsakri swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang ka 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la leg/
403b3(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis lnga dang 'jig rten spong ba khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdag pa dang bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzungs sngags kyi gni 'di dag

403b5(rgyud): la la zhig gang sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
403b6(rgyud): lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto'i'aphye chen po'i dbang po thams cad
403b7(rgyud): kyis bsams par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /
404a1(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i rjod de dag dang / lA dang / mi dang / yu ma yin dang / rdzi zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pal
404a2(rgyud): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba hu pu tra pa ti sa ra nA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/
404a3(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dri skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom
404a4(rgyud): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin na/
404a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang 'dir rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'thab rtsod mtshang brus te bkye bar gyur /
404a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pA dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag de'i
404a7(rgyud): phyir khyod kyis bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i reg sngags 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ ba De ba de re/ u pa da Da da De/ kaM bi ra/ a ba d+ha ne
404b1(rgyud): ni brta ne/ d+ha hi d+ha hi/ a brta ni/ bdag gi sarba Sha na/ ka mi ka nAn/ pra t+yar+thi ka nAn/ pra ta mA NI tAn tsak+Shu mo han/ ka ra mi/ kro tu mo ha raM/ ka ro mi/ dza~M d+hu ka ro mi tA pa na ka ro mi/
404b2(rgyud): dzaM b+hu nan/ staM b+ha nan/ mo hA nAn/ pra mo hA nAn/ khyim bdag gang la la zhig bu mang po rton pa'i gzungs 'di skud pa dmar po la lan bdun sngags te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings/
404b3(rgyud): de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag pos mi tshugs so// 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa rnams la lan thebs par 'gyur
404b4(rgyud): ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag mgor med zas sbyin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pabu
404b5(rgyud): mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta be tA Da kA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa
404b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung
404b7(rgyud): po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go// de'i tshe na
405a1(rgyud): mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir ro langs chen po bdud btang bar gyur ro// de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag
405a2(rgyud): gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed do// de dag gis rlags ma rnyed// dmigs pa ma rnyed nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus
405a3(rgyud): la reg go/ re ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha bka shi la thugs pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du
405a4(rgyud): sems te/ bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'ad sas dgongs so// bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na de bzhin gshes
405a5(rgyud): pas ma dgongs so snyam mo// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu da / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa
405a6(rgyud): kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos thos so// de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
405a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor brtsol nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra'am/ de skad ces spras
405b1(rgyud): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni/ dper na sog les mgo bo gshegs pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg
405b2(rgyud): pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig/ bdag cag gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das des khyod la yongs su skyob pa mdzad par
405b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
405b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dgar po la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas thebs sam/
405b5(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// kun dgar po khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba gdul
405b6(rgyud): dka' ba/ mthong na gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang / nor bu 'dzin dang / gtum po dang / gdol ba dang / rma bya'i snying dang / tshe zad dang //
405b7(rgyud): la ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsnyen par dga' ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba'o// kun dga' bo ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i
406a1(rgyud): mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'ben to// ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go// steng du bltas nas 'gags par byed do// phyogs su bltas na 'chi
406a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// phyogs mtshams su bltas na mes sreg par byed do// de dag gis khyod la reg go/ de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / chos thos pa'i gus pa dang de bzhin gshegs
406a3(rgyud): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis da dung du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das legs par bsal du gsol/ phyir zlog tu gsol/ phyag rgya bcing du gsol/ skud pas bcing du gsol
406a4(rgyud): kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ra/ ma hA ge re/ g+ha sa ra pa ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+ha ra Ni/ tsau ra tsho ra NI/ ka ro ti ti/ ka to ta sa mA d+hi Ni/
406a5(rgyud): sa ma ra sa ra Ni/ sa ra Ni ko ta ma ti/ sa ma b+ha be b+ha ba na nA ga re/ b+ha da ni sA d+ha nri ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lan lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te / mdud
406a6(rgyud): pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bor na brjed byed thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legs
406a7(rgyud): so/ de ltar mdzod cig/ slar yang mi mchi bar mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ bad tsa la ba le/ ma hA pad tsa le ba leg d+hi li b+hi li/ mahA b+hi ri Ni/
406b1(rgyud): ni mi ri ni/ ha na ha na ha ti ra/ ma tsa thA/ ma b+hi tsa ra thA/ k+ti ri s+thi ra mu le/ ma tha nir ma tha ni/ tsa la ni/ mA ka nI/ dzaM b+ha ni/ pA dA ni/ ba ya swa kra Ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ta thA ga ta/ bi ta the ga ti be gA d+ha re/
406b2(rgyud): pa ra pra de/ ha re tiSh+Tha/ nI la ba sa ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo ro langs 'di dag ni 'tshog pa/ spang ba/ gtum por gyur pa/ gsod par gyur pa'o// de la rig sngags dis ke mu ru ka'i skud pa la/
406b3(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor ro// de nas 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur/ 'dzem par 'gyur//
406b4(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur zhing / 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur/ 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA ga dar da 'ad
406b5(rgyud): kA ra ka ra ka ra/ ma hA kak+ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa da tsa ra/ ma hA tsa da tsa ra/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ te re be re/ hi ri ke re/ bai rai bi tsi ni ka ra na ka ri sarba ny+tsa tA nAn/ pra dzaM b+hA ni
406b6(rgyud): nI la ba ra sa ni/ tsats+tsha/ tsakra/ A yu d+he swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad dang / yi dgas dang /
406b7(rgyud): byad dang / sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / la gcan pa phyir zlog par byed do// de la rig sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la lan sum cu rtsa bdun bzlas
407a1(rgyud): brjod byas te/ mdud pa sum cu rtsa bdun bor na thams cad rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung zhig/ chongs shig/ legs
407a2(rgyud): par rab tu yid la zung zhig/ rjes su sbyong bar gyis shig/ de lta bas na kun dgar bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o// tad+ya \u0f7f/ d+ha raH/ hA d+ha ra/ khA ra khar ma hA lar/ ma hA le
407a3(rgyud): ba ga nA sha ni/ ko Ta ni/ kurbad nAM/ barbA ni/ lA 'e/ ku / kakA re/ mA ku Ta/ d+ha rat+ti/ s+thU wa kaH/ rbe ka nI kaM/ sa me sA hA ni/ ka ni/ kai ri Ne/ bo gi sa /
407a4(rgyud): sA sa pre ta Da/ pu ku ma ra ki/ kri ti sA si/ kin ni ba bud+d+ha si/ ba bu d+h+ya/ bi bu d+h+ya gri ha na b+he kr-i ta b+hai ra ba/ bi kra ta b+hai ra bam hA ba ye/ kr-i tA na/ ha ra si/ kin na na mA
407a5(rgyud): ra ye si/ kin ni sarba de ba/ nA ga/ yak+Sha// gan d+ha ra ba/ a su ra/ sarba a su ra/ sarba b+ha ya sha ma na/ ma ta sa ra sA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin sregs ma skud
407a6(rgyud): pas bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ ltung bar byed/ za bar byed do// kun dga' bo ro langs thams cad rengs par byed pa'i rig sngags zung zhig/ tad+ya thA ka se ma
407a7(rgyud): le ma hA ha ha leg ha ra d+ha re/ g+ho ra d+ha re/ d+ha riH/ rid+hi/ bi ro d+hi/ ku niSh+Tha/ ku ta ni/ saM ko tsa na~M/ ka tsa ri/ kha tsa ri/ kha tsa ri/ ma ra Ni/ hu hu/ ma re Na/ ma hA mA la d+ha ra/
407b1(rgyud): yo na ma ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dri dag dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung ba thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan nyi shurtsa
407b2(rgyud): bzhir bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bor na log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung zhig/ legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis
407b3(rgyud): shig/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung bar mi nus so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig/ Shad+ya thA/ tsa ta tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ta tsa rA/ tsi ri tsi ri/
407b4(rgyud): bu ru pU ru/ ma hA pu ru/ sa b+hA le/ ma hA sa~M bA le/ ma hA ba le swA hA/ kun dga' bo lnga dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye dbur bcas pa'i 'jig rtenan
407b5(rgyud): gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spo ba ni ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/ srung ba dang rjes su 'brang ba yin no// gsang sngags 'di ni mi bzad pa ste ka sreg par byed/ 'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed//
407b6(rgyud): 'joms par byeda'abar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa drug cu rtsa gcig bor na sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags
407b7(rgyud): gcod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so// legs par gzung lags so//
408a1(rgyud): mdud pa bor du gsol/ phyag rgya gzhag par mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ tad+ya thA ga b+ha b+hA re/ b+ha re/ b+hu ra Ni he re pre ha re/ ha ra Nika ku thA ni tA Di/ len tshang
408a2(rgyud): da ti/ tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// brgya byin gyis byas pa'i
408a3(rgyud): rig sngags gcad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gza' dang
408a4(rgyud): nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phyogs nas byas pa'i rag sngags gcad do// phyogs mtshams nas byas pa'i rig sngags
408a5(rgyud): gcad do// steng nas byas pa dang 'og nas byas pa'i rlig sngags gcad do// lhas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// klus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang nam mkha'
408a6(rgyud): lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// grul bum gyis byas pa dang / tshor ba pas byas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje ru rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa
408a7(rgyud): dang bud med dang / gdol pas byas pa dang / kla klo dang / ri khrod pas byas pa dang / seng ge dang / sbrul cis byas pa dang 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / g.yung pos byas pa dang / tongs
408b1(rgyud): labs byas pa dang / mu ga 'i khrod pas byas pa dang / sems can thams cad rig sngags 'chang bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// tad+had+hA/ ga ga gar li bu/ ma hAgag gar li pu/ bi shre phu
408b2(rgyud): pa ra si d+hi Ta/ tsaN+Da lisa?/ mahA tsaN+Da li b+h+ya/ tso gi phu/ tse mi re phu/ tsaM tsi mi re pu/ bkr-i pra/ tsakra d+ha re pU/ kr-iSh+Na ra?/ kr-iny+dza ru be phu/ tsar+Ne ru/ so ga phu/ brtsa ba lI ru
408b3(rgyud): bAny+tsa le phuH/ b+hI mI phu/ b+hi prA pa le phu/ piM ga le phu/ pai gA la/ ak+She phu/ A nin+de pu/ sa man+te phu nA shwa ni pu/ ts+tshe dA ni phu/ bi ts+tshe da ni pu swA hA/ krI swa ni/ dak+ShA ni/ mA ra nI/ bin da ni/
408b4(rgyud): bin d+h+ya nan/ bak+Sha NI/ nA sha ni/ wAd d+ya ka nan/ gA la b+hi na sha ni/ dA hA ma si/ bAs+sa/ d+hu smA ni/ sa ma ni/ khan d+ha nI swA hA/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnon po bzhi bcu rtsa
408b5(rgyud): gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi 'phrog par byed pa'o// kur dga' bo nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ro langs rjen po gnon byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de sngon gyi dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su
408b6(rgyud): zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas rims su 'gyur te de'ang gcad do// kun dga' bo ro langs kha cig pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de'ang
408b7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba'ang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu thams cad dang 'grul bum thams cad dang / yi dgas dang shasha za thams cad kyang /
409a1(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ rlung lha'ang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ sgyu ma len gyi/
409a2(rgyud): bu pa re pa Di shi rung dro'ang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ phung po 'dzin dang mdung thung 'dzin yang de bzhin du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa'ang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/
409a3(rgyud): so// kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu// nga yis chad pa dag byas pas/ gang la 'byung pos byar ci yod// nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom// gsod par gyur pa stobs po che// ro langs dag gis byur ci yod//
409a4(rgyud): de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yin// zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang // rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas// 'di yis bdag gi kun 'grub cing // gsang sngags tshig rnams
409a5(rgyud): grub gyur cig/ na maHsid d+ha nAn/ sid d+h+yan tu man+ta pA dA sA s+thir me sarba satwa nAny+dza swA hA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang ba// dgra bcom pa rnams kyi stobs dang // dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis// bde
409a6(rgyud): logs su ni rab gyur cig/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi yis// rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cadral swA hA/ cog ni lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ ke me ru dang bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i
409a7(rgyud): skud pa dmar po la mdud pa bor ro// de bzhin du bya ba pa'ang bya'o// 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang
409b1(rgyud): gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
409b2(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
409b3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha si ha dang / ban d+he ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra si sa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/
409b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra ka rA tri nA ma sU tre/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams nas rkyeg la lo//
409b5(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu tal po ta'i
409b6(rgyud): 'gram na 'dug go// de nas lnga kha dog bzang po mchog dang ldan pa zhig nam sros nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ chu tal po ta 'gram thams cad snang bar byas te/ dge slong de la
409b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ des 'di skad ces smras so// lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ lnga khyod kyis mtshan mo
410a1(rgyud): bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/ des 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so// lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal bA de/
410a2(rgyud): lta bu su mchis/ des 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das sa kyin khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
410a3(rgyud): de khyod la lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas dge slong de nam langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
410a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mdangs
410a5(rgyud): dgung rmongs nas bdag gi der lha kha dog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba der mchis te/ chab tal po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o//
410a6(rgyud): dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so// lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na// lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen
410a7(rgyud): ta mi mkhyen// des bdag la ni 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so// lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba da lta su mchis/ des 'di skad
410b1(rgyud): ces mchi'o// dge slong rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya kA lan ta ka gnas pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ 'di
410b2(rgyud): gzung la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid du mi gda' bar 'gyur to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di yongs su zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
410b3(rgyud): khyod kyis lha de shes sam/ dge slong des gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag gis lha de ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi de dpon de tsan dan zhes bya'o//
410b4(rgyud): dge slong des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde thos 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang /
410b5(rgyud): ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// dge slong chos gsum dang ldan nA/ dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa la rjes su phrad par mi byed/
410b6(rgyud): pa dang / ma 'ong ba la re ba med pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i
410b7(rgyud): mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs //
411a1(rgyud): 'das la rjes su phrad mi bya// ma 'ong ba la re ba med// 'das pa gang yin de 'gag ste// ma 'od de ni ma phyin pa'o// gang dag da sngar byung ba'i chos// de dang de la ra
411a2(rgyud): bltas na// rnam par rtog pas mi phrog par// de dag mkhas pas khong du chud// sang tsam shi ram sus shes kyis// de ring nyid du brtun te \u0f7f// 'chi dag sde chen de dang ni// rtag tu shes pa ma yin/
411a3(rgyud): no// sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang thams cad kyang // bded 'ba' zhig grub 'gyur te// thams cad nyon mongs med par shog/ thams cad bzang po mthong 'gyur te/
411a4(rgyud): gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la// nyin mtshan snyom las med pas na// de phyir mtshan mo bzang po yi// mdo sde thub pas rtag tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das
411a5(rgyud): kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di bshad nas/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag gsungs so// tad+ya thA/ bi nI bi ni/ bi ni mUr ni/
411a6(rgyud): dud+d+ha ma d+hiH/ mA ni ni mA ni ni/ mA ni ne/ Ni Ni Ni NI/ Ti Ti Ti Ti b+hI rANI/ kau rI/ gad d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mu taM gi/ b+hukasI/ bA ma ni/ dzA ba~M DI/ dri mi Di/ sha ba ri/ sa ra ma b+hU/ hrIn+darAT+Ta
411a7(rgyud): mor ta ni/ mtsho me/ da la nga nid la pa ti/ da la bat+te/ ma hA da li ni/ tsa li ni/ muSh+Te/ tsakra ba ti/ ma hA tsakra ba ti/ sha ba ri sha be riH/ ma hA sha ba ri d+hu tsi gi ni b+hu tsi gi ni/ ni mi ni mi
411b1(rgyud): gi / ni dzid+hi rI/ rtswa ni / 6/ a na? n+yA rtsa/ ma// NI/ oM ku/ bik+Sha ri/ lay+YA// !/ u a // ku/
411b2(rgyud): da sa le/ ta ra ke/ ta re/ ta rod du/ nod du/ ti la la lu/ b+hu ta pra ti ya/ ba ti yi ye sAhA/ tad+ya thA/ a ra ga d+h+we/ bAM su ka/ pA li ye/ ka po ta ka pA yi ye/ ta po d+ha
411b3(rgyud): Ne swA hA/ dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i don dang / tshig dang / tshigs su ba
411b4(rgyud): pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de'i lus
411b5(rgyud): la mes mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin/ rkun po'i rnyed pas ma yin te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang mi 'gyur zhing //
411b6(rgyud): nges par mya ngan las 'das par yang nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes par yang / mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo bklags na// skye ba dran dang dgra sos dang // dbang phyug tu yang nges par gyu/
411b7(rgyud): lan cig gis ni gnas kun tu// dus min 'chi dang bar ma dor// bdag gis bdag la mi sbyor ba// dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin// sems can thams cad srung zhing sel/ nad dang
412a1(rgyud): mya ngan 'jigs skye dang // rmi lam mi shes mya ngan du// brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur// gang gis bris te skyes pa dang // bud med lus la btags na ni//
412a2(rgyud): skal la bzang dang gzi brjid// de yi dpal yang skye bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis su// mi dge cung zad gang byas pa// de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos// dus ma yin ltas 'chi las skyob//
412a3(rgyud): rgyal po chu dang me dang glog/ chom po nang dang dgra dag dang // g.yul spros pa dang 'thab par yang // bzang po dran na skyob par byed// rig pa bzang po 'di dang ni// gsang sngags 'di dag
412a4(rgyud): rtag brjod na// mi dag mi zhum gnas kun tu/ de bas 'di ni yid kyis brjod// 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
412a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags 'di dag brjod par bya ste/ rig sngags 'dis kyi bdag 'byor par gyur cig/ dad+ya thA/ ni mi nI mi naHre/ tI na
412a6(rgyud): m-i gas/ ka ni/ mi mo ki ri/ ri yul na ri// sa su me ti/ shri se ri co / kug+h+ra~M Ta se/ ti/ ku pu Ne/ bdag drang sems can thams cad lagan rdo rje dang ldan
412a7(rgyud): tu 'jig pa thams cad dang / narnamams cad dang / chug thams cad dang / rings thams cad dang / gdod pa thams cad dang / gdus pas yin pathams cad dang / tsam rkun thams cad dang /
412b1(rgyud): mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / sdig pa dang / rtsod pa dang / babyed pa dang /
412b2(rgyud): mtshang 'dru ba thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis ngan par spyad pa thams cad dang / thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig/ tad+ya thA/
412b3(rgyud): hi li mi li/ tsi li/ i li/ mi li/ pi shA tsi ni/ par+Na sha ba ri tsi li tsi lI swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
412b4(rgyud): de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang /
412b5(rgyud): shab dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
412b6(rgyud): rgya gar mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te// skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
412b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya o dza pra te ha ra Ni nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'brog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
413a1(rgyud): / cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
413a2(rgyud): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags zung zhig/ rmongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gang la la zhig mdangs phyir/
413a3(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i mdangs phyir mi 'phrog cing phrog par mi 'gyur ro// phrogs na'ang phyir yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas
413a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+yathA/ pi le pi le me/ bi lu mo ge/ ri lum ti bal gu ti/ sU ra bi ta/ k+Shi ra ba ti/ ku ru mA ti/ u ta pa la ni/
413a5(rgyud): gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsau ri/ tsaN+Da li sta re stu ba re/ in+d+ra mA li ni/ dza li ni/ so ba ko tri k+Sha Sha Ne/ sA ga re ma hA sA ga re/ pu ru tse pu tsu ru sa ma ne/ de ba be/ da raM phe/ hu lu
413a6(rgyud): hu lu swA hA/ rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrug/
413a7(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'khrugs pa'i bar du gyur to// gnod sbyin rnams kyang kye ma'o sdug bsngal mo// kye ma 'o nyam thag go zhes ngu zhing skad chen po sgra chen po 'byim cing 'khod ngo // bcom ldan 'das
413b1(rgyud): sa smra
413b2(rgyud): 'dren pa dang ba na pa'i tshis rnyes sa bzung bar bya'o// bde las su 'gyur ba'i bar baju'o// 'i sangs dathug par bya/ gas bya byed bsgrub pa 'o /
413b3(rgyud): sbyin gyisa'i na nam/ mi dang mi ma yin pas zin na ni/ dus de dang / chod de dang / yud tsam de la sadangs 'phrog go// phyir dgrag go// rnam par 'jog go yul te 'phrog cing kyir
413b4(rgyud): 'phrog par mi byed de/ gnas na 'dug bzhin du rnam par mi 'jig cing yang 'jog par 'dod dam 'phrog par 'dod par gyur na/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
413b5(rgyud): pa nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas te mi mnyes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
413b6(rgyud): pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni nA ma'id+ya/
413b7(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skar bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
414a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig na shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sta du sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/
414a2(rgyud): dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa dang / sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos la skyabs su song / dge 'dun la skyabs su song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/ chos la gcig tu phyogs/ dge
414a3(rgyud): 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tsom med/ chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la nem nur med cing the tsom
414a4(rgyud): med la/ bden pa mthong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa/ mngon par rdzogs par gyur pa/ mtshon dang dbyig pa bor re zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams mi snang bar gyur nas/
414a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa sgron ma 'dzin pa gsal ba 'dzin pa la
414a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig ni rnam par sbyang du gsol zhes bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
414a7(rgyud): lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa/ shAkya bde bas cho ga de skad ces brjod pa gsan to// gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/
414b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la srung ba gyis shig/ yongs su gzungs pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang /
414b2(rgyud): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar gyis shig dang / de bzhin du/
414b3(rgyud): 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong shig/ mig sbubs rnam par sbyongs
414b4(rgyud): shig/ tad+ya thA/ hi li mi lI/ ki li mi li/ hi li tre/ hu yA hu yA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ du du hu du hu du/ tsak+Shur mu kha bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal po
414b5(rgyud): mig rnam par sbyong ba'i 'di ni mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/ tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang / brtul
414b6(rgyud): zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden
414b7(rgyud): pa dang // lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas/ shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur//
415a1(rgyud): cig mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ kun tu mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ bdag dang sems canarnams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags
415a2(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs pa'o// nga'ang da ltar 'chad de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po
415a3(rgyud): tshangs pa'ang rjes su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na/ de la thibs por 'gyur ba dang / rab rib bam/ ling tog gam/ mig nad sngon por mthong ba 'am/ mig gi yul
415a4(rgyud): gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/
415a5(rgyud): ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun tu rgyu las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun tu rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni
415a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma
415a7(rgyud): mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngag kyi gzhi 'di rnams bzung ste kun
415b1(rgyud): chub par byas nas/ shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyi/ nyin re shing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig/
415b2(rgyud): ces de la rgyas par smras so// shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/ mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka
415b3(rgyud): stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya bde ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mig rnam par
415b4(rgyud): sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ak+Shi ro ka pra sha ma ni su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed
415b5(rgyud): pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs
415b6(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyen chen po
415b7(rgyud): 'dir/ mig nad thung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nag po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de/ tad+ya thA/ ru d+hi pu re d+hi ras kyi phu ru d+ha'i migs
416a1(rgyud): puH bA te pun pa te we phuHhan te pu/ mAM sa dung+ku b+hi phu/ pad+ma ak+Shi dz+ra/ pad+mad Tha hi ra Ni ye phu swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sdeng pon/
416a2(rgyud): chen po nag po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// chog ni 'di yin te/ srad bu dkar po la la ni bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun por ro// tshu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la
416a3(rgyud): lag pas drubs na mig nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
416a4(rgyud): kA ya'i nad sel ba'i sngags/ na mo ba tu be kle sAd+da/ lus la nad byung nas nad khong skems kyis btab na bsil yab chus gtor te/ lan drug cu rtsa gcig bsngags nas de'i lus la g.yabs na na
416a5(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro// k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rtsa gar skad du/ Ar+ya an prA ma ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
416a6(rgyud): gzhang thum rab tu'i bar byed pa'i 'dro/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub ses dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i ldab na rjong
416a7(rgyud): ma'i tshal bya ka yan ta ka gnas pa'i tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bco lnga'i gis sbyong thab bya ba nyin gyi //
416b1(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi mdun na gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rnga yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yod cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe/
416b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar tI/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
416b3(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na dge slong gzhang 'brum can mang po dag gzhang 'brum gyi zo nad kyis gzir te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po mi bde ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher
416b4(rgyud): pa myong bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag la dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bkal
416b5(rgyud): sbrul to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo 'di long zhig/ kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo'i ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge shes na ji srid
416b6(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ro rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ a lan+te/ a ma le/ shA li tsi ni/ ku she saM bA be swA hA/
416b7(rgyud): kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba de na/ sA la'i shing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod de/ gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/ gnyis pa ni 'jam pa
417a1(rgyud): zhes bya/ gsum pa ni skam po zhes bya ste/ ji ltar de bskams pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu 'askams par gyur cig/ mkhris pa'i 'brum du
417a2(rgyud): bskams par gyur cig/ bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba'i 'bum bu bsgoms par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ 'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskam
417a3(rgyud): par gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par
417a4(rgyud): gyur cig/ 'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ sna'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ 'phyang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha ma sha mA ne swA hA/ sha ma sha mA ne/
417a5(rgyud): swA hA/ na bar ma gyur cig/ rengs par ma gyur cig/ sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ sdug bsngal bar ma smyig/ rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ zag par ma gyur cig/ rab
417a6(rgyud): tu zag par ma gyur cig/ 'di nyid du zad pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / nad med par gyur cig/ 'og tu song zhig/ na mo b+ha ga~M ba te/ bud+d+ha ya/ sa t+ya/ bA dA nA/ sid d+h+yan+tu/ man+tha/ pa dA ni
417a7(rgyud): swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/
417b1(rgyud): bklags pas 'grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la/ mdud pa 'dun bor te mgul du gdags so// 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tuzhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
417b2(rgyud): rgyag kyim lan po dzin ma dza de/ dran DI swA nga / ma gyi lalal ba kyi la shes rgyu grus te gtan la /
417b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba rog pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
417b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dka' ba na bzhugs
417b5(rgyud): te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la
417b6(rgyud): rgya cher yang dag par ston cig/ tad+ya thA/ tsi le mA/ tsi le le/ paM na ko ki li/ shri ma ti/ kun+na le/ dun+na le/ in+d+ra le/ mu khe swA hA/ 'di dag ni zas mazhu ba dang / spos pa dang
417b7(rgyud): wag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang / gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang / gzhang nang can dang / za gu dang / lus pa can dang / rims can dang / klad pan pa dang / gtogs byed na pa dang /
418a1(rgyud): yi dgas kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yin te/ kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed de ni/ ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/
418a2(rgyud): ma mthong ngo // tshe zad pa ni ma gtogs so// gsang sngags kyi gni dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rtse// 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams/
418a3(rgyud): cad kyi mchog go// 'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams cad kyi mchog go// dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mchog go// bden pa'i tshig dang bden pa'i ngag 'dris/ bdag gis zos pa dang
418a4(rgyud): 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
418a5(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum
418a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// 6 tswa/ y-i 'i ma ti ma si/ han su te/ che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ba na d+ha me/ e ka hi ka ne/ tri hi ka tsa tu rtsa kan/ sni t+ya dz+wa ran sAd+d+ha/
418a7(rgyud): chog ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims cad med par byed do// rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skang du/ Ar+ya
418b1(rgyud): ra pa sha ma ni rA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims nang rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal/
418b2(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gal ba
418b3(rgyud): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
418b4(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa rnams mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag srung du gsol srung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
418b5(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rims gnas te/ de sems can rnams la nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin
418b6(rgyud): gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gtse bar byed de/ de srung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no// tad+ya thA/ dz+wA la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra dz+wa la ni/ pra ti pa ni pra sha ma ni/
418b7(rgyud): bdag gi rims na song zhig ma 'dug swA hA/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang / 'jig rten na chos dang dge 'dun bla na med pa dang bden pa dang bden//
419a1(rgyud): #pa'i tshig des bdag gi rims nad song zhig ma 'dug swA hA/ sid d+hi man+t+ra pa dar tu bi d+ya tan bra ma a nu mo t+te swA hA/ skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa
419a2(rgyud): gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
419a3(rgyud): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
419a4(rgyud): lo/ he b+ha ga ban/ many+dzu shI ku mA ra sarba ta thA ga ta ba la bI d+hi dzA/ sarba ta thA ga ta nAn/ nA gre sti tiSh+Tha sarba sa ta nAn swAhA/ 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
419a5(rgyud): rdzogs so// sradangs phyir mi 'phrog pa zhes bya ba bai DUR+Ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM ma ma rak+Sha sA ga re mA hA sA gare/
419a6(rgyud): pu ru tse pu tsu ru/ sa ma ne me/ de ba bre/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / b+hI su nag po la lde gu b+h+yas te lkog mar thig le byas te sngags lan bdun bcwan
419a7(rgyud): na 'byung po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/ de lta bar yang mi nus so// rdzogs so//
